1a1(rgyud): @#/ /rgyud ma pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud): @##/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
1b2(rgyud): m o g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
1b3(rgyud): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /skye bo phyi ma rnams dang / sems can
1b4(rgyud): bsod nams chung du rnams kyi slad du rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang / lha thams cad kyi cho ga phyi ma rgyas
2a1(rgyud): par bshad par 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
2a2(rgyud): kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'dzin/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'i las phyi ma
2a3(rgyud): rnams shod cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po la bsams nas las phyi ma rnams bshad
2a4(rgyud): do| |de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi las 'byung ste/ dgon pa'am/ ri'i rtse mo'am/ dben pa'i phyogs su skyang nul
2a5(rgyud): bya ste| thab dbyibs gru bzhir byas la lha bshos su zho dbul bar bya'o/ /g.yog byed pa rnams la zho glud do/ /yang na
2b1(rgyud): n gos kun tu khru bcu pa'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te der me sbar la shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas be kaM ka ta'i yam
2b2(rgyud): sreg shing srid du khru gang sboms su chang bar 'khyud pa/ 'phan med pa stong rtsa brgyad zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du smyugs te dus
2b3(rgyud): gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /zas su phye'am/ 'o ma'i 'dag gu'am/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing las byas te mi smra bar bdug cing dus gsum
2b4(rgyud): du khrus bya'o/ /khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi glor grogs mkhar gyi sa las lag na rdo rje'i stegs bu khri 'phang can byas la/ dri dang / me tog
2b5(rgyud): dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dbul zhing pho nya mo'i sngags thams cad kyi las byas zhing ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas rig sngags
2b6(rgyud): 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das ma sngags kyis btab pa'i chus kha zas bsang gtor byas te bza' bar bya'o/ /ci dga' ba'i 'dod pa yang
3a1(rgyud): gsol bar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg de yang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje me
3a2(rgyud): thab de'i nang nas 'byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'am/ rdo rje stsol bar mdzad de/ rdo rje de lag na thogs pas lag
3a3(rgyud): na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam par 'gyur te/ thams cad du yang thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /mig btsums pa'i yud
3a4(rgyud): tsam gyis kyang 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing bskal par gnas par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyang des
3a5(rgyud): bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang la cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub kyang sbyin bar mdzad de/ cho ga rgyas par bsgrubs
3a6(rgyud): na| las thams cad rdo rje bsgyur ba tsam gyis 'grub pa dang / byed par 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dbang du bya na/
3b1(rgyud): gtsang sbrar byas te mchod rten la me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa phul zhing bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la yang mchod par byas la/ de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang
3b2(rgyud): n ul gyis byugs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du me tog dkar po snyim par bcug ste ming nas smos shing lan stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la phyogs
3b3(rgyud): mtshams ma nor bar mchod rten la bor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gter dang lha ma yin gyi phug gang na yod par yungs kar gyis bsnun na/ lha ma yin gyi phug gi 'khrul 'khor
3b4(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur zhing gter gyi 'khor thams cad choms par 'gyur te phyin par yang 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du skud pas bsrung bar bya'o/ /gter dang lha ma yin gyi phug gi
3b5(rgyud): gnas sgrub pa thams cad la bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad med par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'khor
3b6(rgyud): skyang nul gyis byugs te zhag gcig smyung ba byas te nim pa'i shing dang / arga'i bud shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dang / lan tshwa yungs mar gyis bsgos pa'am/ yang na
3b7(rgyud): mar dang / 'bras yos kyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dri zhim po dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dbul zhing lag na rdo rje
4a1(rgyud): la yang mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o/ /de nas mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun
4a2(rgyud): du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du dri dang / me tog dang / lha bshos phul nas byang chub kyi shing gi bud shing gis me sbar la
4a3(rgyud): 'bras yos kyi 'o thug gis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin byed cing nor sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze dbang du bya na/ cho
4a4(rgyud): ga de nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg brgya stong bya'o/ /rgyal rigs la ni/ nas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rje'u rigs la ni/ nas dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /dmangs rigs la
4a5(rgyud): ni| sbyar thug gi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yugs sa mo dbang du bya na/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bu mo dbang du bya na/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'di dag la yang de
4a6(rgyud): bzhin du dri dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul zhing sbyin sreg lan stong stong byas na/ dbang du 'gyur te/ za gcig par bya'o/ /dgra phung bar bya na/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu
4a7(rgyud): b zhi'am mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dkyil 'khor gru gsum skyang nul gyis byugs nas seng ldeng gi bud shing gis me sbar la ske tshe'i sbyin sreg
4b1(rgyud): lan brgya stong byas na/ de ma thag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /dgra gsad na/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /
4b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dbang du bya na/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo phyogs gang na gnas pa der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dkyil 'khor
4b3(rgyud): skyang nul gyis byugs nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me phul te mngar gsum gyi lha bshos kyang dbul lo/ /de nas a sho ka'i bud shing gis me sbar la a sho ka'i
4b4(rgyud): me tog brgya stong gis sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig gis rdo rje'i rigs gtso bo mchog gi ming tsam 'dzin pa de la yang lha thams cad kyis
4b5(rgyud): zil gyis mnan par mi nus na/ gang mdo nyid 'chang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'jigs pa thams cad la ni/ skud pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas srung ba
4b6(rgyud): byas par 'gyur ro/ /dug go cog la ni/ chu'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis byabs na med par 'gyur ro/ /zhag gcig smyung ba byas te nyi ma bzang ba la 'bab chu'i 'gram du song ste
4b7(rgyud): me tog brgya stong phul na/ me tog gi kha dog ji lta bu phul ba de lta bu'i gos rnams zhag bdun tshun chad kyis thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu'i gdon gyis byis pa zin pa la ni/
5a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs pa la dri dang / me tog dang / lha bshos phul nas byis pa shar phyogs su kha bstan te bzhag la bdug pas
5a2(rgyud): bdugs te byab pa yang byas nas lag pa la yang skud pa btags na sos par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / ro langs sgrub pa dang / bdag nyid srung ba
5a3(rgyud): dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / pha rol srung ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad la rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gcig bus bya'o/ /char dbang par 'dod na/
5a4(rgyud): chu klung gi sar 'gram gnyis ka'i sas rdo rje byas la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'gram du song la sa de lta bu la nor
5a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi bu'i gzugs byas te/ de la dri dmar po dang / me tog dmar po dang / bdug pa dang / mar me phul nas de'i mdun du rdo rje la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te
5a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod zin na/ dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gcad na/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lag na rdo rje la phul ba'i me tog rnying pa brgyad brgyas sbyin sreg byas
5a7(rgyud): na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te rgya shug dang / ban da ka'i shing blangs la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba
5b1(rgyud): byas nas dur khrod du song la dkyil 'khor skyang nul du byugs te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas nam dro bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad
5b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas de 'chang na/ rgyal po la bzhag na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur te/ ci rnyed pa yang 'phral du zad par 'gyur ro/ /ri bong gi
5b3(rgyud): khrag dang / mig gnyis dang / de bzhin du sbal pa'i mig gnyis dang / ri dwags kr-iSh+Na sa ra'i mig gnyis blangs la skar ma rgyal dang sbyar zhing zhag gcig smyung ba byas te btags
5b4(rgyud): la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du til gyi lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas dro bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na grub par 'gyur te/ rkang pas mgyogs pa'i sman du 'gyur ro/ /de nas
5b5(rgyud): mig la bskus na lo bcu drug lon pa na tshod dang ldan par 'gyur zhing gter thams cad mthong ste/ tshe lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur la tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
5b6(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dur khrod du song la dkyil 'khor skyang nul du byugs nas de'i dbus su 'bras phye las mi'i gzugs byas te/ de la gtor
5b7(rgyud): ma rgyas pa dang / dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang 'byin la ta la'i lo ma'i spu gri skra la sogs pa breg pa ltar bya/ de'i g.yas logs su mi'i thod pa dri dang / me tog dang /
6a1(rgyud): bdug pas brgyan te bzhag la thod pa'i steng du 'dug pa bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod
6a2(rgyud): b yas te| de nas thod pa blangs te dur khrod kyi mes bsregs na thod pa chag pa de'i dum grugs blangs te gzugs byas te de'i lte ba'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod
6a3(rgyud): b ya'o| |de nas thod pa'i dum grugs blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du btags la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas pas lus bskus na 'dod rgyur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can
6a4(rgyud): du 'gyur te/ gang dri mi zhim pa de dag kyang dri zhim par byed cing chu klung gyen du 'bab par byed la tshe lo bdun brgya thub par 'gyur te srung ba'i cho ga byed pas bya'o/ /chu srin na
6a5(rgyud): kra dang / /sbal pa'i tshil blangs la til mar dang sbyar te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas nas til mar des gdong bskus na/ chu'i nang du zla ba drug gi
6a6(rgyud): bar du 'dug nus par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman sgrub par 'dod na/ tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang gdam mi dgos/ smyung ba bya mi dgos par phag gi mig gnyis dang / glang po
6a7(rgyud): che'i mig gnyis dang / lig bu mig dang / pha wang long bu dang / stang zil dang / bu tra dzi ba dang / 'di rnams blangs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te
6b1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te des mig bskus na/ lus la nad yod pa rnams
6b2(rgyud): med par 'gyur ro/ /mi gdon gyis zin pa yang gdon gyis de mthong bar 'gyur te mthong nas 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya na/ ba lang gi lhas sam kun dga'i ra bar
6b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor skyang nul du byugs la sid d+ya'i shing gis me sbar te rig sngags kyi rgyal pos sna ma'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur
6b4(rgyud): ro| |de nas las de 'grub par 'gyur te/ klu mthong na tshur shog ces brjod na/ sa'i steng na gnas pa'i klu'am/ klu'i bu mo rnams 'ongs te yid la bsam pa tsam gyis
6b5(rgyud): thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa thams cad la rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams shes par bya ba'i las 'di byas na/ bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags
6b6(rgyud): 'chang gis sgrub par 'dod na/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du so ma rA dza'i khu bas log 'dren gyi gdong bris la de'i steng du seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar te le brgan rtsi'i me tog
6b7(rgyud): rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ bgegs thams cad bcom zhing brtags par 'gyur ro/ /de phyin chad sgrub pa rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin
7a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig so ma rA dza'i khu bas log 'dren gyi gdong bri na yang sgrub pa thams cad la bgegs med par 'gyur ro/ /gtum po
7a2(rgyud): nub phyogs su kha bstan pa'i mdun du mar gyi ngo zhag dgu la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te mchod pa rgyas par byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul na be kang+ka ta'i bud
7a3(rgyud): shing gis mes par te 'bras las byas pa'i khu ba lan brgya stong blangs nas sbyin sreg byas na/ lha mo'i dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ste/ de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /grub
7a4(rgyud): nas kyang ti na ra lnga brgya'am/ yang na longs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /dgra la gtse bar 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dur khrod du song
7a5(rgyud): la 'bras phye las gzugs byas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu dug gi dud pas bdugs pas tshigs rnams su btab la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya stong 'das brjod byas
7a6(rgyud): na| dgra'i yan lag thams cad du zug par 'gyur ro/ /phyung ste 'o mas bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro/ /dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes gsum la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la de'i
7a7(rgyud): m dun du seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag ste zhag gcig smyung ba byas la mchod pa byas te rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur
7b1(rgyud): t e| de nas sred med kyi bu'i chung ma la phul ba'i ras bal gyi 'dab ma rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba dug gis bsgos pas mo mtshan gyi gzugs byas te bud med kyi ming
7b2(rgyud): nas smos shing phur bu des phug na/ bud med kyi mo mtshan na zhing khrag 'dzag par 'gyur te/ /'phyung na sos par 'gyur ro/ /smigs bu'i skad dam/ ce spyang gi skad dam/ wa'i
7b3(rgyud): skad shes par 'dod na/ dur khrod dam/ khyim gtsang ma'am/ lha khang du yar gyi ngo tshes dgu la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la lag na
7b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag nas de'i g.yas phyogs su lha chen po bzhag ste lha chen po'i mdun du 'bras phye las smigs bu'i gzugs sam/ ce spyang gi gzugs sam/ wa'i gzugs
7b5(rgyud): byas la bzhag nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas la/ lha chen po la yang lha bshos ci 'byor pa phul nas smigs bu la 'bras can zho dang sbyar ba sbyin no/ /ce spyang la
7b6(rgyud): ni| sha sbyin no/ /wa la ni/ ci 'dod pa sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid la bsam ste rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas na/ ci ste smigs bu yid la bsam
7b7(rgyud): na ni| smigs bu smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ce spyang yid la bsam na ni/ lce spyang smra bar 'gyur ro/ /wa yid la bsam na ni/ wa smra bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de dag thams cad yid la
8a1(rgyud): bsam na/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ smras na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /grub nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa'i don thams cad ston par
8a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /nam 'chi ba yang ston par 'gyur/ nor yang ston par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags gang zhig las 'grub par mi byed na/ rig sngags de'i ming nas smos shing lag
8a3(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du u dum wa ra'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ rig sngags mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing dngos grub kyang myur du sbyin par byed do/ /'byung po
8a4(rgyud): dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas de'i dbus su tshon rtsi sna gsum gyi phye mas lag
8a5(rgyud): na rdo rje'i gzugs byas te de'i g.yas phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po gzhag go/ de nas lag na rdo rje la mchod pa bya ste/ 'byung po'i bdag po la lha bshos rgyas par
8a6(rgyud): dbul zhing 'byung po'i kha zas kyang sbyin par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar spyan drangs par byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang bcas te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas nas pa
8a7(rgyud): ru ra'i shing gis me sbar la ba ru ra'i sa bon nye ba'i snying pos lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas 'byung po'i bu nag po zhes bya ba 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas ci bya
8b1(rgyud): zhes zer ba dang / des yid la ci dang ci bsam pa thams cad gyis shig ces smros shig/ de nas de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa tsam gyis dpag tshad
8b2(rgyud): brgyar yang 'gro zhing de bzhin du phyir yang 'ong ngo / /dpag tshad brgya nas bud med khrid de 'ong zhing phyir yang skyel lo/ /kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / khang khyim dang /
8b3(rgyud): mal stan dag kyang sprul par byed do/ /g.yog kyang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bza' ba dang / gzhib pa dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa yang sprul par byed do/ /tshe lo
8b4(rgyud): sum brgya thub par 'gyur te/ lus zhig nas lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ma mo'i nang du song nas mchod pa rgyas
8b5(rgyud): par bya ste/ gtor ma yang rgyas par byas nas bcom ldan 'das mas srung ba bya zhing pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad byas la mar me gnyis sbar te stang zil ba so'i gab tse'i
8b6(rgyud): nang du bcug nas ma mo'i gtso mo'i mdun du pus mo gnyis btsugs te 'dug la lag pa g.yon pas mnan te rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/ de
8b7(rgyud): nas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dro ba dang / dud pa 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'bar ba ni/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma shar ba'i
9a1(rgyud): kha dog dang ldan te lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyur la rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur ro/ /dud pa 'thul na ni/ lus
9a2(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs me tog ces bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs dri zhes bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yi dwags
9a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi rigs thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/ /de la rig sngags 'chang gi rigs me tog ces bya ba de dag ni/ gnod sbyin mo rnams dang
9a4(rgyud): lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de tshe lo stong thub la/ rig sngags 'chang dri zhes bya ba rnams kyis mi tshugs shing dbang yang mi byed do/ /rig sngags
9a5(rgyud): 'chang gi rigs dri zhes bya ba de dag ni/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dag dang / ded dpon chen po'i rigs rnams dang / khyim bdag khyim chen po'i rigs rnams kyi bud med gang
9a6(rgyud): yin pa de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de tshe lo lnga brgya thub po/ /de dag kyang rig sngags 'chang me tog ces bya ba rnams kyis mi tshugs
9a7(rgyud): so| |rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yi dwags zhes bya ba de dag ni/ mi 'dod de de dag gi yi dwags rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bu mo 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag dang lhan
9b1(rgyud): cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de tshe lo sum brgya thub po/ /de la me tog gi rigs rnams ni/ me tog gi ming gis dgug par bya'o/ /dri'i rigs rnams ni/ dri'i ming
9b2(rgyud): rnams kyis dgug par bya'o/ /yi dwags kyi rigs rnams ni/ yi dwags kyi ming gis dgug par bya'o/ /de bkug na skrag ste drung du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /
9b3(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur te ming smos pa tsam gyis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rgyud phyi ma mtha' dag chub par
9b4(rgyud): byed pa la ni/ rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje yang phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur te/ lha thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur la dngos
9b5(rgyud): grub kyang bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga rgyas pa rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen pos gang bshad pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod cing bsngags te/
9b6(rgyud): de la lha thams cad sems dga' nas dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa'i snying po brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchog
9b7(rgyud): la drag tu skul bar byed pa gang yin pa de'i snying po chen po rig pa mchog gi snying po la drag tu skul bar byed pa yang ngas bshad zin to/ /rig sngags mchog la drag shul can pha rol
10a1(rgyud): gnon pa gang yin pa de dag la drag shul skul bar byed pa de nyid kyi snying po yang ngas bshad zin te/ 'di ni/ dngos grub gnyis ka sbyin par byed
10a2(rgyud): pa yin pas na/ des ni/ lha rnams kyang de bzhin du yid bskyod par byed do/ /nye ba'i snying po bshad pa na lha'i tshogs 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag skrag cing 'jigs
10a3(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ de dag bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha
10a4(rgyud): dag/ rig sngags bshad par byas te re zhig khyed la snying po mchog gi las rnams nyon cig /de nas snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ srung ba ni/ lan bdun bzlas
10a5(rgyud): brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o/ /mtshams gcad pa ni/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i phur bus bya'o/ /bskrad pa ni/ skras bya'o/ /kum+b+hi ra kha bcing bar bya ba ni/
10a6(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o/ /las thams cad dang sgrub pa thams cad la yang rig sngags kyi rgyal po snying po sbyar bar bya'o/ /sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs
10a7(rgyud): bsal ba ni/ me sbar la yungs kar bdag gi khrag gis bsgos pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na/ bgegs thams cad choms par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs thams
10b1(rgyud): cad rengs par bya na/ tsam pa ka'i sa bon la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o/ /ro langs rengs par bya na/ lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar
10b2(rgyud): gyis bya'o/ /ro langs sgrub pa thams cad dang / bgegs rengs par bya ba thams cad la ni/ snying pos bya'o/ /bdag dang grogs rnams srung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o/ /
10b3(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya ste/ rtsa ba'i las rnams la yang sbyar ro/ /phyi ma'i las rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis bya'o/ /rig sngags
10b4(rgyud): kyi rgyal po'i snying po'i las rnams sgrub pa ni/ snying pos phyi ma'i las gzhan rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po la ni/
10b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis bya'o/ /nye ba'i snying po la ni/ snying po'am/ yum mam/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o/ /pho nya'i gsang sngags rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa thams
10b6(rgyud): cad ni| bcom ldan 'das mas sbyar bar bya'o/ /nor 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas la spra ba'i
10b7(rgyud): shing gis me sbar nas 'bras dmar po la rdo rje byas te mar gyi nang du smyugs pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ dngos grub kyi mtshan mar me tog phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur ro//
11a1(rgyud): grub nas kyang ti na ra lnga brgya'am/ yang na yul sbyin par byed do/ /skyes pa dbang du bya na/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lha chen
11a2(rgyud): p o'i gnas su song ste gzugs kyi g.yas logs su arga'i shing gis me sbar nas zhag gsum gyi bar du seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing skud pas dkris pa stong rtsa brgyad rtsa
11a3(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te grog mkhar gyi phung po
11a4(rgyud): gcig 'dug par song nas de'i steng du me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa phul la de'i 'og tu a shwat+tha'i shing gis ma sbar te yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong sbyin sreg
11a5(rgyud): byas na mi'i gtso bo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ zhag gsum gyi bar du dud pa med pa'i mdag ma la 'bras dang phub ma bsres pas sbyin sreg
11a6(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /yugs sa mo dbang du bya na/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te pa la sha'i shing
11a7(rgyud): gis me sbar nas ske tshe dang / lan tshwa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na yugs sa mo dbang du 'gyur ro/ /spyan ma ma gtogs par gang gsang sngags thams cad la snying
11b1(rgyud): gzir bar byed pa dang / gdung bar byed pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gdung bar byed pa'i snying po dang bcas par sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar sbyar na/ bde blag tu 'grub par
11b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing snying po bzlas brjod byas pa la de'i 'og tu mar gyi zhag brgyad la skyes pa'i ro ma nyams pa blangs te snying pos gtor
11b3(rgyud): ma sbyin zhing de'i lag tu lig bu mig bzhag pa de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod bya ste/ yi dwags kyi rig sngags 'chang gis lag tu lig bu mig 'bul bar
11b4(rgyud): 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ des mig gnyis bskus nas/ gang la reg pa de gser du 'gyur ro/ /nye ba'i snying po thogs pa med cing
11b5(rgyud): stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i phyi ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags thams cad kyi yum gsungs pa gang
11b6(rgyud): dran par byas na/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin pa dang / rig sngags thams cad kyi nye ba'i snying po dam pa 'jug par byed pa ngas bshad pa gang yin pa'i
11b7(rgyud): spyan dang / nye ba'i snying po dran par byas na/ rig sngags sgrub par dka' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par byed cing rig sngags rnams las gang dang gang las sbyar ba de yang myur du
12a1(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags gang las thams cad la las mi byed pa de la rig sngags 'chang gi yum dang nye ba'i snying po ldan pas lag na rdo
12a2(rgyud): rje'am lha chen po'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong gis las thams cad bde blag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /rig sngags yid la
12a3(rgyud): bsam ste grog mkhar gyi sa las gzugs byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste yum dang nye ba'i snying por ldan pas
12a4(rgyud): sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgyas bsnun na/ rmi lam du ston te/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam nyid du rig sngags 'grub pa'am/ yang na mi 'grub pa yin pa'i
12a5(rgyud): rig sngags thams cad ston par byed de/ de ltar rtogs nas rig sngags bde blag tu bsgrub par bya'i/ gzhan du ma yin no/ /yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te rgya
12a6(rgyud): mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs la slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na yul sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas nya'i bar du zas
12a7(rgyud): 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ gzhan gyi yul 'khor la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing bzlas
12b1(rgyud): brjod byas na/ dmag gi dpung 'joms par byed do/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong bzung nas
12b2(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po bzlas brjod byas na/ ji tsam na lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od zer des kyang rig sngags 'chang g.yas phyogs su
12b3(rgyud): bskor nas lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgyal po sbyin par byed cing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing rgya mtshor
12b4(rgyud): ' bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te nye ba'i snying po spyan dang bcas par lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i nang du yungs kar gyi sreg blugs lan
12b5(rgyud): brgya stong byas na/ bar snang la ral gri mthong bar 'gyur te de blang bar bya'o/ /ci ste snang bar mi byed na ni/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog bzlas brjod byas na snang bar
12b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'og pag can gyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o/ /de blang pas skra lcang lor 'khyil cing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyur te/
12b7(rgyud): dpag tshad nyis stong gyen du 'phags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / tshe lo nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /gter 'byung bar 'dod na/ /rig sngags 'chang /
13a1(rgyud): gnas gang na gter yod par song la tshes grangs dang rgyud skar yang gdam mi dgos/ smyung ba yang bya mi dgos par bil ba'i me'i nang du yungs kar dang /
13a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i lo ma bsregs pa la nye ba'i snying po lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ gter gyi lha des rmi lam du ston par byed do/ /de nas rig pa mchog gis bgegs rnams kyi sbyin
13a3(rgyud): sreg byas nas blang bar bya'o/ /dga' byed gdong gis gnas bsrung bar bya'o/ /nye ba'i snying pos ni/ mar me sbar bar bya ste/ ba lang gi rwa arga'i shing bal gyis dkris la/
13a4(rgyud): ba ser mo'i mar gyi smar me sbar bar gter gang na yod pa de brtol te/ sgra tshig tshig po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na srin phyes arga'i shing bal gyis dkris la rdo rje khro
13a5(rgyud): bo'i sngags dang ldan pas srog chags go ta'i tshil gyis mar me sbyar ro/ /mtshan ma ni/ de nyid dang 'dra'o/ /nag ba la'i arga'i shing bal gyis g.yogs te pad+ma'i rgyus
13a6(rgyud): pas dkris la mi'i tshil gyis sbar te gzung ngo / /mtshan ma ni/ de nyid dang 'dra ste/ snying po chen po zhes bya'o/ /lha rnams gnas rnams pa sna tshogs mthong nas nye ba'i snying po'i
13a7(rgyud): las rnams bshad pa yin no/ /sgrub pa'i snying po stobs ldan pa/ /gang dag snying stobs med pa dang / /bsod nams chung ngu de dag gi/ pha rol phyin pa rdzogs bya'i phyir//
13b1(rgyud): gter gyi sgo yi khyad par dag /bdag gis su ni bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis/ /de nas tshig ni 'di skad smras/ /gter sgo gang dag tshangs pa yis/ /gsang sngags
13b2(rgyud): kyis ni sbyor ba dang / /cho ga sa ni nges bzhag pa/ /mi rnams cho ga med pa dang / /stobs dang mthu ni med pa yis/ /rtag tu choms par mi 'gyur te/ /gang gis mi rnams bde blag tu/ /
13b3(rgyud): longs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang / /pha rol phyin pa'ang rdzogs byed dang / /ji ltar nor rnams rab bzhag pa/ /de dag bdag gis bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis/ /de
13b4(rgyud): skad du ni tshig kyang smras/ /gter gyi sgo ni rab bshad pa/ /sa mthar rgya mtsho thug pa yi/ /sa yi 'og gnas gang yin pa/ /bdag gis su ni rab bshad kyi/ /lha rnams kyis ni
13b5(rgyud): mnyan par gyis/ /de dag gis ni kha dog mtshan/ /gsang sngags gang gis gzhom pa dang / /cho ga ji bzhin las rnams dang / /bde blag tu ni thob pa yi/ /sbyar sman bdag gis
13b6(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /de dag gi ni mtshan ma yang / /so so ru ni bshad par bya/ /gru gsum dang ni zla gam dang / /zlum po dang ni zur bzhi dang / /pad+ma chu shing lo ma dang / /de bzhin gzhan
13b7(rgyud): ma bsil yab 'dra/ /gter gyi sgo ni brgyad bshad pa/ /de dag kha dog legs par nyon/ /ngang pa'i mdog 'dra gter sgo yod/ /kA ra bA ri'i mdag 'dra dang / /'dam bu chu gsher
14a1(rgyud): 'dra ba dang / /rgya skyegs khu ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /ljang gu'i mdog can gter sgo yod/ /ba bla'i mdog dang 'dra ba dang / /g+hi wang gi ni kha dog 'dra/ /de bzhin
14a2(rgyud): b+h+ring+ga dang mtshungs/ /kha dog bshad pa 'di dag gis/ /gter sgo rnams kyi bgegs bsal bzhin/ /steng dang sa 'og gnas pa yi/ /bgegs rnams gang gis brlag
14a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i/ /sbyin sreg las ni cho ga rnams/ /rab tu bshad kyi mnyan par gyis/ /gter sgo gsang sngags gang gis dgod/ /de dag rim pa bshad par bya/ /na mo badzra
14a4(rgyud): pA Na ye| na mo ru dra ya/ na mo ma hA bid+ya rA dzA ya/ bi ru dri Ne swAhA/ ra ra nA ra swAhA/ oM ga nA ya swAhA/ bi rU pi Ni swAhA/ ti b+ha ri swAhA/ mu ka ti ni swAhA/ bi muM ti ni swAhA/ pre ta
14a5(rgyud): he swAhA| ba di ra Ni swAhA/ hau rga kho swAhA/ ga ga ne swAhA/ bi ri Ni swAhA/ aM ga ri Ni swAhA/ bi ra ga Ne swAhA/ ma hA ba ra ta swAhA/ ri Ni ba Ni swAhA/ ka ra pa rA ki ra swAhA/ bi rU pi
14a6(rgyud): swAhA| ma ri pa swAhA/ badz+dza ni swAhA/ gar+dz+dza ni swAhA/ marma Ni swAhA/ ku ni pa ti na swAhA/ sa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir skyang nul du byugs la ku sha'i stan bting la shar phyogs
14a7(rgyud): su kha bltas te 'dug nas gtsang spra dang / tshangs par spyad pa dang / dbang po dul bar bya ste/ zas su chu grog 'thung zhing las brtsams la cho ga 'dis lha thams cad bkod nas
14b1(rgyud): 'khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / ben tse dang / tsan+dan dri zhim po dag phyogs dang mtshams kyi lha rnams la dbul zhing zho dang dmar bag spangs te sngags snga mas sha mya'i yam
14b2(rgyud): sreg shing mar gyi nang du myugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bgegs thams cad phung bar byed pa'i gcod byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags bstan par bya ste/ na mo badzra pA
14b3(rgyud): Ni s+ya| ku tu ku ti/ tsi ti tsi ti/ mi ti mi ti/ ri Ni ti Ni/ mo ti ni pra mo ti ni swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na srung
14b4(rgyud): ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ a ma ra a ma ra/ ma ri ka ti ni ta na ti la ti swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te mgo bor gtor na bgegs
14b5(rgyud): rnams 'tshe bar mi byed do/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ku ti ku ti/ tu ti tu ti/ ha ra ha ra swAhA/ rig sngags 'di chu la bzlas brjod byas pa'i sar bzhag na me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
14b6(rgyud): gter sgo kun gyi bgegs rnams ni/ /rnam pa brgyad du rab bshad do/ /mi ro dag ni mi'u thung dang / /'jigs par byed pa skad cig pa/ /glang po che dang ma he dang / /rab tu 'jigs
14b7(rgyud): pa'i srin po dang / /stag dang bya dang spyil po tsam/ /bgegs rnams brgyad po rab bshad de/ /de dag phung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/
15a1(rgyud): a ri ba ri/ ti ri mi ri/ tsi ri mi ri/ par pa ni ra Ni/ ki ri ki ri/ ka li ka li/ mi ri mi ri/ shi ri shi ri/ nA sha ni nA sha ni/ staM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni/
15a2(rgyud): mo ha ni swAhA/ rig sngags 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal pos yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na/ bgegs thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
15a3(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo d+ha ga ba te bra hA ya/ khA ri bi bi ki ri/ na ri ba na ri/ mo ha ni ha ri ha ri pho ShANi swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis chu la bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir
15a4(rgyud): gtor ni/ bgegs thams cad bcom zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ na mo mi ri mi ri/ tsan+d+rI tsan+d+rI/ man+ti swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis chu la bzlas brjod byas te
15a5(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor na/ phyogs bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ khwa yi gzugs ni mi snang 'gyur/ /'phur zhing che la gsum du snang / /spyil po
15a6(rgyud): tsam zhes bya ba ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /gter gyi sgo yi ri mo ni/ thod pa rab 'dra rtogs par bya/ /de na phur bu zer snang ba/ /'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i 'od
15a7(rgyud): dang bcas/ /phur bu de ni dpal gzugs ldan/ /de la lag pas reg mi bya/ /lus ni sbyar sman bskus nas kyang / /de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya/ /gang gis sa la de lhung ba'i/ /
15b1(rgyud): nam mkha'i phub ma shu dag yung / /nim pa'i lo ma ldong ros dang / /sgog skya nas dang shing kun rnams/ /mi khrag gis ni sbyar ba yi/ /byug bas de la bsku bar bya/ /de nas sa la
15b2(rgyud): lhung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar ma byas nus mi 'gyur/ /shir ri sha yi me tog dang / /de yi rtsa ba shun phrags dang / /ru rta rgyas pos bri ha ti/ /yungs kar 'di rnams cha mnyam pa/ /ra gcin
15b3(rgyud): dag dang brtag par bya/ /lus la bskus pa'i sbyar sman 'di/ /khrag 'joms pa yi mchog yin no/ /ru rta dang ni rgya spos dang / /lig bu mig dang ldong ros bcas/ /sbal pa'i
15b4(rgyud): tshil dang ldan byas te/ /dud pa'i mig rtsi rab sbyar ba/ /'di ni mig rtsi'i rgyal po ste/ /gter gyi sgo rnams gcod pa yin/ yi me tog dang / /de yi rtsa ba shun phrags dang / /ru rta rgya
15b5(rgyud): bcas/ /b+hing+ga'i dud pas rab tu bdug /'di ni sbyar sman mchog yin te/ /sbyar sman gyis ni lus bskus nas/ /de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya/ /ci ste snang bar mi byed na/ /khra
15b6(rgyud): yi 'khrul 'khor rengs byed cing / /beg gas kun phung bar byed pa yi/ /rig sngags 'di ni de yis sbyar/ ka ruM ga ku ruM ga/ dI bya/ rU pi Na/ kan+ne tu ma ba ka ga tra/ saM b+ha be
15b7(rgyud): bid du lu ni/ ku mi ni/ hI hI nI/ hU hU hU ni/ ki ri ki ri/ ka la ka ra Ne/ ma hA bid+yA/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ tsa la tsa la tsa la/ ra ra ra/ tha tha tha/ sha sha sha/ stam+b+ha ya/ nA sha ya
16a1(rgyud): nA sha ya/ hi ri hi ri/ gi ni gi ni/ hun+da hun+da/ gr-i ha na mu ya/ ha na brah+ma Ni/ pa ta ni/ mo ha ni/ bi tsi ri/ ma ba na/ tha ra tha ra/ mi ti mi ti/ si ti si ti
16a2(rgyud): mi ri mi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ de mya ni de mya ni/ bi ti ba ti/ pa ta ni/ pa ta ni/ ha ha ha ni swAhA/ phur bu 'byin pa na mdog gsum du bcal te/ chu dang yungs kar gyis
16a3(rgyud): bsnun na/ khra de rengs bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na rgyang ring por lhung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'dis ni/ bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /na mo badzra pA Na ye/
16a4(rgyud): na mo ru drA ye/ na mo brah+mA ya/ ga ra shi ri shi ri ri/ si si ri ri/ mi ri/ ba ba pa swAhA/ rig sngags 'di'am/ yang na gos dkar can gyis gtsug phud bcing bar bya'o/ /gang
16a5(rgyud): ges nor rnams blang bya ba'i/ /gru gsum 'joms pa 'di yin te/ kho ra khor yug sbyangs byas la/ /rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya/ /de yi mtshams kyi dbus dag tu/ /ri
16a6(rgyud): mo gru gsum nag pa yod/ /ci ste de ltar mi snang na/ /de nas 'o mar gtor bar bya/ /a pa marga'i thal sman gyis/ /mkhas pa dag gis rab gtor zhing / /dung gi phye mas
16a7(rgyud): phyi bar bya/ /kho ra khor yug gtor bya zhing / /gtor dang byi dor byas nas kyang / /ci ste mtshan ma mthong 'gyur na/ /sbyar sman gyis ni bskus na yang / /lcags kyi 'khar bas
16b1(rgyud): brdabs byas na/ chags par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /zla gam dag gi dbus dag na/ /bkra shis ldan pa'i gzugs kyang snang / /ci ste de ltar mi snang na/ /thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar
16b2(rgyud): bar bya| |e 'dra bye'u rug lo ma rnams/ /mnyam par bzhag pas btsir nas ni/ /ba gcin dag dang lhan cig sbyar/ /bskol nas gtor ba byas nas ni/ /bkra shis ldan pa der
16b3(rgyud): snang ste| |'di la blo ldan the tshom med/ /sbyar sman gyis ni bskul nas kyang / /lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab par bya/ /des na sa la de ltung ste/ /rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ /zlum
16b4(rgyud): po gzhom pa'i cho ga yis/ /sbyar bar bya ba rab bshad do/ /kho ra khor yug sbyangs nas ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ /sbrul mgo gdengs
16b5(rgyud): ka'i ri mo snang / /ci ste de dag mi snang na/ /thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya/ /ka li sha yi sa bon dang / /btsod rnams dang ni ba gcin gyis/ /sbyar nas kun tu blug par bya/ /de
16b6(rgyud): nas mtshan me snang 'gyur te/ /sbyar sman gyis ni lus bskus nas/ /lcags kyi 'khar ba brdab par bya/ /des na des ni 'jig 'gyur te/ /rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med/ /gru bzhi
16b7(rgyud): po yi ri mo yang / /gru bzhi yin te bshad par bya/ /ci ste de ni mi snang na/ /thal ba'i sman ni sbyar bar bya/ /snu ha sha ra'i yal ga blangs/ /mnyam par bzhag pas btsir byas
17a1(rgyud): la| |ba gcin gyis ni sbyar nas kyang / /mkhas pa yis ni blug par bya/ /blugs nas mtshan ma snang 'gyur te/ /de la sman gyis bskus byas shing //
17a2(rgyud): lcags kyi khar bas brdabs byas na/ /chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /pad+ma yi ni dbus su yang / /snying po dag ni snang ba yod/ /sman rnams kyis ni lus bskus nas/ /
17a3(rgyud): rdo ba yis ni brdab bya zhing / /de ni snying po gzhom par bya/ /de na yod par the tshom med/ /ji ltar bdag gis bzhag pa bzhin/ /lhag par yang ni blang bar bya/ /chu shing lo ma'i
17a4(rgyud): dbyibs 'dra ba/ /sbyar ba'i thabs ni mnyan par bya/ /de ni mtshan ma snang ba ni/ /gi'u wang thig le 'dra ba yi/ /ri mo gnyis sam gsum yang rung / /yang na bzhi'am lnga yod
17a5(rgyud): de| |mtshan ma 'di dag snang bar 'gyur/ /ci ste mtshan ma mi snang na/ /thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya/ /a shwat+tha dang pa ta pa'i/ /lo ma a pa marga rnams/ /ra yi gcin gyis
17a6(rgyud): sbyar nas su/ /kho ra khor yug blug par bya/ /blugs ma thag tu snang 'gyur te/ /sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang / /lcags kyi khar bas brdabs byas na/ /chag par 'gyur
17a7(rgyud): te gzhan du min/ /bsil yab dag dang 'dra ba ni/ /yu bar bcas par snang bar 'gyur/ /gshor gyis legs par sbyangs byas la/ /de yis mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /ci ste de
17b1(rgyud): na mi snang na/ /thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya/ /in+d+ra shing gi lo ma dang / /nir rgun dag gi lo ma dag /rta yi gcin gyis sbyar nas kyang / /kho ra khor yug blugs nas ni/ /de nas
17b2(rgyud): mtshan ma snang ba der/ /sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang / /lcags kyi khar bas brdabs byas na/ /chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /chu shing lo ma 'dra ba las/ /rus sbal rgyab dang
17b3(rgyud): 'dra ba dang / /rdo rje ci ste rang 'ongs pa/ /de ni gzhom du med pa yin/ /gter gyi sgo ni thams cad la/ /phur bu rnam pa bzhi yod do/ /dbang po gshin rje lus ngan dang / /khyab 'jug phur
17b4(rgyud): bu bzhi pa'o/ /gter gyi sgo ni thams cad du/ /rig sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ gshin rje la ni/ bsreg bya rnams so/ /khyab 'jug la ni/ 'bras can sna tshogs pa'o//
17b5(rgyud): ku be ra la ni/ sbyar thug go /dpal ldan la ni/ 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyin par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ nan+te su nan+te/ go bin+te/ ri ti ri ti/ mi ti mi ti/ mo ri ti swAhA/ sngags 'dis ci
17b6(rgyud): 'dod ba'i gtor ma thams cad byin la/ de nas las brtsam par bya'o/ /gzhor gyi sngags ni 'di yin te/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ti shi ya bi ti sha ya/ na mo ma hA Shi yA ya swAhA/
17b7(rgyud): sngags 'di dag gis chu la bzlas brjod byas bsang gtor bya ste/ de nas las bya'o/ /de la gter sgo gcog pa'i mchog /rdo rje rnams dang gzhan yang gang / /khra yi rigs rnams
18a1(rgyud): gcog pa yi/ /sbyar sman rnams kyang bshad par bya/ /ka na ka yi rtsa ba dang / /a sha nag ti'i g+hi wang dang / /spu yi rtsa ba 'di dag rnams/ /arga dar ba'i shun
18a2(rgyud): phrags dang / /ril bu sran tsam byas nas kyang / /grib ma dag tu bskam par bya/ /gter sgo thams cad gcog pa 'di/ /'byung po'i mchog ces bya ba yin/ /'bam po dang ni
18a3(rgyud): gcod rnams dang / /gi wang ldong ros bcas pa dang / /kA ra bI ra'i rtsa ba dang / /arga dkar po'i shun phrags dang / /sho na ka yi shun phrags dang / /'di dag cha ni bsnyams
18a4(rgyud): byas la| |ba gcin dag dang btags par bya/ /gter sgo thams cad gcog pa yi/ /sbyar sman dag gi dam pa ste/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yin/ /ag+ni man+ta'i lo ma dang //
18a5(rgyud): e ran+ta yi rtsa ba dang / /snu ha gshi ri sgog skya rnams/ /ba gcin dag dang btags par bya/ /gter sgo gcog pa'i sbyar sman 'di/ /rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yin/ /ka ra bI ra'i rtsa ba
18a6(rgyud): dang / /chu shing sa bon skyer pa dang / /yungs dang nag ta ma la dang / /gi ri kar ni dkar po rnams/ /ba gcin ngag dang btags par bya/ /sbyar sman gyi ni rgyal po 'di/ /gter
18a7(rgyud): sgo gcog pa'i mchog yin no/ /bid+ya dzi hwa mo ra ti/ /de bzhin ram nye'u yungs kar rnams/ /ba gcin gyis ni legs sbyar ba/ /gter sgo gcog pa'i dam pa yin/ /ba
18b1(rgyud): lung gi ni me tog dang / /shal la ka yi snying po dang / /'bam po sni ha k+Shi ri dang / /gi'u wang dag dang ldan par ni/ /ra gcin dag dang btags byas pa/ /rdo rje 'joms pa'i mchog
18b2(rgyud): yin no| |ko sha ta ka'i sa bon dang / /ko bi ra yi 'bras bu dang / /du ru ka yi lo ma rnams/ /ba gcin dag dang btags byas la/ /zhag grangs bzhi bcu dgur bzhag pa/ /rdo rje
18b3(rgyud): 'joms pa'i dam pa yin/ /pa ri dzA ti'i rtsa ba dang / /su par sna dang ta ka dang / /spen pa yi ni lo ma dang / /sbrang rtsi dang ni shing kru dang / /gi'u wang dag dang sbyar ba ni/ /gter sgo
18b4(rgyud): gcog pa'i dam pa yin/ /sbyar sman dam pa 'di dag ni/ /rdo rje 'joms pa yin par bshad/ /gser rnams blang bar 'dod pa yi/ /lag pa bsku ba nga las nyon/ /ru rta dang
18b5(rgyud): ni rgya spos dang / /a li ta dang mo ra ti/ /lag pa bsku ba'i mchog yin te/ /rdo rje 'bar byed 'jigs pa yin/ /zhim thig le yi sa bon dang / /nag ta ma la'i 'bras bu rnams//
18b6(rgyud): ba gcin dag dang sbyar ba ni/ /bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba rgya spos dang / /sa ra Shi dang spu rnams ni/ /ra yi gcin dang legs sbyar ba'i/ /bde bar byed pa'i
18b7(rgyud): lag skud yin/ /ka gan 'dzi yi sa bon dang / /kar ni ka ra'i me tog dang / /pri yang ku dang rgya spos dang / /su ra bi dang tsan+dan dkar/ /gi'u wang dag dang ldan pa ni/ /bde bar byed pa'i
19a1(rgyud): lag skud yin/ /sgo glags lag pas reg pa na/ /mtshams nas kyang ni 'bye bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rengs par bya ba'i phyir/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar
19a2(rgyud): bar bya| |na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ti ri ti ri/ mi ri swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis chu la lan bdun bsngags te sgo glegs kyi ngos la gtor na rengs bar 'gyur te/ bde blag tu
19a3(rgyud): bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gter gyi sgo rnams thams cad la/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /rengs byed rmongs byed dge ba ste/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms byed
19a4(rgyud): pa| |tshangs pa nyid kyis byas pa ste/ /rmongs byed sgo yi them pa'i phyir/ /ri rab brtol nas byung ba ste/ /dri za lha mo rnams dang ni/ /mi 'am cis ni rab tu mchod/ /'joms par
19a5(rgyud): byed cing skrag byed pa/ /lha yi gzugs ldan blo gros che/ /rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya/ /ki li ki li/ paM ga yak+Shi ha ha b+hi maM gi /ha na ha na/ shU le na bi da ra ya badzre
19a6(rgyud): Na| ki li ki li shap+de na/ stam+b+ha ya ru dre Na/ de na ha na ha na shak+ti na/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ na ru ti na ru ti/ tha ra tha ra/ tha tha/ ra ra/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ stam+b+ha ya
19a7(rgyud): stam+b+ha ya/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ gardza gardza/ mardza mardza/ tardza tardza/ kiM ki ni/ kiM ki ni/ dun+du b+hi dun+du b+hi/ shukla daMSh+T+ra rA lA na ne/ ka na ne di pya rU pe/ tsa ma bin+du saM ma DA| di
19b1(rgyud): pya pra b+he| ba sha ne/ ka ha ka ha/ kha Da ga ha ste/ tri ne tre/ ru dra ya ne sh+ma shA ne/ ya dA kri da se/ gleM pA gleM pA/ ga gleM pA/ yu ra wa ra Ni/ an+d+ha kA re swa yaM ka sha ki mu ku Ta/ tsan+d+raM
19b2(rgyud): ka/ shaR+She/ de ba gan+d+harba/ yak+Sha bid+h+yA/ da rai a tse te/ su pU dzi te/ dreM bA dreM bA/ thi thi/ ma ba pa spaR+sha ma ba/ ha haM pa/ ka kaM pa/ tsi tre/ ha na ha na/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ma hA bid+yA tsa
19b3(rgyud): tu rmu kha A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar dang / chu dang / thal ba rnams las gang yang rung ba gcig blangs te rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la phyogs
19b4(rgyud): bzhir gtor na/ bgegs thams cad rengs par 'gyur zhing / dgra yang bcom par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyis gsad pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / mun par bya ba
19b5(rgyud): dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo la sogs pa byed du gzhug pa dang / gzhan yang sems can mi snang ba gang yin pa dag dang / snang ba gang yin pa dag dang / bgegs
19b6(rgyud): dang log 'dren gang yin pa dang / ci ste rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dur khrod kyi gnod pa byung ngam/ sbrul gyis bcings pa'ang rung / gzhan yang sems can gnod par byed pa
19b7(rgyud): gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'joms par byed cing rmongs par byed pa yin no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis de skad bshad do/ /gser len pa na rdo rje lag na thogs
20a1(rgyud): shing rig sngags kyi mchog 'dis sbyin sreg legs par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ bi be tA ya swAhA/ ti stoM su ka la hA ya swAhA/ kuM beSh+Ta nA ya/ pa rin+ta
20a2(rgyud): asta nA ya swAhA/ ni drA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ sha ye yur bA yu swAhA/ li bi gra re tA ya swAhA/ ba hu yak+Sha ya swAhA/ ya swAhA/ ga NA ya swAhA/ ga Na pa ta ya swAhA/ ka ma rU pa ya
20a3(rgyud): swAhA| kaM li ne swAhA/ byA g+h+rA ya swAhA/ byA g+h+rA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ rAk+Sha sA ya swAhA/ rak+Sha sA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ khaD+ga swAhA/ khaD+gA d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ ru drA ya swAhA/ ya mA ya swAhA/
20a4(rgyud): wa ru NA ya swAhA/ ku be rA ya swAhA/ pr-i thi bye swAhA/ mA tri bye swAhA/ brah+ma ya swAhA/ gang gsang sngags 'di dag gis sha ma'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na/
20a5(rgyud): bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad de/ de yang 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms pa'i nye ba'i snying po dang
20a6(rgyud): ldan pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /yang na nye ba'i snying po gcig pus bya'o/ /de ltar ma byas na brlag par bya'o/ /de nas dbang ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la
20a7(rgyud): zhus pa| bcom ldan 'das stobs po che pha rol gnon pa/ mi rnams la phan pa'i phyir nyan bar 'tshal ba de bdag la gsungs shig /khra rnams bshad pa du zhig mchis//
20b1(rgyud): brtson 'grus mthu stobs ji tsam lags/ /bdag gis the tshom de dag gsungs/ /ji bzhin du ni gsungs ba'i rigs/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen mnga' bdag gis/ /dbang ldan gyi ni
20b2(rgyud): tshig thos nas/ /dbang ldan gzi brjid chen po pa/ /tshangs pas bshad pa'i khra de nyid/ /sngon ni sa 'di steng dag na/ /rtag tu gter rnams mang po yod/ /gter de dag ni bsrung
20b3(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ /tshangs pa nyid kyis khra rnams yod/ /khra yi rnam pa brgyad bshad pa/ /brtson 'grus che zhing stobs po che/ /lag na rdo rje bka' mchog gis/ /de dag gang gis brgyar
20b4(rgyud): 'gyes dang / /gtor ma sngags rnams ji bzhin pa/ /de dag bdag gis bshad par bya/ /nag dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar/ /mgrin pa mthon kar grags pa dang / /ka pin dza
20b5(rgyud): ra mig dmar dang / /'dab bkra dang ni shel mig can/ /de la nag po ni/ gshin rje lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /dkar po ni tshangs pa lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /de bzhin du mgrin pa
20b6(rgyud): mthon ka ni/ smin drug gi bu lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /ka pin dza ra ni/ khyab 'jug lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /mig dmar ni ku be ra lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /de bzhin du 'dab
20b7(rgyud): bkra ni| dbang po lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /shel mig can ni sa'i lha lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ /khra de dag gi kha dog mtshan/ /rtags rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin/ /de da
21a1(rgyud): gi ni mdog dang dbyibs/ /rim bzhin du ni bshad par bya/ /nag po yi ni gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /kha dog rab tu nag
21a2(rgyud): pa dang / /bong tshad che zhing 'jigs par byed/ /dpag tshad gcig na gnas bzhin du/ /dril bu'i skad 'dra 'byin par byed/ /gtor ma 'dod phyir yang dang yang / /de bzhin rgyun
21a3(rgyud): tu skad kyang 'byin/ /gang gis zhi bar 'gyur ba yi/ /zas rnams kyang ni bshad par bya/ /sha btsos de bzhin brdos pa rnams/ /bya rje la ni sbyin par bya/ /myur du sngags
21a4(rgyud): kyang sbyar bya zhing / /gtor ma yang ni sbyin par bya/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ kr-iSh+Na k+ShA ya/ kr-iSh+NA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ gtor ma la yang sngags 'dis bsngags la de nas sbyin par
21a5(rgyud): bya'o| |dkar po yi ni gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /nam mkha' la dag bskor byas nas/ /de ni chu skyar mdog 'dra yi/ /'dab ma'i shugs
21a6(rgyud): kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rgyun du khor khor yug nas/ /'dab ma'i gshog sgra chen po yis/ /'brug sgra chen po 'byin par byed/ /gnas rnams su ni lan gcig gam//
21a7(rgyud): lan gnyis lan gsum bskor bar byed/ /gdon rnams lan gsum tshang ba'i bar/ /de srid du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /sna ma 'bras yos mar dag gis/ /gtor ma rnams
21b1(rgyud): ni sbyin par bya/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pa pa ta ya/ sho pA d+hi ba ta ye swA hA/ dmar po yi ni gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab
21b2(rgyud): bshad de/ /bzhad bzhin du ni skad 'byin cing / /zab mo'i sgra ni rab tu sgrog /lan lnga'i bar du skad 'byin zhing / /de ni myur du 'ong bar byed/ /ji srid lan lnga skad 'byin pa/ /de srid
21b3(rgyud): du ni gtor ma sbyin/ /dri dmar dang ni me tog dmar/ /phu la li ka sbyin par bya/ /bza' ba dang ni la tu dang / /til gyi khu ba sbyin par bya/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ rak+te rak+ta/
21b4(rgyud): k+She rak+ta d+hi pe ta ye swA hA/ mgrin pa mthon ka'i gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /sder mos kyang ni 'brad par byed/ /de ni khwa ltar skad 'byin cing / /lan
21b5(rgyud): bdun bar du skad 'byin te/ /de ni myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gtor ma myur du sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyang legs par dran par bya/ /lan tshwa med pa'i sha sbyin cing / /yam sreg shing
21b6(rgyud): yang sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis/ /de ni myur du ltung bar 'gyur/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ nI la ga sho/ nI la te dzo/ nI lA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ ka pin
21b7(rgyud): dza ra'i gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /srin bya bzhin du yang dang yang / /skad po che ni 'byin par byed/ /myur ba myur bar skad 'byin cing / /de bzhin sgra
22a1(rgyud): yang lan gsum 'byin/ /nye ba dag tu 'ong ba 'gyur/ /de tshe zas kyang sbyin par bya/ /gsang sngags kyis ni bya ba yin/ /khrag gis su ni bkang pa
22a2(rgyud): yi| |mngon sum dag kyang sbyin par byed/ /de bzhin nya dang sha rjen sbyin/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ka ra li/ ba ka ra li/ ka ra lA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mig dmar
22a3(rgyud): gyi ni gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /rta bzhin du ni skad 'byin cing / /'khar ba'i sgra ltar tsher tsher po/ /de bzhin sgra cher sgrog par byed//
22a4(rgyud): me lce 'bar ba kha nas 'byin/ /the tshom med cing myur ba ru/ /de la gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin sha ni rjen pa dang / /chang gis bkang ba'i gnod kyang byin/ /sngags
22a5(rgyud): la| na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ rak+ta ne tro rak+ta ni ba/ rak+tA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ 'dab bkra yi ni gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de/ /'brug sgra bzhin du
22a6(rgyud): skad 'byin cing / /de yang de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rang gi lus las de bzhin 'dab/ /glog gi rgyud 'drar snang bar 'gyur/ /rnga mo ltar ni brtul zhing 'ong / /dur pa
22a7(rgyud): bzhin du yang dang yang / /lan brgyad du ni skad 'byin cing / /de ni myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing / /gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin/ /bu ram zho dang sbyar
22b1(rgyud): ba yi| |zas kyang rab tu sbyin par bya/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tsi tra tsi tra k+Sho/ /pi tsa trI d+hi pa ta le swA hA/ shel mig can gyi gzugs gang dang / /mthu stobs gang yin rab
22b2(rgyud): bshad de/ /nam mkha' dag ni khebs par byed/ /de ni dal nas 'ong bar byed/ /glang po che ltar skad 'byin cing / /'dab mas rlung ni g.yo bar byed/ /'dab ma de ni rlung gis su//
22b3(rgyud): grang bar yang ni byed par 'gyur/ /skad ni lan gnyis 'byin byed cing / /de ni khad kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing / /gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin/ /de bzhin
22b4(rgyud): mar dang sbyar bya yi/ /nas kyi zas kyang sbyin par bya/ /ba yi mar dang de bzhin sha /bu ram chang gis bkang bar sbyin/ /sngags la/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ke ka rak+Sha ka kar dr-iSh+Ti/ ke ka
22b5(rgyud): rA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ khra 'di dag ni bdag gis su/ /mtshon bcas cho gar ldan par bshad/ /gang zhig khra ni nag po yi/ /sngags la brten te las rtsom pa/ /de la 'jigs pa ci
22b6(rgyud): yang rung / /cung zad kyang ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de la sbrang rtsi 'o ma sbyar/ /de las 'gal bar las bya ba/ /gang yin de ni bdag nyid brlag /bdag nyid chen po khra 'di dag /mchod
22b7(rgyud): pa byas na ldog 'gyur te/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /khra thams cad kyi gsang sngags ni/ lhag par spyan dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /khra gzhom
23a1(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags tshangs pas smras pa ngas bshad zin te/ de dang sbyar zhing las bya'o/ /ngas kyang khra thams cad phung bar bya ba'i phyir gtum po mi bzad
23a2(rgyud): pa'i rig sngags gang thos pas brag la thog tog 'bab pa bzhin du dum bu brgyar 'gro bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA tsan+te tsan+te tsin+ta na ma na
23a3(rgyud): tsa ma ne| stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ hi hi ga ka re/ ba re ye swA hA/ khra thams cad zlog pa la yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'byar byed gzhom par 'dod na/ rdo rje
23a4(rgyud): 'byar byed la bltas la rdo rje khro bo nyid bsngags te blang bar bya'o/ /sman 'di dag kyang gtor bar bya ste/ rgya sran gyi khu ba dang / sru sru'i rtsa ba dang / 'om bu bsregs pa'i khu
23a5(rgyud): ba dang / so ma dang / so ma ta pa dang / so ma dzA ti dang / 'di rnams bsres pa'i chus gtor la nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdung bar bya'o/ /gang na nyi ma med pa der nor bu me shel
23a6(rgyud): bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bcos ma'i rdo rje 'byar byed gzhig par 'dod na/ swa ri ka'i thal ba dang / gze ma dang / kan+ta ga dang / ang yag dang / dun+ti ka'i thal ba dang /
23a7(rgyud): 'di rnams bsres pas bshig na des 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcos ma'i rdo rje 'byar byed bya bar 'dod na/ lhang tsher srang gnyis dang / so ma ra tsa'i sa bon srang
23b1(rgyud): gcig dang / ba bla srang phyed dang / mon sran gre'u'i phye ma srang gnyis dang / phye ma zho gnyis dang / sa ma dzA ti zho gnyis dang / ku ta dzi zho gnyis dang / ka la pa ta'i sa bon zho
23b2(rgyud): gnyis dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te phye ma zhib mor bya'o/ /lhang tsher yang brtag par bya ste/ ka tsa pa la bsregs pa'i chu dang / 'om bu dang / in+d+ra brik+Sha bsregs pa'i
23b3(rgyud): chu dang gcig tu sbyar la ma tang+gis bskus pa'i snod kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag nas kra kan+ti dang / mu zi'i phye mas btab na/ de nas rdo rje 'byar byed de dag dang bar
23b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ sgo glegs sam/ rtsig ngos sam/ gang 'dod pa la gtum pa'i phyir gyis bskus na rdo rje 'byar byed de a sho ka'i me tog 'dra bar dmar por 'gyur ro/ /las thams
23b5(rgyud): cad la yang nye ba'i snying po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gter sgo 'di dag ngas bshad de/ /gter rnams 'di na yod do zhes/ /mngon pa'i rtags ni gang dag gis/ /nges par rtogs
23b6(rgyud): par 'gyur gyi nyon/ /rdzas kyi tshad ni ji tsam pa/ /de kun bdag gis bshad par bya/ /shing med khrad khrod gnas dag na/ /sa la tha yi shing 'dra ba/ /dkar zhing dri zhim snang ba yod//
23b7(rgyud): zabs su mi 'greng gnyis tsam na/ /nor rnams khri phrag drug yod de/ /de ni klu dang ldan pa yin/ /shing gi gnas ni du ma na/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang / /pad+ma chen po'i dri zhim
24a1(rgyud): yod| |zabs su mi 'greng gnyis tsam yod/ /nor ni drug khri lnga stong yod/ /de ni srin dang ldan pa yin/ /shing med pa yi gnas dag na/ /sa la tha
24a2(rgyud): la'i 'bru 'dra ba/ /ta la'i dri dang ldan pa yod/ /zabs su mi 'greng gnyis tsam na/ /'bum las lhag pa'i nor yod de/ /de ni gnod sbyin ldan pa yin/ /shing med pa yi
24a3(rgyud): gnas dag na/ /sa la ta la'i shing 'dra ba/ /gcig pu dri zhim ldan pa yod/ /zabs su mi 'greng gsum tsam na/ /nor rnams bye ba snyed yod de/ /de na rnam thos bu yang
24a4(rgyud): gnas| |shing med pa yi gnas rnams na/ /sa la ta yi mig 'dra ba/ /dkar zhing dri zhim ldan pa yod/ /zabs su mi 'greng gsum tsam na/ /nor rnams bzhi khri drug
24a5(rgyud): stong yod/ /de dag na ni dbang ldan yod/ /shing med pa yi gnas rnams na/ /ci ste sa la'i khri 'dra ba/ /rkang pa bzhi la ldan pa ste/ /ke ta ka ti dri can yod/ /de na bye ba snyed
24a6(rgyud): yod do| |de ni klu dang ldan pa yin/ /mtshan rtags chen po 'di dag ni/ /bshad zin gzhan yang nga la nyon/ /dbyar zhing skam la rtsub pa dang / /rgun zhing gsing mar gyur
24a7(rgyud): pa dang / /mdza' bo de bzhin byi la sbrul/ /lhan cig gcig tu gnas pa dang / /de bzhin sbrul dang ne'u le gnyis/ /khung gcig na ni lhan cig gnas/ /gang na go da dkar po
24b1(rgyud): dang / /byi ba dkar po lhan cig gnas/ /gang na wa ni nyal ba dang / /ci ste sa phyogs dro ba dang / /khyi ni rtag tu grong bor nas/ /dgon pa'i phyogs gcig gang na nyal/ /shing ni thur du
24b2(rgyud): mi 'khrung ba/ /ci ste thur du 'khrung 'gyur dang / /'o ma med las 'o ma 'byung / /mu tu'i rtswa ni gdugs 'dra dang / /rgyal mtshan 'dab ma 'dra ba dang / /shing rnams gang dag bum pa
24b3(rgyud): 'dra| |rtswa las rtswa 'byung yal ga 'phyang / /rtsub cing kha rnga 'dra ba dang / /'dab ma skam zhing lo ma snum/ /dus ma yin par me tog 'byung / /rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa dang / /tsher ma
24b4(rgyud): med las 'tshe ram 'byung / /tsher ma can las tsher ma med/ /rtse gcig shing rigs gang yin pa/ /ci ste kha drag gyur pa dang / /shing drung grog mkhar phung chen yod/ /dus ma yin
24b5(rgyud): par me tog 'byung / /shing drung gang na gzugs yod la/ /rtag tu 'bras bu mchod pa dang / /mchod pa med cing gzi brjid ldan/ /shing drung gi ni phyogs gcig na/ /bde byed mtshan
24b6(rgyud): ni snum byed yod/ /shing drung gi ni phyogs gcig na/ /ci ste rdo leb yod pa dang / /grong gi phyogs gcig ma mo yis/ /gnas yod mchod pa med pa dang / /khron pa'i phyogs
24b7(rgyud): gcig sangs rgyas gzugs/ /ci ste khron pa'i phyogs gcig na/ /bde byed mtshan ma stegs bur bcas/ /rtag tu snum pa gnas pa dang / /khron pa yi ni phyogs gcig na/ /rdo
25a1(rgyud): leb ming dang ldan pa yod/ /zhing gi phyogs gcig klu rnams kyis/ /mchod cing stegs bur bcas pa dang / /rtag tu snum dang ldan pa yod/ /zhing
25a2(rgyud): gi dbus su gang dag na/ /rdo yi phung po chen po yod/ /de na khung gi sgo yang yod/ /zhing dag gi ni dbus rnams na/ /rdo leb zur gsum yod pa dang / /rdzing bu dag gi 'gram
25a3(rgyud): dag na| |ma mo rnams kyi gnas yod pa/ /mchod pa med cing gzi byin ldan/ /mchod du zin kyang gzi med na/ /nges par de na nor yod do/ /grong gi phyogs gcig slar
25a4(rgyud): song nas/ /ra dang rmig pas rko bar byed/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i kha dag nas/ /bya rog thur du lta bzhin du/ /rtag tu skad kyang 'byin par byed/ /rdzing bu yi ni 'gram dag
25a5(rgyud): na| |ci ste gnod sbyin gzugs yod dang / /chu klung 'gram na sangs rgyas gzugs/ /dbang phyug che dang lhan cig gnas/ /grong dang grong gi phyogs gcig na/ /sa 'bigs
25a6(rgyud): zhes bya rdo leb yod/ /grong rnams kyi ni dbus dag na/ /stegs bu med pa'i mchod shing yod/ /klu yi mchod shing stegs bu dang / /lhan cig na ni gnas pa yod/ /de dag
25a7(rgyud): gi ni lho phyogs na/ /grog mkhar phung po chen po yod/ /grong ngam yang na dgon pa na/ /ma mo'i gnas ni mchod pa med/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dang nyi ma'i gzugs//
25b1(rgyud): ci ste de dag g.yon phyogs na/ /gang la nyi ma'i gzugs yod la/ /klu dag dang ni lhan cig gnas/ /zhing dbus rdo phung chen po yod/ /grog mkhar dang yang lhan cig gnas//
25b2(rgyud): sa gzhi dag kyang dud par 'thul/ /rtswa yang rnying par 'gyur ba ste/ /rtag tu yang ni gzi byin ldan/ /chu yang shin tu skam par 'gyur/ /chu dogs pha gu phung chen yod/ /sa dge
25b3(rgyud): kyang ni bye ma 'dra/ /khang pa brtsigs pa'i phyogs gcig na/ /rtag tu dud pa 'dra bar 'thul/ /grong ngam yang na dgon pa'am/ /zhing ngam yang ni khyim dag na/ /khra dang phug ron
25b4(rgyud): lhan cig tu/ /gang na shin tu mdza' bar 'gyur/ /grang ngam tsha 'am bkres pa'am/ /skom pa yis ni gzir bzhin du/ /de ltar dus ni thams cad du/ /phyogs gcig tu ni
25b5(rgyud): dga' bar 'dzin/ /zhing dag gi ni dbus dag tu/ /rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod/ /shing rnams gang la ba lang rdzi/ /bru bas gzir zhing skom pas gzir/ /rtog tu 'dzeg cing rtse
25b6(rgyud): pa dang / /sdug bsngal de bzhin rab bder 'dzin/ /dus kun tu ni ba lang rdzi/ /gang du de bzhin rtse byed cing / /grang zhing grang ba med par 'dzin/ /de bzhin du ni skyo ba med/ /pad+ma'i
25b7(rgyud): sdong bu gcig pa la/ /pad+ma la ni pad+ma skyes/ /de bzhin ut+pal ku mu da/ /ci ste kha dog ngan por 'gyur/ /dri yang zhim por mi 'gyur bar/ /'dab ma dag kyang 'khums pa
26a1(rgyud): dang / /gang la 'bras bu mi chags pa/ /de la pad+ma ku mud/ /ba gcin dang ni rta gcin dang / /rdo thal rnams dang lhan cig sbyar/ /de dang de yi me tog
26a2(rgyud): dang / /chu rnams la ni gtor byas na/ /gang na gter de gnas pa yi/ /sa phyogs de dang chu rnams dang / /me tog sngon po dmar por 'gyur/ /rtag tu sa phyogs gang dag na/ /chu
26a3(rgyud): ni khyor gang tsam yod la/ /sa gzhi de yang dro ba dang / /khang pa brtsegs pa gang dag la/ /rdo thal sngon por 'dug pa dang / /byi ru lta bur mdog dmar zhing / /bar bar du ni gnas
26a4(rgyud): pa dang / /yang na rab tu mdog sngo zhing / /phug ron mdog ltar 'dug kyang rung / /de bzhin ro ni kha ba dang / /gang na gzugs ni mdog snum zhing / /bkrus kyang shing du skam pa
26a5(rgyud): yod| |de bzhin dri dang me tog phreng / /de ni snying por ldan pa ste/ /yan lag 'bru mar bskus pa la/ /mi yi lce yis bldags byas na/ /myur du yal bar 'gyur ba dang / /gang
26a6(rgyud): na rdo rje'i gzugs yod pa/ /thur du yang ni lta bar byed/ /phyogs gcig na ni lha gzhan gyi/ /shing dam yang na rdo gzugs yod/ /mgo la rdza thogs ci ste snang / /rdzing bu
26a7(rgyud): 'gram gyi gnas dag na/ /nor lha yi ni pu yi gzugs/ /nub phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin/ /shar phyogs logs su lta ba dang / /rdzing bu'i 'gram na ma mo gnas//
26b1(rgyud): nub phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin/ /shar phyogs logs su lta ba dang / /khron po'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas gzugs/ /ci ste dur khrod gnas dag na/ /sangs rgyas gzugs
26b2(rgyud): 'dra snang ba dang / /chu med phyogs na sbrul gzugs dang / /gang na mi ro mgo med 'dra/ /rdo 'am yang na shing la byas/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag na/ /ci ste dbang po'i gzugs snang
26b3(rgyud): zhing / /sgra chen la ni zhon bzhin du/ /bum pa mgo la thogs nas kyang / /thur du lta ba yod pa dang / /mig rnams yongs kyi mi gnas pa'i/ /shing med pa yi gnas dag na/ /ma mo
26b4(rgyud): dag kyang gnas 'gyur la/ /mtshan ni thur du lta ba dang / /shing gi tshal ni gang dag na/ /ci ste glang chen gzugs yod dang / /grong nas kyang ni rgyang ring ba/ /gang na phag gi gzugs
26b5(rgyud): yod pa| |rdo'am yang na shing las byas/ /shing gi tshal gyi dbus dag dang / /shing mtshams bar la sogs pa na/ /dbang phyug gi ni gzugs yod de/ /de ni rtag tu thur du lta/ /khron
26b6(rgyud): pa'i phyogs gcig gnod sbyin gnas/ /gzugs brnyan stegs bur bcas pa ste/ /gang na klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /yang na gtum po'am brgya byin gyi/ /sha tshugs 'dra la shing
26b7(rgyud): ring thogs/ /gang na glang gi gzugs yod dang / /glang gi gzugs ni shing las byas/ /yang na sa las byas pa yod/ /shing gi tshul gyi phyi rol na/ /gang na klu yi rdo gzugs yod//
27a1(rgyud): lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag na/ /klu ni gcig pu gnas pa la/ /shing rnams kyis kyang bskor ba ste/ /mi rnams med pa'i sa phyogs bzang / /chu med pa yi
27a2(rgyud): dgon pa na/ /klu yi mchod shing kha brag bzhi/ /dur khrod na ni sbrul 'dra'i shing / /yod na klu yi mchod shing yod/ /dur khrod de na shing yod pa/ /klu shing dag gis kun nas bskor//
27a3(rgyud): dur khrod gang na khyi dang ni/ /yang na wa ni rtag tu gnas/ /grog mkhar ba yi dus kun du/ /wa rnams snang ba yod pa dang / /dgun zhing grong gi phyi rol du/ /phyugs ni rtag tu
27a4(rgyud): nyal bar byed/ /phag gam yang na khyi yang rung / /song nas rtag tu lta ba dang / /rkang lag dag gis 'bru bar byed/ /bya rog sa la 'dug nas ni/ /rtag tu thur du lta bar byed//
27a5(rgyud): grog mkhar gyi ni phyogs gcig na/ /gang du bya rog mchu dag gis/ /rtag tu rko bar byed pa dang / /sa ni rtag tu dud par 'thul/ /gang na sa ni dkar por snang / /dbyar zhing
27a6(rgyud): skam la rtsub pa dang / /rtag tu yang ni dud par 'thul/ /gtsang ma'i gnas ni gang dag na/ /rtag tu mi gtsang snang ba dang / /nyi ma nub ka dag tu yang / /dud pa med par dud 'dra
27a7(rgyud): snang / /dbyar zhing dra bas khebs 'gyur la/ /khor khor yug gas pa dang / /rtag tu yang ni rab tu 'bar/ /shing drung gang na rtag 'bar dang / /gel ba 'khri shing med pa la//
27b1(rgyud): dbyar zhing thog tog 'bar ba dang / /rtag tu tshwa sgo gang dag na/ /sa ni 'khor lo ga shol dag gis/ /khebs par snang ba yod pa dang / /grang ba'i dus na dro ba dang / /dro ba'i dus ni
27b2(rgyud): grang ba dang / /gzhan dag gis ni ma 'dres pa'i/ /shing gi tshal gyi dbus dag na/ /mi yi thod pa khung chen yod/ /a ni na dza byi dza na kan+te/ /shing med gnas na gter yod do/ /
27b3(rgyud): khang pa dog pa dag na yang / /brag ca'i sgra ni yod pa dang / /me tog med cing 'bras bur ldan/ /'bras bu la yang me tog chags/ /shing gang 'bras las 'bras bu 'byung / /me
27b4(rgyud): tog las kyang me tog skyes/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi dang 'dra ba yi/ /sa ni rab tu 'bar ba yod/ /gang na yal ga gcig bu las/ /'bras bu 'byung gi gzhan las min/ /lo ma med
27b5(rgyud): pa'i yal ga las/ /me tog gang nas 'byung ba yod/ /nyin bar lo ma 'khum 'gyur zhing / /mtshan mo 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / /shing gnyis rtse mo'i yal ga dang / /rab tu 'du bar
27b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yang / /rdzing gi 'gram na stobs bzang gzugs/ /shar phyogs su ni kha lta zhing / /sred med bu yang lho phyogs 'dug /ci ste rdzing gi 'gram dag na/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs
27b7(rgyud): yod pa dang / /kun dga' ra ba'i phyogs gcig na/ /ci ste gnod sbyin gzugs yod dang / /sku ba yi ni lo ma rnams/ /phur mar chags shing bu gu yod/ /ci ste zhing gi dbus dag na//
28a1(rgyud): klu yi gzugs dang sku la ka /yang na bde byed mtshan yod dang / /ci ste zhing gi dbus dag na/ /khron pa 'ga' zhig yod pa dang / /bde byed gnas kyi stegs
28a2(rgyud): bu yi| |phyogs gcig na ni gzugs gzhan yod/ /lam gyi bzhi mdo'i shing drung na/ /ci ste khron pa yod pa dang / /dur ba dkar po'i phyogs bzhi nas/ /rtswa rnams kyis kyang
28a3(rgyud): bskor ba dang / /shing la ci ste gzugs yod dang / /sa la sbrang mas rtag tu bskor/ /sa phyogs bzang por dbyar gyi dus/ /srin phyis phung po snang ba yod/ /rtags 'di rnams
28a4(rgyud): las gter rnams kyi/ /mtshan ma dag ni brtags byas te/ /'byung ba dag ni ngas bshad zin/ /de nas blug par bya pa'i sman/ /gang dag gi ni rtogs gyur nas/ /rtag tu
28a5(rgyud): the tshom med 'gyur pa'i/ /blug sman cho ga mnyan par gyis/ /'bras can zhos sbyar til phye dang / /kuny+dza ra yi me tog rnams/ /ma he'i 'o mas sbyar bar bya/ /sna ma'i me
28a6(rgyud): tog btags par bya/ /kA ra bI ra'i me tog rnams/ /ma he'i 'o ma ba gcin sbyar/ /sran chung til dang lhan cig tu/ /chu yis su ni btags par bya/ /kun da'i me tog
28a7(rgyud): blangs byas la/ /'o ma tsan+dan dag dang sbyar/ /in+d+ra prik+Sha'i lo ma rnams/ /zho ga chu dang btags par bya/ /nya lcibs sa ni blangs nas kyang / /chu dang lhan cig btags par
28b1(rgyud): bya| |kun da'i me tog ma bye ba/ /blangs nas 'o mas sbyar bar bya/ /arga dmar po'i lo ma rnams/ /'o ma yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /a sha na ni zho dang sbyar/ /mkhas pas blug sman
28b2(rgyud): de byas la/ /rang bzhin gyur par rtogs nas ni/ /nor yod par ni bstan pa yin/ /gzhan dag kyang ni bshad bya ste/ /ma bsregs pa yi kham phor dag /'bras phye 'dag gus bskus
28b3(rgyud): byas la/ /mdzub gang brkos nas gzhag par bya/ /rang bzhin gzhan du gyur na ni/ /nor rnams yod par shes par bya/ /yungs kar a da'i me tog rnams/ /gong bu dag tu brdzis
28b4(rgyud): nas ni| |rang bzhin gyur na nor yod do/ /'bras rnams til dang lhan cig tu/ /zho dang sbyar te gong bur byas/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang bcug la/ /mdzub gang brkos pa'i 'og tu gzhag
28b5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyur na nor yod do/ /dgun smad dus su dus rnams ni/ /mar gyis bkang ste brkos nas gzhag /zhu bar gyur na nor yod do/ /lha rnams sems can don gyi phyir/ /blug
28b6(rgyud): sman dam pa'i cho ga rnams/ /bdag gis su ni bshad pa yin/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /mig sman gang gis mig bskus na/ /sa la gter kun mthong 'gyur
28b7(rgyud): ba'i| |mig sman rnams kyang bshad par bya/ /'ug pa'i mchi ma zag pa yis/ /lig bu mig ni bsgos nas kyang / /ldong ros dag dang lhan cig tu/ /blo can gyis ni mig kyang bsku//
29a1(rgyud): ldong ros dang ni shing mngar dang / /gi'u wang dang ni 'ug pa yi/ /mig rnams lhan cig sbyar byas la/ /blo ldan gyis ni mig kyang bsku/ /ra yi gcin dang de
29a2(rgyud): bzhin du/ /byi lha yi ni gcin blangs la/ /'ug pa'i mig dang lhan cig tu/ /dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya/ /lig bu mig dang sbyar byas la/ /blo ldan gyis ni mig kyang bsku//
29a3(rgyud): rdul bye'u rang ni shi ba yi/ /khong du lig bu mig bcug la/ /dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /'jon mo'i mgo bo'i nang dag tu/ /lig bu
29a4(rgyud): mig ni bcug nas kyang / /dud pa bkag ste bsregs na ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /ne'u le'i mgo bo blangs nas ni/ /de yi nang du ldong ros gzhug /dud pa bkag ste
29a5(rgyud): bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /mthing ril sgo nga bya gag sgong / /de bzhin sbrul mgo de dag rnams/ /dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang
29a6(rgyud): ba yin| |na ma ka ri sbrul mgo dang / /lig bu mig dang sbyar byas nas/ /dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /rang shi ba yi sbrul dag gi /khong du
29a7(rgyud): lig bu mig bcug la/ /ldong ros dang ni lhan cig tu/ /dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /na ma ska ri gi'u wang dang / /'ug pa yi ni mig rnams
29b1(rgyud): dang / /'jon mo'i mgo dang cha mnyam par/ /dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya/ /lung bong gi ni mig gnyis dang / /de bzhin byi ba'i mig gnyis dang / /bya rgod mgo dang lhan cig tu//
29b2(rgyud): dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ /spre'u yi mjug ma dag dang ni/ /de bzhin 'jon mo'i mig gnyis dang / /sbrul gyi mgo dang lhan cig tu/ /dud pa
29b3(rgyud): bkag ste bsregs pa ni/ /mig sman kun gyi mchog yin no/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /mig sman gyi ni sbyor ba mchog /lha rnams dag gis bshad pa yin/ /mig
29b4(rgyud): sman rnams dang / /blug sman rnams la ni/ nye ba'i snying po sbyar bar bya'o/ /gter gyi las thams cad ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o/ /nye ba'i snying po'i las rdzogs so// //
29b5(rgyud): ngas sngar bshad pa'i pho nya mo gang yin pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo'i las bshad par bya'o/ /lha rnams/ rig sngags chen mo stobs chen mo stobs chen mo'i 'phrul gyi rig sngags
29b6(rgyud): de dag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga'i las kyang bshad par bya'o/ /de la pho nya mo thams cad kyi las ni/ 'di yin te/ longs spyod kyi gzhi sgrub par 'dod pas zhag gsum smyung ba byas
29b7(rgyud): la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lha bshos sna tshogs su phul nas mchod pa byas te pri yang ku'i shing gis me sbar la pri yang ku dang / gi'u wang dang / ril bu stong rtsa
30a1(rgyud): brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag bdun gyi tha mar longs spyod kyi gzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la mchod sbyin byas pa'i mchod sdong blangs nas mi ro
30a2(rgyud): bsreg na/ rig sngags kyi snying po dang ldan par bzlas brjod byed bzhin du mdag ma blangs la/ blangs pa de spyan gyi sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du phug ron gyi khung du
30a3(rgyud): shi bar byas te phyi ma'i mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas su song nas log 'dren gyi sngags kyis gtor ma'i cho ga thams cad byas la/ zhag gcig smyung ba byas
30a4(rgyud): te ldum bu so ma'i 'dab ma bdun blangs pa'i steng du sol ba bzhag nas gzugs kyi lho phyogs su rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ste/ dud pa 'thul ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas
30a5(rgyud): la| de brangs nas nang par bram ze rnams dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod ston byas la de nas sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing tshe lo lnga
30a6(rgyud): brgya thub la/ pho nya mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /zas su 'o ma'i 'dag gu za zhing tshes gcig la brtsams te tshes bdun gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas
30a7(rgyud): zhag gcig smyung ba byas la dka' zlog ma'i gnas su song ste 'bras phye las mdung rtse gsum pa byas pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ yul gru thob par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga
30b1(rgyud): 'di nyid kyis ma mo'i gnas su song la mchod pa byas te dbang phyug chen po'i sngags kyi las thams cad bya'o/ /ma mo'i gtso bo'i mdun du 'bras phye las 'khur ba dkris shing
30b2(rgyud): ldan par byas pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ yul gru sbyin par byed do/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna
30b3(rgyud): ma'i me tog kha ma bye ba brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ pho nya mo thams cad las so cog byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i las rnams la ni/ pho nya mo
30b4(rgyud): rnams sbyar bar bya'o/ /pho nya mo rnams la ni/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / dga' byed gdong sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa'i gsang sngags thams cad
30b5(rgyud): la ni| rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang spyan sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang na bcom ldan 'das ma nyi tshe sbyar bar bya'o/ /gdon no cog dbye bar 'dod na/ ma da na'i tsher ma dug dang
30b6(rgyud): khrag gi nang du smyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te smin drug gi bu'i gnas su song
30b7(rgyud): nas rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na/ gzhan gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
31a1(rgyud): z hag gcig smyung ba byas te lha chen po'i gnas su song la gzugs kyi lho phyogs su seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong
31a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na/ skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo tshes bdun la rgyu skar sa ri la bab pa'i tshe bil ba las shing brnyan bdun skyes pa blangs nas dug mo yungs
31a3(rgyud): kyi shing drung lan stong bzlas brjod byas te btsugs na/ grong khyer gyi mi thams cad gnyid log par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la spos kyi rengs bu blangs te mi'i tshil
31a4(rgyud): g yis bsgos nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lha chen po'i gnas su song nas mchod pa rgyas par byas la gzugs kyi lho phyogs su spos kyi
31a5(rgyud): ' dag gus mdung rtse gsum pa bris nas de'i steng du mi'i thod pa bzhag pa la 'dug ste thod pa'i snod mi tshil gyis bkang ba'i nang du spos kyi reng bu bzhag pa las thod
31a6(rgyud): pa'i nang du dud pa chags par byas nas de blangs pa lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen po dang / grogs rnams la yang skal ba sbyin te/ de nas mig gnyis bskus na/ lus mi
31a7(rgyud): snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod rgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can stobs po che tshe lo dgu brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gdon las thar par bya 'dod na/ a shwat+tha'i shing gis me sbar te
31b1(rgyud): lan tshwa dang ske tshes lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na cho nge bton nas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /dgun zla tha chung yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa
31b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing gis me sbar nas dri na shu le'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ pho nya mo thams cad kyis dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs kyi bdag po
31b3(rgyud): lcags can ni/ pho nya ma thams cad kyi gzhen 'debs pa dang / sgrub pa byed par ngas bskos te/ de dran par byas na/ pho nya mo thams cad mdun na 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /nga dang lha
31b4(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po lta bur gyur pa/ 'byung po'i bdag po'i cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa/ pho nya mo thams cad kyi yid dang 'thad pa/ tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can bshad par bya'o/ /na mo
31b5(rgyud): rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ba ra ba/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ ma ra ma ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/
31b6(rgyud): b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ha na la ha ka badzra Na swAhA/ lcags can snying lta bur gyur pa/ 'byung po'i bdag po'i cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i pho nya ma thams cad kyi yid dang
31b7(rgyud): 'thad pa bshad de/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ na ma I shwa rA ya/ na mo nan+da ke shwa rA ya/ ru lu ru lu/ pi la ta ma taM gi/ tsa la lo ha ka /duSh+Ta saM gra ha mi naM/ A be sha ya swAhA/ 'di ni/
32a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can pho nya ma rnams kyi gzhen 'debs pa dang / sgrub par byed pa thogs pa med pa'i las can no/ /gdon dbab pa thams cad la
32a2(rgyud): ni| me tog gis bya'o/ /las so cog la yang tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can brjod nas las thams cad bya'o/ /zhag gsum smyung ba byas nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag
32a3(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas bai kaM ka ta'i shing gis me sbar la bil ba'i yam sreg shing brgya stong
32a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas/ de'i 'og tu tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can gyis mtshan mo rmi lam du bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas pho nya ma thams cad las byed par 'gyur ro/ /pho nyam
32a5(rgyud): rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so/ / //log 'dren rnams kyi rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid snying po'i mchog kyang bshad par bya ste/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/
32a6(rgyud): oM bi ti ta ma ti ste ha/ snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ sgrub pa thams cad dang / las thams cad la las 'di nyid bya ste/ gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang / /gi'u wang shu
32a7(rgyud): dag ru rta dang / /sug smel yang na de bzhin te/ /sgron shing dang ni thang shing dang / /tsan+dan dang ni a ga ru/ /ka le ya ka pad tra dang / /ge sar 'di rnams cha bsnyams la/ /chu
32b1(rgyud): dang lhan cig btags par bya/ /gang na sbyar sman 'di gnas pa/ /der ni 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ /chom rkun ma yin mtshon rnams min/ /sprul rnams ma yin lha min min//
32b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskul bas/ /sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di yis lus la bskus pa ni/ /log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur/ /sbyar sman 'di ni byas nas kyang / /
32b3(rgyud): sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na/ /log 'dren rnams kyis mi tshugs te/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /log 'dren rnams kyang gzhen 'debs pa/ /sgrub pa byed par ni/ 'phags
32b4(rgyud): pa lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi thab sbyor bskos so/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan+dan dmar po'i khu bas 'phags pa bdud
32b5(rgyud): rtsi thab sbyor bri'o/ /de'i g.yog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thal bas bri'o/ /de'i log 'dren rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang lan brgya bzlas brjod
32b6(rgyud): bya'o| |de nas lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du log 'dren rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /log 'dren rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi
32b7(rgyud): dbang phyug gis rig pa mchog las bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar mo can bshad pa gang yin pa de'i phyi ma'i las rnams ngas bshad kyi/ lha rnams nyon cig /sgrub pa thams
33a1(rgyud): cad la srung ba yin te/ chom rkun dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / chu srin na kra dang / ma ka ra rnams las gnas srung ba dang / mtshams gcang pa dang /
33a2(rgyud): kha bcing bar bya ba rnams yid kyis bya'o/ /gter blang ba ni/ gter gang na yod pa der song la smyung bar byas te dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas bil ba'i shing gis
