33a3(rgyud): me'i nang du yungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ de'i 'og tu gter ston par 'gyur te/ de nas blang bar bya'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag
33a4(rgyud): gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgya stong lan re bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras
33a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi brang du bsnun la bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i til gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ dngos grub grub pa'i mtshan mar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
33a6(rgyud): dbang phyug gi yan lag dang / nying lag 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas grub nas yul gru'am/ yang na gser sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing
33a7(rgyud): rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
33b1(rgyud): dbang phyug 'brir gzhug ste 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can thor tshugs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ g.yas pa na sngags kyi nor bu thogs te/ brang na dpal
33b2(rgyud): gyi be'u yod pa pad+ma la bzhugs par bya/ g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar can 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog dang ldan pa/ thor tshugs byas shing pad+ma'i phreng
33b3(rgyud): bas brgyan pa pad+ma la bzhugs te yid tsam gyis 'dud par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang spyad pa byas pas mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung
33b4(rgyud): du ri mo'i sku gzugs bkram ste mchod pa rgyas par byas la lha bshos kyang rgyas par dbul lo/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du pri yang ku'i phye ma brdzis pas gzugs byas te/
33b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags snying po dang bcas pas lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas mjug brtul te rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams
33b6(rgyud): rnams gcad par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mas ni/ steng dang 'og bcing bar bya'o/ /steng dang 'og bcing ba na lho phyogs su skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur te/ de nas dngos grub
33b7(rgyud): 'grub pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang nye reg byas la ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste rig sngags lan brgya stong
34a1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ ri mo'i gzugs 'gul zhing sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ bla ma la phyag byas nas rig sngags
34a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod byed bzhin du gyen du 'phags par bya'o/ /'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing / dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags shing / rna ba gsang zhing mig
34a3(rgyud): rno ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / tshe lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu yang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gos
34a4(rgyud): dkar can gyi rig sngags kyi cho ga la gzhen 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i gsang sngags chen po yang ngas sbyin par bya'o/ /oM shrI paN+Da ra bA si ni/ na dza TA mu ku Ta d+ha ra Ne
34a5(rgyud): swAhA| ka be ka be ka be ki bi ri swAhA/ rig sngags 'di lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i g.yon rol du ni/
34a6(rgyud): gos dkar can gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung ba byas te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod
34a7(rgyud): pa byas nas zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas gos dkar can 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gos dkar can gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //lha rnams/ ngas
34b1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi las rnams bshad zin te/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i thogs pa med pa'i las rnams kyang bshad par bya'o/ /ston zla ra ba tshes brgyad
34b2(rgyud): l a zhag gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ka ra bI ra'i me tog brgya stong lan re bzlas brjod byas pas 'phags pa rdo rje sde la bsnun na mdun du 'dug par
34b3(rgyud): 'gyur te/ pho nya ma rnams kyis lha'i tshogs so cog 'gugs par 'gyur zhing de la dngos grub sbyin du 'jug ste/ mngags ma thag tu yid ci sems pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
34b4(rgyud): gdon rnams kyi snying gzhom par bya na/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /bca' sga la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdon la bstan na/ gdon gyi
34b5(rgyud): lus tsha bas 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /nad do cog la sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te byin na/ nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu mchog gi gzhen 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i
34b6(rgyud): snying po bshad zin to/ drag tu skul ba gzhan yang bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM hu yu hu yu swAhA/ 'phags pa rdo rje sde'i snying po'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag
34b7(rgyud): gcig smyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje'i sde bzhag nas me tog dkar po brgya stong snying po dang sbyar te 'phags pa rdo rje sde la bsnun na/ de nas 'phags pa rdo rje sde
35a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/ drag tu skul ba'i snying po mchog bzlas brjod byas pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzogs so// //
35a2(rgyud): lha rnams/ ngas 'phags pa rdo rje sde'i las gang dag gis myur du mdun na gnas par 'gyur ba rnams bshad zin te/ 'gong bar dga' ba/ mthu dang pha rol gnon pa dpag
35a3(rgyud): tu med pa'i rgyud phyi ma gang gis rtse bzhin du bde blag tu las rnams byed pa yang bshad par bya'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags
35a4(rgyud): pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ gzhon nu mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las
35a5(rgyud): de grub pas cho ga rgyas pa gzhan dag bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na/ gzhon nu'i gsang sngags dran par bya ste/ dran
35a6(rgyud): pa tsam gyis myur du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /rtse zhing sgrub na lha thams cad gzhon nu blta ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas dngos grub sbyin par byed do//
35a7(rgyud): zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas sam/ yang na kun dga'i ra ba'am/ khang stong du song nas be'u dkar po blangs te dri dang /
35b1(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan la kha lho phyogs su bstan nas sbrang rtsi dang / a lam bu mas lag pa gnyis bskus te rkang pa g.yas pa byug par bya'o/ /rig sngags kyang lan
35b2(rgyud): brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te be'u smrar gzhug go / de ste smrar mi btub na yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas smrar bcug na/ ci bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ /des
35b3(rgyud): kyang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par gyis shig ces smros shig / de nas yid la gang bsam pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ tshe la stong nyis brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhon
35b4(rgyud): nu'i las rig sngags sgrub par byed pa bshad zin to/ /ci ste rdo rje'i rigs sgrub par 'dod na/ lag na rdo rje'i sras gtsug nas byung gtum pa/ drag pa/ 'dul dka' ba
35b5(rgyud): bsten par bya'o/ /sgrub par 'dod pa gang yin pas yum snying la dran par byas te sras gtum po dran par bya'o/ /'di'i las gang sgrub na/ rdo rje'i rigs 'grub par 'gyur ba yang
35b6(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i glo g.yas phyogs su ni/ 'phags pa rdo rje sde/ g.yon phyogs su ni/ 'phags
35b7(rgyud): pa gtsug nas byung gzhag go / de dag la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams dbul bar bya ste/ 'phags pa rdo rje sde la ni/ tsan+dan dkar po dbul lo/ /'phags pa lag na
36a1(rgyud): rdo rje dang / gzhon nu la ni/ tsan+dan dmar po dbul lo/ /me tog dkar po dang / dmar po yang tshul de dang 'dra bar dbul bar bya ste/ de'i mdun du
36a2(rgyud): seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la yum gyi gsang sngags kyis tsan+dan dmar po'i yam sreg shing mar gyi nang du smyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas gzhon nu 'grub
36a3(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ bgegs med pa bde blag tu cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /rig sngags rgyal po mnga' bdag mchog /gang zhig phyag
36a4(rgyud): 'tshal mchod byed pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu lan gcig gam/ /yang dang yang du rjod byed dang / /gzi chen sras ni yum dang bcas/ /legs pa ru ni dran par byed/ /de la ngas
36a5(rgyud): ni khor zug tu/ /lag na rdo rjes bskul ba bzhin/ /dngos grub kyang ni sbyin par bya/ /gang zhig cho ga rgyas pa 'di/ /gsang bcas gsang chen ldan pa dang / /lag na rdo rjes
36a6(rgyud): sngags bshad dang / /gzi chen phyi ma'i rgyud klog dang / /gzhon nu dam pa mnga' bdag ni/ /spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa dang / /phyi ma'i rgyud las bshad pa yin/ /las rnams
36a7(rgyud): gang zhig lta byed pa/ /de la dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /lus kyi spyi bor rtag tu gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyi spyan spyi bo la bkur te rdo
36b1(rgyud): rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lha thams cad sems
36b2(rgyud): 'jig par 'gyur te/ /lhags nas khyab 'jug ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi glo g.yon phyogs su 'dug go /lha chen po ni/ g.yas phyogs su 'dug go /smin drug ma ni/ 'dzem
36b3(rgyud): bzhin du rgyab logs su 'dug go / dka' zlog ni/ mdun phyogs su 'dug go /gzhon nu dril mdzes dang / smin drug gi bu ni/ glo g.yas su 'dug go /tshogs rnams ni/
36b4(rgyud): g.yon phyogs su 'dug go /pho nya mo drug gis bskor ba'i dpal gyi lha mo gzi brjid chen mo shin tu 'od 'bar ba dag mo pha rol gnon pa drag mo ni/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
36b5(rgyud): ste| de'i lha yul ba dang / lha ma yin dang / grub pas bsten pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der ma zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te lha
36b6(rgyud): de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas so/ /de nas phyogs gcig na 'dug pa'i dpal gyi lha mo dang / pho nya mo stobs chen mo'i pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa drug kyang
36b7(rgyud): bltas so/ /de nas pho nya mo drug po rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la legs par bltas nas pho nya mo de dag gis bstod de/ pho nya mo chen mo me lce ma dang / me stag ma dang /
37a1(rgyud): phreng ldan ma dang / mdzod ldan ma dang / 'bar ldan ma dang / kha 'bar ma dang / 'di dag gis dpal gyi lha mo la bstod pa/ ag+ni dzi hwa swa yaM na ma
37a2(rgyud): pI ta daMSh+T+ra ya na maH| ya mA ya na maH/ da ha nA ya na maHbin+du dzi hwA ya na maH/ A daR+sha nA ya na maH/ bri sha lA ya na maHswAhA/ me lce mas bstod nas lha rnams dga' bar gyur
37a3(rgyud): to| |me stag ma'i rig sngags bshad de/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru swAhA/ A gats+tsha pa te swAhA/ me stag mas bstod nas phreng ldan mas bstod pa/ na mo badzra pA
37a4(rgyud): Ni ye| de ba ti/ de ba ya/ tsi yi mi yi/ ka li pra tIts+tsha bi li de ba te swAhA/ phreng ldan mas bstod nas mdzod ldan mas bstod pa/ na mo badzra pA Na ye de ba ti d+ha bA yA ti ba ri si
37a5(rgyud): ri ri| bi du ri/ dza pe na ta to da ne swAhA/ mdzod ldan mas bstod nas 'bar ldan mas mngon par bstod do/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ na maHpra tsaN+Da s+ya/ na ma skr-i twA sarba b+hU ta/ pra
37a6(rgyud): sha ma ni| sarba a ta sing+naM ba she mi hu na ni hu na ni/ mo ha ni mo ha ni/ hi hi badzra pA Ni swAhA/ 'bar ldan mas bstod nas kha 'bar mas mngon par bstod pa/ shri ye ma hA
37a7(rgyud): shri ye| tsa le ma hA tsa le/ i R+yid de ka ni/ ma hA b+ho gi ni/ b+ho ga ba ti /ma mA ba lo ka swAhA/ kha 'bar mas bstod nas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas so/ /de nas dpal
37b1(rgyud): gyi lha mo chen mo lag na rdo rje la bstod nas de nas bskyod par brtsams so/ /de nas lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas myur
37b2(rgyud): du langs te lag na rdo rje'i g.yas su 'khod do/ /stobs po che'i tshogs la gtum byed dang / gser can dang / rmugs byed dang / rdzong ldan dang / lcags can dang / so can dang /
37b3(rgyud): mtshan sbyin dang / bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa tshogs pa de dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshogs rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stobs chen mo bstod pa ni/ spyan dang
37b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas thog mar gtum byed ma brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ da ma da ma raM gA raM gA/ ga ga ga ya ga ya ga ya/ tsan+da kA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ gnyis pa ste
37b5(rgyud): gser can brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ba na ba na/ tsa la pa tsa la pa/ na mo dzA kA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ gsum pa ste rmugs byed brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa
37b6(rgyud): tsa| tsUr+Na tsUr+Na/ nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya dzaM b+ha ko dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ bzhi pa ste rdzong ldan brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ta ta ta ta/ ma ta ma ta/ kot+ta kot+ta dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/
37b7(rgyud): lnga pa ste tshogs chen mo lcags can brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ TaD+ya ThA/ ra ba ra ba/ da ba da ba/ ma ra ma re/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na
38a1(rgyud): grih+Na| ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ha na le ha ka badzre Na swAhA/ drug pa ste so can brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ hu ta hu ta/ grA ha ma pa ri/ shu mi badzra ha
38a2(rgyud): ste na/ su pra ti na dan+ta ko dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ bdun pa ste tshogs gzi bo che stobs po che mtshan sbyin brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+ho ma hA gra ha badzra sa t+ye na su
38a3(rgyud): pra ti pi ba pA la to tA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ brgyad pa ste tshogs chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor brjod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA
38a4(rgyud): hi khA hi/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha swAhA/ lha de dag gis tshogs chen po brgyad po de dag las brtsams te dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstong nas tshogs chen po de dag gis kyang dpal gyi
38a5(rgyud): lha mo chen mo la rim gro byed cing lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du song ngo / /de nas gzhon nu smin drug gi bus lha mo chen mo de dag la bstod pa mthong nas rang gi
38a6(rgyud): rig sngags kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ trai lokya dza la ni bi drA pa Ni/ sarba d+harma Ni/ sa ma Ni/ sa mi ra Ne/ sarba lo ka ba shaM ka ri/ dza dz+dze
38a7(rgyud): mu dzi/ hr-i da yaM a brta ni/ mi li mi li/ mi li tsa lA ya/ sarba lo ko ta sA da ni/ a nu na ha na swAhA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo gzhon nu smin drug gi bus bstod nas yid
38b1(rgyud): rab tu dga' zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo / /de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ba drug mas mthong nas rang gi rig sngags
38b2(rgyud): kyis bstod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ na maHsat+ya pA Ni naM/ sa t+ya bA tsa ne na sa t+ya/ ba ti ni sa t+yaM ba de sa t+yaM/ ba hi te dza ba ti/ mA la ni/ ha ri Ni brta ni/ dza lo tit+tsa li/ sarba lo ka ba
38b3(rgyud): shaM ka ri| At+ma nAM mu ni s+ya/ ki bi te/ yo ga me da re/ hi li hi li/ na mostu te swAhA/ drug mas bstod pa dka' zlog mas mthong nas mngon par bstod pa/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ s+yang
38b4(rgyud): de/ da yi ta/ a tri tre/ so me brah+ma/ bi da ni/ ri Shi ri Shi/ nak+Sha tre/ ya sa da tra s+ya d+ya na/ taM ba ta/ ka te ya ni swAhA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la drug ma dang / dka' zlog
38b5(rgyud): gnyis kyis bstong nas drug ma dang / dka' zlog ma gnyis la yang bltas te lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo / /de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo lha rnams kyis
38b6(rgyud): bstod de lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po rgyas pa phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen
38b7(rgyud): po brgyan pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po rgyas pa sgrub pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i dpal bskyed pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen
39a1(rgyud): po'i rig sngags kyi las thams cad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na rdo rjes rjes su yi rang ba/ ma grub pa rnams grub par
39a2(rgyud): byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtag tu dpal mngon par 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar
39a3(rgyud): byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'jug par byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rig sngags bshad de/ de
39a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje spyi bo la bkur te rig sngags 'di bshad do/ /na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+harma s+ya/
39a5(rgyud): na maHsaM g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ na mo yak+ShA NAM/ na mo ma hA shri ye/ tsi li tsi li/ un mA da/ pra man+te/ dr-i D+ha/ shri ye/ tsa le tsa le/ shri ye/ a ki ra Ni/ u pa tiSh+Tha/ u pa tiSh+Tha/
39a6(rgyud): i mi tiSh+Tha/ i maM pu ru ShaM/ na maHu pa tiSh+Tha/ ma ya ra ma/ gri he gri he/ de ba ti badzra swa mAn swAhA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad ma thag tu
39a7(rgyud): lha rnams kyis de thos nas snying 'dar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing 'khod do/ /de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha rnams/
39b1(rgyud): khyed kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa nyon cig /rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i phyir 'phel bar bya
39b2(rgyud): ba dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po brgyan pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po sgrub pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i sgrub pa dpal
39b3(rgyud): mngon par bskyed pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rig sngags kyi las thams cad bya ba'i phyir ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar
39b4(rgyud): byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtag tu dpal 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs
39b5(rgyud): pa| dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rig sngags bshad pa de/ bzod ldan dag /khyed kyis rgyags pa med pa'i sems
39b6(rgyud): kyis nyon cig / ngas rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo gshag sa re/ de nas lha rnams snying 'dar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing rig sngags
39b7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig sngags kyis kyang mngon par bstod de/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mos rig sngags
40a1(rgyud): bshad pa gang yin pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la bstod nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal gyi lha mo kun tu
40a2(rgyud): lta ba chen po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i las rnams bshad du gsol/ bshad du gsol/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo
40a3(rgyud): rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha rnams/ ngas bshad kyi/ khyod nyon cig /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpal mngon par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
40a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dpal thams cad skyed par byed/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas bshad par bya ste/ gang mthong nas
40a5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpal thams cad kyi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
40a6(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad brtan par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dpal rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas
40a7(rgyud): bshad do/ /sa gzhi mnyam par brtags byas la/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /khru ni bzhi 'am bcu drug pa/ /gyo mo dang ni gseg ma med/ /dur khrod yang ni shing
40b1(rgyud): gcig drung / /yang na chu klung 'dus pa'i mdo/ /sa gzhi de dag brtags byas la/ /de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /sa de lta bu mthong nas smyung ba byas te gso sbyong dang ldan
40b2(rgyud): pas du gu la'i ras dkar po bgos la lag na pog phor thogs nas phye ma red kyi dus mtshams su dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de nas nam
40b3(rgyud): phyed kyi dus sam/ yang na nang par dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ ci ste gser gyi phye mas bri na ni/ lha'i dpal 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dngul gyis ni/ dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur
40b4(rgyud): ro| |zangs kyis ni/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na tsan+dan gyi phye mas bris na ni/ dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan dmar po'i phye mas ni/ dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /pu shel
40b5(rgyud): tses ni| grod khyer zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na 'bras phye dkar pos bris na ni/ dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /nas rjen pa'i phyes bris na ni/ dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na
40b6(rgyud): me'i bsreg bya byas pa'i thal bas bris na ni/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste so phag gi phye ma'am/ sol phye'am/ dur khrod kyi thal ba yang rung ste/ tshon rtsi 'di gsum gyis dkyil
40b7(rgyud): 'khor bris na ni/ yul 'khor la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bdag nyid dag par bya ste/ rgyu skar dang mthun pa'i dus su smyung ba byas la nyi ma bzang ba'am/ yang
41a1(rgyud): na yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'am/ yang na khru bcu bzhi pa bri'o/ /ci ste thog mar shar phyogs su thig btab na ni/ rig sngags
41a2(rgyud): 'chang rnams kyi dpal 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste lho phyogs su btab na ni/ grong khyer la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste nub phyogs su btab na ni/ rig sngags 'chang
41a3(rgyud): rnams phan tshun mi mthun par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste byang phyogs su btab na ni/ dgra thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste thog mar tshon dkar po bkye na ni/ rgyal po rgyal
41a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi las 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste tshon dmar po bkye na ni/ grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste nag po bkye na ni/ grong khyer la
41a5(rgyud): mi dge bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ byang phyogs su ni/ gangs kyi ri
41a6(rgyud): gzhag go / lho phyogs su ni/ ri 'bigs byed gzhag go /de nas khor yug gi ris bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri'o/ /g.yon logs
41a7(rgyud): su ni| lag na rdo rje bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni/ dpal lha mo chen mo bri'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du ni/ pho nya mo drug bri'o/ /byang phyogs ngos su ni/
41b1(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / lha chen po dang / tshangs pa rnams de dag dang mthun pa'i 'khor dang bdud rtsi gzhag go /nub phyogs su drug ma dang / dka' zlog ma dang / gzhon nu 'khor
41b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa gzhag go / lho phyogs su ni/ tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams gzhag go /sgo re rer yang tshogs rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor gtum byed
41b3(rgyud): dang / gser can gnyis gzhag go /lho phyogs kyi sgor ni/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / rmugs byed gnyis gzhag go /nub phyogs kyi sgor ni/ rdzong ldan dang / mtshan sbyin
41b4(rgyud): gnyis gzhag go / byang phyogs kyi sgor ni/ lcags can dang / so can gnyis gzhag go /nang du ni/ bcom ldan 'das tshig ldan ma dri za'i 'khor gyis bskor ba gzhag
41b5(rgyud): go / kaR+Sha pa na brgya rtsa tshang ba'am/ yang na pa na brgyas rdo rje byas te bzhag la de'i steng du spyan gyis bzlas brjod byas pa'i bum pa mi nag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin bcings
41b6(rgyud): dang bcas pa gzhag par bya ste/ bum pa de'i nang du sa bon thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad gzhug cing 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi yal ga gzhag go /gra bzhir yang bum
41b7(rgyud): pa bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ mgrin bcings dang ldan pa la sa bon dang rin po che thams cad bcug ste 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi yal ga gzhag go /de nas rig sngags
42a1(rgyud): 'chang gang dag dpal lam rig sngags 'chang las byung ba'i 'bras bu 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /bla ma des
42a2(rgyud): kyang rig sngags 'chang smyung bar byas pa/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba/ gso sbyong gi yan lag dang ldan pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ dar dkar gyis
42a3(rgyud): gdong g.yogs pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o/ /de la nub phyogs kyi sgor bcug na ni/ dpal mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs su ni/ rtag tu rgyal
42a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /shar phyogs su ni/ 'thab mo 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /byang phyogs su ni/ bla ma'i sgo yin te/ 'jug par mi bya'o/ /de nas bla mas rig sngags 'chang
42a5(rgyud): du gu la'i ras dkar pos gdong g.yogs la dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags kyi mgo bor bsang gtor byas te gzhug go / de nas 'gron bu brgyad brgya lha la dor bar
42a6(rgyud): bya'o| |'gron bu de yang lo mas dkris na ni/ rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ras dkar pos dkris te bor na ni/ zhag bdun gyis dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /rig
42a7(rgyud): sngags 'chang de dag la lha rnams kyang bstan par bya'o/ /de nas phyir byung ste byang phyogs su song la dbus kyi bum pa'i chu khyor ba'i nang du sbyin no/ /rig sngags 'chang
42b1(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang lag pa g.yon pas mnos te btung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags rnams la yang sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su bzung ngo / /zhes smros shig ces bsgo
42b2(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /zhes smrar gzhug go /de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir
42b3(rgyud): rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smrar gzhug go / de nas rig sngags 'chang ba spu ldang bar 'gyur zhing bstod pa'i glu'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur
42b4(rgyud): ro| |de'i 'og tu 'ongs pa'i bram ze rnams kyang rgyal bar gyur cig / dar bar gyur cig ces brjod par 'gyur ro/ /dung gi sgra dang / rnga sgra yang thos par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste bud med
42b5(rgyud): gos dkar po bgo zhing snod gang ba thogs pa mthong na ni/ lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rig sngags 'chang de la dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste thu ba gang ba mthong
42b6(rgyud): na ni| rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'am/ grong gi bdag po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dpal thob par 'dod na/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i
42b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong na rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /ci ste dpal thams cad mngon par
43a1(rgyud): 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong na ni/ de yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ dgra rnams btul nas sa'i steng 'khol bar 'gyur ro/ /mi
43a2(rgyud): phal pa gang la la dpal 'dod pas dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong na yang skal pa can gyi khyad par du 'gyur zhing / rgyal
43a3(rgyud): srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po'am/ grong gi bdag por 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i las 'di ni/ don yod pa yin no/ /zhes rdo rje 'dzin pas bshad do/ /de
43a4(rgyud): n as rig sngags 'chang rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'dod pas dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen mo mthong la mthong nas zhag nyi shu rtsa
43a5(rgyud): gcig gi bar du nges par gnas par bya ste/ rig sngags gang 'dod pa bzlas brjod byas na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis de la rig sngags de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal
43a6(rgyud): po mthong ste zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nges par gnas pa yang yid la bsam pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /las rnams zin nas rig sngags kyi lha bshos sna tshogs
43a7(rgyud): dang / me tog sna tshogs rnying pa de rnams kyang bsdus la dur khrod dam/ chu klung gang yang rung bar dor bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dbang phyug nyams ba'am/ rgyal
43b1(rgyud): po'i dpal nyams pa slar gron par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des zhag gsum smyung ba byas te zla ba nya'i nub mo gnas dben ba'am/ yang na mya gro d+ha'i drung du dpal thams
43b2(rgyud): cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa/ sgo bzhi yod pa/ me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal bas bri zhing / dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags dang sbyar te de'i
43b3(rgyud): dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni/ rdo rje bri'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas phyogs su dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bri'o/ /de nas rig sngags
43b4(rgyud): 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi ngos su bum pa nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod par bya'o/ /byang dang / nub dang / lhor yang de bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /bum pa de dag gi
43b5(rgyud): nang du yang sa bon dang / rin po che thams cad gzhug go /bum pa thams cad kyang mgrin bcings dang ldan par bya'o/ /bum pa de dag thams cad du 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi
43b6(rgyud): yal ga yang btsugs te lan bdun bdun bsngags so/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dang / dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la lha bshos rgyas
43b7(rgyud): par dbul zhing mchod pa rgyas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor gur gum gyis skyang nul du byugs la de'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis
44a1(rgyud): me sbar te ba ser mo be'u yod pa'i mar gyi nang du a ga ru'i yam sreg shing ngam/ yang na pad+ma brgyad stong smyugs te sbyin sreg byas la mar gyi mar me
44a2(rgyud): brgyad stong sbar te de nas las bya'o/ /las zin nas bum pa de dag gis rgyal po de khrus byed du bcug la/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nges par gnas par byas na/
44a3(rgyud): zin pa'i rjes la rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /phal pa gang la las khrus byas na/ de'i longs spyod kyi gzhi 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po'am/
44a4(rgyud): grong gi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /ci ste ba lang dang bram ze gsod par byed na yang sdig pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang 'dod pa'i phyir byas na yang 'dod
44a5(rgyud): pa de dang de thob par 'gyur te/ ji ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring na rtag tu gnas pa de bzhin du dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'di de'i thad na gnas par 'gyur ro//
44a6(rgyud): ji ltar rdo rje 'di rtag tu nga la gnas pa de bzhin du dpal gyi lha mo 'di rtag tu de la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig rtag tu dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed
44a7(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor 'chang de la ni/ rtag tu lha rnams srung par byed cing zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ngam/ rig sngags 'chang gi bu'am/ rig sngags
44b1(rgyud): 'chang ma gang zhig dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong na/ thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /dpal
44b2(rgyud): thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so/ / //de nas drang srong lnga dga' ba'i tshal du 'khod nas gcig la gcig bltas te 'di
44b3(rgyud): skad smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di nyid ni/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /thub pa'i drung na gsang ba'i sngags/ /rnam
44b4(rgyud): pa sna tshogs thabs kyis su/ /rig mchog cho ga chen po gang / /lha rnams la ni grub sbyin zhing / /thos nas rtag tu lha rnams ni/ /lha min las rgyal ldon byed kyi/ /sems can
44b5(rgyud): rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /gsang ba'i bdag po stobs po che/ /zhi ba dang ni dul ba yi/ /thad du song nas bri bar bya/ /de nas lha'i drang srong 'od zer can dang / 'od srung dang /
44b6(rgyud): kun shes dang / gnas 'jog dang / mi sbyin gyi pu la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil
44b7(rgyud): 'khor gyi rgyal po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas lha'i glu dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo
45a1(rgyud): rjes dkyil 'khor de nas langs nas lha'i drang srong de dag la smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ khyed rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
45a2(rgyud): brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i nang du 'ongs pa
45a3(rgyud): legs so legs so/ /de nas dga' ba'i tshal chen po yid du 'ong ba dang / shing chen po yongs 'du la gnas pa'i srin mo nam gru zhes bya ba stobs chen mo/ brtson
45a4(rgyud): 'grus chen mo/ 'jig rten gsum na byis pa rnams gsong pa/ 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can de yang drang srong de dag gi thad du song ste mthong nas ltad mor
45a5(rgyud): gyur te dkyil 'khor de dang nye ba zhig tu song nas rgyang na 'dug cing rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis de'i nang du 'ong ma nus so/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
45a6(rgyud): lha rnams dang / mi sbyin gyi bu la sogs pa drang srong rnams lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing / rdo rje 'dzin srin mo nam gru zhes bya ba/ stobs chen mo/ brtson 'grus chen mo

45b1(rgyud): dpal dang ldan pa rdo rje 'dzin khros te mig dmar por bsgyur nas rang gi dpung la bltas te lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha rnams/ re zhig 'khod cig dang / 'jig rten
45b2(rgyud): na sdang ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gzhig par bya'o/ /de nas lha rnams dang / drang srong de dag gis lag na rdo rje dang / spyan la bstod nas rdo rje 'dzin srin mo chen mo/ /brtson
45b3(rgyud): 'grus chen mo/ /stobs chen mo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug mi nus kyi/ rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis kyang srin mo chen mo 'di la bstod par mdzod cig dang / des na dkyil 'khor

45b5(rgyud): phyod kyi cho 'grang dang / /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus/ /rgyab ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ /khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te/ /lto ba'i ngos
45b6(rgyud): ni rdo rjes gtams/ /ming po mdzod dang mdzod srung ba/ /khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma/ /khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya/ /skal ldan shing rta khyod kyi rus/ /lha yul dag tu grags pa yin/ /
45b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes srin mo nam gru rang gi cho 'brang la bstod nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa
46a1(rgyud): bdag nyid che/ /tshangs dang gsum la phyag 'tshal te/ dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sa 'dzin rlung rnams gang yin dang / /gang dag
46a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin stobs po che/ /grub pa rgyu ba dri za rnams/ /drang srong lha dang lha min pa/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad dang / /'od zer can dang 'od srung dang / /kun shes dang ni gnas
46a3(rgyud): 'jog dang / /thub pa chen po mi sbyin bu/ /dbang po gtum po khyab 'jug dang / /'di rnams bdag la grub sbyin shog /nam gru mo ni bshad bya na/ /mtshan mo nag mo 'jigs
46a4(rgyud): byed ma| |gshin rje'i sring mo chen mo ste/ /yongs 'du'i shing la gnas pa yin/ /ri la khyab 'jug gcig pu ni/ /bde bar nyal bar mi nyam ste/ /des ni bya yi gzugs
46a5(rgyud): kyis su| |mtshan mo khyab 'jug skrag par byed/ /lha mo nag mo stobs mo ches/ /de mthong nas ni 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de nas rtsed mo byed bzhin du/ /byis pa gsod pa'i mgrin
46a6(rgyud): pa nas| |lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ /'jigs pa'i sgra yang 'byin par byed/ /rna gnyis kyang ni ma mthong ste/ /sems nyams pas ni nga mthong nas/ /shin tu bred
46a7(rgyud): cing bzhin yang 'gyur/ /khyod ni nga la ma 'tshe bar/ /lha yi dga' gnas dga' bar gyis/ /de nas khros nas de nyid du/ /byis pa gsod la bsgo ba ni/ /lo gcig pa dang
46b1(rgyud): lo gnyis dang / /lo dgu pa la ma 'jug par/ /bzang mo song la skye rgu 'di/ /rang gi las kyis bza' bar gyis/ /ba lang rnams la gor yang byos/ /wa rnams dang ni wa gsod
46b2(rgyud): dang / /ri dwags la ni ri dwags nad/ /mi rnams la ni mi ngas byos/ /khyod kyi lus la deng brlag gyur/ /byis pa rnams ni rtse gyur cig /byis pa rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /ma

46b7(rgyud): ba la kaM swAhA/ badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de ba sa mA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ ri sha ya/ sa mA dz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stobs po ches

48b1(rgyud): dang / /til dang sbyar ba'i snum khur dang / /'bras kyi zhing de du zho dang / /ban tser 'khur ba bkra shis ldan/ /'bras kyi chung peng la phug til/ /bur mar 'o ma nya dang sha /til

48b3(rgyud): bshos sna tshogs dbul bar bya zhing / der shin tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa yang bklag par bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las bcom ldan 'das kyis
48b4(rgyud): gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bdun brgyad bskor ba gang yin pa de yang der bklag par bya ste/ rim gror bya zhing bla mar byas la dri

48b6(rgyud): na yul der zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur te/ yul der mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam gru'i cho 'brang mtshan nyid ni/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /
48b7(rgyud): des ni bdag gis nges par bstan/ /pho nya mo stobs chen mo rnams kyi las kyang bshad par bya ste/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la
49a1(rgyud): pho nya mo stobs chen mo drug ngas bshad pa gang yin pa rnams dang / tshogs rnams kyi nang na pho nya mo rnams kyi las sgrub pa lcags can bstan pa

49a6(rgyud): po gzhag go / 'og logs su ni/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i lho phyogs su ni pho nya mo stobs mo che drug gzhag go /rkang pa g.yas pa de yang 'degs par bya ste/ tshogs chen po
49a7(rgyud): lcags can stobs po che tshogs bdun gyis bskor bas lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i rkang pa g.yas pa ston cing 'dzin par bya'o/ /de nas lcags can gyi
49b1(rgyud): 'og logs su rin po che thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad gzhag par bya'o/ /yang na kaR+Sha pa ni brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar dbul bar bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dang lcags can la sogs
