79b5(rgyud): yis| |brgyan par sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /'on tan gzhi ba nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas lha de dag gis 'jigs pa'i sems kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje
79b6(rgyud): la mngon par bstod nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdo rje khu tshur gyis rig sngags chen mo'i las rnams shod cig shod cig ces smras nas/ lag na rdo rje stobs chen
79b7(rgyud): gyis/ /spyan la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ /mnyam bzhag rdo rje khu tshur gyi/ /cho ga bshad pa rab bstan pa/ /chu klung gi 'gram mam/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi
80a1(rgyud): drung du sgra skad grag pa med pa'i gnas su gtsang sbra dang / tshangs par spyad pa dang / za gcig pa dang / slong mo'i zas za zhing mi smra bar lan
80a2(rgyud): sum 'bum mam/ lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /chu klung ngam/ pad+ma'i rdzing bur me tog la lan re re bzlas brjod byas te dor bar bya'o/ /slong mo'i zas za zhing ri'am/
80a3(rgyud): dgon par ba lang gi lci ba bsreg par bya'o/ /chu'i nang du zin thig le'i lo ma bcad cing bcad cing dor bar bya'o/ /las 'di dag byas na/ lha nyid rang gi cha lugs kyis
80a4(rgyud): 'ong bar byed de/ 'gog par byed do/ /sgrub pa'am/ bdag nyid sad par 'dod pa'am/ yul gru 'dod kyang rung ste ras ma nyams pa/ skra med pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa la
80a5(rgyud): t shon rtsi sbyin dang ma sbyar ba snod gsar pa'i nang du bcug ste phyis gsar pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
80a6(rgyud): gzugs 'brir gzhug go / rdo rje'i sde yang mi'i gzugs su byas la mgo bor rdo rje bzhag ste 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin lag pa g.yon pas snyes par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i sde
80a7(rgyud): yang skra lcang lor 'khyil zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i mgo logs su ni/ gtsug nas byung gzhon nu'i gzugs la
80b1(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gser gyi kha dog can/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni/ rdo rje khu tshur ma
80b2(rgyud): gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan la gser gyi mdog can bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
80b3(rgyud): zhing 'dug pa bri'o/ /sgrub pa po yang 'og logs su pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te lag pa g.yas pa na pog phor thogs/ lag pa g.yon pa na me tog gi
80b4(rgyud): za ma tog thogs par bri'o/ /de nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang 'bras can za zhing za gcig par byas la dus
80b5(rgyud): gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du smyung ba byas te dus gsum du khrus byed cing gos gtsang ma bgos la mtshan mo ni/
80b6(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya/ nyin mo ni/ bzlas brjod bya ste/ yul gru 'dod na ni/ shu ti mar gyi nang du smyugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /zhag grangs du'i sbyin sreg byed pa de srid du bzlas
80b7(rgyud): brjod bya ste/ las so cog la dus gsum du lan sum stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /dngos grub kyi mtshan mar rmi lam du me tog gam/ 'bras bu rnyed pa'am/ 'dzin pa
81a1(rgyud): rmis na lha 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shags 'gyed pa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ rgya skyegs yungs mar gyi nang du smyugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bu 'dod
81a2(rgyud): pas ni/ til dang 'bras kyis bya'o/ /dgra gzhig pa la ni/ gu gul 'bru mar dang sbyar te khrag dang bsres pas bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad la ni/ bil ba'i yam
81a3(rgyud): sreg shing gis bya'o/ /lha bshos ni/ 'bras kyi 'o thug dang 'o ma 'bras kyis sbyar bas bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir yang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams las 'byung po'i zas kyi
81a4(rgyud): gtor ma sha dang chang dang bcas par nub mo sbyin par bya'o/ /las rnams la ni/ nas dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos dang / so sor sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdon las
81a5(rgyud): thar par bya na/ ba ru ra'i yam sreg shing ske tshes bya'o/ /lo tog rgyas par bya na/ nas dang / u dum ba ra'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o/ /dgra gzhig par bya na/ ske
81a6(rgyud): tshe'i 'bru btags te til dang sbyar ba dang / ma da na'i tsher ma'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o/ /gtan du bskrad par bya na ni/ bil ba'i 'bras bu yungs mar gyi nang du
81a7(rgyud): smyugs pa dang / bil ba'i yam sreg shing dang / bil ba'i phye ma dang / rgya skyegs phye mar byas te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs kyang 'dir
81b1(rgyud): gzhug go / bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ nyin mtshan du lan tshwas bya'o/ /ka ka dang u du ba'i yam sreg shing dang / lan tshwa las gzugs byas te bud med la ni/
81b2(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa nas/ skyes pa la ni/ rkang ba g.yas pa nas brtsam mo/ /skyes pa la ni/ nim pa'i yam sreg shing dang / skyes pa'i gzugs byas la lan tshwa e
81b3(rgyud): raN+Da'am/ zar ma'i mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /cho ga gzhan yang rtsig ngos sam/ shing leb la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bris te mgo bor yang bcom
81b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi gzugs bri'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis lag pa g.yon pa la rdo rje gtod de 'dzin par bya/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni/ bsdigs pa'i tshul du bya ste/ g.yon
81b5(rgyud): phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur ma mdog nag mor bri/ g.yas phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na rdo rje'i zhal du blta zhing bus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te rdo rje 'dzin la snyim par
81b6(rgyud): me tog 'thor bar bya/ rdo rje khu tshur ma yang lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la rab tu 'bar bar bya/ lag pa g.yas pa ni/ mdzub mor bsdigs par bya ste/ khros shing
81b7(rgyud): gos ser po gyon par bya'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo zhag bco lnga'i bar zhag bdun du sngar bsnyen pa mi smra bar dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya
82a1(rgyud): brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te zas su 'o ma dang 'bras can za zhing mar gyi mar me dang / dri dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / bdug pa la sogs
82a2(rgyud): pas mchod pa bya zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la nub gcig bzhin du gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dbul zhing rtag tu dus gsum du yang dbul lo/ /zhag bdun gyi
82a3(rgyud): bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te ka ra ba'i ra dmar mo yungs mar gyi nang du smyugs pa dang / a ka'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin
82a4(rgyud): sreg bya ste/ cho ga 'di ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /me tog dkar pos bya na'ang yam sreg shing ni/ snga ma nyid de/ mar gyi nang du smyugs pas bya'o/ /las 'di rnams gnyis te/
82a5(rgyud): dgra sdig can la bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i sa'am/ grong gi logs su rlung phyogs gang nas 'gro ba der nye'u shing dum bu dum bur gtubs pa dang / pa la sha'i yam sreg
82a6(rgyud): shing sbyin sreg bya ste/ lha bshos su zho dang / 'bras can sbyar ba dbul zhing smyung ba byas pas bya ste/ sku gzugs kyi cho ga ni/ snga ma bzhin no/ /dgra'i ba lang ngam/
82a7(rgyud): ma he rnams ma rungs par bya na/ ba lang gi sha dang / ma he'i shas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyi cho ga'i skabs su lha bshos dbul zhes 'byung ba kun rdo rje khu
82b1(rgyud): tshur nyid dbul/ mi rnams la ni/ mi shas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /tsha ba gsum dang / ske tshe 'bru mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/ /mi rnams la ni/ be kang ka ta'i yam sreg
82b2(rgyud): shing gis bya'o/ /ba lang rnams la ni/ ba lang gi lci bas bya'o/ /ma he rnams la ni/ ma he'i lcibs bya'o/ /mi dang ba lang ma he rnams kyi nad kyi gnod pa la yang
82b3(rgyud): de dang 'dra ste/ mi rnams la ni/ skra dang / sen mo dang / byi ba'i rtug pa dang / lan tshwa rnams yungs mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /ba lang gi nad la ni/ pags pa dang /
82b4(rgyud): mjug ma dang / spu dang / rmig pa rnams dang / beg tshong dang lhan cig tu phye mar byas te yungs mar dang sbyar bas ba lang gi lhas sam/ ba lang gi ra ba'am/ yang na gang
82b5(rgyud): na ba lang gnas pa yang rung ste/ der sbyin sreg bya zhing nyin mtshan brgyad kyi bar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/ /dge slong rnams la yang mchod ston byas te/ 'dir
82b6(rgyud): yang sku gzugs kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin gtor ma'i cho ga yang bya'o/ /mi rnams la ni/ grong ngam/ grong khyer gyi nang du sgo'i them ba non par bya ste/ de nyid du khyim du byas la mi
82b7(rgyud): rnams la ni/ seng ldeng gi gsol bas bya'o/ /ba lang rnams la ni/ spos kyis bya'o/ /ma he rnams la ni/ nim ba'i yam sreg shing gis byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros
83a1(rgyud): dang / lig bu mig dang / gi'u wang la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na/ sngar bshad pa'i bsnyen pa byas la/ zangs dang / lcags dang / ra gan
83a2(rgyud): la sogs pas yam sreg shing gis mig sman byas te lig bu mig dang / ldong ros dang / ge'u wang la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba blangs la/ bu mo gzhon nu gso
83a3(rgyud): s byong dang ldan zhing gos dkar po gyon pas spos chu dang sbyar te btags nas sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad
83a4(rgyud): nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin par sngar bsnyen par byas la nub mo bsgrub par bya'o/ /gtor ma yang nub mo sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa gnyis dri chus bkrus
83a5(rgyud): la mig sman de blangs te mchod nas mar gyi ngo zhag gcig la bud med shi ba mthong ba dang de'i khar mig sman de bcug la ras ma nyams par kha bcing bar bya'o/ /bud med de yang
83a6(rgyud): thog ma kho nar snum gyis bsku zhing dril te khrus byas nas spos kyis byugs la mig gnyis mig rtsis bsku'o/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil yang rgya skyegs kyis bskus
83a7(rgyud): la ras ma nyams pa zung gcig bskon te/ ku sha'i stan la mgo nub phyogs su bstan te gzhag go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad par bya ste/ dang po tshon
83b1(rgyud): sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/ /rim pa gnyis pa thal bas bya'o/ /gsum pa ni/ yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /bzhi pa ni/ chus byas la shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas bud
83b2(rgyud): med de yang seng ldeng gi phur bu'am/ lcags kyi phur bu bzhi la gdags so/ ri sngags dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad par bya ste/ dang po ni/ sangs
83b3(rgyud): rgyas byams pas bya'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ gos dkar mos bya'o/ /gsum pa ni/ gzugs chen pos bya'o/ /bzhi pa ni/ rdo rje khro bos bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rkang pa
83b4(rgyud): g.yon pa ni sa la bzhag / g.yas pa ni snying gar mnan la 'byung po'i gtor ma thams cad kyang sbyin zhing mi'i thod pa bzhi'i nang du phyogs bzhir gtor ma byin nas nam
83b5(rgyud): langs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gi glo g.yas g.yon du ni/ lag na mtshon thogs pa'i mi gnyis gzhag par bya ste/ g.yon phyogs su yang gcig /
83b6(rgyud): g.yas phyogs su yang gcig gzhag go /phyogs srung ba yang bzhir mi bzhi gzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la gzhag go /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis brtson 'grus
83b7(rgyud): brtun la nam shar phyogs su ce sbyang gi skad 'byin gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'grub par shes par bya'o/ /bud med kyi kha nas kyang 'od zer 'byung
84a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ 'od zer byung ba dang gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /bgegs byung na yang gtor ma byin na grub pa yin/ de blangs pas bdag gi
84a2(rgyud): grogs rnams dang bcas te gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing skra lcang lor 'khyil la nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog can dang ldan pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por
84a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / lag na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam zhing in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can dpag tshad gcig tu dri bsung gis khyab pa dang / bskal par gnas par 'gyur te/
84a4(rgyud): 'di'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga yang spyi dang 'dra'o/ /a pa marka sgrub pa yang 'dir bshad par bya ste/ ri'i rtse mo ra bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma'i
84a5(rgyud): gdan la bzhugs la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyar bya'o/ /'og gi g.yon rol tu ni/ rdo rje 'dzin mdog nag por bri'o/ /rdo rje sde
84a6(rgyud): yang rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar bya ste/ lag na rdo rje la lta zhing 'dug par bri'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi lag pa g.yon pa yang rdo rje'i steng du bzhag la/ gang gi phyir sgrub pa
84a7(rgyud): de yang pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te me tog gis snyim pa bkang la rdo rje 'dzin la lta zhing 'dug par bya ste/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sgrub pa po la lta zhing lag pa g.yas
84b1(rgyud): bas dbugs 'byin par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur ma yang gzhon nu'i gzugs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs/ g.yas pa na pad+ma
84b2(rgyud): 'am ut+pa la thogs te/ rdo rje 'dzin la lta zhing pad+ma'am ut+pa la rdo rje 'dzin la dbul bar blta bar bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan gyi cho ga dang / ras kyi cho ga ni/ sngar bshad pa dang
84b3(rgyud): 'dra ba bya ste/ ri mo mkhan gtsang mas bya'o/ /mar gyi ngo zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod lan brgyad stong brgyad stong byas la/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te zhag
84b4(rgyud): gsum smyung bar byas la bsgrub par bya ste/ mar gyi ngo la ni sngar bstan pa yin no/ /yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la a pa marka'i yam sreg shing mar dang sprang rtsi'i nang du smyugs
84b5(rgyud): pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi gtor ma yang ci 'byor pas bya'o/ /nang gi lha bshos kyang zho dang 'bras can sbyar ba'am/ 'bras
84b6(rgyud): kyi 'o thug 'bul bar byas na/ zla ba phyed tshun chad kyis 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /yang na a pa marka'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o/ /grong dang
84b7(rgyud): grong khyer dang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na tsa pa ta'i shing ngam/ yang na shing 'o ma can gyi drung du song la nyi ma gung gi dus su grib mas ji tsam khebs pa de
85a1(rgyud): tsam gyi phyogs byi dor bya ste/ grog mkhar gyi sas skyang nul byugs la/ sa de nyid kyis stegs bu gsum bya ste/ gcig ni/ bcom ldan
85a2(rgyud): 'das kyi/ gcig ni/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi/ gcig ni/ rdo rje khu tshur ma'i bya'o/ /mdun logs der thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la grog mkhar gyis sa rdo rje
85a3(rgyud): byas nas sa de nyid kyis skyang nul byugs te tsan+dan dmar pos mchod la ka ra bI ra dmar pos mchod par bya'o/ /lha bshos kyang ci 'byor pas 'bras can bur ma dang
85a4(rgyud): sbyar ba dang / 'bras can zho dang sbyar ba dbul lo/ /de'i nang du rtswa dur ba rtse mo ma nyams pa'i stan bting la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ gtor ma rnam gsum
85a5(rgyud): la sogs pa sbyin zhing / bcom ldan 'das de'i mdun logs kyi dkyil 'khor la thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ ra ba shar nub tu dkyus ring bar byas
85a6(rgyud): ba'i nang du shing 'o ma can tsher ma med cing rtsa ba dang bcas pa bcad de sbyin sreg byas na/ rgyal srid dam nor sbyin par 'gyur te/ mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod
85a7(rgyud): na| sbyin sreg byas na mi'i gtso bo de yang de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal rigs ni/ zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rje'u rigs ni/ zhag gnyis kyis
85b1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dmangs rigs ni/ zhag gcig gis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /las byed pa'i tshe ci ste la la zhig 'ongs te nor gyis 'drid par byed na yang las yongs
85b2(rgyud): su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nor de blang bar mi bya'o/ /g.yog byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan dang lhan cig tu gtam yang mi bya'o/ /ci ste rmi lam du lha mo las 'od zer
85b3(rgyud): 'byung bar rmis na/ de yang de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma yin no/ /sgrub par 'dod pa ni/ ci ste bud med kun 'ongs te me tog gam 'bras bu sbyin par byed na/ des na
85b4(rgyud): dngos grub 'grub par shes par byos shig / lo tog ma rungs par 'dod na/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas 'bru ma
85b5(rgyud): rung bar bya ba gang yin pa'i 'bru de nyid kyi sbyin sreg bya ste/ mchod pa yang ci 'byor pas bya'o/ /gso sbyong dang ldan pas pa la sha'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur
85b6(rgyud): ro| |nya pa rnams kyis nya mi sod par bya na/ nya pa nyid kyi khyim nas me'am shing blangs la nya pa de nyid kyi khyim nas nya blangs nas mar gyi nang du smyugs te nya pa de dag nyid
85b7(rgyud): kyi khyim gyi grar sbyin sreg byas na/ nya mi sod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ri dwags dang / phag dang / ma he dang / ri bong la sogs pa'i cho ga de dang 'dra ste/ lam gyi
86a1(rgyud): bzhi mdor sbyin sreg byas kyang rung / gtor ma yang sbyin par bya'o/ /gsod ba dang 'ching bar byed pa la ni/ rtsig ngos la rdo rje khu tshur ma bris
86a2(rgyud): te| de'i mgo bor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris la zas su dkar gsum za ba dang / gso sbyong gi yan lag dang ldan pas bya zhing / bcom ldan
86a3(rgyud): 'das la dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur ma ni/ mdog dkar por bya ste/ lag pa g.yon khu tshur bcangs la lag pa g.yas bas dbugs
86a4(rgyud): 'byin par bya'o/ /sgrub pa po yang pus mo g.yas pas la btsugs te snyim par me tog thogs par bya'o/ /de nas yam sreg shing gang 'dod pa dang / gu gul
86a5(rgyud): yungs mar gyi nang du smyugs pas nub mo sbyin sreg byas na des 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad la yang spyan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya'o/ /lha rnams/
86a6(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen mo rdo rje khu tshur ma'i las rnams ni/ ngas bshad zin te/ de la drag tu skul ba'i rig sngags dran pa tsam gyis mdun du gnas par
86a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ru tu ru tu ma ta swAhA/ de nas lha de dag 'jigs pa'i sems kyis lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing tshig
86b1(rgyud): 'di skad du rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen mo rdo rje khu tshur ma'i snying po'i las rnams shod cig shod cig ces kyang smos so/ /de nas
86b2(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje snying po'i las rnams bshad pa/ ras ma nyams pa kha tshar ma bcad pa la tshon rtsi spyin dang ma sbyar bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
86b3(rgyud): seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs shing chos ston cing bzhugs pa 'brir gzhug go / glo g.yon logs su lag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon bo'i mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
86b4(rgyud): la tshig gu'i sham thabs gyon zhing lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri'o/ /g.yas logs su ni/ rdo rje khu tshur ma mdog sngo bsangs ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la lag
86b5(rgyud): pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs/ g.yas pa na shing thog thogs pa bri'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i lde gu'am/ slong mo'i zas za zhing phyogs gtsang mar
86b6(rgyud): lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu ri mo'i sku gzugs phyogs gtsang mar bkram ste zas dkar gsum bza' zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/ yar
86b7(rgyud): g yi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zhag gsum smyung ba byas te me sbyar nas gu gul gyi ril bu mon sran rtsa'i 'bru tsam la du ru kra'i mar gyi nang du smyugs pa brgyad stong
87a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas sku gzugs 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha mo 'ongs nas dam pa gang stsol ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod
87a2(rgyud): pa yang ci 'byor par bya'o/ /dge slong dag la yang mchod ston gsol bar bya ste/ 'di ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i dngos grub yin no/ /sku gzugs de nyid kyi
87a3(rgyud): mdun du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ khu tshur bcangs pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing phye na snang bar 'gyur ro/ /
87a4(rgyud): cho ga snga ma bzhin du sa phyogs gtsang mar hUM dang ldan par lan nyi khri bzlas brjod byas na/ glang po che rgyags pa dag kyang sgyel bar byed cing 'dren par byed/ dbang
87a5(rgyud): du 'gugs par byed/ bcing bar byed do/ /'grol bar byed do/ /khu tshur bcangs pas gang la bsdigs pa de srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /klu rnams kyang
87a6(rgyud): rengs par byed/ 'khrul 'khor rnams kyang sgyel bar byed do/ /gdon rnams kyang rengs par byed cing sgyel bar byed do/ /de bzhin gdon dang yi dwags thams

94b7(rgyud): zin to| |snying po la drag tu skul ba'i rig sngags kyang bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ta ki ta ki pu ta ki swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis 'phags pa lag na
95a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas dri chu ser po dang /
95a2(rgyud): dkar po dang / dmar po dang / nag po la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas te mchod pa yang ci rigs par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod
95a3(rgyud): byas na/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo rnams dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi ma mo rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //lha rnams/ 'jig rten gyi
95a4(rgyud): ma mo rnams kyi las rnams ngas bshad do/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa las phyi ma yang bshad par bya'o/ /
95a5(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du khro bo bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas pa byas la bcom ldan 'das mas
95a6(rgyud): l as thams cad bya zhing me tog dkar po re re la lan re re bzlas brjod bye ba brgyad stong gis 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i brang du bsnun na dam pa sbyin par 'gyur
95a7(rgyud): ro| |lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gu gul bdug pas ni/ 'bebs par byed do/ /chu'am yang na rnam par bzlas brjod byas pas ni/ rgya 'joms par
95b1(rgyud): byed do/ /lo mas ni/ dug sel bar byed do/ /srung ba ni/ skud pa'am gos kyi grar mdud pa bya ste/ de dag thams cad kyang lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas pas ni/
95b2(rgyud): longs spyod kyi gzhi 'dod na ras ma nyams pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo mdog nag la mig dmar ba/ sham thabs ser po gyon
95b3(rgyud): zhing skra kham par 'dug la sbrul gyi phreng bas brgyan te pad+ma la 'dug pa 'brir gzhug go / de nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te sku gzugs
95b4(rgyud): kyi mdun du byang chub kyi shing bud shing gis me sbar nas pad+ma dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du smyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ dngos grub 'grub
95b5(rgyud): pa'i mtshan mar me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang khams gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa yang ci 'byor pas bya'o/ /bzlas brjod byas pa
95b6(rgyud): tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do/ /'o ma'am chus ni/ dug sel bar byed do/ /sas ni/ kham phor lag pa la 'bebs par byed do/ /mi'i thod pa dang
95b7(rgyud): bum pa la yang 'bebs par byed do/ /yan lag kyang ma rungs par byed nus so/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te li khri blangs la thod pa'i nang
96a1(rgyud): d u bzhag ste lha chen po'i gnas su song la gzugs kyi g.yas logs su dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar te li khri btso bar bya zhing rig
96a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis li khri blangs te khyim du khyer la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas mar gyi
96a3(rgyud): ngo zhag brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa
96a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal pos
96a5(rgyud): ni| bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis li khri blangs te a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la dro bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags brjod na 'grub
96a6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang thig le byas na lus mi snang ba dang / 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur la rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod ci 'dod
96a7(rgyud): pa'i kha zas rnams longs spyod cing tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten
96b1(rgyud): gyi drung du mchod pa rgyas par byas la lha bshos kyang rab tu rgyas par phul te bcom ldan 'das mas las thams cad bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod rten gyi
96b2(rgyud): m dun du ldon gros kyi ral gri bris la lag mthil du rdo rje bris te lag pas ral gri bzung nas 'phar zhing ku co'i sgra thos par gyur gyi bar du rig sngags kyi rgyal po brjod
96b3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das ma dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang bcas par dran par bya'o/ /de nas lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de lag
96b4(rgyud): na 'ongs pas nyi ma shar ba'i mdog dang ldan zhing skra lcang lo 'khyil ba lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba ma gtogs par
96b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod pa dang / bud med bdun gyis bskor nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / sdang bar sems pa gang yin pa de dag
96b6(rgyud): bsam pa tsam gyis chom par 'gyur te/ tshe lo khri sum stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams/ rdo rje khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu
96b7(rgyud): med pa'i las rnams ngas bshad zin to/ /'di la drag tu bskul ba'i snying po mchog gi rig sngags kyang bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ hUM dz+wa lA na lA ya phaT
97a1(rgyud): swA hA/ /gsang sngags 'di ni/ cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la drag tu skul ba yin te/ rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par byed do/ /mar gyi ngo zhag
97a2(rgyud): bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas dkyil 'khor tsan+dan dmar pos skyang nul
97a3(rgyud): byugs la/ kA ra bI ra'i me tog brgyad brgyas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la bsnun nas 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad las
97a4(rgyud): thams cad byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams/ rdo rje khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa'i las rnams ngas bshad zin to/ /
97a5(rgyud): tshangs pas bshad pa'i las kyang bstan par bya ste/ srung ba ni/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o/ /gdon bskyod pa ni/ mthe bos bya'o/ /lo thog ma rungs par
97a6(rgyud): bya ba ni/ yid kyis bya'o/ /chu ma rungs par bya ba ni/ lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o/ /dgra gsad par 'dod na/ dgra gang na 'dug pa de logs
97a7(rgyud): su kha bltas te zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na zhag bdun gyi nyin par dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang
97b1(rgyud): du bya bar 'dod na/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ka ra bI ra'i me tog brgyad brgyas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /khrag 'dzag par bya
97b2(rgyud): na| zhag gsum gyi bar du rgya skyegs kyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya brgyad brgya byas na khrag mang du 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /'o ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /pha
97b3(rgyud): rol gyi yul 'khor gzhom na/ sngar ngas las bshad pa'i las gang yin pa des rkang rdzas kyi rdul gyis zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /lha rnams/
97b4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i snying po la drag tu skul pa'i gsang sngags kyang bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ na maHpi tA ma hA s+ya/ oM swa yaM b+hu be dz+wa la phaT swA hA/ mar gyi ngo
97b5(rgyud): zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang phul nas me tog dkar po brgya stong gis
97b6(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la bsnun na/ de nas tshangs pas dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams/ tshangs pa chen pos bshad pa'i rig sngags kyi las rnams
97b7(rgyud): ngas bshad zin to/ /'jig rten skyong pa bzhis bshad pa'i dga' byed gdong gi las kyang bshad par bye ste/ srung ba ni/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud
98a1(rgyud): pas bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga la ni/ las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mas ni/ lha rnams spyan drang bar bya'o//
98a2(rgyud): snying pos ni/ slar gtang bar bya'o/ /gdon thams cad kyi mtshams gcad pa ni/ yid kyis bya ste/ dgrol ba yang yid la bya'o/ /dgra gzhig par 'dod na/ mar gyi
98a3(rgyud): ngo zhag brgyad la brtsams te dus gsum du phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag bdun gyi nyin par dgra 'jigs par 'gyur ro//
98a4(rgyud): skyes pa dbang du bya na/ yar gyi ngo tshas bdun la brtsams te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas arga'i shing gis mi sbar la til nag pos sbyin
98a5(rgyud): sreg lan brgyad stong byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya na/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras yos kyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na
98a6(rgyud): bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin pa rnams la ni/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor bas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa
98a7(rgyud): tsam gyis ni/ gdon thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas
98b1(rgyud): byang chub kyi shing gis bud shing la me sbar nas a pa ra dzi ta dkar po'i me tog gis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ dga' byed gdong gis dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /
98b2(rgyud): gdon gyis zin pa rnams la a par tsi ta'i me tog lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdon gyi kha zas kyi nang du byin/ gdon lag pa phan tshun 'ching bar byed cing kun tu
98b3(rgyud): rgyug ste ci bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa mthong zhing ldan pa de la ni/ gdon rnams kyang 'byer zhing lha rnams kyang yid
98b4(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon rnams kyis kyang ma 'dod cing mthong na 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ lha rnams/ 'di dag gi snying la drag tu skul ba'i gsang sngags sngags kyang
98b5(rgyud): bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ badzriM badzriM ba lo ka pA lA ya swA hA/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la/ /gcig smyung ba byas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
98b6(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dga' byed gdong gis dam pa sbyin par byed do/ /rig sngags thams cad la yang sgrub pa'i tshe thog ma kho nar
98b7(rgyud): snying la drag tu skul ba'i gsang sngags kyis mar dang gu gul gyis lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas la de nas rig sngags bsgrub par bya'o/ /las kyi mjug tu yang
99a1(rgyud): yungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas byas na las des drag tu skul ba'i rig sngags thams cad
99a2(rgyud): kyis dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /de nas lha dag las 'di thos pas yid 'jigs shing snying 'dar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
99a3(rgyud): 'das lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzod ldan dag /khyed sems rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig /ci ste dam tshig 'di las 'gal bar
99a4(rgyud): byas te dngos grub sbyin par mi byed na/ ngas rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas spyi bo gsheg go /de nas rdo rje khro bos ca co'i sgra bon te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag
99a5(rgyud): na rdo rje gang na ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ khyed kyis sems can thams cad
99a6(rgyud): la phan pa'i phyir zhus te cho ga rgyas pa chen po rig pa mchog gi rgyud phyi ma dang bcas/ gsang ba dang bcas par bshad na/ bdag gis kyang sems can rnams
99a7(rgyud): kyi don gyi phyir dang / gdon dang drag shul can mi rnams la gang 'tshe ba yin pa'i gdon de dag nges par gzhig pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'bri bar bgyi'i/
99b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ snying rje'i sems kyis gdon rnams kyi rus dang / rigs ming de dag bdag la gsungs shig /de skad ces smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
99b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor/ gang khyod sems can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ sems
99b3(rgyud): can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gdon rnams kyi rus dang / ming nga la dris pa legs so legs so/ /de ngas bshad pa bzhin du nyon cig /'jig rten dag na gdon rnams ni//
99b4(rgyud): drag cing sbyor ba sna tshogs yod/ /gdon yod de dag ci 'dra ba/ /go rim bzhin du bshad par bya/ /gdon rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ni/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na gnas//
99b5(rgyud): de las sa 'dir rgyu ba yi/ /gdon ni bco brgyad shes pa dang / /gdon rnams 'ong bar 'jug pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan ma dag dang ni/ /gso rung mi rung dpyad pa dang / /
99b6(rgyud): gso ba'i thabs ni tha dad dang / /rigs rnams la ni gang bsten dang / /gang gi rus ni gang yin dang / /de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /ngas bshad de ni mnyan par
99b7(rgyud): gyis| |gzugs kyang med la dri yang med/ /sgra yang med cing khyad par du/ /nyan du med cing bltar med de/ /mtshan ma tsam las shes par bya/ /me long dang ni chu dag
100a1(rgyud): las| |grib ma ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /de ltar de dag rtogs bya zhing / /de las gdon rnams shes par bya'o/ /thams cad rlung dang 'dra ba ste//
100a2(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyis 'dzin par byed/ /mtshan ma dang ni tshul rnams dang / /spyod pas kyang ni rtogs par bya/ /gdon rnams lus la zhugs na ni/ /mi las mi ma
100a3(rgyud): yin par byed/ /grib ma dang ni 'gros dang mdog /de bzhin nga ro 'gyur bar byed/ /gdon rnams rigs bzhi yan lag bzhi/ /rnam pa bzhi yod shes par
100a4(rgyud): bya| |rigs bzhi dag la spyod pa yang / /mdor na de dag shes par bya/ /rlung can gyis ni rlung can 'dzin/ /de dag gi ni ming dang gzugs/ /so sor yang ni
100a5(rgyud): bshad bya ste/ /gcig ni lha gdon shes par bya/ /gcig ni 'byung po'i gdon yin te/ /de bzhin gcig ni dri za nyid/ /gcig ni gnod sbyin gdon yin te/ /
100a6(rgyud): gcig ni srin por shes par bya/ /sha za'i gdon ni rnam gsum dang / /klu yi gdon ni shes par bya/ /tshangs pa'i srin po nyid dang ni/ /log 'dren gdon ni
100a7(rgyud): shes par bya/ /de bzhin brjed byed gdon dag dang / /gzhon nu'i gdon ni rnam bzhir shes/ /gcig ni smyo byed nyid yin te/ /lha min gdon ni shes par bya//
100b1(rgyud): de ltar gdon rnams bco brgyad de/ /gang gi tshe na gang rgyu dang / /gang gi dus ni gang yin dang / /gang gi mdog ni ci 'dra ba/ /de ni bdag gis bshad kyi nyon/ /gdon
100b2(rgyud): rnams bco brgyad gang yin pa/ /dus tshigs dag tu 'dzin byed de/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi/ /gdon rnams gso ru rung bar bshad/ /de las 'das par
100b3(rgyud): gnas pa yi/ /gso ru rung ba ma yin no/ /de las gzhan yang mtshan rnams kyis/ /khyad par dag kyang bshad par bya/ /lha gdon shes par bya ba la/ /de ni gtor
100b4(rgyud): ma 'dod pa ste/ /rigs bzhi so sor rgyu bar byed/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sbra spyod pa dang / /dka' thub gnod pa mthar phyin dang / /tshul khrims ldan pa'i mi dag la/ /
100b5(rgyud): lha yi gdon ni 'dzin par byed/ /lha yi gdon gyis zin pa ni/ /shes pas legs par rtogs bya ste/ /dga' bar mi 'gyur 'khrug mi 'gyur/ /kha zas la yang mi
100b6(rgyud): sems la/ /cung zad kyang ni smrar mi byed/ /de ni gnyid kyang mi log ste/ /phyi sa dang ni gcin dag kyang / /rang dgar 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ /khrus byas khrus ma byas
100b7(rgyud): kyang rung / /dri bsung mang po'i ngad ldan zhing / /de yi gdong ni pad+ma bzhin/ /legs par byas par 'gyur ba ste/ /gang la tshul ni 'di dag yod/ /de ni lha yi gdon
101a1(rgyud): du bshad/ /gang gis bde bar 'gyur ba yi/ /gtor ma'i chog 'di dag bya/ /me tog dri dang me tog phreng / /mar me yang ni de la sbyin/ /
101a2(rgyud): pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tse/ /chang dang 'bras chan sbyin du gzhug /gdugs dkar dag byed srad bu dang / /de bzhin me tog phreng dkar dag /de na lha yi gnas kyang
101a3(rgyud): rung / /lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon
101a4(rgyud): de gtong 'gyur ba/ /'di ni de la sbyar bar bgyi/ /na ga ta ma shra sha yi/ /me tog rtsa ba 'bras bu dang / /shun phrags dang ni de bzhin du/ /shu dag dkar po yungs
101a5(rgyud): kar dang / /tshogs rnams de dag bsags nas kyang / /me ni chung ngus byas pa la/ /mar ni phul bzhi'i nang du btso/ /de nas de la blud par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar
101a6(rgyud): yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs bar 'gyur/ /snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang / /mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas/ /gdon de
101a7(rgyud): rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /las 'di yang ni legs par brtsam/ /rgyal ba'i blo gros ma'i sngags kyis dur khrod kyi sol ba las
101b1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan byas la rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings nas mdun du gzugs brnyan mtshon rnon pos bcad na/ gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /ci
101b2(rgyud): ste de ltar byas kyang ma bros na/ rgyal ba'i blo gros mas lan tshwa dang ske tshe lan brgyad brgyas byas na ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gdon gyi skabs
101b3(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /'byung po'i gdon yang shes par bya/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs la/ /'dzin par byed de de
101b4(rgyud): bzhin du/ /de ni gtor ma 'dod phyir rgyu/ /de yi tshul rnams nga la nyon/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang / /gzugs bzang ba yi mi rnams la/ /'byung po'i
101b5(rgyud): gdon ni 'dzin par byed/ /de yi tshul rnams nga las nyon/ /tshes grangs bcu gsum bcu bzhi 'ang rung / /gnyi ga'i phyogs la'ang de bzhin te/ /bcu bzhi la ni rtag pa
101b6(rgyud): yin| |dga' ston dag dang 'dus pa dang / /lha rnams kyi ni gnas dag dang / /skabs 'di dag tu gzugs bzang ba'i/ /mi rnams la ni 'dzin par byed/ /gtsang
101b7(rgyud): zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang / /dka' thub gdon pa mthar phyin dang / /rtag tu gos dkar gyon pa dang / /smyung ba dga' ba de bzhin no/ /'byung po'i gdon gyis
102a1(rgyud): zin pa yi/ /tshul 'di dag ni nga la nyon/ /sems pa dang ni dgod pa dang / /nam mkha' la ni lta bar byed/ /mdog kyang nam mkha' 'dra bar
102a2(rgyud): 'gyur/ /gser gyi mdog ltar mdzes pa ste/ /zas dang skom la dga' ba dang / /lha dang bram ze mchod la dga'/ /'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa yi/ /mtshan
102a3(rgyud): ma yang ni de dag yin/ /de ni gang gis bder 'gyur ba'i/ /gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya/ /til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas/ /sha btsos rjen pa de
102a4(rgyud): bzhin te/ /me tog dri dang gtor ma dang / /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs pa/ /gtor ma de dag bsdus nas ni/ /lho phyogs su yang sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje ser skya'i
102a5(rgyud): sngags kyis kyang / /sreg blugs gsum dang bdun pa dbul/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang
102a6(rgyud): na| |gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /gnad ma la du ma bi dang / /ba la a ti ba la dang / /pu shel tsi dang thal tre sa
102a7(rgyud): dang / /shu ga na sa sgog pa dang / /tshogs rnams de dag bsags nas ni/ /mar ni phul gang bzhi dag dang / /ba gcin phul bzhi'i nang du btso/ /me ni chung ngus
102b1(rgyud): btso bar bya/ /de nas de dag blud par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs gyur nas/ /'byung po rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste
102b2(rgyud): des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje ser skya'i sngags kyis las brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor
102b3(rgyud): bris nas lan tshwa dang / /ske tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na/ gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so/ /
102b4(rgyud): sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /dri za'i gdon yang shes par bya/ /bram ze rgyal rigs 'dzin par byed/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes bcu gnyis/ /mar gyi ngo yang de
102b5(rgyud): bzhin te/ /dri za rtag tu rgyu bar byed/ /lhag ma'i dus su 'tshe mi byed/ /gtor ma 'dod cing zhi la dga'/ /gdon de dga' ba 'dod pa ste/ /glu la dga' zhing
102b6(rgyud): dga' la sred/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang / /gzugs bzang ba yi mi dag la/ /dri za dag ni sten par byed/ /de yi tshul ni nga la nyon/ /glu len cing ni
102b7(rgyud): gar byed cing / /kha nas rol mo'i sgra yang 'byin/ /zas dang skom la dga' bar byed/ /de bzhin khrus dang phreng la dga'/ /rgyan dang gtam gyi tshul la
103a1(rgyud): dga'/ /chags shing dri zhim dang kyang ldang / /dri za yi ni zin pa yis/ /mtshan ma rnams ni de dag yin/ /gang gis de ni bder 'gyur
103a2(rgyud): ba| |gso ba'i thabs kyang bstan par bya/ /gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang / /dga' bzhin pas ni gso bar bya/ /me tog phreng dmar de bzhin te/ /'bras
103a3(rgyud): chan dmar po'ang de bzhin te/ /ba dan dmar po sbyin par byed/ /tsan+dan dmar po nyid dag dang / /skud pa dmar po dag dang ni/ /de dag thams cad sbyin par bya/ /
103a4(rgyud): nad pa gos dmar bskon byas la/ /me tog phreng mar byug bar ldan/ /me tog phreng mar lus bskus pa'i/ /dge slong bram ze bkra shis gdon/ /kha zas
103a5(rgyud): dmar po byin nas kyang / /de nas nub mo gtor ma sbyin/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang
103a6(rgyud): na| |gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /gsod dang tsha ba gsum po dang / /seng ldeng gi ni snying po dang / /rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis
103a7(rgyud): kyang 'jug/ sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya/ /de nas tshogs rnams bsags nas kyang / /mar ni phul gang bzhi dag dang / /ba gcin bzhi chas btso bya zhing / /me ni chung ngus
103b1(rgyud): btso bar bya/ /de nas de la blud par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang / /
103b2(rgyud): mar 'thungs bas kyang 'jigs gyur nas/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan
103b3(rgyud): 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje ma'am/ yang na bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis nim pa'i yam sreg shing dug dang khrag gi nang du smyugs pa brgyad
103b4(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas gdon du zhing 'bros par 'gyur te/ gdon rnam pa gsum po 'di dag gang gis mgo gas nas 'bros par 'gyur ba'i ngo lon
103b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gzhig par bya'o/ /gdon bco brgyad las kyang de bzhin du gso bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sngags ni/ pho nya mo rdo rje ma'i sngags te/
103b6(rgyud): na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ti s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ dzi dzi ru ru/ khu ri bi khu ri/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ pa la ya/ yata tad/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ a gra to ba shi/ ta na ta na/
103b7(rgyud): sma ra sma ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ dri za'i gdon
104a1(rgyud): gyi skabs rdzogs so/ / //sngar bshad gang yin tshangs pa yi/ /srin po'i gdon yang shes par bya/ /gtum zhing drag la
104a2(rgyud): stobs po che/ /lci la tshugs par dka' ba ste/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dang / /zla ba nya la 'dzin par byed/ /gdon dang dka' thub ldan pa dang / /tshangs par
104a3(rgyud): spyod la gnas pa la/ /tshangs pa'i srin po 'dzin par byed/ /lha la 'dran tor byed pa dang / /gang zhig snying ni sdang ba dang / /bram ze ma yin bram zer smra/ /
104a4(rgyud): bram ze gang dag gtsang sbra nyams/ /dpa' bo gang dag 'dran tor byed/ /lha gnas dag tu gar rtse zhing / /tshangs par spyod las nyams gyur pa/ /de la tshangs
104a5(rgyud): pa'i srin po 'tshe/ /de yi tshul ni nga la nyon/ /gshe zhing 'gyod par byed pa dang / /gar yang byed cing gdon par byed/ /bsgrags par mi 'gyur smra mi byed/ /lha
104a6(rgyud): rnams la yang mchod byed cing / /bram ze mthong na mchod par byed/ /rdo ba dag dang shing dag dang / /de bzhin lag pa rkang pa yis/ /rang gi lus la gnod par
104a7(rgyud): byed| |tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa ni/ /snyan tshig rig byed lhur len cing / /nges brjod rig byed rjod par byed/ /bstan bcos kun la mkhas pa ste/ /dri ba
104b1(rgyud): dag kyang 'dri bar byed/ /sngags 'chang la ni brnyas par byed/ /dgod cing rab tu rgyug par byed/ /tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa yi/ /mtshan ma yang ni de dag yin/ /
104b2(rgyud): gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba/ /de yi gtor ma bshad par bya/ /nas ni bre gsum btsos pa dang / /de bzhin 'khur ba til zan dang / /me tog phreng dmar bdug
104b3(rgyud): pa dang / /shing thog rnam pa sna tshogs dag /til nag de bzhin 'bras yos dang / /de bzhin zho dang 'o ma dang / /gang ba'i snod dang de bzhin gdugs/ /de yi byug
104b4(rgyud): pa shu dag ste/ /khrus byas bsgrims te gtsang byas pas/ /lho phyogs su ni sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon ni myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /
104b5(rgyud): ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gdon de myur du gtong ba yi/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /nag ta ma la shri sha yi/ /'bras bu rtsa ba shu phrags dang / /de bzhin
104b6(rgyud): me tog thams cad dang / /pa ta li dang a sha na/ /bil ba'i rtsa ba gzhug par bya/ /dug mo yungs kyang de bzhin te/ /thang shing dang ni bil ba dang / /de bzhin tsha ba
104b7(rgyud): gsum po dang / /rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis kyang gzhug /sgog skya dang ni phul bdun mar/ /ba gcin kyang ni nyi shu dang / /seng ldeng shun phrags bshus pa ni/ /srang grangs
105a1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang / /'di dag thams cad bsres pa ni/ /me chung gis ni dal nas btso/ /de nas de la blud par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar
105a2(rgyud): yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang / /mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas/ /gdon
105a3(rgyud): de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste de nas ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po bris
105a4(rgyud): nas kyang / /der ni gdon yang 'gugs par bya/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /ngo lon dag ni der bya ste/ /rig pa'i mchog gam yang na ni/ /dga'
105a5(rgyud): byed gdong gis gzhom par bya/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /sngags gzhan gyis kyang yang na gzhom/ /tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gyi skabs
105a6(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /srin po'i gdon yang shes par bya/ /gtum zhing drag la gzu lums can/ /lci zhing tshugs
105a7(rgyud): par dka' ba ste/ /mar gyi ngo ni zhag brgyad dang / /mar gyi ngo ni bcu bzhi la/ /mi ni gtum zhing gzu lums can/ /spyi brtol can ni gang yin dang / /brlang
105b1(rgyud): zhing 'thab la sred pa dang / /rtag tu tshig ni rtsub por smra/ /de la srin po sten par byed/ /srin pos zin pa de yi ni/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang shes par bya/ /skad cig
105b2(rgyud): gis ni ngu bar byed/ /dga' zhing glu yang len par byed/ /don dang ldan pa'i tshig smra zhing / /don med pa yi tshig kyang smra/ /zas dang skom la dga' ba dang / /de bzhin
105b3(rgyud): me ni sha la sred/ /gshe bar byed cing smyugs par byed/ /de bzhin zan za glu yang len/ /mi ni glo bur dag tu len/ /lag pas sa la rko bar byed/ /srin po'i
105b4(rgyud): gdon gyis zin pa yi/ /mtshan ma rnams ni de yin te/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur te/ /de yi ngo lon bshad par bya/ /khu ba zas dang de bzhin dri/ /de bzhin
105b5(rgyud): sha btsos rjen pa dang / /zas dang skom dang til zan rnams/ /sdig med khrag gis gtor ba dang / /dri zhim pa yi me tog rnams/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnams kyis

108b7(rgyud): klu ni myur du 'bros par 'gyur/ /klu yi gdon gyis zin pa la/ /gang gis gzhan du 'gal bar byed/ /rig sngags 'chang dang mi dag la/ /brtse ba'i phyir ni 'ong byed na/ /go cha
109a1(rgyud): brtan par bgo bya zhing / /rig pa mchog gi go bgos la/ /ma rungs dug ni mi bzad pa/ /pho nyams ni nges bar 'joms/ /lag na rdo rje
