109a6(rgyud): med kyis spangs gang yin dang / /chu ngogs bud med bltas pa dang / /shing la 'dzeg cing bshang gci byed/ /'greng zhing bshang gci byed pa dang / /gcer bur
109a7(rgyud): rgyugs gang yin dang / /gzhan gyi gos dang 'dres pa dang / /gos kyi tha mas g.yab pa yi/ /mi rnams gang gis zin pa yi/ /zhum zhing ngu bar byed pa dang / /
109b1(rgyud): nor rnams kyang ni chud za zhing / /gzhan gyi yid du mi 'ong dang / /skyes pa chung ma rnyed mi 'gyur/ /bud med na ni khyo mi rnyed/ /tshong byed na yang zong dag gis/ /khe spogs
109b2(rgyud): rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing / /zhing gshin dag la rmos btab kyang / /rmos pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur/ /mtshan ni thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ /chung ma las kyang bu mi
109b3(rgyud): 'byung / /don gzhan bya bar brtsams kyang ni/ /log pa'i blo ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /de dag gang la snang 'gyur ba'i/ /de yi gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad/ /khang pa mnyam
109b4(rgyud): zhing gsar byas la/ /rin chen thams cad bsags par bya/ /bum pa bzhi yang der bzhag cing / /bkra shis rnams kyang dbul bar bya/ /rdzas rnams dang ni 'bras
109b5(rgyud): rnams dang / /bum pa ba dan sngon po dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang / /de bzhin khu ba zas rnams dang / /dri dang me tog dkar po dang / /'bras kyi 'o thug der
109b6(rgyud): sbyin bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /de ni khrus kyang byed du gzhug /ba la a ti ba la dang / /kan+ta ka ri 'bri ha ti/ /ba tra dang ni pu shel tse/ /pri yang ku dang
109b7(rgyud): shu ti dang / /phye ma'i gong bu 'di yis ni/ /rab tu mnyam gzhag khrus byed gzhug /rig sngags 'chang ni shar phyogs lta/ /nad pa nub phyogs bstan byas la//
110a1(rgyud): gos dkar can gyi snying po dang / /ldan pa'i chus ni dbang yang bskur/ /de nas blo ldan yid gzhungs bas/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor ldan
110a2(rgyud): pa yi/ /sbyar sman gyis ni lus kyang bsku/ /gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang / /gi'u wang shu dag ru rta dang / /su ga smel yang ni de bzhin te/ /sgron shing dang ni thang
110a3(rgyud): shing dang / /tsan+dan dang ni a ga ru/ /ka le ya yi pad 'dra dang / /ge sar rnams ni cha bsnyams la/ /chu dang lhan cig btags par bya/ /gang na sbyar sman 'di
110a4(rgyud): gnas pa/ /der ni 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ /chom rkun ma yin mtshon rnams min/ /sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min/ /lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskus pas/ /
110a5(rgyud): sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /'di yis lus la bskus na ni/ /log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur/ /sbyar sman don kun sgrub pa ni/ /sngar yang ngas ni
110a6(rgyud): bshad pa yin/ /log 'dren gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// //sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /brjed byed gdon yang shes par bya/ /drag
110a7(rgyud): cing khro la gtum pa dang / /gzu lums can de tshugs par dka'/ /tshes gnyis dang ni tshes bzhi dang / /de bzhin dgu dang bcu gnyis dang / /mar gyi bcu bzhi
110b1(rgyud): de bzhin te/ /brjed byed dag ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /dang po'i thun ni 'das nas kyang / /lhag ma rnams la de bzhin ldang / /phyi nas rlung bzhin yang dang yang / /de nas
110b2(rgyud): yud tsam nyin zhag dang / /de bzhin zla phyed zla dang lor/ /dbu ba skyug cing rgyal bar 'gyur/ /lus las rngul yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gdon gyis zin pa 'khor ba
110b3(rgyud): dang / /sa la 'gyel zhing 'khor bar 'gyur/ /brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa yi/ /de yi mtshan ma de dag yin/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /gso ba'i
110b4(rgyud): thabs kyang bshad par bya/ /bdug pa dri dang me tog phreng / /de bzhin sha btsos rjen pa dang / /til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas/ /de bzhin shug pa pu shel rtse/ /byug
110b5(rgyud): pa dang ni mar yang blud/ /'bras bu gsum las srang gcig dang / /tsha ba gsum las srang gcig gzhug /sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya/ /yungs kar stong
110b6(rgyud): yang de bzhin te/ /nag tam la'i sa bon dang / /bil ba'i rtsa ba de bzhin te/ /de dag cha ni mnyam byas la/ /ra gcin dang ni btags par bya/ /mar dang ba gcin
110b7(rgyud): bzhi 'gyur gyi/ /mar du yang ni btso bar bya/ /mig kyang bsku zhing snar yang blugs/ /de bzhin mar yang btung bar bya/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par
111a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ /snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang / /cho ga 'di dag rnams kyis kyang / /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des
111a2(rgyud): kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong gyur pa'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di yang bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor bris te gzhug par byas la spyan nam/ yang na
111a3(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram/ tshogs chen po lcags can gyis be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing gi sbyin sreg byas na/ gdon de 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /brjed byed kyi
111a4(rgyud): gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so/ / //sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /smyo byed gdon yang shes par bya/ /drag cing gtum la gzu lums
111a5(rgyud): can| |lci zhing tshugs par dka' ba ste/ /mar gyi ngo yi zhag gnyis dang / /zhag dgu la ni 'tshe byed cing / /rlung dang bad kan rang bzhin gyi/ /smyo byed gdon ni
111a6(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur/ /de yi tshul ni bshad par bya/ /ngas bshad de ni mnyan par gyis/ /gzugs ni rab tu mdzes pa yin/ /shin tu dga' zhing spro bar 'gyur/ /
111a7(rgyud): dpa' bo dang ni gzugs bzang dang / /mi ni glu la sred pa la/ /rtsed mo la sogs gtam dag las/ /smyo byed 'dzin te the tshom med/ /mtshan 'di dag gis shes
111b1(rgyud): bar bya/ /tshul rnams kyang ni 'dir nyon cig /glu len cing ni gar byed dang / /dgod par byed cing du ba dang / /dri dang me tog phreng la dga'/ /rlung dang bad kan gnas pa
111b2(rgyud): yin| |rab tu rgyug gam yang na 'greng / /dal nas kyang ni dgod pa dang / /gnyid kyang che bar mi 'gyur la/ /cung zad kyang ni smra mi byed/ /kha zas la yang dga' ba
111b3(rgyud): rnams/ /rlung mkhris bad kan gnas pa yin/ /shin tu drag tu smra ba dang / /mang du yang ni smra ba dang / /gtam gyi tshul la dga' ba'i rnams/ /bad kan gnas la
111b4(rgyud): brten pa dang / /gnas gsum la ni rten 'gyur la/ /tshul kun yang ni byed gyur na/ /de ni gsor med shes par bya/ /de la spyad par bya ba med/ /lha rnams/ lag
111b5(rgyud): na rdo rje nga'i mtshams rlung 'di ni/ /gsor mi rung ba la yang tshar gcod pa yin no/ /gdon gang nga'i ming thos kyang mi 'bros pa de la ni/ ngas rdo rje drag pos spyi bo
111b6(rgyud): gshag par bya'o/ /sman dang gsang sngags gang gis smyo byed kyi gdon stobs po che la gso ba yang bshad par bya ste/ dri kun dang ni me tog phreng / /de bzhin rol
111b7(rgyud): mo'i spyad kun dang / /'bras can dri zhim gtsang ma dang / /'o thug 'bru chang sbyar ba'i chang / /de ltar gtor ma rnams bsags la/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par
112a1(rgyud): bya| |gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtor
112a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /mar snying lo ni sum cu gnyis/ /lon pa'i mar de phul bzhi dang / /'o ma phul bzhi dag dang ni/ /sbrang rtsi
112a3(rgyud): phul bzhir ldan par bya/ /ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi/ /phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya/ /sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya/ /srang grangs sum cu a ru
112a4(rgyud): ra| |srang grangs nyis 'gyur tsha ba gsum/ /gso ba pos ni gzhug bya ste/ /lhan ci ga phye ma zhib mor bya/ /gang tshe thams cad tshos gyur nas/ /de bzhin du
112a5(rgyud): ni phyir yang 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten gnas pa yi/ /gdon rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /rlung can dang ni mkhris pa can/ /bad kan can dang 'dus pa
112a6(rgyud): can| |gdon gyi gzugs ni thams cad kyi/ /sman rnams kyang ni 'di yin te/ /rdo rje lha yi mar zhes bya/ /gdon kun gtong bar 'gyur ba dang / /gdon kun
112a7(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa dang / /gdon kun 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /nga yis su ni bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig sman gyi rgyal
112b1(rgyud): po yi/ /ming ni legs par dran byed pa/ /de la gdon rnams thams cad kyis/ /glags btsal phyir ni brtson mi byed/ /de phyir de la blud par bya/ /de bzhin snar
112b2(rgyud): yang blugs par bya/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i//
112b3(rgyud): thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bris la der gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor der rig sngags kyi rgyal po'am/ tshogs lcags can nam/ rmugs byed kyis sbyin
112b4(rgyud): sreg bya'o/ /lha rnams/ 'di ni/ lag na rdo rje'i mtshams rlung yin te/ gsor mi rung ba rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do/ /gdon gang nga'i ming thos nas mi 'bros pa de la rdo rje drag
112b5(rgyud): pos spyi bo gshag par bya'o/ /lha rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas ma rungs pa rnams gzhom pa bzang po rnams ngas bshad zin to/ /smyo byed kyi
112b6(rgyud): gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so/ / //sngar bshad pa ni gang yin gdon/ /lha ma yin gdon shes par bya/ /gtum zhing gzu lums che ba dang //
112b7(rgyud): 'jig rten 'tshe bar byed pa'i ste/ /gzi brjid can dang lus che dang / /gzugs bzang yon tan ldan pa la/ /lha ma yin ni 'jug par byed/ /de yi mtshan ma tshul
113a1(rgyud): bzhin nyon/ /rig sngags 'chang la brnyas par byed/ /rig byed kyang ni smra bar byed/ /skem byed nga yin khyab 'jug nga / /zhes ni rdzun
113a2(rgyud): yang smra bar byed/ /gdon kun gyi ni tshul dag dang / /rnam pa mang por sgyur bar byed/ /ngu zhing res 'ga' sems kyang 'dzin/ /res 'ga' zas kyang za bar
113a3(rgyud): byed| |lag pas rtsa dag blangs nas kyang / /skad cig gis ni mi la 'tshe/ /tshig ngan dag kyang smra bar byed/ /shin tu yang ni dgod par byed/ /lha ma yin gyi
113a4(rgyud): gdon rnams kyi/ /mtshan ma yang ni de yin te/ /cho ga yang ni de bzhin du/ /de yi ngo lon gang dag gis/ /gdon de gtong bar 'gyur ba'ang bya/ /me tog kun
113a5(rgyud): dang dri dag dang / /me tog phreng ba sna tshogs dang / /pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tse/ /ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa yin/ /ngo lon
113a6(rgyud): dag ni 'jam por bya/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang dag gis/ /gtsang sbra bya ste nub phyogs sbyin/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong
113a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/ /
113b1(rgyud): ba la a ti ba la dang / /thal tres dang ni bu shel tse/ /rtsa ba lnga rnams bsags nas ni/ /mar ni phul tag bzhi dag kyang / /ba gcin phul bzhi'i nang du btso/ /me ni
113b2(rgyud): chung ngus dal nas btso/ /de nas de la blud par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /snar blugs 'jigs
113b3(rgyud): pas gzir ba dang / /mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de
113b4(rgyud): gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje ser skyas sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje sgrog gis bcing bar bya/ /de dag sngags kyis tshar yang gcad/ /
113b5(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// //de nas ngas ni sngar bshad gang / /gzhon nu'i gdon bzhin shes par bya/ /gtum zhing khro
113b6(rgyud): la gzu lums can/ /'gro ba'i gnas dang mi gnas 'joms/ /tshes gnyis dang ni bcu gcig dang / /mar gyi ngo yi zhag lnga dang / /phal cher tshes bcu
113b7(rgyud): dag la rgyu/ /gzhon nu'i srog ni gcod pa yi/ /rtag tu gsum zhing rgyu bar byed/ /byis pa gsod cing mi srun na/ /rigs bzhi ldan zhing rtag tu rgyu/ /gtor ma
114a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gdon chen yin/ /de las gzhan pa'i gang dag gi /rigs rnams ci 'dra bshad par gyis/ /nam gru bram zer shes par bya//
114a2(rgyud): bya ni rgyal rigs yin par bstan/ /skem byed rje'u rigs shes par bya/ /gzhon nu dmangs rigs shes par bya/ /gyen du lta ba gang yin dang / /skad cig skad
114a3(rgyud): cig 'khor bar byed/ /rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde/ /de ni nam gru'i gdon yin no/ /mig phab pa ni gang yin dang / /so yang 'cha' bar byed pa
114a4(rgyud): dang / /rngam pa can dang rims btab gang / /de ni bya nyid yin par bstan/ /glo bur du ni ngu ba gang / /rims kyis btab cing rab tu rgyug /sdang zhing dgod
114a5(rgyud): par byed pa dang / /de bzhin 'dar zhing glal bar byed/ /byis pa gang gis kha dag nas/ /dri nga ba ni 'byung ba dang / /lus la rma dang 'brum bu dang / /tsha zhing
114a6(rgyud): me yi mdog dang 'dra/ /mtshan mo dus mtshams ldang bar 'gyur/ /dus mtshams dag tu bab pa na/ /'khru zhing rims 'debs skyug pa dang / /lus kyang sngon
114a7(rgyud): por gyur pa dang / /gang zhig lus ni rdob par byed/ /rims kyis kyang ni 'tshe ba dang / /nu ma shin tu sos kyang 'debs/ /lan grangs mang du ngu zhing 'dar/ /
114b1(rgyud): mig kyang dmar por gyur pa dang / /mi dga' mchu yang mur bar byed/ /byis pa skem byed zin pa yin/ /lag pa dang ni rkang pa gcig /las byas pas ni tshig kyang
114b2(rgyud): na| |mig ni 'khor zhing lta bar byed/ /mig gcig kyang ni 'dzum par byed/ /rnag dang khrag gi dri yang mnam/ /smin ma ya gcig 'degs par byed/ /skem byed
114b3(rgyud): brjed byed gdon rnams kyi/ /mtshan ma dag tu bstan pa yin/ /gzhon nu'i gdon la gtor ma bya/ /legs par khrus byas gtsang mas bsgrim/ /dbyig rnams
114b4(rgyud): dang ni gser rnams dang / /gos kyang de la sbyin par bya/ /snum khur bkra shis 'bras yos dang / /'bras chan dang ni zan dron dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa
114b5(rgyud): dang / /chang dang til zan rnams dang ni/ /til dang 'bras can pu shel tse/ /'bras kyi 'o thug yungs kar ldan/ /ba lang gi ni chu ka 'am/ /shing skam ma mo'i
114b6(rgyud): gnas dag tu/ /gtor ma me mar bcas pa 'di/ /srod la yang ni sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des
114b7(rgyud): kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong ba yi/ /thabs gzhan dag ni sbyar bar bya/ /bu tshang rdo dang ram nye ba/ /gser phrom dang ni skyer pa yungs/ /ka ping ta yi
115a1(rgyud): khu ba dang / /pa la sha yi lo ma dang / /sbrang rtsi ran tsam gzhug par bya/ /seng ldeng snying po tsha ba gsum/ /btsod dang shing mngar thams
115a2(rgyud): cad dang / /de dag cha ni mnyam byas la/ /ra gcin dang ni btag par bya/ /mar ni phul bzhi gzhug par bya/ /ba gcin yang ni bzhi 'gyur blugs/ /go phye'i
115a3(rgyud): lo ma dag dang ni/ /par ba ra ka rul pa dang / /til rul nas kyi lo ma yin/ /blugs pa'i sman ni bya ba yin/ /mar ni phul tag phyed kyis kyang / /gong bu'i sman
115a4(rgyud): mchog btso bar bya/ /dus mtshams gnyis su mkhas pa yis/ /de ni khrus kyang byed du gzhug /gzhon nu'i gdon ni thams cad las/ /gso ba'i thabs ni
115a5(rgyud): dam pa yin/ /kun nas gso ba'i thabs yod de/ /thams cad kyang ni 'tsho ba yod/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci
115a6(rgyud): ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /dga' byed gdong gis khrus bya zhing / /gtor ma yang ni
115a7(rgyud): de la sbyin/ /yang na rig pa mchog gis bya/ /des ni gdon de gtong bar 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// //sngar bshad
115b1(rgyud): pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /gnod sbyin gdon yang shes par bya/ /gtum zhing gzu lums che ba ste/ /'jig rten dag la 'ang 'tshe bar byed/ /ngo gnyis tshes ni bcu gsum dang //
115b2(rgyud): yar gyi tshes lnga dag la rgyu/ /skyed mos tshal dang lha gnas su/ /gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang / /mi rnams gzugs ni bzang ba dang / /rgyan pos rtse la rab chags
115b3(rgyud): dang / /bzhi mdo gang du rtse ba na/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rtag tu 'dzin/ /gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin gyur pa/ /de yi mtshan ma shes par bya/ /dri dang me tog phreng la dga'//
115b4(rgyud): zas skom la 'ang de bzhin dga'/ /khro ba med cing mi ngu la/ /yang dang yang du zas kyang za/ /dbang yang che zhing nor mang la/ /de bzhin rtag tu sbyin la dga'/ /rtag tu
115b5(rgyud): shin tu gtsang sbra ldan/ /de ni gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad/ /zas kun dang ni dri kun dang / /de bzhin me tog thams cad dang / /shing tog kun dang sbyar thug dang / /
115b6(rgyud): de bzhin 'bras kyi 'o thug dang / /sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang / /til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas/ /gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs/ /de bzhin skud pa ser
115b7(rgyud): po dang / /dbyig rnams dang ni gser dag dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tshul bzhin du ni sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma de dag bsags nas kyang / /byang
116a1(rgyud): phyogs su ni sbyin par bya/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang
116a2(rgyud): gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /gro rnams dang ni nas rnams dang / /mon sran gre'u dang rgya sran dang / /'bras bu gsum
116a3(rgyud): dang tsha ba gsum/ /de bzhin yungs kar pri yang ku/ /shu dag dang ni shing kun dang / /de bzhin rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis/ /til rnams sgog skya ldan par gzhug /
116a4(rgyud): mar ni phul bzhi'i nang du btso/ /'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi bzhi/ /ba gcin phul bzhi blugs par bya/ /ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi/ /phye ma phul bzhi gzhug
116a5(rgyud): par bya/ /me ni chung dus dal nas btso/ /de nas de la blugs par bya/ /de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs/ /mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs pa dang / /snar
116a6(rgyud): blugs 'jigs pas gzir bar 'gyur/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon
116a7(rgyud): de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di yang sbyar bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor bris te der bcug la sbyin sreg gi las mi bzad pas me'i nang du rig pa mchog
116b1(rgyud): gis gzhom par bya'o/ /yang na rdo rje nag mos gzhom par bya ste/ des ni/ gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// //de las gzhan yang gdon rnams
116b2(rgyud): kyi| |mtshan ma'i bye brag bshad par bya/ /gdon rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /rigs bzhi dag ni yod par bshad/ /de dag kyang ni ming gcig dang / /mtshan ma gcig pu 'khrul bar byed/ /
116b3(rgyud): gdon rnams gang dag gang du 'dzin/ /de yang bdag gis bshad par bya/ /lha dang 'byung po gnod sbyin dang / /de bzhin dri za tshangs pa'i srin/ /gdon rnams lnga por shes pa na/ /bram ze
116b4(rgyud): rgyal rigs spyod par bshad/ /klu yi gdon du shes pa dang / /srin po yi ni gdon nyid dang / /gdon de gnyis su shes pa ni/ /rje'u rigs dmangs rigs 'tshe ba yin/ /lha min gdon ni rgyal
116b5(rgyud): rigs kyis/ /lhag ma'i rigs rnams 'tshe ba yin/ /sha za'i gdon ni dmangs rigs kyis/ /lhag ma'i rigs rnams 'tshe ba yin/ /smyo byed dang ni log 'dren dang / /byis pa'i gdon ni gang
116b6(rgyud): yin pa/ /gdon rnams 'di gsum shes pa ni/ /rigs bzhi dag la spyod par bshad/ /gdon gang rigs mthun gang la spyod/ /de ni gso bar sla ba yin/ /ci ste gdon gang 'ga' btsal
116b7(rgyud): zhing / /gzhan la ston par 'gyur na ni/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /de la gson du re ba'ang med/ /nyi ma nub mo snang mi byed/ /zla ba nyin mo snang mi byed/ /bstan pa de yi tshul gyis
117a1(rgyud): ni| |gdon ni rang gi rigs la spyod/ /gdon rnams bco brgyad gang yin pa/ /thams cad dus tshig rnams su rgyu/ /lo grangs bcu gnyis
117a2(rgyud): tshun chad kyi/ /gdon rnams gso ba'i thabs bshad de/ /de las 'das pa'i gdon rnams kyi/ /gso ba'i thabs ni yong med do/ /mtshan gcig gnas dang
117a3(rgyud): chu yi nang / /me 'gram dang ni khron pa'i drung / /de bzhin ma mo rnams kyi gnas/ /ba lang dbus dang rta zhon dang / /glang chen zhon dang g.yul du pham/ /ri bo dang
117a4(rgyud): ni dur khrod dang / /shing drung dang ni 'breg mkhan khyim/ /gnas 'di dag ni thams cad du/ /gdon ni gang zhig 'jug gyur na/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa
117a5(rgyud): bzhin| |de la gson du re ba med/ /de las gzhan yang mi bzad gdon/ /gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya/ /grib gnon gdon ni gnyis yod de/ /mthong
117a6(rgyud): ba tsam gyis 'brang bar bshad/ /de yi mtshan ma'ang nga las nyon/ /grib gnon gdon gnyis gang yin de/ /thams cad du ni 'jug par byed/ /gdon rnams
117a7(rgyud): dag ni thams cad kyang / /grib gnon gyis ni nye bar mtshon/ /sau gan+d+hi dang ut+pal gyi/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang nga la nyon/ /de las sau gan+d+hi ka ni/ /gzu lums
117b1(rgyud): che zhing drag pa ste/ /tshes grangs nyin zhag nges pa med/ /shing drung dang ni skyed mos tshal/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jug par byed/ /gdon de khus 'debs du ba dang / /lus
117b2(rgyud): rnams kyang ni 'joms par byed/ /nyin mo thun gcig 'das pa na/ /gsod par yang ni byed pa ste/ /sau gan+d+hi kas zin 'gyur ba/ /de yis mtshan ma de dag yin/ /
117b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor rab dga' byed gdong gi chu la bsngag te khrus byed du bcug la bdug pas gdug na gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /ut+pa la yang nga las nyon/ /
117b4(rgyud): ngu zhing dgod par byed pa dang / /so rnams kyang ni gtsigs par byed/ /nu ma yang ni mi shes de/ /dus tshigs med par rgyu bar byed/ /ut+pal las ni zin gyur pa//
117b5(rgyud): de yi mtshan ma de dag yin/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /gtor ma yang ni de la sbyin/ /'bras kyi 'o thug sbyar thug dang / /lag pan 'bras chan bu ram
117b6(rgyud): chan| |sha btsos pa dang rjen pa dang / /chang dang til gyi zan dag dang / /'bras can sha dang sbyar ba sbyin/ /til dag dang ni de bzhin dbyig /chang dang sbyar ba'i chang
117b7(rgyud): sbyin zhing / /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma sbyin/ /gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis
118a1(rgyud): gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /yungs kar shu dag shing kun dang / /pi pi ling dang na le sham/ /'bras bu gsum ni
118a2(rgyud): cha mnyam dang / /gi ri kar ni dkar po dang / /ru rta dang ni pri yang ku/ /de bzhin bca' lag dag dang ni/ /thang shing dang ni pu shel tse/ /nag ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang //
118a3(rgyud): tshogs rnams 'di dag bsags nas ni/ /ba gcin dag dang btags par bya/ /mar gyi nang gu btso bya zhing / /ba cin bzhir 'gyur blugs par bya/ /mig kyang
118a4(rgyud): bsku zhing snar yang blugs/ /btung bar bya zhing lus kyang byug /'di ni gdon rnams thams cad kyi/ /sman rnams kyi ni dam pa yin/ /gang na sbyar sman 'di gnas
118a5(rgyud): pa| |de na ki ta lu ta dang / /byis pa yang ni de bzhin te/ /de dag gis ni 'jigs pa med/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /
118a6(rgyud): ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram/ dga' byed gdong ngam/ gos dkar
118a7(rgyud): can gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag na/ gdon thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /sau gan+d+hi dang ut+pal la gnyi ga yang las gcig yin par shes par bya'o/ /de
118b1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la bris pa/ ma rungs gdon las gso ba'i thabs/ /bcom ldan shes par bgyi
118b2(rgyud): bar 'tshal/ /gang la shing bu bab pa dang / /gang dag dkyil 'khor spong ba dang / /gos shing zhen par gyur pa dang / /phyir yang ldog byed gang yin dang / /nam yang
118b3(rgyud): gtong bar mi byed pa/ /gsang sngags dang ni rtsi sman dang / /sbyin sreg las kyis gzhi pa ni/ /gdon rnams gzhig pa'i dam pa ste/ /mar btung ba yi cho ga
118b4(rgyud): dang / /cho ga ci 'dra gtor ma'i las/ /gsang ba yi ni the tshom dang / /gang gis gnod sbyin btang 'gyur dang / /sreg pa dang ni gcad pa dang / /gsad cing rus pa
118b5(rgyud): gzhom pa dang / /de dag cho ga rab bshad pa/ /de ni stobs chen bdag la gsungs/ /de ltar blo can che ba nyid/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis dris nas/ /lag na rdo rje skal
118b6(rgyud): chen gyis/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig yang smras/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor khyod kyis su/ /nga la gang dris bshad par bya/ /lha rnams 'khod pa'i nang du nyon/ /ma rungs pa yi
118b7(rgyud): gdon nyid ni/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo zhes bya ba/ /sems can kun la 'tshe ba yod/ /sbyin sreg las ni du mas kyang / /g.yo dang mi g.yo ba'i 'bros mi 'gyur/ /de yi
119a1(rgyud): mtshan ma ngas bshad kyi/ /go rim bzhin du lha rnams nyon/ /dris pa yi ni don rnams kyang / /rab tu yang ni smra bar byed/ /du bar byed cing rab tu
119a2(rgyud): khro| |de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes/ /'dus shing tshogs pa'i nang dag tu/ /shin tu yongs su srung ba gang / /khang stong dag tu dga' bar byed/ /de ni ma rungs
119a3(rgyud): mtshan mar shes/ /gang gis rtag tu phyag 'tshal dang / /snyan par yang ni smra ba dang / /stan dag kyang ni stob par byed/ /de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes/ /stan dag
119a4(rgyud): las ni stan dag la/ /ci ste 'pho zhing ldan par byed/ /de ni ma rungs mtshan mar shes/ /nga ni lha yin khyab 'jug pa/ /tshangs pa nga yin dbang phyug pa/ /skye rgu 'i
119a5(rgyud): bdag po nga yin zhes/ /de skad kyi ni tshig smra zhing / /gdon kun gyi ni tshul yang byed/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba/ /de yi gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad/ /
119a6(rgyud): a sho gan+d+ha shu dag dang / /'bras bu gsum dang pu tse shel/ /kan+ta ka ri bri ha ti/ /ki ti kar ni dkar po dang / /nag ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang / /shi ri sha yi me
119a7(rgyud): tog dang / /de bzhin gso ma pa ta li/ /pa la sha yi lo ma dang / /bu tshang rdo dang ram nye ba/ /ba la a ti ba la dang / /bil ba arka gnyis kyi rtsa/ /de bzhin rtsa ba lnga pa
119b1(rgyud): gnyis| |lo ni sum cu lon pa yi/ /mar ni rnying pa gang yin pa'i/ /mar ni phul bzhi ldan par bya/ /'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi bzhi/ /ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi/ /phye ma
119b2(rgyud): phul bzhi gzhug par bya/ /sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya/ /srang grangs sum cu'i a ru ra/ /tsha ba gsum yang de bzhin te/ /de bzhin 'bru mar blugs par bya/ /shing
119b3(rgyud): kun yang ni srang gcig dang / /lhan cig phye ma zhib mor bya/ /gang tshe thams cad tshogs gyur na/ /ba gcin phul bzhin blugs par bya/ /de nas me ni chung dus btso/ /rlung can
119b4(rgyud): dang ni mkhris pa can/ /bad kan can dang 'dus pa can/ /gdon gyi gzugs ni thams cad kyi/ /sman rnams kyang ni 'di yin te/ /cho ga dag ni 'di nyid kyis/ /gdon
119b5(rgyud): de myur du gtong bar 'gyur/ /ci ste des kyang ma btang na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /lcags sgrog gis ni bcing bya
119b6(rgyud): zhing / /skra yi thag pas bcing bar bya/ /bdug pa sna tshogs kyis kyang bdug /lus kyang bsku zhing byug par bya/ /de nas cho ga sbyar bya zhing / /dus las kyang ni
119b7(rgyud): bshol mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor yangs la bzhag nas ni/ /khor yug nas ni gzir bar bya/ /gdon gyis zin pa dbus bzhag ste/ /lcags thag gis ni gdags
120a1(rgyud): par bya/ /de ni brtan pos 'khor du gzhug /bdug pas legs par bdug bya zhing / /lan grangs brgyar ni tshang bar bya/ /de bzhin ko ba chu dron
120a2(rgyud): dang / /shing kun dang ni sgog skya dang / /spun pa dang ni bca' ba dang / /'di dag chu dang sbyar bya zhing / /chu yi nang du nub par bya/ /mis ni gdon zin ngal yang bso/ /
120a3(rgyud): de ltar nub par byas pa yi/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /ci ste gdon de mi gtong na/ /las la mkhas pas rab bsgrims te/ /cho ga 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /bdug pa
120a4(rgyud): sbyar ba 'di dag gis/ /myos pa nyid du bya ba ste/ /'dir ni dred spu sen mo dang / /de bzhin stag gi sen mo blang / /sha l+ya ka yi 'bras bu dang / /khyi dang dom gyi rtug pa
120a5(rgyud): dang / /ba lang byi ba'i pags pa dang / /ba tu na yi rtug pa dang / /rnga mo bong bu'i rtug pa dang / /spu dang rta yi rmig pa dang / /de bzhin ba lang ra dag dang / /spre'u'i rus pa
120a6(rgyud): sgog skya dang / /de bzhin du ni spen ma rnams/ /de dag cha ni mnyam byas la/ /chu dang lhan cig btags par bya/ /lag na rdo rje phyag byas la/ /bdug pa 'di ni sbyar byas
120a7(rgyud): te| |yud tsam ngal yang bso bya zhing / /bdug pas yang dang yang du bdug /dung dang 'o ma shing kun dang / /de bzhin ku sha na sa dang / /a nan thal tres pu shel
120b1(rgyud): tse| |ngal bso de la phan pa de/ /snar yang blugs shing 'thung du gzhug /legs pa yang ni blugs par bya/ /phan par 'dod pas gdon zin gyi/ /lus la yang ni bsku bar bya//
120b2(rgyud): rgyam tshwa dang ni bca' lga dang / /byi tang ka dang tsha ba gsum/ /ba bla dang ni ru rta rnams/ /cha mnyam par ni bsreg par bya/ /ra yi gcin dang btags bya ste/ /mig bskus
120b3(rgyud): nas ni gdon kun sel/ /snar blugs na yang gdon kun sel/ /nir gun di dang bye'u rug dang / /lung tang yungs kar pi pi ling / /de dag mi bzad gdon rnams
120b4(rgyud): kyis| |zin pa la ni snar yang blugs/ /bkru sman yang ni gtang bya zhing / /sman gyis mig bskus lus kyang byug /de lta bu ni byas na yang / /ci ste gdon ni mi gtong na/ /
120b5(rgyud): gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /sdong chen la ni gdags bya zhing / /sgren mor shin tu skrag par bya/ /thag pa sbom pos bcing
120b6(rgyud): bya zhing / /lus ni shin tu bsgrim par bya/ /khron pa nas ni bcus pa'i chu/ /rab tu yang ni gtor bar bya/ /gdon pa des ni rab zin nas/ /mi bzad pas ni lus kyang bsku//
120b7(rgyud): bdug pa sbyar ba'i lus rims kyis/ /gdon de myur du med par 'gyur/ /ngal bso ba yang bya ba ste/ /shu dag nim pa'i lo ma dang / /pa dag dang ni pu rtse shel/ /ka pi ta
121a1(rgyud): ta yi lo ma dang / /sgog skya sbrul lpags brjes pas bsre/ /'di ni zhi bar byed par bshad/ /cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni/ /gdon des ci ste mi
121a2(rgyud): gtong na/ /gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ /thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /'di la the tshom med par ni/ /mi bzad gsang sngags sbyar bar bya/ /rmugs
121a3(rgyud): byed lcags can so can dang / /mtshan sbyin bdud rtsi thab sbyor sogs/ /tshogs rnams so so'i las kyis gzhom/ /bcings nas karka ta ka yi/ /bdug pa mi bzad
121a4(rgyud): bdug bya ste/ /mgo dang lkog ma de bzhin dbus/ /phrag pa gnyis kyang nges par bdug /drag po'i las kyis drag po rnams/ /skrag par byas nas gtong bar
121a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ /yid ni 'byung bar byed pa ni/ /gsang sngags sbyar sman ldan de bzhin/ /yungs kar reg bdug drag po yis/ /blo ngan de ni skrag par bya/ /blo can rgyud la
121a6(rgyud): 'jigs med cing / /de nyid rtogs pas gtong du gzhug /cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis kyang / /ci ste gdon de mi gtong na/ /gdon rnams rab tu tshar gcod pa'i/ /
121a7(rgyud): thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /nges par yang dag khyad par du/ /gsang sngags kyi ni sbyor ba bya/ /lag na rdo rjes byas pa yi/ /gzhig pa'i thabs kyang rab tu
121b1(rgyud): bya| |gtsang sbra bya zhing zhag lnga'i bar/ /gso sbyong dag gi ldan par bya/ /gtsang mas dur khrod gtsang ma'i dbus/ /dkyil 'khor yang ni bri bar bya/ /rdzas bzhi sbyar ba
121b2(rgyud): gang yin pa/ /de yang legs par bshad par bya/ /lung tang phreng yang de bzhin du/ /shi sha pa dang seng ldeng dang / /ba ru ra dang rgya sran dang / /ka ku b+ha dang ardza na/ /thang
121b3(rgyud): shing yam sreg shing rnams bsdu/ /chu yi bum pa bzhi dag kyang / /khrag gis su ni gtong bar bya/ /sha btsos pa dang rjen pa dang / /til zan la phug sbrang rtsi dang / /mar
121b4(rgyud): rnying dag gi tshogs rnams dang / /yungs kar dag ni bre bzhi yi/ /tshogs rnams dang ni ba bla dang / /a ti pa le'ang de bzhin no/ /dri kun yang ni de bzhin te/ /sim ha
121b5(rgyud): dang sta'i me tog dang / /sa ha de ba'ang gzhug par bya/ /gser dag dang ni dngul rnams dang / /'bru kun yang ni gzhug par bya/ /kha dog dag kyang ngan par bya/ /khrag gis
121b6(rgyud): kyang ni bsreg par bya/ /dri dang 'bras bu me tog phreng / /tshon rtsi btags dang ma btags dang / /a ga ru ni ma nyams spos/ /ta me ru dang gu gul mar/ /pi tshu marda'i
121b7(rgyud): lo ma dang / /de bzhin skud pa shis pa ste/ /mig sman gyi ni ril bu dang / /de bzhin snar yang blug par bya/ /lus la yang ni bsku bar bya/ /de nas khrus kyang bya ba ste/ /
122a1(rgyud): zhi ba'i las kyi cho gas kyang / /gdon rnams drag tu tshar gcod pa/ /dngos grub mchog 'dod gang yin pas/ /rab tu bsgrims te
122a2(rgyud): bya ba yin/ /'byung po'i bdag dang 'byung po yi/ /go cha de la bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa der/ /sa bon thams cad bkod pa yi/ /dkyil
122a3(rgyud): 'khor shes rab can gyis bris/ /'byung po'i bdag po chung mar bcas/ /mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya/ /so can dang ni lcags can dang / /de bzhin rmugs
122a4(rgyud): byed rdzogs ldan rnams/ /de dag phyogs rnams gzhag par bya/ /kun nas lag na bdug pa thogs/ /lho phyogs kyi ni ngos su yang / /dga' byed grong khyer 'od
122a5(rgyud): dang bcas/ /dam pa brgyad po gang bshad bri/ /kho ra khor yug dag nas kyang / /yam sreg shing ni dgram par bya/ /nang du bkod pa de dag kyang / /bsam par
122a6(rgyud): bya zhing shes par bya/ /ngos rnams bkra shis 'bar ba dang / /ma rungs gdon ni mkhas pas bri/ /nges par yang ni mchod byas nas/ /me tog phreng dang dris
122a7(rgyud): rgyas pas/ /lag na rdo rje legs bshad pa'i/ /las rnams kyang ni sbyar bya zhing / /rgyud mthong ba yi las kyis ni/ /ma rungs gdon rnams dgug par bya/ /
122b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'byung gnas kyi/ /'byung po'i rigs ni brlag par 'gyur/ /drag po chen po mi bzad pa/ /chos lugs mi bzad gang yin pa/ /de dag nga yi dkyil/
122b2(rgyud): 'khor gzhug /drag po g.yo dang mi g.yo ba/ /drag tu 'khrul cing sems can rnams/ /nga yi dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug /de mthong sems can 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gdon
122b3(rgyud): rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /'thab pa drag pa der gzhug cing / /shin tu tshar yang gcad par bya/ /rig pa'i mchog gam spyan gyis ni/ /'jig rten dkyil 'khor bri
122b4(rgyud): bar bya/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// //de nas gdon skrag pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang / med par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma rnams blta bar
122b5(rgyud): bya ste/ 'di ni btang bar ma gyur cing / /skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya/ /lus kun yang ni 'dar ba dang / /mgo bo yang ni 'dar bar byed/ /dbugs kyi shugs kyang
122b6(rgyud): 'byin par byed/ /de ni skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /shin tu dgod par byed pa dang / /yang dang yang du khro bar byed/ /tshig kyang shin tu 'dzin par byed/ /de ni skrag
122b7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /mthong na yang ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i tshul gyis lta ba dang / /bdug pa yang ni snom par byed/ /hUM zhes bya bas sdod par 'gyur/ /de ni
123a1(rgyud): skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /ngal zhing rims nad 'debs gyur pa/ /de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /smras pa rtog pa gang yin dang / /thams
123a2(rgyud): cad myur du 'dzin pa dang / /yang na shin tu 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /gang zhig mthong na rang dbang dang / /slar ni rang dgar 'gyur ba dang //
123a3(rgyud): mi yi tshul ni spyod gyur pa/ /de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /'jigs bzhin bden pa gang yin de/ /zhi ba'i tshul gyis lta ba dang / /mi ni ngo mtshar ldan gyur pa/ /
123a4(rgyud): de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes/ /de bzhin mdun gyi mi phyogs la/ /dris na yang ni smra mi byed/ /rims nad byang zhing rmongs med pa/ /de ni med pa'i mtshan mar
123a5(rgyud): shes| |khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa/ /de kun khyod la bshad par bya/ /bcom ldan ji ltar gdon 'bros dang / /mi ni 'bros tshul ci 'dra dang / /gnas pa'i tshul
123a6(rgyud): ni ci 'dra dang / /bya ba sgrub par ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mi 'joms mnyan par 'tshal/ /lag na rdo rje stobs chen gyis/ /de yi tshig de thos gyur nas/ /bdud rtsi
123a7(rgyud): thab sbyor khyod kyi su/ /nga la dris pa gang yin pa/ /gdon rnams nyan par 'gyur ba yi/ /las de so so ci rigs nyon/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi mdo dang / /de bzhin
123b1(rgyud): khyim dang ba lang lhas/ /dur khrod dang ni shing gcig drung / /de ni mkhas shing 'jigs med pas/ /gdon de gtong du gzhug par bya/ /thog mar cho gar bya ba ni/ /zhag
123b2(rgyud): gsum yang na zhag lnga 'am/ /zhag bdun bar du cung zad bsten/ /yang na zla ba phyed kyi bar/ /de bzhin zhag ni nyi shu gcig /rig sngags stobs ni che ba dang / /bdag nyid
123b3(rgyud): rig sngags gsang ba yi/ /rig sngags de bzhin shes nas ni/ /ci nas de ni dbang 'gyur zhing / /nyan du yang ni gzhug par bya/ /phyem red kyi ni dus mtshams su/ /ba ba na
123b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/ /'byung po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /khru gsum khru bzhi mdzes pa bri/ /des ni the tshom med par yang / /gsang ba bdag ni nyan par 'gyur/ /
123b5(rgyud): bdag nyid 'byor par gang 'dod pas/ /gsang ba yang ni 'dis bya zhing / /gsang sngags 'di yis 'byung po rnams/ /nyan par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba/ /'di nas mkhas
123b6(rgyud): pas byed du gzhug / lo ni bcu gnyis dag tu yang / /ma bsnyen pa la sbyin mi bya/ /stong snyed ma byin sbyin mi bya/ /sdig pa'i tshul can sbyin mi bya/ /gang gis gdon ni nyan
123b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /gang gis gsang sngags dbang 'gyur pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga nges pa yis/ /gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'di yang bshad/ /phyag rgya tshogs dang bcas btang
124a1(rgyud): zhing / /gsang ba'i phyag rgyas btang byas nas/ /brtags nas rtag tu 'dzin par byed/ /phyag rgya byas pa'i phyag rgya yi/ /dkyil 'khor mchog
124a2(rgyud): tu gsang ba 'di/ /gsang ba pa rnams gzhig pa dang / /cho ga bsgrub phyir bshad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor dam pa la gnas
124a3(rgyud): na sa gdon nyan par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad de/ khru gsum pa tshon sna lnga'i phye mas dbus su bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje bri'o/ /de nas phyag
124a4(rgyud): rgya dgod par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgo logs su na/ rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i rtags rnams
124a5(rgyud): dgod do/ /lho phyogs su ni/ bkra shis dang / shin tu bkra shis dang / klu lag dang / pad+ma'i mtshan rnams dgod do/ /byang phyogs su ni/ 'tshe ba dang / pad+ma'i
124a6(rgyud): phreng ba dang / g.yung drung ris dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dgod do/ /nub phyogs su ni/ mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri rnams dgod do/ /gdon gyi dbyug pa yang
124a7(rgyud): g.yon logs su gzhag go / 'khor lo ni g.yas phyogs su gzhag go /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lha bshos rnam pa sna tshogs dbul zhing dri dang / me tog kyang dbul
124b1(rgyud): lo| |rig sngags kyang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gdon gyis zin pa yang bum pa'i chus khrus byed du gzhug go /de nas gdon gyis gtong bar 'gyung pa'i rig
124b2(rgyud): sngags bklag par bya'o/ /de nas gdon gyis rig sngags 'chang ji skad zer ba bzhin byed par 'gyur te/ song zhig ces byas na 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdon
124b3(rgyud): bkol bar 'dod na/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams gsang ba dang / gsang chen dang / gdon nyan par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'i
124b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ngas bshad zin to/ /phyag rgya rnams kyi cung zad dpe tsam du bya ba de ngas bshad par bya ste/ rig pa mchog gi chog
124b5(rgyud): rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa phyag rgya rnams kyis btab pa 'di 'chang ba gang yin pa dang / klog pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba gnag yin pa de la yang lha
124b6(rgyud): rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyan dang bcas pa 'di 'chang ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba lta ci smos te/ de'i mdun du gdon thams
124b7(rgyud): cad snying 'dar zhing myur du 'khod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ma spyan dang bcas pa gang yin pa ngas
125a1(rgyud): bshad zin to/ /snying po'i rgyal po'i las gang gis cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'gyur ba'am/ 'joms par byed pa yang ngas bshad par bya
125a2(rgyud): ste| snying po bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa rgyud phyi ma dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang / 'chang ba gang yin pa de la ni/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du ring po
125a3(rgyud): mi thogs par dngos grub 'gyub par 'gyur ro/ /'joms par byed pa yang ngas bshad par bya ste/ tshes grangs 'dam mi dgos/ smyung ba yang bya mi dgos
125a4(rgyud): par ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs pa/ der tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas de'i mdun du mi'i gzugs byas te snying
125a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byed cing ba ku la'i me tog gis bsnun na/ cho ga rgyas pa'i gdon bcom par 'gyur ro/ /cho ga de nyid kyis sna ma'i me tog gis
125a6(rgyud): bsnun na/ cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur te/ dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas sam/ 'o ma dang phye ma'i 'dag gu za zhing mchod
125a7(rgyud): rten drung du snying po'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byas na/ gang sgrub pa de la 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
125b1(rgyud): zhag gcig smyung ba byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas mchod rten gyi khang bur song la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas ku sha'i stan gnyis bzhag ste/
125b2(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang shar phyogs su kha blta zhing rig sngags 'chang gcig nub phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug la de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa rig sngags
125b3(rgyud): 'chang gi lag pas bzung nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa lag pa sbyar ba'i nang nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /
125b4(rgyud): 'od zer de yang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang la g.yas phyogs su bskor nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la gtsug
125b5(rgyud): gi nor bur 'gyur te/ de mgo la 'dug pas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod la/ 'dod rgur bsgyur ba'i
125b6(rgyud): gzugs can du 'gyur zhing bskal par gnas pa dang / sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gnyi ga yang sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed dang ldan par
125b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing dpag tshad nyis stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba phyed kyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang phye ma'i 'dag gu la rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la
126a1(rgyud): de nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas su song ste rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags
126a2(rgyud): 'chang zla ba nya la n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gcig 'greng gi drung du song la de'i drung du khru lnga tsam byi dor byas nas pho'i ming dang ldan pa'i shing las mdung byas te dri dang / me tog dang /

126a5(rgyud): lo 'khyil zhing lo bcu drug lon pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod la tshe lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur te/ lus
126a6(rgyud): zhig ba'i tshe yang 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /yum dang snying po'i rgyal po 'chang ba gang yin pa de la ni/ lha rnams yid dga' bas dngos
126a7(rgyud): grub sbyin par 'gyur/ chog rgyas par rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa 'di 'chang ba'am/ klog pa gang yin pa de dag la ni/ lha thams cad srung ba dang / skyob pa dang /
126b1(rgyud): sbed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad las kyang grol bar 'gyur ro/ /snying po'i rgyal po 'chang ba gang yin pas ni/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du ring po mi
126b2(rgyud): thogs par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyis dbang du bya'o/ /gdon 'khrugs par bya 'dod na/ na le sham blangs la ka na ka'i
126b3(rgyud): 'bras bu'i nang du btsos nas na le sham des gdon la bdugs na/ smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa'am/ gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /mig 'khrul
126b4(rgyud): bar bya bar 'dod na/ ba bla blangs te rtsangs pa zar bcug ste ba bla rtsangs pa'i kha nas byung ba blangs nas mig sngar bsten na/ mig 'khrul bar 'gyur te/ mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus na/ slar
126b5(rgyud): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyi klad pa na bar bya na/ ba la ka ta'i 'bras bu blangs la phye mar btags te me tog dang lhan cig tu snom du bcug na/ bsnams ma
126b6(rgyud): thag tu klad pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /gu gul gyi bdug pa'am/ gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdon mkhris pa'i rims kyis
126b7(rgyud): 'debs par 'dod na/ ag+ni ma sdu ba gcin bgos la/ bgos nas phye ma zhib mor btags te me tog dang lhan cig tu snom du bcug na/ bsnams ma
127a1(rgyud): thag tu mkhris pa'i rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /pri ti pi pi

127a6(rgyud): sde'u'i ma ru'i rtsa ba dang / /na le sham dkar 'bru bzhi dang / /ras bal tshi gu bil ba'i rtsa/ /thang shing tsan+dan dmar por bcas/ /the tshom med par gnod sbyin
127a7(rgyud): mo| |bdug pa 'di dag sbyin bya zhing / /byis pa rnams la phan 'dod pas/ /bdug pa 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /gdon rnams kyis ni ngo lon dang / /gtong bar
127b1(rgyud): byed pa dang / 'khrul par byed pa de ngas bshad zin to/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir rig sngags kyis gdon rnams gcad pa dang / gzhom
127b2(rgyud): pa dang / phyir bslang bar bya ba ngas bstan pa de yang bshad par bya'o/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ hu ru hu ru ba hu me/ uta tiSh+Tha/ i me swA hA/ phyir bslang ba ni/ chus bya'o/ /
127b3(rgyud): lha rnams/ gdon rnams kyi mtshan ma dang / gso ba'i thabs ngas bshad zin to/ /rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa ma lus pa'i dbang du byas te/ las byed pa
127b4(rgyud): gang yin pa'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyan dang bcas par 'chang ba gang yin pa des kyang gdon rnams ma rungs par bya ba dang /

127b6(rgyud): pa mchog gi de nyid rtogs/ /cho ga'i lha rnams mchod byed pa/ /de 'drar spyod pa mkhas pa yis/ /gsang ba pa rnams gzhig par bya/ /gdon thams
127b7(rgyud): cad kyi ngo lon rdzogs so/ / //de nas sa'i lha mos lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
128a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ cho ga rgyas pa legs par gsungs so/ /bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi don gyi phyir bcom ldan

128a4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sa'i lha mo/ khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te nga la dris pa gang yin pa de legs so/ /sems can

128a7(rgyud): bya zhing / khrus byed pa'i tshe su la yang smra bar mi bya ste/ rig sngags la phyag byas nas khrus bya'o/ /rig sngags sgrub pa na skyil mo krung brtan por 'dug pa bya ste/
128b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'am rig sngags sgrub pa la ni/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug par bya'o/ /drag shul la ni/ rkang pas rkang pa mnan te 'dug par bya'o/ /rgyas pa'i las dang / nor
128b2(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po rnams la ni/ nang par las bya ste/ de'i tshe lha thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir las 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
128b3(rgyud): drag shul gyi las la ni/ nyi ma gung ngam/ nam phyed na las bya ste/ de'i tshe yi dwags thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas na/ de phyir de dag ma rungs par
128b4(rgyud): byed pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhi ba dang / rig sngags sgrub pa ni/ srod kyi dus su bya ste/ de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang la
128b5(rgyud): lta bar byed pas na/ de'i phyir de la zhi ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nub mo yang cho ga 'di bzhin du las bya'o/ /lha mo/ gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags
128b6(rgyud): gang gi sbyin sreg nub mo bya bar bshad pa de'i sbyin sreg ni/ nub mo bya ste/ bzlas pa nyid ni nyin mo bya'o/ /lha mo gang gi sbyin sreg nyin par bya ba de'i bzlas brjod
128b7(rgyud): ni| nub mo bya'o/ /lha mo/ cho ga des na rig sngags thams cad bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sa'i lha mo de mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas rig pa

129a2(rgyud): s+ya| bal gu bal gu/ hu lu hu lu/ taM gi ni swAhA/ de nas sa'i lha mo des lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig sngags kyi las

129a4(rgyud): zla ba phyed kyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang 'dag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la tsan+dan dkar po las sa'i lha mo'i

129a6(rgyud): gzugs bzhag la/ dbus der sa'i lha mo yang bzhag ste lag na rdo rje dang / sa'i lha mo la mchod pa byas la lha bshos rgyas par phul nas lag na rdo
129a7(rgyud): rje'i drung du ni/ ba dan dmar po gzhag go /sa'i lha mo'i drung du ni/ ba dan dkar po gzhag go /phyogs bzhir yang gos dmar po gyon pa'i mi rnams gzhag
129b1(rgyud): go / rig sngags 'chang gis kyang gos dmar po bgos la nges par gnas par bya ste/ rig sngags bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba'i mes

129b4(rgyud): tsi ra kan da ka'i phye ma yungs mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ /de nas nam mkha' las sa'i lha mo 'grub bo zhes sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de
129b5(rgyud): nas rig sngags 'chang gis sa'i lha mo de blangs la/ blangs nas phye ma zhib mor btags na/ phye mas gang la reg pa de las grub nas sa la gnas pa'i rig

130a2(rgyud): mdo'am/ dur khrod kyi thal bas sa'i lha mo'i gzugs byas la de'i steng du tsan+dan dmar pos gtor bar bya ste/ thal bar blangs la dur khrod kyi shing gis
130a3(rgyud): me sbar la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gzer thabs kyis gdab par 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la
130a4(rgyud): rdza mkhan gyi 'jim pa la gzugs byas te mdung rtse gsum pa'am/ ma da na'i tsher ma dbul nas blangs pa'i ma da na'i tsher ma la lan brgyad brgya bzlas
130a5(rgyud): brjod byas pas btsugs na/ gang du btsugs pa der gzer bar 'gyur te/ phyung na gtor bar 'gyur ro/ /thig le sgrub par 'dod na/ zhag gsum smyung

130b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing dngos grub kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ /sa'i steng na sdang bar sems pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /lha thams cad kyang

130b5(rgyud): ' bum bzlas brjod byas te zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la shing de nyid kyi drung du a sho ka'i shing gis me sbar la gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong
130b6(rgyud): gi sbyin sreg byas na/ shing mi snang bar gyur na las de 'grub pa yin no/ /de nas nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur te/ 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur

131a6(rgyud): po| bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang thams cad gang gis dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub bstan par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
131a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas lha'i drang srong me la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po/ khyod sems can thams cad
131b1(rgyud): la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa gang yin pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /drang srong chen po/ khyod ni/ lha thams

131b7(rgyud): grub nges par thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag 'ong ba'i mtshan ma lta ba ni/ sgrub pa thams cad la yang bdag mdun du bzhag la pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas
132a1(rgyud): 'bras yos mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas me'i dbus sngo breng der 'dug pa dang / mtha' sngo ba
132a2(rgyud): dang / me'i rtse mo rgyas pa dang / brung sngo zhing mgyogs pa las brtag ste/ de nas rtags bshad pa de dag gis 'ong bar shes par bya'o/ /de nas rig
132a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang gis lha bshos phul te mar gyi sreg blugs bdun gyis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /bdag 'dug pa dang bgegs thams cad mi 'byung zhing rig sngags

132a5(rgyud): rnams shod cig shod cig / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yid dga' bar gyur nas rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams la bltas te rig sngags kyi
132a6(rgyud): las rnams bshad pa/ las thams cad la yang pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong
132a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas na/ las 'grub par 'gyur te/ me yang dam pa sbyin par byed cing gang na 'bar ba snang ba der srung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dbab na/ bye'u rug
132b1(rgyud): pa'i lo ma'am chus bya'o/ /skyes pa dbang du bya na/ yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung bar bya ste/ sbyin sreg gi gnas sam/ khang stong dben pa'i phyogs
132b2(rgyud): su me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mes bil ba'i shing gi me sbar te kun da'i me tog kha ma bye ba mar gyi nang du smyugs pa sum stong gis sbyin sreg byas na/ skyes pa dbang
132b3(rgyud): du 'gyur ro/ /de nas me sgrub par 'dod na/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zas 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas yar gyi ngo tshes
132b4(rgyud): bcu gnyis la zhag gcig smyung bar byas te khang stong du song la nang du zhugs nas gcang mar byas te phyogs bzhir gtor ma byin la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
132b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag nas de'i mdun du me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mes bil ba'i shing gi me sbar la/ de nas me tog dkar po dang / gu gul gyi bdug
132b6(rgyud): pas me lha spyan drang ngo / /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa dur ba'i stan byas te rtswa dur ba'i stan la 'dug la sna ma'i yam bsreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
132b7(rgyud): mar gyi nang du smyugs pa brgyad stong gis sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas me stag gang gis rtswa rol bar byed na/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog dran

133a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas slar de nyid du zhugs na/ 'grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas lag stangs tsam byas pas kyang sbyin sreg gi las
133a3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags sgrub par 'dod na/ me'i thab khung de nyid nas sol ba blangs te cho ga 'di nyid kyis lag na rdo rje'i mdun
133a4(rgyud): du bzlas brjod byas na/ dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ /de nas me 'byung bar 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba byas te sbyin sreg gi gnas su
133a5(rgyud): song nas a mra ra te ka'i rus pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ me'i kha nas me stag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ che ge mo zhig sreg cing yul de tshig par gyis
133a6(rgyud): shig ces yid kyis bzlas na/ yid la bsam ma thag tu las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /dgra gsad par 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam mar gyi

133b2(rgyud): byas na nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /lha sgrub par 'dod na/ gang gi nyin mo yang rung ste glo bur du me 'bar ba mthong na/ de blangs la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi'i bar du
133b3(rgyud): bzhag ste dus gsum du khrus byed cing zhag bdun du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lha
133b4(rgyud): b shos rnam pa sna tshogs phul te ku sha'i stan la 'dug cing me de nyid kyis sha mya'i shing gi me sbar nas me de'i nang nas pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa dpag tshad brgya dri

140a1(rgyud): par byed kyi/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
140a2(rgyud): skye rgu'i nang na nga'i gzugs 'dzin par nus pa gzhan su yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes rdzong gi lha mo la 'di skad ces
140a3(rgyud): smras so/ /lha mo/ gang khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rgyal po bshad par bya ba'i don la 'ongs pa legs so legs

140b2(rgyud): a s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ti s+ya/ na maHkro d+ha gI ri k+Sha ya/ siM ha sha tu la bA hA nA ya/ e hi b+ha ga ba tI/ badzra pA Ni/ sad+ya na/ sta ne shwa ri/ A gats+tsha A
140b3(rgyud): gats+tsha/ nan+ti ni/ ma ma karma/ sA d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha sa d+ya/ a mo g+ha gA mi ni/ ya sho d+ha ri/ hu ru hu ru/ d+hu na d+hu na mI ni nA/ karmA Ni hud dru swAhA/ gsang sngags bshad pa'i tshes

140b7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi las bshad pa/ rig sngags 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du dben par 'dug la gcer bu'am yang na khyer dings su byas te rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ zhabs

147a6(rgyud): po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dag ni/ bdag gis bshad zin gyi/ gser gyi don du bdag gis rdzas bshad pa gang yin pa'i rdzas de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang

147b1(rgyud): zhing 'jam zhing lci la snum/ /bsregs na dwangs la shin tu dkar/ /'od bzang mnyen bag yod pa'i yul/ /gang yin de ni rab tu bzang / /phyi rol nyi ma 'char ka'i

154b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyang rtag tu srung bar byed do/ /rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa/ pho nya mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang
154b7(rgyud): bcas pa/ phyag rgya'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ gsang chen dang bcas pa/ gang ba dang bcas pa/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs
155a1(rgyud): pa 'di thams cad ma lus par su 'chang ba de'i lus kyi spyi bor ni/ dpal dang ldan pa rdo rje 'dzin rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gsang
155a2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so/ / //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byang
155a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po khyod legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / sems
155a4(rgyud): can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de ni/ legs so/ /rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di
155a5(rgyud): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rjes su gnang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
155a6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa yin no/ /rig sngags 'chang gang spyan gyi snying po dang bcas pa/
155a7(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dang bcas par dran par byed dam/ dus gsum du phyag 'tshal ba de dag la ni/ ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur pa de dag
155b1(rgyud): med do/ /'chi ba'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du phyogs par 'gyur te/ des na de dag la ngan 'gro leg bar ltung bar 'gyur pa med do/ /
155b2(rgyud): sems can mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa dag kyang mnar med par skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mthu yin no/ /dper na/ nor bu
155b3(rgyud): r in po che gtsug phud can zhes bya ba mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing gdon thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur pa de bzhin du rig sngags kyi rgyal
155b4(rgyud): po 'di spyan dang / snying po dang bcas par dran pa tsam gyis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar byed do/ /'di ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rgyu dang mthun
155b5(rgyud): pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzhan du gsung pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
155b6(rgyud): 'phrul pa'am/ 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs byed par 'dod na/ des rig sngags kyi rgyal po btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o/ /sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa

156a3(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni thogs pa med pa'i las yin te/ las thams cad la don yod pa yin na/ sems can ma
156a4(rgyud): rungs pa'i las byed la gang yin pa de dag gis kyang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du las sna tshogs byed nus shing lha rnams la yang 'tshe bar nus te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
156a5(rgyud): bskyed cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa'i lha de dag la yang gnod pa byed nus so/ /rtul phod pa'i mi de dag la rig sngags thams cad kyi snying po gsang

156b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i rig pa mchog gi rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa chen po don yod par sgrub pa bshad do/ /

158b1(rgyud): bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lha gang rig sngags thams cad kyi snying po ming thos na yang dngos grub stsol bar mi bgyid pa de la ni/ bdag gis dgum
158b2(rgyud): pa'i slad du phyag rgya'i tshogs mi bzad pa gtang bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor dam pa la gnas nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rjes su

159a2(rgyud): so| |gdon drag po dang / srin po ma rungs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phyag rgya rnams kyis zhe bcil nas khrag skyug bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du bzhag

161a2(rgyud): sna tshogs gdon rnams la/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gang btab na/ /gdon rnams phyogs brgyar 'byer ba yi/ /phyag rgya'i tshul yang bstan par gyis/ /de nas lha'i tshogs de
161a3(rgyud): dag gis lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang na phyag rgya 'di dag gi ming tsam gnas pa der yang dpag tshad lnga'i nang tshun chad du bdag
161a4(rgyud): cag yongs su mi gnas so/ /bzod ldan dag /de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /nga yang rig sngags kyis bskor ba'i phyag rgya 'di dag gang na gnas pa de na gnas

161a7(rgyud): brkyang ste rdo rje ltar byas pa ni/ rgyal ba'i 'o/ /gung mo yang brkyang la sor mo'i bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni/ rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /srin lag dang bcas
161b1(rgyud): par brkyang la sor mo de dag gi bar nas gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni/ rdo rje mtshan gyi'o/ /de nyid las sor mo par phral te brang gi dkyil du gzhug pa na/ rdo rje rtags kyi'o/ /phyag
161b2(rgyud): ' tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams kyi bar du sor mo thabs bcug nas lag pa'i rgyab tu legs par sbyar la gung mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bzhag nas
161b3(rgyud): brang gi dkyil du bzhag pa ni/ bkra shis kyi'o/ /de nyid lte ba'i gnas su bzung ba ni/ shin tu bkra shis kyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las pad+ma'i sbubs 'dra bar
161b4(rgyud): byas la gung mo gnyis sprad de lhag ma rnams yid tsam gyis ma phrad par byas pa ni/ pad+ma mtshan gyi'o/ /de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis sprad pa la lhag ma
161b5(rgyud): rnams mi sprad pa ni/ pad+ma phreng ba'i 'o/ /lag pa gnyis bkan te mdzub mo dang srin lag rnams bsnol bar dkris la mthe bong gnyis lag pa'i nang du bkug nas sor
161b6(rgyud): mo lhag ma rnams ni/ thams cad kyang 'dra par so so nas lag pa'i gting du gdu bu ltar bkug pa ni/ g.yung drung ris kyi'o/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcangs la
161b7(rgyud): lag ngar yang gcig tu sbyar nas gung mo bsgreng ste gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste nang du yang mi dgu/ phyi rol du yang mi dgye bar tha mal bar bsgrengs nas mthe bong
162a1(rgyud): gnyis nang du gzhug pa ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las srin lag lu gu rgyud ltar dkris la mthe bos srin
162a2(rgyud): lag gi sen mo gnyis mnan nas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / mthe'u chung rnams gshibs te bzhag la sor mo de rnams kyi bar nas gnyis tsam gyi tshad tsam du
162a3(rgyud): byas te drung du khong stong du bya ba 'di ni/ rdo rje'i 'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams nang du bsnol te khu tshur bcangs pa lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo'i
162a4(rgyud): steng du phyung ste brkyangs pa mchod sdong gi dbyibs ltar byas te bzhag pa ni/ mche ba'i 'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams phyi rol du bsnol te khu tshur
162a5(rgyud): bcas la sor mo lag pa'i rgyab tu gzhar/ lag ngar gnyis gshibs te gcig la gcig sbyar te lag pa'i rting sprad la gung mo brkyang ste gshibs pa ni/ mdung thung
162a6(rgyud): gi'o| |phan tshun bsnol mar dkris la lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung rnams lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid las
162a7(rgyud): klu mgo'i gdengs ka ltar byas te bar rnams nas gang tsam du bya ba ni/ klu'i lag gi'o/ /lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan te zhabs mig
162b1(rgyud): gi dbyibs ltar byas la lag pa g.yon pa bkan nas lag pa g.yas pa khas phub ste sbyar la sor mo rnams kyi ngos so sor legs par phrad par bya ba ni/ zhags pa'i 'o//
162b2(rgyud): sor mo rnams phan tshun nang du bsnol la lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis gshibs nas mthe bong gnyis kyi nang du gung mo gnyis kyi gnas su bcug
162b3(rgyud): nas lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo drang por bsgreng la g.yon pa'i gung mo bkug pa'i rtse mo mthe bong dang phrad pa ni/ ral gri'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa'i gung mo rang gi
162b4(rgyud): gnas su nang du bcug la lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo gyen du drang por bsrang ba ni/ dbyug pa'i 'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa bkan la lag pa g.yas pa khas phub ste
162b5(rgyud): gcig la gcig ngos sbyar nas g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung steng na 'dug pa'i tshigs kyi srub bzhag ste tshigs gcig tsam phyir lhag par bya/ g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtse mor
162b6(rgyud): g.yas ba'i mthe bo'i tshigs kyi srub bzhag ste sen mo lhag ma rnams ni/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bzhag ste 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid byas la sor mo rnams kyi thor
162b7(rgyud): to lag pa'i rting du dmar pos bkram pa ni/ 'khor lo'i 'o/ /de la de dag gsang sngags rnams/ /bdag gis su ni mdor bshad de/ /rim bzhin du ni ngas bshad
163a1(rgyud): pa| |ci rigs par ni mnyan par gyis/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM dza ye dza ya ba he swAhA/ rgyal ba'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/
163a2(rgyud): oM bi dza ye bi kra me/ trai lokya bi kra me swAhA/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM badzra aM ke swAhA/ rdo rje mtshan gyi gsang sngags
163a3(rgyud): so| |na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM badzra tsin+de swAhA/ rdo rje rtags kyi gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM swa sti ka bi shud+d+ha rat+na swAhA/ bkra shis kyi gsang
163a4(rgyud): sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM tri shaM ku swAhA/ shin tu bkra shis kyi gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM shrI ba hai swAhA/ pad+ma mtshan gyi gsang
163a5(rgyud): sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM bi shu d+d+he swAhA/ pad+ma phreng gi gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM pra marti ni swAhA/ g.yung drung ris kyi gsang sngags
163a6(rgyud): so| |na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM badzra tra sa ni pra marda ni ts+tshin+da b+hin+da ni swAhA/ mdung rtse gsum pa'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM bi nA ya ka nA sha ni swAhA/
163a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM sarba duHpra marda nI ye swAhA/ mche ba'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM a ti shA ya bi kra me swAhA/
163b1(rgyud): mdung thung gi gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM hUM phaT swA hA/ klu lag gi gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM pA she swAhA/ zhags pa'i gsang
163b2(rgyud): sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM bid trA sa ni swAhA/ ral gri'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM ma hA da N+Da swAhA/ dbyug pa'i gsang sngags so/ /na mo
163b3(rgyud): badzra pA Ni s+ya/ oM tsakra a spu taM ke swAhA/ 'khor lo'i gsang sngags so/ /phyag rgya'i las rnams mthu bskyed phyir/ /gsang sngags 'di dag bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya
163b4(rgyud): yi ni las rnams kyi/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad par bya/ /de la rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni/ /lha'i gdon la bstan par bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni/ dri za la bstan
163b5(rgyud): par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i mtshan ni/ /'byung po la bstan par bya'o/ /rdo rje rtags ni/ lha ma yin rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /bkra shis ni/ tshangs pa'i srin po rnams la bstan par bya'o//
163b6(rgyud): shin tu bkra shis ni/ gnod sbyin rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /pad+ma mtshan gyi ni/ /srin po rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /pad+ma phreng ba bzhi ni/ gzu lums can rnams la bstan
163b7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /g.yung drung ris kyi ni/ be sa ra bstan par bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum pa ni/ smyo byed rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /rdo rje ni/ log 'dren rnams la bstan
164a1(rgyud): par bya'o/ /mche ba ni/ sha za rnams la bstan par bya ste/ lhag par yang tsi bi na la bstan par bya'o/ /mdung thung ni/ brjed byed rnams la bstan par bya'o/ /klu lag
164a2(rgyud): ni/ dug rgyas par byed pa'i klu rnams la bstan bar bya'o/ /zhags pa ni/ nam gru la bstan par bya'o/ /ral gri ni/ byad la bstan par bya'o/ /dbyug pa ni/ skem byed la bstan
164a3(rgyud): par bya'o/ /'khor lo ni/ gzhon nu la bstan par bya'o/ /mA ma kI ni/ thams cad la bstan par bya'o/ /rtags bcas mtshan nyid bcas pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di dag bdag gis
164a4(rgyud): bshad/ /gdon rnams rnam par 'phrul pa las/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bstan bya zhing / /rdo rje 'dzin pa bzlas brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gcod byed pa//
164a5(rgyud): gang yin de la bdag gis su/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab 'bar gyis/ /spyi bo yang ni gzhom par bya/ /lag na rdo rjes sngags bstan pa/ /gdon rnams 'jigs par byed pa 'di/ /rig
164a6(rgyud): sngags rnams ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /lag na rdo rje'i bka' mchog gis/ /rang gi mtshan ni bstan na 'grub/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya yi/ /rtags bcas mtshan ma gar gnas pa//
164a7(rgyud): lha rnams kun gyis tshugs mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya kun ldan mA ma kI'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bdag gis bshad/ /mdung rtse gsum pa phyed mtshan can/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya ni/ /gang du
164b1(rgyud): bstan pa de dag tu/ /lha dang dri za srin mi gnas/ /lag na rdo rje'i bka' mchog gis/ /gdon rnams thams cad ma rungs 'gyur/ /mA ma kI yi rgyas btab pa'i/ /cho ga rgyas pa 'di sgrub
164b2(rgyud): cing / /dngos grub 'dod pa gang yin des/ /gsang ba 'di ni bstan par byed/ /mA ma kI yi rgyas btab pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mthong ba dang / /mA ma kI yi gsang mthong bas/ /cho ga
164b3(rgyud): tshul bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /sgrub par gang gis mA ma kI'i/ /mthong na ring por mi thogs par/ /dngos grub mchog thob the tshom med/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya'i mtshan/ /gsang
164b4(rgyud): ba bdag gis bshad pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gang dag tu/ /bzhag nas dngos grub phyir bsgrubs na/ /mA ma kI yi rgya mthong bas/ /ring por mi thogs dngos grub thob/ /phyag
164b5(rgyud): rgya lcags kyu lhan cig tu/ /gdon rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /rig sngags rnams dang sbyin sreg las/ /gtor ma byas shing mar 'thungs kyang / /drag cing mi bzad pha rol
164b6(rgyud): gnon/ /gdon rnams gang du mi 'gro der/ /phyag rgya mthong na mi bzad rnams/ /lcags kyu ma dang lhan cig sbyar/ /so sor bstan kyang gdon rnams gang / /'gro bar mi byed
164b7(rgyud): gang yin pa/ /de la lag na rdo rje yi/ /bka' mchog gis ni phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /mi bzad rnams kyang bstan par bya/ /gtum pa'i gzugs can mA ma kI /gcig pu mi bzad
165a1(rgyud): bstan par bya/ /mthong nas sems ni mA ma kIs/ /'jigs nas gdon rnams 'byer bar byed/ /phyag rgya'i rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyang bshad par bya
165a2(rgyud): ste| gdon gang chos lugs mi bzad pa/ /rig sngags la 'da' bar byed pa gang yin pa'i gdon thams cad gang yin pa de la ni/ las 'di bya ste/ sa phyogs gtsang mar brtags
165a3(rgyud): nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po yongs su sbyar bar byas la/ der rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgya ming dang ldan par gzhag go/ /tshon rtsi sna gsum gyi phye mas rgyal ba dang / rnam par
165a4(rgyud): rgyal ba dang / rdo rje'i mtshan ni/ shar phyogs su dgod do/ /rdo rje rtags dang / bkra shis dang / shin tu bkra shis ni/ byang phyogs su dgod do/ /pad+ma mtshan dang / pad+ma phreng dang / g.yung
165a5(rgyud): drung ris ni/ lho phyogs su dgod do/ /mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / mche ba ni/ nub phyogs su dgod do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song la mdung thung ni/ shar phyogs su
165a6(rgyud): gzhag go / klu lag ni/ byang phyogs su gzhag go /ral gri ni/ nub phyogs su gzhag go /phyag rgya bzhis ni bskor nas kyang / /blo ngan de ni skrag par bya/ /de nas dug bzhin du
165a7(rgyud): dbyug pa'i tshul du bstan na/ gdon de ngu zhing tshig bzhin du dkyil 'khor der 'ong bar 'gyur te/ der rdo rje lcags kyu mas bzlas brjod byas nas phyag rgya'i tshul bstan na/
165b1(rgyud): de mthong bas de nyid du 'gyel te/ gdon gyi rigs kyang bcom par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags rnams kyi gsang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni gsang mchog yin/ /rig pa mchog gi gsang ba'i
165b2(rgyud): rgyu| |gsang ba 'di ni gang mthong dang / /gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/ /de la nga ni gnas pa yin/ /phyag rgya'i go cha bgos nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i bka' mchog gis/ /phyag rgya drang zhing
165b3(rgyud): mthong byed gang / /de la nga ni rtag tu yang / /phyag rgya bcings pas dngos grub sbyin/ /dngos grub mchog phyir bstan pa yis/ /chog ji ltar mthong ba bzhin/ /sgrub pa kun la phyag rgya
165b4(rgyud): dgod/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /sgrub pa rnams kyi dngos grub phyir/ /gang gis mi rnams grub 'gyur ba/ /mA ma kI ni rtag par gzhag /phyogs gang du rig sngags sgrub
165b5(rgyud): ba der mA ma kI'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o/ /gang du bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI'i drag tu skul ba'i mchog spangs pa der ni/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du dngos grub med do/ /mA ma kI
165b6(rgyud): bstan pas ni/ gdon rnams la rgyas 'debs par 'gyur te/ /smras pas las thams cad byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang lag na rdo rje gang du spyan drang ba der ni/ mA ma kI'i phyag rgya
165b7(rgyud): gzhag par bya ste/ gang na mA ma kI gnas pa de na nga gnas so/ /gang na phyag rgya'i tshogs gnas pa de na nga rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang lhan cig tu rig sngags thams cad dang ldan
166a1(rgyud): pa dang / pho nya ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang gnas so/ /dus gsum du ni phyag rgya la/ /phyag byas dngos grub dam pa sgrub/ /nga yi rdo rje phyag rgya yis/ /btab pas de la
166a2(rgyud): dngos grub sbyin/ /mA ma kI ni der bzhag na/ /rig sngags nges par 'grub 'gyur te/ /de la yid gnyis mi bya'o/ /gang zhig phyag rgya 'di dag dang / /mA ma kI yi phyag rgyar ldan/ /de ni
166a3(rgyud): rig mchog cho ga yi/ /gsang dang gsang chen ldan pa yin/ /de la lha rnams mgu ba yi/ /yid kyis dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di dag dran byed dang / /lhag par yang ni ston
166a4(rgyud): byed pa/ /de la lha rnams dga' ba 'o/ /sems kyis dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /lha rnams bye bas bshad pa yis/ /phyag rgya 'di dag gar gnas pa/ /der ni dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir/ /
166a5(rgyud): nga ni rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya'i mtshan/ /phyag rgya kun gyi mchog yin te/ /phyag rgya thams cad ston pa na/ /mA ma kI yi phyag rgya yang / /bstan par byas na don
166a6(rgyud): byed 'gyur/ /gang du phyag rgya'i tshogs bshad cing / /mA ma kI yi gsang mchog bstan/ /der ni nga yang gnas par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di dag ni/ char yang 'bebs par byed do/ /
166a7(rgyud): lha rnams la yang rgyas 'debs par byed do/ /mdor na yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du cho ga sna tshogs kyi las byed de/ phyag rgya'i tshul bstan pas las byed par 'gyur ro/ /
166b1(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad la yang rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang sbyor bar bya ste/ phyag rgya 'di rnams ni/ gdon la bstan bar mi bya'o/ /phyag rgya rnams bstan na/ lha rnams 'jigs shing skrag par
166b2(rgyud): 'gyur la rig sngags 'chang yang brlag par 'gyur ro/ /mA ma kIs phur bus btab na/ rtag tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /skrag pas dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ /phyag rgya'i tshul ni/
166b3(rgyud): lag pa'i stangs kyis bstan par mi bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du yang ming dang phyag rgya'i tshul bri'o/ /mA ma kI ni/ las thams cad la yang bstan par bya'o/ /gang na mA ma kI gnas la/ gang na mA
166b4(rgyud): ma kI gnas pa de na lag pas ji ltar bstan par bya ba de bzhin du sa la yang bri'o/ /phyag rgya gang dag gi tshul gyis bskul bas kyang mi rnams dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba bstan na/
166b5(rgyud): des cho ga dang / las dang / gnas rnams kyis kyang las su rung bar byed do/ /de nas phyag rgya'i tshogs bstan nas las rnams bya ste/ mthu stobs chen po sna tshogs rnams bstan par
166b6(rgyud): bya'o| |dkyil 'khor 'di ni/ gsang ba'i mchog yin no/ /nga la blta bar 'dod pa gang yin pa des ni/ mA ma kI la sogs pa phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor blta
166b7(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ming thos nas phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs par bya ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci ste phyag rgya'i tshogs ma mthong na/ de la dam
167a1(rgyud): tshig gis dngos grub sbyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gis mA ma kI'i phyag rgya mthong ba de'i mdun du ngas dngos grub sbyin par bya'o/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba'i mA
167a2(rgyud): ma kI'i phyag rgyas bkod la mA ma kI'i gzugs kyang gzhag par bya ste/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mA ma kI'i phyag rgya blta bar bya'o/ /de nas mA ma kI'i las zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang /
