203b4(rgyud): nas| |nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med/ /byang phyogs yang na nub phyogs su/ /tshon rtsi la sogs de dag bzhag /shar bltas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /dri dang me tog phreng
203b5(rgyud): bas mchod/ /mtshon cha bsngags shing phyogs bcings la/ /thig gis gra yang btsal bar bya/ /de ltar mnyam par bkod nas ni/ /khang pa gru bzhi bri bar bya/ /ji ltar thig ni
203b6(rgyud): gdab ba bzhin/ /thig dang mthun par bsgrub par bya/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /ya mtshan de nyid dran par bya/ /nang gi khang pa mnyam pa dang / /gra bzhi legs par
203b7(rgyud): gnas par bya/ /gra yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /de yi tshad dang mthun pa ni/ /rdo rje khang gnas rdo rje yi/ /dbus dang thog ma dbyibs legs shing / /rtse mtho shin tu rgya che ba/ /
204a1(rgyud): shar du brten te gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje yi ni byang phyogs su/ /rdo rje rig sngags gdab cing bya/ /dbus dang rtse mo legs pa yi/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo nang du bsgreng / /nub byang
204a2(rgyud): grar ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje sgo ni nub tu gdod/ /'di ni gsang ba'i sgor bshad de/ /'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /dkyil 'khor 'dod pas sgo de yi/ /byang phyogs kyi ni nye
204a3(rgyud): 'khor dang / /lho phyogs su ni gang bshad pa/ /bsnyen te legs par gzhag par bya/ /gur gum dag ni yid 'ong ba/ /rgya skyegs khu bas sbyar ba'am/ /le brgan rtsis ni dmar byas
204a4(rgyud): bya| |der ni yid kun 'phrog byed pa/ /des ni ba dan byas nas kyang / /shing ring dag la gdags par bya/ /sgo yi lho phyogs ngos su yang / /de dag las gzhan gang 'dod pa'i/ /ku
204a5(rgyud): ran+da yi phreng ba dag / rdo rje rtse mor gdags par bya/ /yang na me tog dmar po yi/ /phreng ba sna tshogs bzang po gdags/ /rdo rje'i sgo ni don grub pa/ /'gro dang mi 'gro 'jig
204a6(rgyud): rten gsum/ /'di dag 'joms nus gang yin pa/ /sgo srung gnyis kyang gzhag bya zhing / /de yang rig sngags bzhin du bya/ /grags pa gzhan yang gang 'dod pa/ /rdo rje
204a7(rgyud): thog tog lho phyogs su/ /rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs bzhag /rdo rje lo tog lho phyogs su/ /me tog yungs kar steng dag tu/ /dri bsung zhim pos cher
204b1(rgyud): bsgos shing / /dri dang me tog rgyas pa'ang gzhag /rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che/ /dpal ldan de bzhin byang phyogs su/ /rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya yis/ /bzhag na glags ni rnyed
204b2(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal gang gang las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa yid kyis bkug /rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur gyis/ /bsnun na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po'i
204b3(rgyud): khang pa der/ /g.yon logs nas ni 'jug par bya/ /de ni g.yas logs bskor ba yang / /'jig rten dag tu bshad par bya/ /'khor kun dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sgrog kyang
204b4(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /klu yi gtso bo nor rgyas bu/ /gzi can gnyis kyang gra ru gzhag /'di gnyis klu kun bdag po ste/ /klu kun gyi ni gnas kyang yin/ /bram za las byung dug
204b5(rgyud): can de| |'di gnyis sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan/ /'di gnyis kyi ni mdun logs su/ /mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu/ /mkha' lding gi ni cho ga bzhin/ /rkang dang byis
204b6(rgyud): pa la sogs bskor/ /de nas 'byung ba'i tshogs bdun dag /cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /gnod sbyin kun dang ku be ra/ /de yi be con byang phyogs gzhag /de nas klu
204b7(rgyud): chen tshogs rnams dang / /bya ba sgrub po g.yog dang bcas/ /klu yi g.yog rnams mthu stobs ldan/ /de dag shar phyogs ngos su dgod/ /de nas phyi rol rig sngags
205a1(rgyud): tshogs| |thams cad bzhag ste dbang phyug che/ /chos kyi ngang can grags ldan ma/ /lha mo dka' zlog zhi 'brang ldan/ /lag na rdo rje lha chen dang / /
205a2(rgyud): dka' zlog gnyis kyi bar dag tu/ /rig sngags rigs dag gzhag par bya/ /der ni lag na rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu gzir/ /de nas gra logs lha mo ni/ /
205a3(rgyud): ka ta ya na log 'dren dang / /sna yon sum cu rtsa gnyis po/ /de dag las ni gang 'dod dang / /de yi 'og tu dri za ni/ /skal chen brtson 'grus che ba rnams/ /shar du dbang
205a4(rgyud): po lha yi tshogs/ /de yi 'og tu lha yi gza'/ /de nas khyab 'jug 'khor lor bcas/ /me dang drug ma bstan pa yi/ /me dang mdung thung gra ru gzhag /lho phyogs dang
205a5(rgyud): por lho phyogs kyi/ /'byung po'i bya ba sgrub pa gzhag /de yi 'og tu gshin rje dang / /gshin rje'i dbyug pa grul bum rnams/ /grul bum la sogs tshogs kun
205a6(rgyud): dang / /ma mo rnams dang 'jig rten ma/ /bden bral grar ni 'phags ma'i mdung / /'byung po'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya/ /nub phyogs dang por skem byed ni/ /
205a7(rgyud): drag mo tshogs rnams mang por bcas/ /klu dang mkha' lding grags ma rnams/ /de yi 'og tu gtor ma'i gnas/ /tshul li zhes bya rgya chen yang / /der ni nges
205b1(rgyud): par gzhag par bya/ /de ltar de dag thams cad du/ /tshogs rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu/ /rdo rje dbyibs kyi stegs bu ni/ /shar nub
205b2(rgyud): phyogs su lta ba'i dbyibs/ /de yi dbyibs legs gzhag par bya/ /de yi nub phyogs gnas su yang / /rig sngags 'chang ni gus gnas shing / /lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni/ /
205b3(rgyud): rab tu bsgrims te bzlas brjod bya/ /tsan+dan phye ma la sogs sbas/ /nas dang yungs kar la sogs dang / /yang na de dag re re yis/ /lag na rdo rje thog mar bris/ /bdag nyid
205b4(rgyud): g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug / lha mo lho nub mtshams su gzhag /g.yas pas dri dang phreng bas mchod/ /bdug pa sna tshogs dag kyang bsreg /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad
205b5(rgyud): kun| |chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ /yang na 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ /the tshom med par gdon par bya/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bri/ /dpal
205b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa lha yi lha/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs 'od can bri/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu yi/ /rig sngags gus pas mchod cing bzlas/ /lha mo stobs chen de nyid dang / /rdo rje ri bo
205b7(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /snying po lag na rdo rje ni/ /mtshon rtse gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi/ /ma mo bdun gyis bskor bar bya/ /pho nya ma bcu dpung gi mchog/
206a1(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhis rjes 'brang dang / /rig sngags tshogs ni thams cad dang / /rdo rje khro bo yan chad bri/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba dang / /skal ldan mchog
206a2(rgyud): sbyin gzugs bzang 'dra/ /'jig rten kun gyi thabs su ni/ /dus kun du ni phyag bya ba/ /lha kun rig sngags chen mo ste/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs byed/ /gdon chen dag
206a3(rgyud): ni stong phrag rnams/ /gcig pus gsod par byed pa ste/ /de yi ming ni brjod byas shing / /me tog bdug pas mchod byas na/ /gdon rnams bye ba stong phrag dag /'khyams
206a4(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de yi dngos grub gzugs bzang zhing / /dpal dang ldan par mngon sum gnas/ /thams cad don ni sgrub pa pos/ /'di la the tshom med
206a5(rgyud): par bsgrub/ /sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs/ /bshos dang 'dug pa la sogs mchod/ /a ga ru spos du ru ka /yungs kar gu gul shu dag dang / /nir kun
206a6(rgyud): di dang shu la si/ /pad 'dra ma dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /ma ha bi sha la dang bcas/ /'dir ni las kyang bya ba yin/ /thams cad 'jug pa'i sgo dag tu/ /thams cad kyang ni 'byung
206a7(rgyud): bar bya/ /sgo ma yin pa gzhan dag tu/ /'dir ni ci yang mi bya'o/ /zhe sdang gti mug rgyags dang myos/ /'dod chags mi shes dbang gis kyang / /'di la 'jug dang 'byung byas na/ /mi
206b1(rgyud): rnams myur du nad kyis 'debs/ /gdon rnams myos shing rgyags pa yis/ /rdo rje dag la rdzi byed dam/ /rkang pas rdo rje ri mo brdzis/ /myur du dam tshig nyams 'gyur te/ /
206b2(rgyud): de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /myur du rdo rje chen pos 'joms/ /de dag gi ni rigs rnams kyang / /rdo rje'i rig sngags tshogs kyis gzhag /slob dpon yang na dam tshig shes/
206b3(rgyud): gdon gang dag gis brnyas byed na/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang / /sbyin sreg dag gis de yi rigs/ /skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rdo rje
206b4(rgyud): rigs chen las/ /rig sngags 'dor gyur gang yin pa/ /de yang sngar ni bsgrub byas la/ /myos la sogs pas gdon rnams bskrad/ /gang phyir skor yang 'grub pa'i phyir/ /
206b5(rgyud): rtag tu 'di ni nang dag tu/ /mchod pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa dang / /brdeg pa la sogs las mi bya/ /gzhan yang nad gtad mang po dang / /yi dwags 'byung po sha za dag/
206b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor spong bar byed pa dang / /de dag 'dir ni gshibs pa yi/ /drag po'i las la 'jug par bya/ /gzhig par bya ba gang yang rung / /thams cad lho phyogs nang du
206b7(rgyud): bya| |kun la me ni 'bar bar bya/ /bdug pa'i snod ni phyi rol gzhag /lha bshos sna tshogs mdzes pa dag /ci 'dod kun ni thams cad du/ /thams cad zad mi shes
207a1(rgyud): par bya| |gdon gyi dkyil 'khor pha rol gyi/ /byang shar mtshams su gang 'dod pa'i/ /lha yi phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang bri/ /pad+ma 'khor lo rgyal
207a2(rgyud): mtshan mdung / /mdung thung dbyug pa be con ri/ /zhags pa rtse gsum kha gdeng dung / /gdon drag rnams la gnas par bya/ /gang na rig sngags gdon drag pa/ /
207a3(rgyud): mthu drag gnas pa de dag ni/ /mthu nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing / /'di la dpyad par mi bya 'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs kun tu/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun gnas kyang
207a4(rgyud): bya| |gtor ma dang ni bdug pa rnams/ /rab tu rgyas pas mchod par bya/ /de nas gdon ni dul ba yis/ /thems par gyur na mchod par bya/ /mi bzad la ni snar
207a5(rgyud): blugs dang / /mig bsku ba dang btung ba dang / /sbyin sreg sogs pas gzhig par bya/ /gdon gyis drag tu btab pa la/ /dal nas bzung bas yongs mi bya/ /dal nas byas
207a6(rgyud): pa sman pa nyid/ /mi bzad gdon gyis bcom par 'gyur/ /de phyir sman pa mi bzad pa/ /gtum zhing spyod par rig pa dang / /brtan mchog dga' zhing spro ba dang / /
207a7(rgyud): snying snyoms rig sngags brtson pa yis/ /khros nas mthu ni snyoms bya zhing / /brdeg pa'am yang na bsdig par bya/ /dul ba'i gdon ni dang pa yis/ /de ma thag tu
207b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor phyi nang bcas par yang / /gtor ma'i las ni bya ba dang / /'khur ba dang ni gshibs pa dang / /kha zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul/ /dam
207b2(rgyud): tshig ci rigs sbyin par bya/ /rig sngags 'byung po la sogs kyi/ /gtor ma kun ni ci snyed sbyin/ /gdon kun la ni mched pa bya/ /bcom ldan nyid kyis bshad pa bzhin/ /bden
207b3(rgyud): par smra zhing dam tshig shes/ /slob dpon phyir ni 'dir brtson pa'i/ /slob ma dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug /thams cad kyi ni phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /skrag par bya dang mchod bya ba/ /de
207b4(rgyud): dag thams cad g.yon pa yis/ /rnam pa thams cad bstan par bya/ /rdo rje gom pa 'dor dang 'jig /gcig car yongs su sgyur ba dang / /g.yon pas brdab par bya ba dang / /
207b5(rgyud): rgyags pa'i seng+ge sgra bsgrags dang / /mdzub mo bstan te hUM zhes bya/ /shin tu sgra yang rab tu bskyed/ /rdo rje rigs can skyes pa yi/ /slob dpon gyis ni bstan par bya/ /lha yi gdon
207b6(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya tshogs bshad pa/ /rkyen du bab pa gang yin pa'i/ /so so'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin/ /tshangs pa'i pad+ma lha chen mdung / /gshin rje'i dbyug
207b7(rgyud): chen dam pa yin/ /khyab 'jug 'khor lo sman pa'i mi/ /nam mkha' lding gi sna dang 'dab/ /dbang po rdo rje me yi lce/ /chu lha yi ni zhags pa bstan/ /rlung ni dar gyi shugs can
208a1(rgyud): te| |ta na ta yi be con sogs/ /'byung po'i gdon rnams thams cad kyi/ /lag pa g.yon pas de dag gzung / /'jug byed kyi ni 'khor lo rdzing / /lta ba
208a2(rgyud): dang ni di ri ri/ /dri za dag ni thams cad kyi/ /gling bu pi wang la sogs bstan/ /gar mkhan dag ni lhag par yang / /gar dang rol mo'i cha byad bstan/ /gnod sbyin rnams
208a3(rgyud): kyi cher bgad pa/ /rab gtum gyi ni sgrub chen te/ /ku be ra yi mtshon mang dang / /yang na phyag rgya'i tshogs kun yin/ /klu chen gdeng sa ka chas pa ste/ /lag pa g.yon
208a4(rgyud): pas mgo bor gzhag / dbugs ni rgyun ring rgyu ba dang / /mig dmar dug dang bcas pa yin/ /klu rnams gdengs ka mang po dag /gcig tu gzhibs nas ci dgar
208a5(rgyud): gzhag / bya ba sgrub pa thams cad ni/ /sbrul yod pa yi gdengs ka'i dbyibs/ /tshangs pa srin po gnyis kyi ni/ /sngags kyi ril ba nor bu dang / /oM brjod pa yi
208a6(rgyud): dbyug pa dang / /mchod phyir thogs la sogs par bstan/ /srin po rnams kyi so gtsigs dang / /rdzu 'phrul dag kyang rab tu bstan/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang / /
208a7(rgyud): mtshon cha dag kyang 'dra ba yin/ /sha za rnams ni 'tshe ba dang / /ha rer lta zhing sha la sred/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs ston pa dang / /kun tu yang ni lta bar byed/ /skam
208b1(rgyud): byed dang ni rang bzhin tshul/ /mdung thung la sogs dpung la brten/ /ma mo'i gdon ni thams cad ni/ /rang gi lha yi mtshon mchog byed/ /pad+ma phyir dang thor tshugs dbyug/
208b2(rgyud): sngags ni nor bu bskor bar bya/ /ril ba 'dzin pa 'phags pa rnams/ /tshangs pa'i phyag rgya bdun pa yin/ /mdung rtse gsum pa zla phyed dang / /thor tshugs mig dang rgyal
208b3(rgyud): mtshan dang / /khyu mchog skad 'byin ral gri rnams/ /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya bdun/ /mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang / /de bzhin ra dang bya gag dang / /rma bya yi ni
208b4(rgyud): mjug ma rnams/ /gzhon nu'i phyag rgya bdun po yin/ /'khor lo mkha' lding dang phag rnams ni/ /khyab 'jug phyag rgya bdun mkha' lding dang phag rnams ni/ /khyab 'jug
208b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bdun po yin/ /mche ba dang ni sprin dang sa/ /de bzhin bum pa gtun shing dang / /gshol dang rkang pa g.yon pa rnams/ /phag mo yi ni phyag rgya bdun/ /nam gru dag
208b6(rgyud): gi gnyer ma gdong / /rgyan skad la sogs ston pa dang / /skem pa nam gru'i phyag rgya ste/ /rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa yin/ /zas su mdangs za rnams kyi ni/ /lhung bzed
208b7(rgyud): ral gri lag g.yon bcom/ /lha min rnams kyi mi yi gzugs/ /hUM dang bcas par bstan par bya/ /'phags pa rnams ni 'khor dang bcas/ /kun la mdung rtse gsum pa
209a1(rgyud): yin| |dri ba byas na lhag par yang / /gdon rnams mtshan nyid gsal bar shes/ /log 'dren sna tshogs brjod pa gang / /de dag tshul ltas
209a2(rgyud): bstan par bya/ /de dag la rang gi lag pa bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / rkang pa tha mal par brkyang ba dang / smrar gzhug pa de dag las gsang sngags kyi las
209a3(rgyud): bstan te/ dri ba dang / brdeg pa dang / dgrol ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum bya'o/ /las rgya che ba rig sngags kyi tshogs kyis bshad pa phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
209a4(rgyud): gyi las grub pa 'di ni/ shin tu ngo mtshar che ba ste/ bsdeb tu bya ba'i mdo bstan pa dang / sngags kyi tshogs rnams kyang bshad do/ /'dus pa chen po'i mdo las shin
209a5(rgyud): tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs las rig sngags kyi tshogs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang bshad do/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil
209a6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen po dang / dka' zlog mas bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas par bshad pa rdzogs
209a7(rgyud): so|| ||dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor ci bstan dang / /rig sngags kyi ni dkyil 'khor rnams/ /so sor rgyas par bstan pa
209b1(rgyud): pa dang / /gdon gyi las kyi phyag rgya dang / /phyag rgya nyi tshe byed pa dang / /rig sngags grub pa'i sa rnams dang / /khrus kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang / /dri dang me tog phreng ba
209b2(rgyud): dang / /bdug pa dang ni mchod pa dang / /gtor ma sna tshogs de dag kun/ /dbul bas kun tu rnam kun gyis/ /don kun rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /spyan drang 'di ni nges par bya//
209b3(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad bder 'gyur ba/ /'byung po kun dga' zhes bya ba'i/ /gtor ma rig sngags ldan bya zhing / /g.yas g.yon nas ni sbyin par bya/ /rtag tu 'di dag thams cad
209b4(rgyud): kyang / /phyogs kun bltas pas 'di skad brjod/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag
209b5(rgyud): rgya'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags brgyad brgyar skyes pa yi/ /gdon gyi srog gi rten gyur dang / /rgyu ba rab tu bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod pa
209b6(rgyud): dang / /dkyil 'khor ris gsum mchod pa la/ /gdon rnams kyi ni gdon las mchog /gdon gyi gdon stobs rmugs bya dang / /nges par rtag tu bzlas bya bshad/ /bye ba
209b7(rgyud): phrag stong gdon rnams ni/ /sa steng dag na rgyu ba yod/ /dus tshigs sna tshogs bab pa na/ /de dag rgyu ba sna tshogs pa/ /gdon mchog dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ /de dag bdag
210a1(rgyud): gis bshad par bya/ /gdon rnams nyan par byed pa dang / /gtor ma len cing grub sbyin pa/ /de dag tshul dang gnas byas pa/ /dben pa dag tu rgyu
210a2(rgyud): bar byed/ /ri bo yid du 'ong rnams dang / /rtse mo rnams dang khyim rnams dang / /'bras bu me tog rgyas rnams dang / /drang srong dag gi gnas rnams dang / /dka' thub tshal dang
210a3(rgyud): gzhal med khang / /rig byed rjes su slob pa dang / /me tog sna tshogs mchod ldan dang / /gnas dang kun dga' yid 'ong dang / /bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang / /'jig
210a4(rgyud): rten mar me byed kun dang / /nyi ma'i gnas na dga' byed cing / /nyi ma lhan cig 'gro bar byed/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang kha dog mnyam/ /gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma la/ /de dag
210a5(rgyud): rtag tu rgyu bar byed/ /zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer gyi/ /phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas/ /rin chen kun gyis rab brgyan cing / /rtse nas ngos ni lda ldi dang / /phug brgya dag gis gang
210a6(rgyud): ba yin| |lhun po ri la de dag gnas/ /gangs ri ri bo'i rtse mo dang / /gangs kyi sul ni stong pa dang / /sman kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi/ /gsang rnams dang ni nags tshal dang / /
210a7(rgyud): sman rgyas yongs su gang ba yin/ /spos ngad ldan la de dag gnas/ /spos kyi ngad ni zhim pa mi/ /phyogs rnams dang ni rgyas byed dang / /dpag bsam shing gis brgyan
210b1(rgyud): pa yi| |skyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang / /lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams su/ /lha yi gzugs kyis gnas par byed/ /de dag sprin phung gseb na gnas/ /sprin
210b2(rgyud): phung gi ni sgra dag 'dra/ /sprin phung dag dang 'grog byed cing / /sprin phung lhan cig dga' bar byed/ /rgya mtsho nang gi chu la gnas/ /chu yi shugs kyis rjes 'brang zhing / /de dag
210b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i chu klung dang / /lhan cig tu ni rgyu bar byed/ /mun nag gi ni klog chen dang / /rgya mtsho yi ni sgra rnams dang / /rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa la/ /de dag rtag tu 'khrugs
210b4(rgyud): par byed/ /dpyid zla'i dus la bab pa na/ /shing rnams kun la gdon de dag /khu byug bung ba'i gzugs su gnas/ /chu klung chen po'i 'gram dag na/ /gling ma rnams
210b5(rgyud): dang rdzong rnams dang / /chu dmar dag gis rgyas pa yi/ /'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed/ /chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang / /chu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang / /khron pa rnam pa sna
210b6(rgyud): tshogs dang / /ri bo dag dang chu rnams dang / /sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gang ba yi/ /nags khung chen po dag na yang / /de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas/ /sbrul dang lhan cig
210b7(rgyud): dga' bar byed/ /ljon shing chen po mi bzad dang / /'byung po dag ni tshogs chen dang / /khang stong dang ni yul stong dang / /ba lang gnas ni gang ba dang / /rgyal po dag gis
211a1(rgyud): dkor khang dang / /pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang / /glang chen gnas ni yid 'ong dang / /rta rnams kyi ni bres dag dang / /gzhan yang grong khyer
211a2(rgyud): rnams dang gzhan/ /tshong dus dag na gnas par byed/ /chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan/ /srang dang lam dang shing rta dang / /rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnams dang / /
211a3(rgyud): bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams/ /skyed mos tshal rnying mi bzad dang / /lha yi gnas ni zhigs pa dang / /bu btsa' ba yi gnas gzhan dang / /'chi la thug pa'i khyim
211a4(rgyud): dag dang / /dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang / /'dus ston sa dang 'thab mo'i sa/ /g.yul gyi sa ni thams cad ni/ /gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed/ /drug cu rtsa
211a5(rgyud): bzhi'i gdon bshad pa/ /yid ltar mgyogs shing 'dod rgur 'gro/ /'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can de/ /thams cad rang dgar rtsen par byed/ /lha tshogs ma
211a6(rgyud): mo'i gdon drug bcas/ /tshangs pa srung bar byed pa ste/ /bar snang gza' ni nyi ma yang / /gdon rnams kyi ni gtso bor bshad/ /skem byed la sogs srin po'i bar/ /
211a7(rgyud): rdzong ldan ma dang klu gnyis dang / /srin po bcu dang lha mo dang / /nor bu 'grul ni bar ma yin/ /grul bum la sogs yi dwags dang / /brjed byed bcas dang srul por
211b1(rgyud): bcas| |mdangs 'phrog de bzhin smyo byed dang / /thams cad gdon gyi tha mar bshad/ /de dag gi ni khyad par bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod byas nas/ /mngon
211b2(rgyud): par dga' bar bya ba yi/ /bstod pas mchod pa dag kyang bya/ /dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha/ /lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mched
211b3(rgyud): par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /me ste bsreg bya bzhes pa'i lha/ /'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag /phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag
211b4(rgyud): kyang 'tshal/ /gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha/ /sa yi bdag po gdon gyi bdag /brab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /bden
211b5(rgyud): dang bral ba legs ldan lha/ /srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag /sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /zhags pa thogs pa chu
211b6(rgyud): yi lha| |bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag / nub phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha/ /tshig srung gdon gyi
211b7(rgyud): bdag po ste/ /rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /gnod sbyin lag na be con thogs/ /nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste/ /byang
212a1(rgyud): phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag
212a2(rgyud): dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'og gi klu dang che ba'i lha/ /rgyal po chen po glang po che/ /dam tshig shes pa'i gdon
212a3(rgyud): bcas la/ /mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/ /steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang / /zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang / /gza' skar rgyu skar bcas pa dang / /skar ma'i
212a4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang / /rig sngags tshogs dang gsang sngags dang / /de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang / /dam tshig shes dang slob dpon dang / /tshangs
212a5(rgyud): pa la sogs lha chen dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe yi lha/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag /'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs/ /thams
212a6(rgyud): cad zhi bar byed pa ste/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni kun gyis mchod/ /rnam pa kun gyis 'byung po kun/ /dus kun du ni srung ba po/ /rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang / /
212a7(rgyud): 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la/ /bshos dang dri sogs sna tshogs rnams/ /des ni dga' zhing dbul bar bya/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni/ /'byung po'i
212b1(rgyud): tshogs kyis bdag la srungs/ /de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol/ /sna tshogs tshig gis smra bar bya/ /zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang
212b2(rgyud): yang / /bdag gi bla ma'am yang na gzhan/ /dam tshig shes pa gzhan gyis byas/ /'di ni 'byung po kun la phan phyir bshad pa ste/ /'byung po'i tshogs kun 'dus la
212b3(rgyud): rtag tu mchod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag las gtor ma'i las ni rgyas pa 'di/ /rgyu ba dag gi gnas dang rten gyur dpal bskyed phyir/ /'dir ni thams cad dus su phyogs
212b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad du/ /yongs su dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis/ /thams cad zhi bar byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa/ /don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas
212b5(rgyud): bya ba yin/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// //kun rig sems kun gyis mchod/ /rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjed/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs
212b6(rgyud): rgyas ni| |rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan/ /mtshan med mang po mnga' ba ste/ /'od ma gang 'od chen 'chang ba dang / /rig sngags ston pa chen po ste/ /mchod chen 'chang
212b7(rgyud): zhing sbyin byed dang / /dag pa'i chos ni des gsungs pa/ /zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba'i lam/ /gang gis thub rnams shes pa dang / /gzhan yang sngon gshegs gshegs
213a1(rgyud): gyur dang / /ya mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'jug pa/ /shin tu rgyas pa de kun la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal
213a2(rgyud): zhing / /thub pa sangs rgyas gnyis pa ni/ /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ /lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ /klu dang gnod sbyin tshigs kyis mchod/ /de bzhin dam pa grub pa
213a3(rgyud): ste| |rig sngags 'chang kun dbang phyug rje/ /dpa' bo gcig pu dgra thul ba//lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu yum/ /rdo rje thog thog bzang mo dang / /
213a4(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rje'i mthus/ /ki li ki li gtum po dang / /rdo rje sgrog gi nyi ma bzhin/ /blo gros rdo rje phas mi thub/ /'og dpag khro bo dril bu can/ /de bzhin rdo rje nag mo
213a5(rgyud): la| |ci ste shes rab can dag gis/ /gzhan don grub par 'dod pa na/ /mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad/ /grub pa lag na
213a6(rgyud): rdo rje yi| |dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed cing / /dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/ /ji skad du ni rab bstan pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ci 'dra gang yin dang / /de yi yon tan
213a7(rgyud): sna tshogs gang / /tshogs kyang ji ltar bstan pa dang / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dam tshig dang / /cho ga dam pa grub pa dang / /phan dang mi phan don rnams dang / /dam tshig
213b1(rgyud): shes pa'i yon tan dang / /nyams pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa/ /de dang gzhan yang gang mthong ba/ /de dag thams cad legs par bshad/ /lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa/ /rdo rje
213b2(rgyud): sde la phyag byas nas/ /zla phyed yud tsam zhag gcig dang / /rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la/ /gtsang zhing gso gtsang bgos pa dang / /bsngams shing nges par gnas pa dang / /
213b3(rgyud): grogs po gtsang mar ldan pa dang / /gtsang ma'i las kyi rjes 'brang bas/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig gam/ /tshes gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung / /tshes drug dang ni brgyad dang
213b4(rgyud): bcu| |bcu gnyis yang na bcu gsum mam/ /yang na nya yi nyin par ni/ /yongs su gzung bar bya ba ste/ /de dag brtsam gyi gzhan la min/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs byas
213b5(rgyud): la| |zla ba nya yi nub mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ /bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang / /rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas/ /zhi zhing sngon chad las byas pa'i/ /sar ni
213b6(rgyud): mkhas pas 'gro bar bya/ /tshong dus kun dga' gtsug lag khang / /grong ngam yang na grong khyer gyi/ /byang shar mtshams ni gang mthong ba/ /de yi lho nub mtshams dag
213b7(rgyud): tu| |zla ba re re brtul zhugs bya/ /mdangs dga' tshal ldan gtsang ma dang / /tshwa sgo rdo gseg rus pa dang / /mtho dman skyon rnams rnam spangs pa/ /de 'dra'i de rnyed na
214a1(rgyud): ni| |rdo rje lcags kyu dran byas la/ /shar phyogs nas ni gom pa'i 'dor/ /ha cang mi drag dgod mi bya/ /de nas rig sngags gang 'dod pas/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /
214a2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang / /dge ba'i ltas rnams blta bar bya/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dag gis/ /thams cad legs par gtor bar bya/ /ba lang lci
214a3(rgyud): bas legs par sbyar/ /ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i dbus kyi dkyil dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dug nas ni/ /phyogs mtshams steng dang thad kar
214a4(rgyud): yang / /kho ra khor yug blta bar bya/ /srung zhing yid dga' dri dag gis/ /khrus byas zhag gsum smyung bar bya/ /spos ngad ldan pa'i ri bzhin du/ /spos kyis phyogs
214a5(rgyud): kun rgyas par bya/ /thig skud gser zhing rab gtsang dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang / /dri zhim reg na 'jam pa dang / /sra zhing legs par gzab pa dang / /
214a6(rgyud): thung dang sbom sogs ma legs dang / /mdud pa rnams ni med pa yis/ /thig ni shes rab can gyis gdab/ /de yi tshad kyang bshad par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen dga' ba
214a7(rgyud): yi/ /dang po'i gnas ni rdzogs gyur nas/ /de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor che/ /grangs rnams kyang ni bshad par bya/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
214b1(rgyud): rgyal po ste gnas dang po'i/ / //bu dag chog shes dben pa bde/ /chos la mi smod bde ba yin/ /'tshe ba spangs pas 'jig rten bde/ /srog chags rnams la sdom
214b2(rgyud): ba dang / /'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde/ /'dod chags rnams las 'dus pa dang / /nga snyam rgyal zhi ba dang / /dul ba 'di ni mchog tu bde/ /bu dag rgyun las
214b3(rgyud): ldog pa yi/ /lam bgrod zab cing blta dka' ba/ /mun nag thibs pos bsgribs pa dang / /'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur/ /ngas ni dka' bas rtogs byas nas/ /skye
214b4(rgyud): bo rgyun bzhin 'khyams pa dang / /'dod pa dag gi mdud pa yis/ /bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste/ /'di ni lag na rdo rje yi/ /yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brjod/ /rtsed mo can gyis
214b5(rgyud): bsrungs byas nas/ /nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med/ /dkyil 'khor khru ni bcu drug tu/ /ci nas rab tu tshang bar bya/ /srid du yang ni ci nas kyang / /sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa dang / /
214b6(rgyud): gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos la/ /thig skud de ni bdag gis gzung / /lha la dga' ba'i grogs po yis/ /kho ra khor yug drang bar bya/ /thig grangs de yi steng dag tu/ /
214b7(rgyud): thig ni snyoms par legs par bri/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rmad du byung ba de nyid brjod/ /thub chen gnas par gyur pa yi/ /khor yug dag ni rgya che ba/ /rang byung gis
215a1(rgyud): ni bstan pa bzhin/ /blo can dag gis zlum por bya/ /thung spom la sogs skyon bral zhing / /thig ni legs shing snyoms par bya/ /spom tshes pa ni
215a2(rgyud): sngar bshad zin/ /thung ches pas ni nad kyis 'debs/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /de ni yungs kar dag gis bris/ /gang zhig tsan+dan phye mas 'bri/ /
215a3(rgyud): des ni 'jig rten nges par 'joms/ /nas rnams kyi ni ma 'dres pa'i/ /sA lu bzang por byas na ni/ /de yi nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /dbyig rnams rtag tu 'phel bar
215a4(rgyud): 'gyur| |gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas/ /der ni gsum char gyis kyang bri/ /yang na de dag gcig pu yis/ /shes rab can gyis bri bar bya/ /de nas ri yi rgyal
215a5(rgyud): po ni| |rin chen kun nas grub pa ste/ /nyi ma bzhin du rtag tu yang / /rang gi 'od kyis rab 'bar zhing / /bang rim yod pa'i ri rab de/ /thog ma nyid du gzhag par bya/ /
215a6(rgyud): sngar bstan pa yi khor yug ni/ /gru bzhi tshad du bya ba yin/ /de nyid khongs su rim pa gsum/ /khu re tsam du bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang mtho ni do do dang / /sor bzhi bcas par
215a7(rgyud): bri bar bya/ /gnyis pa dang ni lhag ma rnams/ /cha drug mdzes dang ldan par bya/ /gzhan ni mtshams la thugs pa'i bar/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /du 'bod chen
215b1(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i/ /dmyal ba bden bral phyogs su gzhag /bstan pa bzhin du de byas nas/ /gzhan yang bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /ras gsar ba ni sA lu 'am/ /tsan+dan bzang
215b2(rgyud): po'i phye ma yis/ /rdo rje srid du khru gang pa/ /rtse drug yang na rtse gsum bri/ /de yang ci ste mi 'byor na/ /grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag gis/ /sor bzhi tsam du bya ba yin/ /gang
215b3(rgyud): gis gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /khyad par 'dir ni sgrub byed pa/ /de nyid 'jig rten gsum dag gi /'jigs byed drag po yin par nges/ /de nyid ngo mtshar bye ba snyed/ /ya
215b4(rgyud): mtshan rnams kyang ston pa yin/ /gcig tu rdo rje gnyis ldan pa/ /de nyid nyi ni drug dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi po dag /byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya/ /bden dang
215b5(rgyud): gtor ba rgya che ba/ /ting 'dzin zhi ba ya mtshan ldan/ /yang na gang gis 'di dag kun/ /thub pa'i shes rab byin brlab bya/ /bden dang nges pa gnas byas nas/ /bden bral
215b6(rgyud): phyogs su bri ba dang / /chu lha'i phyogs su song nas kyang / /rgya chen don rnams bya ba na/ /si ta ku ni bu dang bcas/ /bzhi ba de ni legs par gnas/ /grong khyer mchog gi drug
215b7(rgyud): dag tu| |gru ni byang phyogs blta bar bya/ /de nas 'jug par rab bstan de/ /dkyil 'khor dag pa gzhan mi bya/ /gzugs gnas sgo mchog de nyid ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dgye
216a1(rgyud): pa yin| |dkyil 'khor 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /de yi sgo yi byang phyogs drung / /lho phyogs kyi ni drung dag tu/ /bstan pa gang yin gzhag par bya/ /
216a2(rgyud): gur gum yid du 'ong ba dang / /ldan pa'i rgya skyegs khu ba dang / /le brgan rtsi yis bsgyur ba yi/ /sar ni dmar zhing yid 'ong ba/ /bug rdol med cing ma nyams la/ /
216a3(rgyud): dri nga ba dag med pa yi/ /gdan dag kyang ni nges byas shing / /shing ring la ni legs par gdags/ /de nas logs shig rtse mo yi/ /cha byad sna tshogs khyad par du/ /
216a4(rgyud): rnam par mdzes pa gzhag bya ste/ /rgya skyegs las ni legs byas pa'i/ /pho long chen po ri mo can/ /gzhan yang dril dang sgo nga'i dbyibs/ /ste 'u 'khor gyi tshogs
216a5(rgyud): rnams dang / /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /ku ran+ta ka'i me tog phreng / /rgyal mtshan rtse mor 'phyang du gzhug /yang na me tog dmar ba yi/ /phreng ba bzang po sna
216a6(rgyud): tshogs gdags/ /de dag bstan pas shes pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol gzhag /de nas ri dbang 'khor yug gi /nang du yang ni 'gro bar bya/ /de ltar mtshungs
216a7(rgyud): med ces bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab pa/ /gnas gnyis pa ni rgyas par bstan/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gnas gnyis
216b1(rgyud): pa rdzogs so/ / //rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rmad du byung ba de dran zhing / /g.yon phyogs dag tu go rim bzhin/ /lha rnams kyang ni dgod par bya/ /chu lha'i phyogs
216b2(rgyud): kyi sgo dag ni/ /kar+Sha pa na brgyad dag gi /'gron bu rnams ni shar nub tu/ /mnyam zhing mdzes par dgod par bya/ /de yi lho phyogs rdo rje yi/ /rig sngags bla ma'i rigs
216b3(rgyud): rnams dgod/ /de ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rgyal po dbus su gzhag /dregs shing stobs kyis rgyags pa yi/ /sngon po chen po sngon po gnyis/ /der ni rig sngags
216b4(rgyud): rigs rnams kyi/ /sgo srung dag tu gzhag par bya/ /rig sngags rdo rje'i rigs skyes rnams/ /shar phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang por bshad/ /rdo rje khro bo
216b5(rgyud): mjug tu gzhag / me tog yid 'ong rtse mo can/ /lug rgyud gtum mo ser mo rnams/ /pho nya ma dag grangs bzhin du/ /thams cad de yi pha rol dgod/ /bung ba ma dang lta ba
216b6(rgyud): ma| |dga' ma thub dka' byang phyogs gzhag / rdo rje ka ta ya na dang / /'di dag g.yas phyogs bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sde yi 'khor rnams kyang / /de yi lho phyogs dgod par bya/ /de
216b7(rgyud): nas klu rgyal nor rgyas bu/ /bzhi pa dag la gzhag par bya/ /'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba yi/ /gzhon nu tshogs dang bcas pa yang / /dkyil 'khor lnga par gzhag par bya//
217a1(rgyud): mdung thung yang ni mdun du gzhag /de nas drug la bden bral phyogs/ /'byung po rings byed mi bzad pa/ /'phags pa yi ni mdun bris la/ /'phags
217a2(rgyud): ma yin ni mdun du gzhag / ma mo rnams kyi rigs lnga po/ /tshangs ma dang ni dbang phyug ma/ /skem byed khyab 'jug phag mo zhes/ /bya ba dkyil 'khor bdun par
217a3(rgyud): gzhag / grong khyer de yi nang dag tu/ /chu klung 'gram dang ldan par bri/ /gra rnams shar byang gra dag dang / /lho dang nub phyogs phyin par bya/ /sdig can chun gnas pa'i nang //
217a4(rgyud): ngoms mi shes pa'i ri dwags shig /nang du mchu btsugs phyogs gcig gnas/ /de nang khyu mchog 'gro bar bya/ /rlung lha'i phyogs kyi gnas gcig tu/ /bde byed lha
217a5(rgyud): mo khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ra dang bum rna gnyis/ /grong khyer gyi ni sgo srung gzhag /klung gi g.yas rol 'gram dag tu/ /rig sngags chen mo bu smad bcas/ /dbang
217a6(rgyud): ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'das pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad pa sngar bshad pa'i/ /'byung po'i bya ba sgrub pa bdun/ /'byung po sna tshogs
217a7(rgyud): bskor ba gzhag / dgu par yang ni rim bzhin bri/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bcu par ni/ /tshangs pa'i drang srong rnams kyang gzhag /de nas gshin rje tshogs mang
217b1(rgyud): bcas| |bcu gcig par ni gzhag par bya/ /me lce lha yi tshogs kyis bskor/ /me de mthu las skyes pa ste/ /de ni bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /yi dwags rnams kyi 'khor
217b2(rgyud): dang bcas/ /yi dwags dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /de ni bcu gsum shes par bya/ /zla ba phyogs bzang stobs po che/ /khyab 'jug dbang po
217b3(rgyud): nye dbang gnyis/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi/ /blo gros lha mo gnyis kyang gzhag /gang na lha dbang gnyis gnas pa/ /de ni bcu bzhir shes par bya/ /bco lnga pa yi
217b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du/ /klu chen rigs brgyad dgod par bya/ /bka' stsol pa zhes bya ba yi/ /tshangs pa'i srin rnams bcu drug tu/ /bcu bdun pa yi dkyil 'khor du/ /ka ta ya na
217b5(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /de yi 'khor ni gang yin pa/ /de yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /dbang phyug chen mo chung mar bcas/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste/ /de ni bco brgyad
217b6(rgyud): shes par bya/ /de nas phyi rol rig sngags rigs/ /rig sngags kyi ni sna tshogs dge /bcu dgu par ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas kyang ni rig sngags rnams/ /ming smos 'di
217b7(rgyud): dag la sogs bri/ /dri gshed thabs kyis dri gshed dang / /ro langs mar ni grags pa dang / /dkar mo chen mo dkar mo dang / /gzhan yang sa steng gnas rnams gzhag /
218a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i mnga' bdag dges pa yi/ /gzhan gyi rig sngags mchog 'ching ba/ /rab tu gsal zhing 'bar ba de/ /dbus der mkhas pas gzhag
218a2(rgyud): par bya| |de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen rje/ /nyi shu par ni gzhag par bya/ /gang na rdo rje 'dzin gnas te/ /ming ni rdo rje pho brang yin/ /nyi shu gcig pa'i byang phyogs su/ /ku pe ra
218a3(rgyud): ni tshogs bcas bri/ /ku be ra ni gar gnas pa/ /grong khyer lcang lo can zhes bya/ /klu yi bya ba bsgrub pa brgyad/ /grong khyer nyi shu gnyis par gzhag /bya ba sgrub bcas klu
218a4(rgyud): chen rnams/ /lnga po nyi shu gsum par gzhag /dkyil 'khor nyis hu rtsa bzhir ni/ /klu yi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /klu mgo yi ni gdengs ka can/ /klu chen gyis ni
218a5(rgyud): g.yas su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu/ /klu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang / /de bzhin nor bu la sogs klu/ /kal pa la dang rab
218a6(rgyud): mgyogs gnyis/ /de bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyis/ /ma dang rgyal tshab 'jog po yang / /dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya/ /shar sgo 'od ma'i rtse mo gzhag /
218a7(rgyud): dga' skyed pa ni lho phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni legs mthong gzhag /byang phyogs su ni stobs kyis rgyu/ /de nas rlung lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni
218b1(rgyud): bdun rnams dgod/ /de ni nyi shu lnga pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor du yang grags pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa/ /'di dag kyang ni mkhas pa yis/ /ci rigs par ni bri
218b2(rgyud): bya zhing / /rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri/ /chu lha'i phyogs su nyi ma bri/ /shar phyogs su ni zla ba gzhag /ka ru na ni gling bzhir ni/ /phyogs mtshams dag tu
218b3(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /lhag ma dag ni byang phyogs su/ /nges par yang ni dgod par bstan/ /'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na/ /'khor yug gi ni khong nas dbyung / /de nas rdo rje
218b4(rgyud): shugs kyis ni/ /der ni stobs chen 'gro bar bya/ /bang rim la ni song nas kyang / /dang po legs par dgod par bya/ /rdzong gi 'phags ma don sgrub pa/ /dur khrod gnas
218b5(rgyud): drag mo ni/ /bden bral phyogs su gzhag bya zhing / /ma yang drung du gzhag par bya/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bye ba rnams/ /dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya/ /log 'dren drag po
218b6(rgyud): chen po yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni legs par dgod/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su mkha' lding gzhag /de nas dang po skyong ba yi/ /rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang / /yongs su
218b7(rgyud): rdzogs par gzhag par bya/ /bang rim dag ni gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing / /klu rigs nor bu gzhag par bya/ /mtha' yas bden bral phyogs su
219a1(rgyud): gzhag / de nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su legs par gzhag /de nas yi dwags tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su gzhag
219a2(rgyud): par bya| |de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /yi dwags kyi ni rigs rnams dgod/ /brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /nam gru dag gi rigs kyang gzhan/ /dbang ldan
219a3(rgyud): 'byung po rnams dang ni/ /'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang gzhag /tshangs pa'i srin po zhes bya rnams/ /dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya/ /phyi rol klu yi rigs
219a4(rgyud): rnams kyang / /rlung lha'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa las/ /bang rim 'di ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje rim gyis bsgoms nas ni/ /
219a5(rgyud): gsum pa yang ni bden bral phyogs/ /sha za bzhag ste song na yang / /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khro gzhag /yi drags kyi ni khyim rnams kyang / /gshin
219a6(rgyud): rje'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ /me yi phyogs su dkyil 'khor du/ /stobs chen lha ma yin rnams gzhag /de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten skyong / /'jig rten chos
219a7(rgyud): las phyir phyogs pa/ /yul 'khor srung ni dpag med pa'i/ /dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod/ /dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gnas par
219b1(rgyud): bya| |de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag/ lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /grogs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje pho brang dga' bar gzhag /de nas stobs chen 'jig
219b2(rgyud): rten skyong / /dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /dbang ldan byang gi phyogs su gzhag /de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu/ /nor sbyin tshogs
219b3(rgyud): dang bcas par bri/ /klu rnams ma ni su ru sa/ /rlung lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de dag bu dang bcas par ni/ /de yi drung du dgod par bshad/ /mkha' lding rnam
219b4(rgyud): par 'dud pa'i bu/ /mthu rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang gzhag /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dgod/ /chu lha yang ni nub phyogs gzhag /gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa
219b5(rgyud): yi| |bzhi pa dag gis bshad par bya/ /bang rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu/ /rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni g.yog dang bcas/ /chu lha'i phyogs su gnas
219b6(rgyud): par bya| |bden bral phyogs su srin rnams dgod/ /de yi pha rol grul bum gzhag /de nas grul bum lcags can yang / /lho phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /me yi phyogs
219b7(rgyud): su rlung lha gzhag / shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas/ /thag bzang ris kyang de bzhin te/ /de gnyis kyis ni bzhi pa dgang / /de nas bang rim ldan pa la/ /rdo rje shugs
220a1(rgyud): kyis 'gro bar bya/ /lha bsrung phyir ni klu rnams kyang / /chu lha'i phyogs su dgod par bya/ /dbang ldan dang ni shar mtshams su/ /lha yi mdzod kyang
220a2(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje che/ /dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje'i drung dag tu/ /gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha chen gzhag /lha yi srung
220a3(rgyud): ma gnod sbyin che/ /byang phyogs dag tu gnas par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis drug pa la/ /song nas chu lha'i phyogs dag tu/ /klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu/ /drag cing
220a4(rgyud): shugs dang ldan pa gzhag / der ni g.yog dang bcas par bya/ /gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la/ /dbang byed la ni gang yin rnams/ /bden bral phyogs su
220a5(rgyud): gnas par bya/ /tshangs ris kyi ni tshogs rnams kyang / /me yi phyogs su dgod par bya/ /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa yi/ /lha rnams shar phyogs gzhag
220a6(rgyud): par bya/ /shin tu mthong lha dbang ldan du/ /srid rtse de yi pha rol dgod/ /de bzhin dka' zlog byang phyogs gzhag /drug pa dag kyang 'das pa yin/ /bang rim
220a7(rgyud): dag ni bdun pa la/ /rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje 'chang / /song nas klu yi gtso po ni/ /rgya mtsho chen po rmad byung gzhag /byang phyogs bya ba zin nas ni/ /grags shing
220b1(rgyud): bsod nams che ba yi/ /'phrul dga' ba yi lha chen rnams/ /gshin rje'i phyogs su gnas par bya/ /de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi/ /gnas kyi gtso bor gzhag par
220b2(rgyud): bya| |sum cu gsum pa'ang shar phyogs su/ /gzhag cing bdun pa yongs su dgang / /lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yis/ /ri yi dbang po dam pa yi/ /bang rim dag ni
220b3(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs/ /de yi 'og tu bya ba bshad/ /ri rab steng du thams cad mkhyen/ /rig sngags snying po 'chang ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs mdzad pa/ /thar pa'i
220b4(rgyud): grong khyer dbang phyug gzhan/ /gang gi 'od zer de dag gis/ /phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mdzad dang / /gang gis sku la mtshan kun gyi/ /mdzod rnams thams cad
220b5(rgyud): 'byung ba dang / /mtshan dang gzhon dang brtson 'grus dang / /gzhan yang zhi bar ldan pa dang / /mchog rnams mchog sbyin byed pa la/ /gang gis mchog gi mchog sbyin
220b6(rgyud): dang / /thugs rje che dang ldan pa'i mgon/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra/ /'od zer nyi ma bye ba yis/ /gang gis mun pa bsal ba dang / /chos dang mtshan nyid rig pa yi/ /
220b7(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs mnga' gang / /gang gis bskal pa grangs med par/ /sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs/ /rin chen in+d+ra nI la ltar/ /gang gi gtsug tor
221a1(rgyud): mdzes pa dang / /nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin/ /zla mdog can gyi mdzod srung na/ /gang gi bdud rtsi gtor ba'i zhal/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra
221a2(rgyud): dang / /dus mtshams gser gyis bsgyur ba yi/ /gser gyi ri ltar sku mdog mdzes/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas/ /phyag dang zhabs ni legs spras pa/ /
221a3(rgyud): skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis/ /thub pa chen po legs par bzhugs/ /chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog /de yi zhal nas kun tu 'bab/ /rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste//
221a4(rgyud): bdag gis kha ni stong phrag rnams/ /stong snyed kyis ni brjod pa 'am/ /khong du chud par nus mi 'gyur/ /de ni rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / /ye shes pha mtha' bla na med//
221a5(rgyud): shin tu rmad byung gsang bar bshad/ /tshig ldan gyi ni lha mo de/ /'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi/ /gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum na bdag
221a6(rgyud): mchog sbyin/ /'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi/ /'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yin/ /che ba'i che mchog stobs chen te/ /
221a7(rgyud): dga' zhing kun gyi tshig la gnas/ /gzhan gcig sangs rgyas 'dra bar med/ /gud na yang ni gnas ma yin/ /de yi bsngags pa sangs rgyas sam/ /lha rnams
221b1(rgyud): nyid kyis brjod par nus/ /mchog sbyin 'jig rten gsum gyi ma/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /mdor na 'gro ba 'di kun ni/ /khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid yin te/ /
221b2(rgyud): lha dang dri za klu dbang dbang / /gnod sbyin lha min tshogs bskor ba'i/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi gter/ /ya mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /der gtogs der ni brtson
221b3(rgyud): zhing spro/ /de dang 'brel bar the tshom med/ /chos klung bsod nams ldan pa de/ /bsod nams rin chen dag gis rgyas/ /lag na rdo rje'i bsod nams kyis/ /las kyi rgya mtsho
221b4(rgyud): dag las 'byung / /chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa na/ /skye bos bsten nas 'bab par 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /'di dag gis bsten byas nas kyang / /lag na rdo
221b5(rgyud): rje'i mgo bo dang / /rna gnyis dang ni gsum du dbab/ /zer ma 'phros pas lha mo dang / /dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog par 'gyur/ /de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di/ /sangs
221b6(rgyud): rgyas las ni 'byung byas la/ /lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang / /rab tu dbab cing bdug par bya/ /bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las/ /skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu
221b7(rgyud): sems btud nyan par byed/ /de nyid la ni lha rnams thams cad mngon par dga'/ /de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten/ /gnas rnams gsum pa 'di ni
222a1(rgyud): lha yi gnas yin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs/ /de nas dam tshig mkhyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi/ /gsang ba gang dang
222a2(rgyud): gang gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// //
222a3(rgyud): ri rab kyi ni byang phyogs su/ /chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen rab gtum pa/ /stobs chen lag na rdo rje gzhag /de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ /dbang
222a4(rgyud): phyug chen po mnan par bya/ /g.yas pa yi ni rkang pa yis/ /lha mo dka' zlog mnan par bya/ /ri yi dbang po 'khor yug dang / /bang rim dag gi bar dag tu/ /gling
222a5(rgyud): chen rnam pa bzhi po dang / /gnas rnams ji bzhin gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /lho phyogs su ni dbyibs legs pa'i/ /'dzam bu gling ni
222a6(rgyud): gzhag par bya/ /chu klung dang ni shing dang yul/ /sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas/ /de yi mngon mtshan chen po ni/ /'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de/ /'phang du
222a7(rgyud): dpag tshad brgya yod do/ /'og logs su ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag /nags tshal yang ni bdun dag dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdun dang //
222b1(rgyud): yul bdun dag kyang gzhag par bya/ /dang po byang nas brtsam bya zhing / /lho phyogs logs su thur du drang / /shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing / /kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas
222b2(rgyud): ni| |rgyal ba'i gsung rab yid 'ong ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rjes sgrub pa/ /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma'i mchog /dge slong dge slong ma rnams
222b3(rgyud): dang / /rgyal po dag gis bsten pa gzhag /'dzam bu gling gi lho phyogs su/ /'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya/ /nub phyogs su ni ba lang spyod/ /chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang //
222b4(rgyud): yul dang skye bo stong dag dang / /ba lang khyu ni stong gis rgyas/ /de bzhin shar gyi lus 'phags kyang / /shar phyogs su ni gzhag par bya/ /yul rnams su ni gzhag par
222b5(rgyud): bya| |yul rnams dang ni ri dag gis/ /kun tu rab tu rgyas par gnas/ /de nas gnas brtan chos skyong ba/ /bcu gnyis dag dang lhan cig tu/ /sgra gcan 'dzin zhes grags
222b6(rgyud): pa ste| |sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas/ /gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams/ /nyin mtshan du ni der song nas/ /dri dang phreng ba dpe med pas/ /mchod pa byed cing phyag
222b7(rgyud): kyang 'tshal/ /de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po yi ni byang phyogs gzhag /gtsang zhing gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /chu klung dag gis rab tu brgyan/ /gang dag gi ni tshe yi
223a1(rgyud): tshad| |chig stong tshang par brjod pa dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa yi/ /sems can ya mtshan de na gnas/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba
223a2(rgyud): yi| |ri yi dam pa ri rab la/ /phyogs kyi lha ni bzhi po rnams/ /kun nas nges par gzhag par bya/ /kaR+sha pa na brgyad dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri/ /de yi
223a3(rgyud): gnas rnams de dag tu/ /gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya/ /sgo rnams re rer don grub pa/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum/ /thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i/ /sgo srung
223a4(rgyud): gnyis kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing / /kun tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya/ /rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs bri/ /rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag /de
223a5(rgyud): nas der ni lha bshos rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang / /bla med rab mdzes rgyas par bya/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod/ /zhib de'i thu lu sna tshogs pa/ /sbrang rtsis
223a6(rgyud): byugs shing gzab pa dang / /legs byas a shwa ka brti/ /de bzhin be reg nas khur dbul/ /ji tsam du ni rgyas pa phul/ /de tsam du ni 'grub par bshad/ /'bras
223a7(rgyud): kyi po thug tshu la ka / thug pa sbyar thug sa mi ta/ /'bras can tshod ma sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan/ /de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa/ /lo ma sna
223b1(rgyud): tshogs skyon med pa/ /yang na kham phor gsar pa 'am/ /pad+ma'i lo ma dag la gzhag /nas dang gro dang mon sran gre'u/ /sA lu dang ni til 'bru rnams/ /snod gsar dag
223b2(rgyud): gi nang du gzhag / yang na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag /hwags dang kha ras gang ba dang / /btung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag /snod gsar dag gi nang dag tu/ /bzhag nas rab
223b3(rgyud): tu dbul bar bya/ /des na su la'ang 'tshe mi 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la/ /kha zas dag kyang sbyin par bya/ /de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ta la'i lo ma
223b4(rgyud): bsil yab dbul/ /dri zhim pa yi dri kun gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya/ /spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa/ /mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod/ /dza ya mu sa na
223b5(rgyud): la sogs/ /dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod/ /a ga ru dang du ru ka /shing gi thang chu gsar sbyar rnams/ /bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin/ /dngos grub sgo drung
223b6(rgyud): 'dug par bya/ /yang na nang du song nas ni/ /de ni byang phyogs kha blta zhing / /lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin 'bod/ /shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang / /de bzhin bde legs
223b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa gdon/ /de nas der ni rig sngags ma/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi/ /rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa/ /des ni bdag nyid bsrung
224a1(rgyud): bar bya| |de nas thog mar spyan drang pa/ /ri rab de yi rtse mor ni/ /'dug nas sgra chen 'don par bya/ /chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba/ /dam pa 'di ni brjod
224a2(rgyud): bar bya| |bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang / /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag dang / /rten
224a3(rgyud): cing 'brel par 'byung ba de/ /ma nyams the tshom med pa dang / /'phags pa shA radwa ti'i bu'i/ /seng+ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon/ /de nas rdo rje rigs kyi yum/ /rig sngags
224a4(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas/ /de nas kyang ni rtse mo can/ /de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi/ /rig sngags dag ni gang 'dod dang / /snying po 'gro lding gtum po dang / /de yi steng dang
224a5(rgyud): 'dod pa yi/ /rdo rje ma dang 'og pag can/ /lu gu rgyud dang gtum mo dang / /gser gtum rdo rje thog thog ma/ /de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma/ /rdo rje thub dka' pho nya ma/ /chen
224a6(rgyud): mo bcu dang drug cu bzhi/ /dang po blo gros rdo rje ma/ /gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma/ /gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang / /bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /lnga pa rdo rje rol pa dang /
224a7(rgyud): drug pa yang ni rgod bag can/ /bdun pa rdo rje shugs yin te/ /brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /dgu pa rdo rje dbyug pa ste/ /de ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags/ /bcu
224b1(rgyud): pa rdo rje bden pa ste/ /ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pa blta bar bya/ /rdo rje khro bo 'joms byed dang / /bung ba lta ba chu klung dang / /rdo rje ka t+ya na ya dang / /bdug
224b2(rgyud): pas 'jil dang srung ma dang / /yon tan chen mo de la sogs/ /nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya/ /des na dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /nges par gnas pas rig sngags
224b3(rgyud): ni| |mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /bdug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgyar bzlas/ /des na las su sgrub pa yi/ /rig sngags des ni grub
224b4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /rig sngags gang la dga' ba des/ /dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi/ /rig sngags mang po de nyid ni/ /mchog 'dod dngos
224b5(rgyud): grub 'dod pa yis/ /ci nas skyo bar ma 'gyur spyad/ /de nas rdzogs par spyan drangs shing / /gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni/ /de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa kun/ /
224b6(rgyud): bzung ba yang ni bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin/ /dad cing mnyam par bzhag pa yi/ /mi ni dam tshig
224b7(rgyud): 'dzin du gzhug / des na de la mkhas pa yis/ /bslab gzhi lnga ni sbyin par bya/ /ming 'di zhes ni bya ba bdag /phyin chad nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu/ /srog gcod log par
225a1(rgyud): g.yem pa dang / /rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang / /'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba/ /rtag tu bdag gis spangs zhes smos/ /bslab gzhi mchog dang ldan
225a2(rgyud): pa de| |blo gros rdo rjes bsrung bar bya/ /'bogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ /byin gyis brlab kyi cho ga'ang bya/ /de nas der ni bum pa bdun/ /chu ni rab tu blugs
225a3(rgyud): nas kyang / /blo gros rdo rjes sngags pa des/ /bdud rtsi yis ni brjod pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni/ /dril bur bcas pas dran byed brjod/ /lag pa gnyis ka
225a4(rgyud): slar yang sbyar/ /mthe'u chung mthe bong sbrel bya zhing / /bdud rtsi'i chu ni blugs par bya/ /gos gtsang bgos shing rab bsdams pa/ /skra bshig pa la ngu 'bod che/ /mi
225a5(rgyud): bzad rnams ni bsgo bar bya/ /'di ni ngu 'bod chen po ste/ /'khrug cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gnas/ /'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las/ /nyams na myur du gdungs
225a6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /khyod ni dam tshig shes gyur na/ /rkyen du 'bab par ma lus sbyin/ /des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di/ /'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur/ /dam tshig spangs
225a7(rgyud): pa gang yin dang / /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa/ /de la dam tshig gzhan med pa/ /bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugs yin/ /dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos/ /nad rnams
225b1(rgyud): thams cad tshogs pa dang / /'byung ba la sogs rnams kyi rgyas/ /khyod ni de nyid ltung bar byed/ /gdon mi za ba'i sdig pa'i las/ /'di la dpyad par bya ba med/ /rtag tu
225b2(rgyud): khyod kyis dam tshig srung / /rtag tu dkyil 'khro mchod pa gyis/ /'on kyang 'byung po sha za sogs/ /sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur/ /slob dpon la ni gus par bya/ /de ni rdo rje
225b3(rgyud): 'dzin nyid yin/ /da ni khyod tshe 'bras bur bcas/ /khyod kyi 'tsho ba 'bras bu yod/ /da ni dam tshig lha rnams dang / /khyod ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal
225b4(rgyud): mtshan 'di/ /ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin/ /de ltar khyod ni yon tan gyis/ /dam tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje de blangs la/ /lag pa g.yon pas dril
225b5(rgyud): bu gzung / /lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas/ /bzung nas kyang ni spro bar bya/ /'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'di/ /sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang
225b6(rgyud): ni| |lhan cig tu ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas grur ni lugs nas kyang / /khor yug las ni brgal bar bya/ /lag pa btang nas de la ni/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan
225b7(rgyud): par bya| |'khrul pa med par me tog gis/ /mdun bzhugs bde gshegs man chad dang / /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba/ /de dang de la bde bar mchod/ /de nas
226a1(rgyud): thams cad mthong nas kyang / /yon gyi bum par dbul bar bya/ /blo can gyis ni mtshan yang gzung / /dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje
226a2(rgyud): stang thabs 'gro ba dang / /gad mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang / /g.yon pas kyang ni gdab par bya/ /seng+ge'i sgra sgrog 'gying ba dang / /mdzub mos hUM yang bsgrags byas
226a3(rgyud): te| |thams cad shin tu byed pa'i mchog / de nas gzhan yang mi shes pas/ /cho ga bzhin du gnod par bya/ /slob dpon gus par legs bya zhing / /dam tshig kyang
226a4(rgyud): ni nges par bstan/ /til zan la sogs mon sran gre'u/ /bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bza'/ /lhag par bla mar gus byas dang / /de la dga' bar byas nas ni/ /
226a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dang / /rig sngags rnams la sdug par gyur/ /de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la/ /de yi rig sngags gang 'dod pa/ /de ni bsgrims te bklag
226a6(rgyud): bya zhing / /dngos grub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod/ /de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang / /lha dang lha min mchog gzugs du ma yin/ /mthong zhing thos la
226a7(rgyud): 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang / /rtag tu legs mchod rjes su bstan pa yin/ /rdo rje'i rigs dpal dang ldan pa las mnyes pa dka' zhing me dang nyi ma las lhag pa
226b1(rgyud): de kho na nyid kyi mi dang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog tu gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag ni/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs pas rtag tu mthong zhing
226b2(rgyud): thos pa'am/ sgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na dngos grub 'grub pa'am/ phan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje chen po thogs bzhin du rtag tu bdug pa dang / me tog
226b3(rgyud): dang / dri dang / lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'jin cing nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni/ dpal
226b4(rgyud): skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid yin no/ /lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen
226b5(rgyud): po gnyis kyis dam tshig bshad pa las/ gnas bzhi pa rdzogs so// //de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum/ /sgrub pa yi ni don rnams kun//
226b6(rgyud): sgrub pa byed pa gang yin bshad/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na maste badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni badzra ya na maH/ su badzra ya na mo badzra
226b7(rgyud): dU tI ye| na mo badzra shA nI ye/ na mo badzra hr-i da yA ya/ na mo badzraM ku shI ye/ na mo badzra da shu shA ya/ na mo badzra ko ShA ya/ na mo badzra bi dza yA ya/ na mo badzraM ku sha /ko Sha pA
227a1(rgyud): sha bi dza yA ya/ na maHpra brta/ a brta/ badzraM ku shi /mi li mi li/ hi li hi li/ hi ri hi ri/ ki ri ki ri/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ gi ri gi ri/ khi ri khi ri/
227a2(rgyud): b+hi ri b+hi ri/ ki li ki li/ badzra ku lam saM sma ra/ gi ri gi ri/ ti ri ti ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ A na ya me hi rat+na su brta d+ha na d+ha n+ya na/ a ta pa ya ma/ ba ru Na/
227a3(rgyud): ku be ra| in+d+ra mA kaD+D+h+ya/ yan+ta da ma ni/ grih+NAM ku sha na/ ta ta taM/ ki li ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da tsaN+Di/ ki ri Ni brah+ma ba de him+biSh+Nu na ba de hi ma ka lo/ /ku ka kalbi/ ni li bi la ni
227a4(rgyud): li lba ku ma raM ad d+ha ru dri ma de haM tsaN+d+raM ba de hi ma shuk+k+raM ba de hiM/ suR+yaM ba de hiM/ ya maM ba de hiM/ ta ta taM ba de hiM/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bI ri bI ri/ a kram+m+ye/ A na ya a kram+m+ye/ i hi
227a5(rgyud): tu rA hi| tu ru tu ru/ sarba ka lan su/ dri gra bI ra/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ ti ri ti ri/ mi li mi li/ tsa ka tsa ka /ki ni ki ni/ bi ri bi ri/ sha tha ku shi sa ha sra/ mi la bi
227a6(rgyud): sha tsaM ku shi badzraM ba he badzraM Ni bri ye/ ma ti ma ti/ ti ri ti ri/ ki ri ki ri/ a kraM mya/ a n+ya kar maM n+ya/ ba ra ka na ma na ya/ ya she ya shi na/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ g+hi ni g+hi
227a7(rgyud): ni| khi ri khi ri/ bi tsa ra bi tsa ra/ ko shaM ko shi ni/ ku be ra ma kra /Sh+Tik+k+raM kad+d+ha/ la la la la/ ha si ni pri ye/ pri yaM ka ri/ tsak+Shur ma ti/ tsak+ShuHpra bi sha /ma na ma ka ri/ sha ya sne
227b1(rgyud): tsaM d+ha ni/ b+hi li b+hi li/ pA sha de brde/ tsak+Shu de/ ha ra ha ra/ ba su ba su/ si mi si mi/ he he hi hi/ ha ha/ ki ki ka la ka la/ pa la pa la/ tsak+ShuHtsak+ShuHta me ka thA ya sarba sar+b+be shaM /ku
227b2(rgyud): ru ku ru/ ba ki me ka ta ya/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ pri yam+p+ri ye na/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bi ma ya shaM ya shen/ la b+ha la b+ha/ ki ri ki ri/
227b3(rgyud): mi ti mi ti/ lo ki /ra ma ra ma/ ra ti ka ri b+hi ti ka ri/ ma ma su kha ka ri/ nir b+h+r-i ti ka ra/ king+ka ri king+ka ri/ ka ra ma ri/ bi ti bi ti/ mi ri mi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ bi ri
227b4(rgyud): bi ri| g+hi ri g+hi ri/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ badzri Ni badzraM ku shi pa ra mAM ku shi ha re badzre k+ShI pa ni ka pa ni ka la shi ba ni/ b+hak+Sha pA Ni/ tsak+Shu rAM ku shi pa ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ma pi ri pi ri/
227b5(rgyud): ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ badzre ku shI ye swAhA/ ko shAM ku shi ye swAhA/ ba shAM ku shI ye swAhA/ bi dza yAM ku shi ye swAhA/ ke mAM ku shI ye swAhA/ a dz+nyA yAM ku shI ye
227b6(rgyud): swAhA| sar+b+baM ku sha a kaR+Sha Ni ye swAhA/ de bAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sti pu ru ShAM ku shI ye swAhA/ hr-i da yAM ku shI ye swAhA/ d+harmAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sarba lo ka dza yAM ku shI ye swAhA/ sarba satwa na
227b7(rgyud): mA gaR+Sha Na ba shi ka ra NAM ku shI ye swAhA/ rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid na/ /'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang / /rdo rje rigs chen gtso mo ste/ /'bar ba chen mo mchog sbyin mchog/
228a1(rgyud): rigs kyi yum ste rigs kyi mchog /las mchog kun gyi byed pa mo/ /bcings dang grol ba thams cad kyi/ /las kun la ni thub med pa/ /dam
228a2(rgyud): pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dra/ /bar ma ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyur/ /snying po dang ni ming 'di yang / /gtso bo dang ni mchog tu bshad/ /lag na rdo rje nyid kyang ni/ /skad cig gis

228a4(rgyud): par mi 'gyur gang yang med/ /gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni/ /yum 'di rtag tu 'chang byed pa/ /de la mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcings pa dang ni
228a5(rgyud): grol ba la/ /rig sngags gsang sngags kun bdag 'gyur/ /nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi/ /'khor dang ldan par byas na ni/ /gcig pu 'jig rten gsum mchog
228a6(rgyud): dang / /rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad/ /de dag thams cad khyad par du/ /stobs dang ldan par skye bos brjod/ /mdor na yum 'di thams cad kyi/ /mchog gi
228a7(rgyud): dam par bshad pa yin/ /de dag bsgrubs pa'i dus dang ni/ /tha mal dus su rtag tu yang / /ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du/ /rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /na maH
228b1(rgyud): tsu ru kuM dang / tsu ru kuM da/ badzra pA Ni na mo b+hud+d+ha s+ya swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyi phye mas gzhag par bya/ na maHku ru tsu ru badzra pA Ni/
228b2(rgyud): na mo bud+d+ha s+ya swAhA/ 'dis ni/ me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo duM me duM me yuM me du sa duM me/ tsu ru tsu ru swAhA/ 'dis bshos dbul lo/ /na mo badzrI badzrI/ badzrI
228b3(rgyud): Ni badzrI Ni/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ e taM sarba big+h+na na pa nI ya kaM /sa ma mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ ud sA da ya/ nA sha ya/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta tsit+ta sh+tsa ma ma/ hu
228b4(rgyud): ru hu ru| sid+d+ha sh+tsa N+Da badzra pA Ni/ ra dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ me sbar la sngags 'dis shing 'o ma can gyi yam bsreg shing ngam/ ka ri mA la ka ra'i yam sreg shing dang / ske tshe dang /
228b5(rgyud): lan tshwa ba gsum rnams lhan gcig tu sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na/ bgegs dang log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas de yi sgrub pa ni/ /rig
228b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba kun gyis mchod/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni gang gis su/ /stobs chen 'di ni grub pa bshad/ /thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ /sangs rgyas
228b7(rgyud): 'grub byed mgon po dang / /'jig rten dag na ya mtshan gsang / /rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /lha rnams dang ni dri za dang / /rig sngags 'chang dang lto 'phye che/ /
229a1(rgyud): shin tu ya mtshan gsang ba 'di/ /don kun 'grub byed mnyan par gyis/ /gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog /'di ni so sor 'chang byed pa/ /
229a2(rgyud): de la 'jig rten thams cad na/ /bka' las 'gal bar byed pa med/ /ci ste sgrub pa'i de nyid shes/ /yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du kun byas na/ /
229a3(rgyud): sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob/ /lha 'am lha ma yin rnams dang / /gnod sbyin yang na rig sngags 'chang / /gzhan yang gang dag su yang dung / /'gal par byed pa/

229a6(rgyud): cad 'chad byed la/ /rig sngags 'chang gi go 'phang mchog /shin tu sems par byed pa yi/ /cho gar ldan zhing rgyas par bcas/ /de ni ma lus bshad par bya/ /de
229a7(rgyud): nas lha dang lha ma yin/ /mi dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang / /'byung po'i tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas/ /gsang ba'i mchog
229b1(rgyud): ni mnyan pa'i phyir/ /thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'khod/ /de nas tshig don rtogs pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la/ /gsal bar bya phyir tshig 'di smras/ /nga ni dkyil
229b2(rgyud): 'khor dam pa dang / /bla ma'i rigs ni sngon mthong la/ /rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /rig sngags sgrub pa rtogs byas nas/ /zla ba phyed gsum par du ni/ /zla gcig pas ni bsgrub
229b3(rgyud): par bya| |sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa 'am/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /rig sngags rigs kyi tshogs bskor ba/ /cho ga
229b4(rgyud): bzhin du byas nas ni/ /yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya/ /mtshams gcad pa dang phyogs bcing dang / /chus ni kun nas gcad pa dang / /thams cad du ni srung ba rnams/ /

229b6(rgyud): gzugs su bri/ /kha zas kyang ni dkar gsum gyis/ /cho ga bzhin byas bza' bar bya/ /dus gsum yang na nub bdun du/ /bzlas brjod mchog gi brgyad brgya bya/ /de
229b7(rgyud): nas der ni rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /der ni gzugs las grub pa po/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang bzhin 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum yang
230a1(rgyud): snang bar byed/ /sa steng dag kyang 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum yang g.yo bar ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni der mthong 'gyur/ /rig sngags rdo rje
230a2(rgyud): lcags kyu dge / de nas de la 'grub par 'gyur/ /ri dwags kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i/ /thad de dga' ba rtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas lha dang 'byung po dag /rgya mtsho
230a3(rgyud): nam mkha' sa gnas pa/ /dang ba med cing ma grub rnams/ /de ltar dga' bar gyur nas ni/ /don rnams kun yang byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ni ji ltar yang //
230a4(rgyud): kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan can/ /mkha' la de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de nas ci dga' rgyu ba dang / /de yi dga' mgur de bzhin byed/ /rtse dga' mchog tu shes
230a5(rgyud): par bya| |de ni yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ni dga' bzhin mkha' la 'gro/ /lha yi rig sngags 'chang gis bskor/ /de ni gcig pu ci dga' bar/ /rdo rje 'dzin
230a6(rgyud): pa yin bzhin du/ /lhag par dga' ba'i gnas rnams su/ /rig sngags 'chang bas bskor par 'gyur/ /de ni na da ku ber bzhin/ /dga' bar gang yang rtse bar
230a7(rgyud): 'gyur| |dus min na par ni shing rnams dang / /me tog tshal dang 'bras bu'i 'tshal/ /khang bzang mid du 'ong ba rnams/ /thams cad kyang ni sprul par byed/ /'on kyang
230b1(rgyud): 'di ni mod tsam ste/ /'dir ni de la bshad mi bya/ /rdo rje lcags kyu grub na ni/ /tshig tu brjod pa thams cad grub/ /las kyi dam pa 'di nyid kyis/ /thams cad kyang ni
230b2(rgyud): 'grub par bshad/ /dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong nas ni/ /dam tshig dag la mkhas pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rig sngags rdo rje 'dzin/ /bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya/ /
230b3(rgyud): bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni/ /lha bshos dag kyang tshul bzhin dbul/ /de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rig sngags gdon/ /lha bshos de yi cho ga
230b4(rgyud): dang / /me tog bdug pas mchod byas nas/ /sgrub pa pos ni ci nus kyis/ /dus gsum bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas kyang / /gdon gyi las
230b5(rgyud): rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams/ /dga' mgur yang ni gzhig par nus/ /yang na g.yul ngor mi bzang 'jig /gdon dag gi ni dkyil
230b6(rgyud): 'khor du/ /myur du gdon ni 'bebs pa dang / /de bzhin gzhig dang gsad pa dang / /bcing dang breg dang gzir ba dang / /ku co 'don du 'jug kyang rung / /grong khyer dang ni
230b7(rgyud): gnas rnams dang / /smas pa'i rma ni spo ba dang / /rig sngags dam ba bshad pa 'dis/ /thams cad kyang ni byed par 'gyur/ /babs pa de dag thams cad kyang / /pi wang
231a1(rgyud): dag kyang len du gzhug / de bzhin gar gyi cho ga rnams/ /yid 'ong ya mtshan byed du gzhug /dgug dang rmi lam cho ga dang / /de bzhin lcags
231a2(rgyud): sgrog gzhom pa dang / /rgyal po'i pho brang dag na ni/ /rtsod pa dag las lhag par rgyal/ /gzugs dang stobs chen ldan pa yi/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ /
231a3(rgyud): gang gi snying la tshul bzhin rtag /de yi don kun 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med dam/ /klu'am lha yang dga' ba yod/ /der ni kun tu thams cad
231a4(rgyud): la| |don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni blon po dang / /blon po chen po mdun na 'don/ /zhag bdun yang na lnga yi bar/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
231a5(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'chi bar bya 'dod na/ /de yi gzugs de der bris la/ /lag pas mnan la bzlas brjod bya/ /gdon dang klu yi gdon yang rung / /'byung
231a6(rgyud): po 'byung po'i gdon dang ni/ /khar ni rdo rje gzir byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni brlag par 'gyur/ /bran mo dang ni mi rnams kyang / /zhag gsum gyis ni brlag par
231a7(rgyud): 'gyur| |dbang du bya bar 'dod na ni/ /der yang nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /khyim thab dang ni nor
231b1(rgyud): 'jog dang / /khyim dang bzhon pa glang chen rta/ /ma he dang ni grong yang rung / /zhag bdun gyis ni myur bar 'thob/ /gzhan gyis rig sngags rigs kun dang / /gdon
231b2(rgyud): rnams kyang ni brlag par 'gyur/ /khye'u dag dang ni bu mo rnams/ /nad kyis kyang ni ma rungs 'gyur/ /ro bsregs sol ba'i ri mo yis/ /dgra yi gzugs ni der bris
231b3(rgyud): la| |de yi steng du 'dug nas ni/ /gang du gzhom par 'dod pa der/ /gzir bar byas te zhag bdun du/ /bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de ltar byas na gzir bar
231b4(rgyud): 'gyur| |ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na/ /des ni zhag bdun bya bar bstan/ /zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang ba
231b5(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis/ /khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni/ /grong khyer dag ni 'bar ba dang / /gser dang de bzhin 'jig pa dang / /gdan dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur/ /
231b6(rgyud): gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang / /'dug nas kyang ni bzlas brjod bya/ /grong khyer dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /nad kyis grong khyer dkrugs par 'gyur/ /grong gi
231b7(rgyud): dbus 'dug bzlas na ni/ /grong mi nad kyis dkrugs par 'gyur/ /dgon par 'dug nas bzlas na ni/ /gdug pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /de nas yid ni zhi ba
232a1(rgyud): yis| |zhi ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya/ /zhi phyir rig sngags brjod na ni/ /thams cad du ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /gsad phyir rig sngags bzlas
232a2(rgyud): na ni| |phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur/ /'thab tu gzung phyir rig sngags bzlas/ /'thab mo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shing skam phyir ni chu la bzlas/ /zla ba
232a3(rgyud): gcig gis lo ma 'byung / /kun dga' ra ba yid 'ong yang / /zla ba gcig gis bshig par 'gyur/ /ci ste nyi ma rangs par bzlas/ /chu dang zas dang bag tshos
232a4(rgyud): dang | |'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /de ma thag tu sgyur bar byed/ /gzhan gyis bzhon dang de bzhin du/ /shing rta'i bzhon pa 'joms par byed/ /ci ste chu klung
232a5(rgyud): chen po yi/ /'gram du song nas bzlas brjod bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang / /gang dang cho ga ji bzhin gang / /de bzhin cho ga gtor ma dang / /bzlas
232a6(rgyud): brjod sbyin sreg gtsang byas na/ /des na don rnams thams cad kyang / /byed 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /rtag tu bden smra bslab la dga'/ /dngos grub mchog
232a7(rgyud): chen thams cad ldan/ /'byung po sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /zhag gsum smyung byas mar gyi ngo / /bcu bzhi la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed/ /
232b1(rgyud): shing drung yang na dgon par gnas/ /gcig pu srung ba mchog byas la/ /slong mo yi ni zas kyang bza'/ /zla drug yang na zla ba gcig /lha 'am gdon kyang gnas kyang
232b2(rgyud): rung | |zla gcig phyugs kyi lhas su gnas/ /zho dang 'o mar mar yang bza'/ /sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten drung / /zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchod/ /zla ba
232b3(rgyud): gnyis ni dur khrod du/ /gtor ma bdug pa gtsang sogs mchod/ /thang ngam mchod rten drung du bzlas/ /de nas 'byung po brlag par 'gyur/ /der ni 'byung po dam pa
232b4(rgyud): gang | |yang na thog mar gang 'ongs dang / /gang tshe de la nye bar 'gyur/ /gang na gang zhig sems kyis 'dod/ /de tshe shin tu bsnyen nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rtag tu
232b5(rgyud): bzlas| |de yi ming ni bris nas kyang / /de nyid ming ni gzung bar bya/ /gcig pus dkyil 'khor byas na ni/ /rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs/ /dri la sogs pas
232b6(rgyud): legs mchod nas/ /des ni 'byung po de dag dgug /de yis ming brjod 'byung po rnams/ /dga' nas der ni 'ongs bar 'gyur/ /de nas des ni legs par mchod/ /
232b7(rgyud): gzhan yang 'ongs nas mchod par bya/ /ming ni legs par brjod bya zhing / /skrag byed ming la brten nas ni/ /'byung po sgrub tu grub 'gyur na/ /mi ni 'grub par 'gyur
233a1(rgyud): ba yin| |de nas de la 'byung po rnams/ /kun nas nye bar 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zham 'bring mthun byed bzhin/ /las kun yang ni byed
233a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal po'i dmag rnams la/ /rgyal po chen pos byas pa bzhin/ /stobs chen 'byung po'i sde dag la/ /bka' ni kun tu stsol bar byed/ /sa steng
233a3(rgyud): kun tu rtse byed cing / /'byung po'i bdag po kun gyis mchod/ /'byung po dag ni phul ba yis/ /kha zas la sogs thams cad za/ /grong ni gang la rgyal 'dod cing / /
233a4(rgyud): yang na phan par 'dod kyang rung / /bsgrub phyir yang na gzhig pa'i phyir/ /der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong / /des ni ming gang ma bkug pa'i/ /'byung po'am 'byung
233a5(rgyud): po'i tshogs kyang rung / /de yi las mchog 'dod na ni/ /de yis ming yang smos par bya/ /ming ni smos pa de yis ni/ /snyems pa med pa'i 'byung po yang / /bkug pa
233a6(rgyud): med par myur du ni/ /bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur ba bstan/ /de ni mi yi 'khor dag tu/ /sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur/ /lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu/ /
233a7(rgyud): spyod pa sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /srog chags mi la sogs rnams kyi/ /srog la dbang bar des 'gyur ro/ /'byor par bya ba'i phyir yang rung / /yang na lus
233b1(rgyud): ni gzhig phyir des/ /ming gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la/ /dga' bzhin bag brkyang smra bar bya/ /ming la sogs pa 'di dag gis/ /sna ni shin tu che ba dang / /shin tu
233b2(rgyud): ring bar byos shig ces/ /bsgo na de bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de bzhin rkang lag bzhin mdog bsgyur/ /ring ba dang ni skam pa dang / /ma rungs par ni byos shig ces/ /
233b3(rgyud): bsgo na de tshe de bzhin byed/ /de bzhin rnam pa mang po dang / /shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams/ /de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis/ /'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur//
233b4(rgyud): mi 'dod na yang mi rnams dang / /'byung po mang pos mthong mi 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu bzlas/ /lha la yang ni
233b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhing / /rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang / /kha zas ci 'dod sbyin byed por/ /de ni lhag par bde 'gyur zhing / /tshe yang lhag par bskal par thub/ /'byung po
233b6(rgyud): mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog / gtso bor yang ni 'gyur ba dang / /lha yi rgyal po 'dra ba yang / /rkyen du bab par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sgrub pa rdzogs so// //
233b7(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni/ /rig sngags don kun grub byed pa/ /lha mo mchog 'gror grags pa 'di/ /sems can rnams kyis bstan par bshad/ /zla ba drug gis
234a1(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur te/ /tshig gis don kun byed par bstan/ /rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni/ /srang gcig nges par gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra
234a2(rgyud): ya s+ya| na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ba ti ba ra ti/ ku sha sam+ba na ma na se/ a ta ra te/ ba te/ ye saM rtse b+hU te/ at+to the/ ru pa ti -i smri ma swAhA/ sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten
234a3(rgyud): drung / /dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya/ /gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa yis/ /lha bshos me tog bdug pa dang / /de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang / /mchod pa
234a4(rgyud): ci nus ci dga' bya/ /mtshams gcad phyogs bcing srung ba rnams/ /rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya/ /de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la/ /de ni zla ba drug gis 'grub/ /de
234a5(rgyud): nas 'dod chags la sogs dang / /sman chen mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ /nad dang sman kun ston pa dang / /gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po
234a6(rgyud): la legs nyes rnams/ /tshig gis ston cing smra bar byed/ /gsang sngags de'i cho ga ni/ 'di yin te/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas bcom ldan
234a7(rgyud): 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs bris te/ lha mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te/
234b1(rgyud): zas su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas lag na rdo rje la bsnun par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
234b2(rgyud): 'das dang / lag na rdo rje la mchod pa yang rtag tu byas te mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya'i nub mo brgyad stong gis bsnun la ci 'byor pas mchod na
