234b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / lha mo dang / sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyen la 'brir bcug ste sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bcom ldan
234b5(rgyud): 'das kyi sbyan sngar mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya sngags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de/ de rnams las cha gcig
234b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha cig blangs te
234b7(rgyud): ras dkar po'i nang du phur nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o/ /'o me dang / phye'i lde gu dang zas dkar po za zhing me tog dkar po dang / dri dkar po phul na/ zla
235a1(rgyud): ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste/ cho ga de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas
235a2(rgyud): brjod byas te mchod pa byas la/ lhag ma yang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na/ rmi lam du thams cad ston par byed do/ /cho ga gsum pa ni/ me long la bsgrub par
235a3(rgyud): bya'o| |mchog 'gro ma'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so/ / //na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra bra Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ e h+ye hi badzra pA Ni/ i daM
235a4(rgyud): bA ha na| ma nu sma ra shI g+h+raM ma na tsa ba la li ta ga ti/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti badzra pA Ni/ he hi he hi he hi/ hi hi/ he ku ru he ku ru/ ku ku ku ku /ku badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/
235a5(rgyud): bai ri bai ri/ he hi he hi he hi/ ku ku b+ha ku ku b+ha/ badzra pA Ni swAhA/ 'di ni/ snying po spyan drang pa'o/ /de la 'di ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po yin no/ /sar+b+ba tra a pa ra dzi taM/ sarba
235a6(rgyud): tra a pra ti ha taM/ sarba tra ar+tha sA d+ha naM/ oM dza te dzo grA ma NAM/ swa rU pa mu pa daR+sha naM/ ki li ki li/ mo ku la shab+dA ru taM badzra t+yu ta ka ra kri t+yu ka ra na ra Na dza naM/ ad b+hA na sid+d+hi
235a7(rgyud): pa ra ma sid+d+hi/ ba tsa laM tsaN+DaM/ pi tra/ pa kaM sa kaM ra ka ra ta ka raM shAM ti ka raM/ puSh+Ti ka raM/ sa bA no pa ra daR+ShaM/ tsa ra daM/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ar+tha sA d+ha kaM A kaR+Sha NaM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/
235b1(rgyud): bo la lA pa naM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ha sa pa naM/ badzra pa Ni s+ya/ pa ra ma hr-i da ya/ i daM badzra pA Ni s+ya/ badzra pA Ni ra ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti ra dz+nyA pa ya ti badzre Na/ ha na ti/ da ha ti/ pa tsa ti
235b2(rgyud): ts+tshin+da ti/ ts+tshin+da ti/ bi dra ba ya ti/ A lo ka bi lo kaM ka ro ti/ hi li ni/ li mi li/ o u ho u b+ha badzra pA Ni/ hu ru hu ru/ saM baM badzra bAny+dza ye duSh+Tan/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa
235b3(rgyud): pa ce| gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ baM sh+yaM ka ro ha hi la ha lA ya swAhA/ hu lu hu lA ya swAhA/ hi li hi lI ye swAhA/ ka la ka lA ye swAhA/ ku li ku lU ye swAhA/ kI li kI la ye swAhA/ ki li ki lA ya swAhA/
235b4(rgyud): da ya ma na sma ra badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti sa ma ya pra ti gr-ih+Na hu te hu tiM d+hU pa pA sha gan+d+ha ma l+yaM tsa ra swA ma tu twa sa ma yaM bya ta kra ma mAd ma/ sa ma yo bi shud+d+hi/ hi li hi ri na
235b5(rgyud): i laM| ku ru kun+du pra da shak+to smin du ru me ha ra ba rA hi ri li/ ni li badzra pA Ni/ ti li ti li/ ba shi ma nu brta hi ri Ni/ ni ri Ni sa ma yA nu brta hi ri mi ri i bA haM ya ni/ satwaM badzra
235b6(rgyud): pA Ni ma ma hi/ swa ya mu pa tiSh+Tha swAhA/ 'di ni/ de'i bdug pa'i sngags so/ /li hi li hi pi li tu u b+h+yo/ u b+ha/ hu ru hu/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza ba sh+ye me ka ro haM di swAhA/ lag na rdo rje phyag
235b7(rgyud): 'tshal bcas/ /rtse mo can zhes bya ba yi/ /snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags/ /de na 'dod rgur sgrub pa yi/ /gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod cing / /'di yi sgrub pa'i

236b6(rgyud): gzhan| |nyin gcig bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /de tshe 'o ma'i lde gu rnams/ /za zhing mnyam par bzhag pa dang / /gso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan pas/ /tshes ni bcu

237a2(rgyud): yi nang dag tu/ /lha bshos dkar po dpe med dbul/ /phyi ril du yang sna tshogs pa/ /ci 'dod thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de nas ku sha'i stan 'dug cing / /srung

237a6(rgyud): tshom ci yang med/ /de nas dga' ba ma yin pa'i/ /las de dag kyang 'dir bya ste/ /de dag gi ni mdor bstan pa/ /snying po bsdus pa bshad par bya/ /gang zhig mi
237a7(rgyud): yi gtso bo 'am/ /blon po dbang du bya 'dod des/ /de yi sgrub pa gang yin pa/ /'di yang rab tu bshad par bya/ /zhag bdun gtsang mar byas nas ni/ /nas kyi zas
237b1(rgyud): ni dus su bza'/ /de nas seng ldeng me bsangs la/ /yam bsreg shing dang sbrang rtsi zho/ /mar blangs brgyad brgya tshang bar ni/ /dus gsum du yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dus kyi lhag ma rtag tu
237b2(rgyud): bzlas/ /lan gsum khrus byas nges par gnas/ /dbang du bya 'dod gang yin pa/ /de dang yang ni phrad par bya/ /de yi ming ni smos pas kyang / /de ni bran bzhin dbang du
237b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ /mi ni gang zhig bran mor 'dod/ /des ni nor gyi tshad bsam la/ /de yi sgrub mchog 'di bya zhing / /lan gsum khrus bya bil ba yi/ /bdug pa mar dang ldan pa
237b4(rgyud): bsreg / de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun/ /der ni ba lang lci ba'i mer/ /sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i/ /sbyin sreg mnyam par bzhag pas bya/ /yang na bil ba'i sbyin sreg
237b5(rgyud): ni| |mar dang yungs kar ldan pa 'am/ /yungs kar mar dang ldan pa'ang rung / /yang na mar ldan pil ba 'am/ /mar dang yungs kar ldan pa yi/ /sbrang rtsi bzang po bil bar
237b6(rgyud): ldan| |yang na re re sbyin sreg mchog / brgya rtsa brgyad du bya ba ste/ /seng ldeng yam bsreg shing bzang gis/ /dus gsum du ni rnam gsum byas/ /phye dang ba gcin lde gu dang / /
237b7(rgyud): phye dang 'o ma'i lde gu'ang rung / /dus gsum bza' zhing yang na ni/ /mi smra mi bza' rig sngags bzlas/ /yang na sbyin sreg yid kyis bya/ /gtsang zhing brtson par
238a1(rgyud): gnas pa des/ /nor ni yid la gang 'dod pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni thob par 'gyur/ /zla phyed yang na zla ba gcig /yang na zla ba phyed gsum
238a2(rgyud): gyis| |rnam pa kun gyi thabs rnams kyi/ /'dod pa thams cad ma lus sbyin/ /yang na gdon gyi las rnams 'dir/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod brtson pa dang / /gtsang
238a3(rgyud): zhing dam tshig mkhas pa yis/ /thams cad rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtsed mo can gyi snying po rdzogs so// //de nas gtum po'i snying po'i cho ga rgyas par bshad par
238a4(rgyud): bya'o| |na maHtsi li tsi ri Ni/ i li ku ru had ti pra sid+d+ha b+ha ga to smi ku ru me ha ba raM ki li bi li/ hi ri Ni su ru ku ru/ sa ma ya ma nu brta hr-i da ye swAhA/ snying po dran par
238a5(rgyud): byed pa'i tshig 'di dag gang du brjod pa der dga' bar gyur nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /na maHkI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ma hA kI li kI la ya swAhA/ kro d+ha kI
238a6(rgyud): li kI la ya swAhA/ tsaN+Da kI li kI la ya swAhA/ de ba ti kI li kI la ya swAhA/ badzra kI li kI la ya swAhA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swAhA/ badzra mo ta nA ya swAhA/ badzra staM b+ha ya swAhA/ badzra
238a7(rgyud): pra baM d+ha nA ya swAhA/ i hi sti badzra/ e hi su sti badzra/ e hi pra ti ra badzra/ e hi a pra ti ta ha badzra/ e hi a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi shi g+h+raM ni la be ga badzra/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA
238b1(rgyud): pa ti| badzra pA Ni/ mu ne mu ne mu ne/ re ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ su ma ti/ e hi pa ni ti li/ sau haM di li pir twa ma ti to ni ra ti ti/ ku la ti li/ shi li/ tsa ra di mo ha te ku cing tha
238b2(rgyud): marte| su bu ru bu ru/ khu khu ti/ khu da li ti li ti ri/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti/ i daM gan+d+ha ma le/ a nu le pa na maHpra ti ts+tsha ku ti ku ti ku ti swAhA/ ku
238b3(rgyud): di bi ri bi ri ti swAhA/ bi ti maM ku ti la swAhA/ a ra li sa ra sha li/ tsi ri li sa ra li gi ri ni/ barma li ni si li ti/ pur+Na kur+Na/ sarba durba tu kut+ta/ mut+ta/ narba barba balba
238b4(rgyud): ram+ba ha hwa/ e hi e hi/ shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni/ he he hai hai he/ tu ru tu ru/ la hUM la hUM swAhA/ sma ra ha na mi ti ri ti/ di ri ri ti li pu swAhA/ ku khu lu tu ku ka ti lu ti li ri
238b5(rgyud): swAhA| e hi tri ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti hi ri/ ti li bi ti/ ri li gi ni/ ni ra dzan+tu bi ri dza yan+tu ri kin+ta rang+ga tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri ti ri swAhA/ narba sharba ba ba ku ku lu/ khu khu
238b6(rgyud): lu| khu khu ti ni/ ru ru ta ru/ sma ra taM/ pra ti dzA ya swAhA/ lag na rdo rje gtum rab gtum/ /nga yi snying po gnyis pa ni/ /gtum zhing rab gtum las yin te/ /ming
238b7(rgyud): yang gtum po zhes par grags/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /snying po gtum po 'di dag ni/ /nyes pa zhes ni bya ba bstan/ /las rnams la ni zla phyed de/ /dam pa
239a1(rgyud): rnams kyi las kun mchog / gdon la sogs pa'i sems can dang / /'gugs pa'i mchog la sogs pa dang / /srung ba la sogs dpe med pa/ /
239a2(rgyud): 'di yi las ni stong rnams dang / /cho ga chen po brgyad rnams kyang / /lha gnas mthong bar nges par ni/ /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnams kyis bya/ /la la gang zhig rdo rje
239a3(rgyud): 'dzin| |mngon sum mthong bar 'dod na ni/ /nga yi sgrub pa'i thabs 'di dag /spyan 'dren mchog 'di de yis bya/ /dus gsum ba lang lci bas bskus/ /las kyang
239a4(rgyud): dag cing sems dag dang / /rdo rje 'dzin la gus pa dang / /rkang lag la sogs bkrus nas kyang / /dgon pa'am rang gi khyim yang rung / /gtsang ma'i phyogs su
239a5(rgyud): mchod rten nam/ /sku gzugs yang na sku gdung gi /mdun du rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /mi ni gtsang sbrar spyod pa yis/ /bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/ /mchog
239a6(rgyud): dang khyad par 'phags pa yis/ /dus gsum rtag tu mchod par bya/ /de la rab spro de la gus/ /srog kyang de la bstan byas nas/ /lag na rdo rje gzugs kyang rung / /
239a7(rgyud): ji skad bstan bzhin ri mor bri/ /dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /rtag tu de la mchod par bya/ /mar dang ldan pas dus su bza'/ /sbrang rtsi 'o thug bza' bar bya/ /
239b1(rgyud): ri mo'i sku gzugs nub phyogs bstan/ /rtag tu shar phyogs kha blta 'dug /mar gyi mar me mi 'chi bas/ /nyin par mchod pa legs par bya/ /cho 'phrul gyi ni zla
239b2(rgyud): phyed dam/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad la/ /brtsams te brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ /yang na nyin re dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod bya/ /thang
239b3(rgyud): chu yang ni bsreg par bya/ /dang zhing rtse gcig sems kyis ni/ /srung ba'i mchog byas bzlas brjod bya/ /zla ba phyed ni lon nas kyang / /des ni zhag gsum smyung ba byas/ /
239b4(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs kun rgyas shing / /shin tu mang por byas nas kyang / /'dod pa yis la gzhag bya zhing / /de nas gus pa mchog gis su/ /oM ni tshig stong bzlas brjod
239b5(rgyud): bya| |de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de la mchod sbyin gtso bo de/ /dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byed/ /sgrub pa'i cho gas spyan drangs nas/ /mchod sbyin mchog la ci 'dod
239b6(rgyud): smos| |tshig gis gang dang gang brjod pa'i/ /sgrub pa'i dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /de yi slar gtang cho ga de/ /rnam ba thams cad bshad par bya/ /des ni phyag dang
239b7(rgyud): mchod pa dang / /mchod yon me tog la sogs dbul/ /'dod pa'i rig sngags lan gcig brjod/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro /na maHhi li hu la/ ni li hu la/
240a1(rgyud): a ha ha ha ha ha/ sa pra ti gats+tsha tu b+ha ga bAM badzra pA Ni re tha su khaM tsu lu tsu lu swAhA/ 'di ni gcig gam gsum du brjod/ /lnga 'am bdun nam nyi shu
240a2(rgyud): gcig |brgya 'am yang na brgyad brgya 'am/ /lan stong cho ga bzhin du brjod/ /'byung po'i gnas sam gzhan dag tu/ /rdo rje dang ni lha yi mdun/ /dri kun gyi ni sbyor
240a3(rgyud): ba dang | |bcing dang grol la bzlas brjod bya/ /dgug dang slar gtang thams cad dang / /bcing dang grol ba thams cad la/ /der ni lan gcig brjod par bya/ /des
240a4(rgyud): na rdo rje 'dzin pa 'gro/ /'di ni rtsed mo ldan pa yin/ /sgrub dang slar gtang ba yang yin/ /'di gnyis la ni khyad par du/ /dbye bar bya ba mang po yod/ /gang gis rtag
240a5(rgyud): tu gtsal byas la/ /lo gcig par du dus gsum du/ /bzlas brjod rnam pa gsum byas na/ /de yis bde bar 'dod pa 'thob/ /gang zhig zla drug sgrub byed cing / /
240a6(rgyud): bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byed/ /legs byas de ni mkha' la rgyu/ /'bring dang lhag ma nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig zla gsum bzlas brjod byed/ /yang na yid kyis
240a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg las/ /byas na cho ga 'di dag gis/ /de ltar de yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed gsum za gcig zos/ /des ni dngos grub tha ma 'am/ /'bring dang khyad
240b1(rgyud): par 'phags pa thob/ /khyim gyi don rnams grub byed cing / /nad rnams kyang ni sel bar byed/ /don rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin/ /de dag thams cad rab tu
240b2(rgyud): 'grub| |zla ba gcig tu bzlas brjod byed/ /'o thug sbrang rtsi mar bcas bza'/ /dus gsum brgyad brgya bzlas pas ni/ /gsum brjod mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//
240b3(rgyud): legs par ma byas don la sogs/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bcing dang dgrol ba thams cad dam/ /sgrub pa'am gzhig pa bcad par byed/ /zla phyed
240b4(rgyud): nas kyi kha zas zos/ /gdon gyi las rnams byed par nus/ /ba gcin nas kyi kha zas zos/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par nus/ /zhag bdun du ni dus gsum
240b5(rgyud): du| |de bzhin brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas/ /dbang du bya dang bcings la sogs/ /gsad par yang ni nus par 'gyur/ /gang zhig zhag lngar zas mi za/ /nyin gcig
240b6(rgyud): bzhin du bzlas brjod byed/ /des na mo rnams gzhig pa 'am/ /dgrol dang dbang du bya bar nus/ /zhag gsum bar du dus gsum du/ /gang zhig sbyin sreg rnam gsum
240b7(rgyud): byed| |lhag ma'i dus su khros nas bzlas/ /des ni gzhan yang gzhig par nus/ /drag po yi ni las byed na/ /zhag gcig smyung byas dur khrod du/ /khrag gi sbyin sreg
241a1(rgyud): byas na ni/ /des ni gdon dang mi rnams gzhig /de dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir/ /dang por zhag gsum smyung byas nas/ /mar gyi ngo ni bcu
241a2(rgyud): bzhi la| |sum brgya lnga bcu gtsang mas bzlas/ /sngar bstan 'di dag byas na ni/ /de nas nges par gnyis kas kyang / /tshig gis gang dang gang smras pa/ /bsam
241a3(rgyud): pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar rtsed mo ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog kyang bshad/ /'gro lding snying po gsum pa yang / /cho ga dag dang bcas par
241a4(rgyud): ni| |las kyi dam pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin 'bring dang tham la/ /rdo rje rdzogs par khru gang srid/ /rtse gsum yongs su dag pa'i mchog /yang na rtse drug dam
241a5(rgyud): pa ni| |de kun gyis ni bri bar bya/ /sus mchod rdo rje rig sngags kyis/ /rdo rje de ni spyan yang drang / /me tog dam pa ma nyams pa/ /lag pa g.yon thogs legs
241a6(rgyud): par mchod/ /lag na bdug thogs pus mo btsugs/ /des ni rig sngags 'di yang bzlas/ /na mo reM reM grAM grAM /tsi ri Ni bi naM/ tra pa ru Ni/ badzrA sa ma ya/ tu bi ta ye
241a7(rgyud): badzra pa ni ma hA bA hA yA swAhA/ bris pa de ni lag g.yon thogs/ /mchod gnas kyang ni mchod par bya/ /bya ba zin nas slar gtang phyir/ /mchod gnas slar ni
241b1(rgyud): gtang bar bya/ /gtum po dang / rtse mo can gyi sgrub pa rdzogs so// //'gro lding gi snying po bshad par bya ste/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa'o/ /de nas
241b2(rgyud): g nod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dul ba mchog gis gnas shing bcom ldan
241b3(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas mgo bo btud cing thal mo rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
241b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i slad du bdag nyid kyi snying po 'jig rten dag la bshad lags so/ /bdag gi
241b5(rgyud): snying po ni/ 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug na de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan
241b6(rgyud): 'das| ci ste bdag nyid kyi snying po 'dis bdag bkug pa las ma mchis na/ 'jig rten pa la dgra bcom pa gsod pa'am/ dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang
241b7(rgyud): lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na de las bcom ldan
242a1(rgyud): 'das kyis slar gtang bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das yid tsam 'dzum pa mdzad de lag na rdo rje la 'di skad

242a5(rgyud): bdag la gsan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ e hi sti ra badzra/ e hi su sti ra badzra/ e hi ma tu badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ e hi e ma ka badzra/ e hi shI gaM ni la be ga badzra/

242a7(rgyud): la ti shi li shi pa li ti ma ti pu tshod ta ma rte tsit+ta tsit+ta marta/ du ru du ru/ khu khu ti khu khu ti ha la ti la ti ri e hi shI g+haM badzra pA Ni i daM gaM d+ha mA le nu le pa na de/ pra tits+tsha/
242b1(rgyud): ut+ta li| ud+tha ud+tha li swAhA/ ku ti bi ri ti swAhA/ tsi ti bi ti ha ti swAhA/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ a la li ma la ri ri bi li ni/ par ma yi ni shi li/ li bi ba li/ lo ti pu rna garba
242b2(rgyud): sharba narba/ tu rba ut+ta/ put+na narba tsarba sharba mam+b+ha dzam+b+ha bam+b+ha swAhA/ e hi shI g+h+raM badzra pA Ni he hi he hi/ tu ri tu ri la hUM la hUM swAhA/ /sma ra tan+ta ka ra n+ta/ ti dz+nyA taM mi ti ri ti mi ti ri ti/
242b3(rgyud): mi di ti ti li/ ri ri ri/ khu yu lu khu khu yi la hu na ri ti a hrI twaM/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pA ti li ri li ri li ri/ ba si ri ri ki ri ti smra ri ma hA smra ri u dzu ri ge tsu ru tsu ru ti swAhA/ tar+b+ha

242b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje gsum pa yin/ /'di ga rten gsum mchog gtso bos kyang / /'di las 'gal bar byed mi nus/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'jig rten dbang / /tshangs pa

243a3(rgyud): bkru| |dag pas shar phyogs bltas te 'dug/ shin tu mnyam bzhag dus gsum du/ /lan grangs brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas yid du 'ong ba yi/ /

243a5(rgyud): bya| |brgya rtsa brgyad ni brjod byas na/ /de nas rdo rje can yang mthong / /de nas gzhan yang stong gi phyed/ /ci ste gus pas 'dun pas mchod/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen mngon
243a6(rgyud): sum du| |mthong 'gyur de la the tshom med/ /mchod sbyin mchog gi gtso bo des/ /de la dam pa sbyin par 'gyur/ /yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid/ /'dod pa
243a7(rgyud): gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i slar gtang dang / /ji skad bshad pa'i las rnams kyang / /mjug tu legs par
243b1(rgyud): bya ba yin/ /'gro lding gi cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
243b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan du yod pa na ste/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes
243b3(rgyud): b la gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas spyi bor thal mo sbyar te dul ba mchog gis gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

243b5(rgyud): lags so/ /gang gis snying po 'dis bdag bkug na/ de'i thad du bdag myur du 'chi bar 'tshal lo/ /ci ste bdag snying po 'dis bkug pa las ma mchis na/ 'jig rten la
243b6(rgyud): la mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid cing dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gi skye gnas su mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bas na/ zhag gcig
243b7(rgyud): smyung bar bgyis pas bdag bkug na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar gtang du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yid tsam
244a1(rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la khas blangs pas khyod la nga mnyes
244a2(rgyud): kyi| gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po/ khyod song la dad pa dang ldan pa yi chad pa ma byed cig /de lta mod kyi/ nga yang khyod kyi snying po nyan bar ni/ 'dod do/ /de skad ces
244a3(rgyud): bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rjes gdong yid tsam phab nas 'dzem bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag
244a4(rgyud): gi snying po cho ga dang bcas pa gsan du gsol/ 'di sgrub par 'tshal zhing bcom ldan 'das la mchod par dga' bas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te zas
244a5(rgyud): su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu 'tshal te dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas khrus bgyis la/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug pa sreg cing sku gdung dang ldan pa'i
244a6(rgyud): mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par bgyis la snying po brjod par bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi thog mar bdag nyid srung bar
244a7(rgyud): bgyi'o| |na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ shrI mu ata trai b+ha/ badzra pA Ni ma ti shi ba mA nA ya/ a n+yo n+ya badzra a sha nir na ma/ sarba gra hA
244b1(rgyud): buSh+Ta a pa ra te shu rak+Sha ya ma na sh+tsa a b+ha ya ka ri hi hi badzra pA Ni hi hi he ha hi/ hi ri ku ku bu/ hi ri ku bi sa ra su be ri tsi ri badzra bA Ni dur dan+tA nAM/ da ma ka da ma da ma swAhA/ lan
244b2(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa la btags na/ sems can thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti
244b3(rgyud): s+ya| e hi badzra pA Ni/ ad mA ba ha na ma nu sma ra ma hA s+thi ra badzra/ e hi su sti ra badzra/ e hi na na bA badzra/ e hi a pra ti hi ta badzra/ i hi shI g+h+raM ma na tsa pa la ga ti ma hA yak+Sha
244b4(rgyud): se nA pa ti/ badzra pA Ni hi hi he hi hi he hi hi hi he hi hi he hi hi he he/ ku tu ku tu ku tu ku tu badzra pA Ni e he/ hi hi he/ hi hi hi hi hi/ hi hi hi hi hi hi hi hi/ badzra pA Ni ku ku bu ku ku bu/ ku b+h+ya
244b5(rgyud): ku b+h+ya| ku ku b+h+ya/ badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ e bai ri/ ha ra ni li/ a ba ha ya mi twaM/ ma ma hi sa ma ye no pa tiSh+Tha swAhA/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

251b1(rgyud): don yod zhi ba dang / /gsum mchog blta na mi bzad dang / /'byung po thams cad rab zhi byed/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bu/ /gnod sbyin
251b2(rgyud): kun gyi mnga' bdag rje/ /gnod sbyin gang dag ri la gnas/ /sa ti ri dang ri bo che/ /zho gdong dang ni gdong rgyas dang / /'dod pa'i don sbyin gnod sbyin gang / /mtshon
251b3(rgyud): cha 'thab cha sna tshogs can/ /stobs ldan rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dang / /pad+ma dkar dang dgra 'joms dang / /rgyan phreng rgyas dang rgyan phreng
251b4(rgyud): che| |bdud rtsi snying rje nying rje grong / /gnod sbyin chen po lngas rtsen dang / /gnod sbyin na la ku be ra/ /nor bu'i sul can gnod sbyin gang / /nor bu bzang zhes grags
251b5(rgyud): pa dang / /rdzogs ldan dang ni rdzogs bzang dang / /rab tu bzang dang bzang po nyid/ /bdag gi snying pos bkug pas na/ /de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shig /ma
251b6(rgyud): smos gnod sbyin de dag dang / /bdag gi don grub de dag dang / /rtag tu dge dang phan byed dang / /gnod sbyin gdon ni skyed byed dang / /gnod sbyin mo ni 'phrog ma mo/ /bu
251b7(rgyud): mangs khyod ni 'dir shog cig / gzugs chen ldan zhing stobs che ba'i/ /bu de dag kyang 'dir shog cig /khyod ni rtag tu gnod sbyin dang / /bu yi 'khor dang lhan cig tu/ /
252a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes rab bskul bas/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par gyis/ /dgra yi phyogs dang mdza' bo'i phyogs/ /de bzhin rgyal po sa gang
252a2(rgyud): dang / /nags dang brag khrod rdzong rnams dang / /g.yul du rgyal bar bya ba dang / /rgyas ba yi ni las rnams dang / /rtsod pa dang ni 'thab pa dang / /srung pa'i las dang
252a3(rgyud): dbang sgrub dang / /bag ma dag ni len pa la/ /lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ /rdo rje dbyug sogs lhan cig tu/ /dam pa 'chang ba'i 'og pag mas/ /don rnams
252a4(rgyud): thams cad smyur te gyis/ /s+yAd ya the dan a ma le/ bi ma le/ ni rma le/ maM ga l+ye sa hi te/ ha na ha na/ sa ra sa ra/ A shA ne be ga nA ma tiSh+Tha rA dzA dU ti/ de ba dU ti/ yak+Sha dU ti/ badzra
252a5(rgyud): dU ti| sarba gra ha nA sha truM pra marda ni badzra dU ti i daM/ ku rbaM hi badzre sA dA yA kAR+ya ma ma pa re shaM d+hu b+ha ga kA R+ya ma b+hi duSh+Ti ka du rmu khe du rmu khe me ma/ sha tra bo nA tha ba d+ha bi
252a6(rgyud): dza ye bi dza yo me b+ha ba tu/ a pa rA dzi te/ a ba rA dza yo me b+ha ba tu ba la ba la/ ban+to b+ha b+hA me ma ti d+hi ti d+hi ta man+to b+ha ba na a ma le maM ga l+ye/ ma re hi taM bi ma l+ye/ na she
252a7(rgyud): ha taM maM ga l+ye/ ma re ha taM bi ma l+ye/ na she hi taM daM ta karma dan+to hi dan la g+hu pA sha ni bri she hi taM/ sarba rA dzA dwA ra bi ra dzA ni a pa rA dzi te/ sarba yak+Sha hr-i da ya brta ni/
252b1(rgyud): a pa yA mi bA pi tsa a nu sa ra sa ra sarba yak+Sha hr-i da ya ni a bi ba pi tsa so ni so na/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a yA na/ ya na saM tsa la ni/ sarba yak+Sha da yA ni/ ha na
252b2(rgyud): ha na| da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ b+ha na b+ha na/ mu ru mu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ rak+Sha rak+Sha maM karma dU ti ma ma karma/ pra bi sha /sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba ar+tha sA
252b3(rgyud): d+ha ma me sA d+ha ya/ i dany+tsa me/ kAR+yaM ku ru swAhA/ rig sngags rdo rje 'og pag can/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi snying po ste/ /'phrog ma zhes kyang rab grags pa/ /shes ldan de ni
252b4(rgyud): bshad pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni las mthong dang / /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa byas pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin du/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor mchog mchod nas//
252b5(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar bya/ /yang na zhag gsum smyung byas la/ /gtsang mas gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su/ /gnod sbyin dkyil 'khor rab gsal bri/ /yang na zhag

252b7(rgyud): yang na chos kyi dkyil 'khor bri/ /de yi g.yon phyogs rig sngags kyi/ /stobs 'chang lag na rdo rje bri/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su/ /nor gyi dbang phyug gnod
253a1(rgyud): sbyin bcas/ /de dag mdun du 'phrog ma ni/ /'og bag rig sngags sna tshogs mchog /de yi rig sngags tshogs kun ni/ /g.yas phyogs

253a3(rgyud): bar bya| |rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/ /grul bum mchog gi dpung gis bskor/ /lho phyogs sgo yi nang na gnas/ /lho phyogs nas ni byang du blta/ /rgyal po

253a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin mchog gi dpung gis bskor/ /byang phyogs kyi ni sgo na gnas/ /lho phyogs logs su blta bar bya/ /kho ra khor yug thams cad nas/ /gdon rnams

253a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nang du dgram/ /mar me la sogs dri rnams dang / /me tog 'bras bu kun gyis bskor/ /de ltar byas na rig sngags che/ /rgyal mo yi ni dam pa
253b1(rgyud): 'di| |bzlas brjod byed na bshos rnams dang / /bdug pa dri la sogs pa dbul/ /bzlas brjod bsnyen ba grangs med par/ /bzlas brjod bya zhing kun nas mchod/ /bdug
253b2(rgyud): pa thams cad nang du bsreg / bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bkra shis pa/ /mkhas pas sngon du byas na ni/ /de nyid srung ba'i mchog yin no/ /de nyid rab tu sgrub pa yin/ /phyogs
253b3(rgyud): bcings pa yang de nyid de/ /de nas 'di yi bzlas brjod rnams/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa nas/ /sgrub pa'i 'phrog ma 'gul ba dang / /sa gzhi dag kyang g.yo bar 'gyur/ /

253b5(rgyud): mthong 'gyur zhing / /gzugs so cog ni du mar ston/ /de ni de yis 'jigs mi bya/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni drung dag tu/ /rig sngags tshogs ni bzlas brjod bya/ /rig sngags

253b7(rgyud): la sogs gnod sbyin gyi/ /tshogs mchog kun gyis de la mchod/ /gnod sbyin bzhin du'ang rgyu ba dang / /ji bzhin stobs dang ldan par rgyu/ /de srid du ni mkha' la 'gro//

254a3(rgyud): tu bzlas brjod sbyin sreg dang / /mchod pa kun dang mnyam gzhag dang / /rtag tu mchod pa dga' ba yis/ /don rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje 'og pag
254a4(rgyud): can gyi cho ga rdzogs so/ / //de nas sngags 'chang kun gyis mchod/ /lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa/ /rdo rje'i sde ni stobs po che/ /mthong na don yod zhi

254a6(rgyud): satwa satwa s+ya/ a ti ba la s+ya/ a pra mo ya ba la s+ya/ badzra se nA ya s+ya/ badzra kAm da s+ya/ tu ru tu ru/ badzra si nA swAhA/ ku ru ku ru ma hA se nA ya swAhA/ hu ru hu

258a7(rgyud): ldan| |rin chen kun dang ldan pa dang / /sa bon kun gyis mchod byas shing / /gtso da nas dkris pa 'am/ /de yi gzhi la bzhag nas ni/ /lan
258b1(rgyud): grangs brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ /bsdams shing legs par bstan byas nas/ /rdo rje sde la rab bsgrims te/ /dri la sogs pas legs mchod nas/ /

258b3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub/ /rgyas shing dpal yang skye bar 'gyur/ /lig bu mig dang tsan+dan dang / ba bla dang ni ldong ros dang / /nA ga bus pa ba tra dang / /de bzhin po
258b4(rgyud): la brgyad pa ste/ /'di dag cha ni mnyam byas la/ /phye ma zhib mor btags par bya/ /rgyal gyi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ /mchod rten drung du bsgrub par bya/ /dri bsang mang

259b1(rgyud): yang snod kyi nang du gzhug / rig sngags mchod pa la sogs bya/ /de nas lan stong rtsa brgyad du/ /sbyin sreg byas nas zin pa'i mjug/ /de nyid phyi rol bor

264b1(rgyud): sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ su khi b+ha ba tu badzra pA Ni sa pa ri pA ra badzra pA Ni/ bA tsa ne na bA tsa ne na sa t+ye na badzre Na/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ badzre Na ts+tshin+da ti/ badzre Na b+hin+da
264b2(rgyud): ti| a lo la g+ha lo la/ ga lin+d+ha/ ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ badzra pA Ni/ ma hA/ yak+Sha se na pa ti ra dz+nyo pa ya ti swAhA/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang phye'i lde gu
264b3(rgyud): za zhing bsgrub par bya ste/ lag na rdo rje ri mo'i gzugs tshon rtsi sbyin med pas 'brir gzhug go /ri mo'i gzugs kyi drung du ras ma nyams pa'i stan la gser dang / dngul
264b4(rgyud): dang / zangs sna gsum las byas pa'i rdo rje bzhag ste steng g.yogs par bya'o/ /pog dang sra rtsi pog sbyar ba yang dbul lo/ /na maHku ru badzra pA Ni pra ti gr-ih+Na hi mye d+hu pa
264b5(rgyud): hu ti ma baspa hu ti ma ma ma tsa/ rak+Sha maM twaM sa ma yo bya d+hi shu ti swAhA/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te dus gsum du bdug pa thogs shing lan brgyad brgya bzlas
264b6(rgyud): brjod byas nas phyi de nyin par mchod pa lhag par bskyed de bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mar me yang ci 'byor pas bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas lag na rdo rje 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bya
264b7(rgyud): ba gang yin pa de byed par 'gyur ro/ /grub nas kyang zla ba phyed kyi bar du cho ga bsrung bar bya'o/ /dam tshig ma mthong bas byas na ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon
265a1(rgyud): la gus pa dang mchod pa byas nas gdod cho ga rgyas par mnod par bya ste/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su kaR+Sha pa na brgyad kyi 'gron bus
265a2(rgyud): rdo rje byas nas slob dpon la dbul bar bya'o/ /de lta bus cho ga rgyas pa bsgrubs na gdod 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /slob
265a3(rgyud): dpon ma yin zhing bu ma yin pa bsten nas lo gcig ma lon pa la sbyin par mi bya ste/ yang na slob dpon gyis rab tu sbyang ba byas nas gzod gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas
265a4(rgyud): pho nya mo yi tshogs/ /bcu po rnams kyi g.yog mo ni/ /yid las skyes pa drug cu bzhi/ /bstan pa rnams ni bshad par bya/ /na mo ma ti hi badzra pA Ni badzra pA Ni ma hA

271b5(rgyud): yungs kar gyis rdo rje bri'o/ /de'i phyogs gcig tu thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la/ de nas las brtsam par bya ste/ dus gsum du khrus byed cing dus gsum
271b6(rgyud): du gos brje ba dang / phyi rol du rtswa dur ba'i stan la nyal ba dang / gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / kha zas dus gcig tu 'o ma dang / 'bras sA lu'i chan
271b7(rgyud): bza' zhing dka' thub spyod pas nang du lha bshos dbul bar bya'o/ /gtor ma yang til zan dang / 'byung po'i zas sbyin par bya'o/ /bdug pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la
272a1(rgyud): a ga ru dbul lo/ /lag na rdo rje la ni/ gu gul dang / thang chu dbul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das la ni/ me tog dri zhim po rnams dbul lo/ /lag na rdo
272a2(rgyud): rje la ni| ka ra bI ra dmar po dbul lo/ /mtshan mo ni/ mar me gnyis dbul bar bya ste/ dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas la sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/ /
272a3(rgyud): mjug tu zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgyas par byas te nam zhig rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis 'ong ba dang / yang na 'od ston pa'am/ yang na rmi lam
272a4(rgyud): legs par ston pa'am/ yang na gnod sbyin mo'am/ rig sngags sam/ ci 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur gyi bar du pho nya mo'i bzlas brjod grangs med par
272a5(rgyud): bya'o| |bdug pa'i gsang sngags la/ na mo ba ra mu ni ba ra ma hA mu ni bar mu ni ba ra mu ni pra tits+tsha me b+ha ga t+yo pa ni taM puSh+pa gan+d+he mA l+ye pa ha ra ma i li mi li li me/
272a6(rgyud): i li mi li li me swAhA/ 'dis dus gsum du dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ sbyin sreg gi sngags te/ na moH
272a7(rgyud): an+d+rI ya swAhA/ ya mA ya swAhA/ wa ru NA ya swAhA/ ag+na ye swAhA/ pra dzA pa ta ye swAhA/ b+ha ga ba te swAhA/ bi rU pAk+Sha ya swAhA/ bA ya be swAhA/ ku be rA ya swAhA/ badzra pA Na
272b1(rgyud): ye swAhA| dz+wa la dz+wa la mi li ti i ti mi ri dzU hi ri swAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis a pa marga dang / sa mi dang / shing 'o ma can gyi yam bsreg shing gi sreg blugs sna re yang brgyad
272b2(rgyud): brgya brgyad brgya zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du smyugs te sbyin sreg byas la/ de'i 'og tu grangs nges par pho nya mo'i bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'dis bcing
272b3(rgyud): bar bya ste/ na mo ma li ma li ma hA ma li/ i ti mi ti/ ye tra bi ha ri Ni haM sra nan di sha ban+d+ha/ ma dz+nyA pa ya ti rak+Sha mAM sarba twa ti/ tsi hi ri ki ri swAhA/ lan bdun bzlas brjod
272b4(rgyud): byas pa'i chu dang / skud pas bya'o/ /'di ni/ lag na rdo rje slar gtang ba'i sngags te/ na maHtsi li tsi li badzra pA Ni swa b+hA ni gats+tsha pu na ra ga ma nA ya/ pu na pra ti ga ma nA ya
272b5(rgyud): swAhA| chus slar gtang bar bya'o/ /de ltar de sgrub pa ni/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'dis bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur te/ ma grub na
272b6(rgyud): yang las rnams byang bar byed do/ /gdon dbab pa gtsug phud bcing ba ni/ chus bya'o/ /gnod par bya ba ni/ shing shun thag gu'am/ ta la'i lo mas sbyin sreg bya'o/ /
272b7(rgyud): rmi ltas kyi rig sngags dang / srung ba'i skud pa ni/ yungs kar dang / chu dang / thal ba rnams kyis bya'o/ /dug zhi bar bya ba ni/ bzlas brjod bya'o/ /gdon bdun po skrag
273a1(rgyud): par bya ba la ni/ lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis bya'o/ /sgo lcags dbye ba dang / gdon dbang du bya ba dang / mi'i gtso bo dang / mi chen po dbang du bya ba
273a2(rgyud): ni| zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi ya ma bsreg shing gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg gis bya ste/ dus
273a3(rgyud): gsum du khrus byed cing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bya'o/ /de ltar byas na/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ dri za mo'am/ srin mo yang dbang du khugs par 'gyur
273a4(rgyud): ro| |zla ba gcig gis ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / shi ba ma gtogs par sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dbang du khugs par 'gyur ro/ /
273a5(rgyud): blo gros rdo rje ma'i cho ga gnyis pa ni/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la brtsams te zas su 'o ma dang / 'bras chan za zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du thab khung gru bzhi pa byas
273a6(rgyud): te seng ldeng gi me spar la/ u dum wa ra'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgyad sbrang rtsi'i nang du smyugs pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ /thab khung du yang rtswa ku shas
273a7(rgyud): bskor bar bya'o/ /yungs kar gyis kyang bsrung bar bya'o/ /sna ma'i me tog gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams la mchod par bya'o/ /sna ma'i me tog gis
273b1(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba yang phyag tu dbul lo/ /lag na rdo rje la yang zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te mtshan mo ku ran+tas lan brgyad stong sbyin
273b2(rgyud): sreg byas na/ las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ me tog gi phreng ba 'bul bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar 'grub par gyur na phyi de nyin par mchod pa shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /de ni/
273b3(rgyud): rdo rje blo gros ma de'i sgrub pa'i cho ga yin te/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas blo gros rdo rje ma pad+ma'i mdog 'dra ma lag na pad+ma thogs shing pad+ma la 'dug pa bri'o//
273b4(rgyud): de nas zhag lnga'i bar du ni/ bdag cin dang / phye ma'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas pa dang / dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / rtswa dur ba'i stan gyi steng du nyal bar bya
273b5(rgyud): ste| dus gsum du pad+ma brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas te dbul lo/ /mjug tu zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te mchod pa ni/ rgyas par byas nas lha
273b6(rgyud): bshos kyang phul la mtshan mo pad+mo brgyad stong phul na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa yang ci 'byor pas bya'o/ /'di ni/
273b7(rgyud): blo gros rdo rje ma de'i cho ga yin no/ /na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma ti badzro badzro Ni/ badzra badzri sma ra sa ma yaM/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ ki ri
274a1(rgyud): ki ri| ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ badzre/ ha na ha na ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ dU ti bar+Na sa ha sraM me pra yats+tsha hu ru hu ru/ sid+d+ha sh+tsaN+Da badzra
274a2(rgyud): pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ cho ga ni/ yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la brtsams te gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas zas mi za bar dus gsum du las bya'o/ /
274a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dri zhim po dang / a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / lha bshos dkar po dang / mar gyi mar me rnams phul te lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du a sha
274a4(rgyud): ku ra'i skyang nul gyis dkyil 'khor byugs te/ der gur gum mam/ tsan+dan dmar pos rdo rje bri'o/ /lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje la yang gur gum dang / tsan+dan dang / me
274a5(rgyud): tog dmar po dang / lha bshos dmar po dang / ser po dang / dkar po dang / mar gyi mar me rnams dbul zhing / dus gsum du khrus byas te las dang / mchod pa
274a6(rgyud): bya'o| |de nas rdo rje'i drung du snod gsar pa'am/ kham phor gsar pa'i nang du me sbar te gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas sbyin sreg
274a7(rgyud): bya ste| zhag gsum smyung bar byas nas zla ba nya la lan brgyad stong bya'o/ /de'i mjug tu dngos grub kyi rtags g.yo bar 'gyur te/ zla ba drug tshang nas 'bras bu yod
274b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /de nas blo gros rdo rje ma'i cho ga tha dad pa bshad de/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la btsams te zas su dkar gsum za zhing lig bu mig gam/ ldong ros las
274b2(rgyud): zho gnyis sam/ srang re re blangs te bzlas brjod byas te dus gsum du khrus byed cing / dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / rtswa dur ba'i stan la nyal zhing dus gsum du brgyad
274b3(rgyud): brgya bzlas brjod byas nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas la mdun du zhag gsum smyung bar byas te zla ba nya la yang bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje
274b4(rgyud): la mchod pa byas nas lig bu mig dang / ldong ros a shwat+tha'i lo ma bzhi'i steng du bzhag la gsum gyis bkab nas lag pa g.yas pas mnan te/ g.yon pas tsan+dan dmar
274b5(rgyud): po'am| be kang ka ta'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa las byas pa'i rdo rje srid du sor brgyad yod pa rtse lnga pa blangs te srung ba byas shing cho ga bzhin du lha bshos phul nas dngos grub
274b6(rgyud): 'grub pa'i gnas gang yin par nyi ma'am/ zla ba la gza' 'jug pa'i tshe nam dro bar gyur pa'am/ dud pa 'thul ba'am/ 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mchod
274b7(rgyud): rten gyi drung ngam/ sku gzugs sam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du ba mar srang gcig /gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo
275a1(rgyud): rje la mchod pa byas te zla ba mi mthong bar rtswa dur bas btsugs te bzlas brjod byas la dro bar gyur nas 'thungs na/ 'jig rten thams cad dbang du
275a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbu ba byung nas 'thungs na ni/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dud pa 'thul nas 'thungs na ni/ lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /'bar bar gyur
275a3(rgyud): nas 'thungs na/ nam mkha' la rgyu bar 'gyur te/ dngos grub chen po yin no/ /de nas nor sgrub pa 'byung ste/ tsan+dan dmar po las blo gros rdo rje ma'i gzugs rgyan
275a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan la/ de'i lag pa g.yas pa na pad+ma thogs pa/ g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs par byas te gtsang ma'i phyogs su grog mkhar gyi sa las stegs bu
275a5(rgyud): sor brgyad pa byas nas der kha nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas pa'i nang du ba
275a6(rgyud): l ang gi lci bas me sbar te dgang blugs phul la tsan+dan dmar po'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar ba'i sreg blugs lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na 'grub

275b1(rgyud): pa dang bcas par sbyin sreg byas nas lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin byas nas ba lang gi rmig pa ji snyed cig sbyin sreg byas pa rmig
275b2(rgyud): pa re re zhing ba lang brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /ma he dang / ra yang de dang 'dra'o/ /yang na 'bras ma brdungs pa mar dang sbyar ba'i yul ma gang+ha'i bra tshad gcig tsam gyi
275b3(rgyud): sreg blugs cho ga gong ma bzhin zhag bdun sbyin sreg byas la brgyad brgya rdzogs shing dgang blugs phul na/ nyin re zhing bre re re thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'bru
275b4(rgyud): thams cad dbul bar bya ste/ dur ba'i myu gu sbyin sreg bya'o/ /mar 'thung bar 'dod pas ni/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung bar byas te gu gul srang

275b6(rgyud): z hag gcig smyung ba byas te yungs kar srang gcig a shwat+tha'i lo ma bzhi'i steng du bzhag nas gsum gyis bkab ste lag pas mnan la lan brgyad stong bzlas
275b7(rgyud): brjod byas na/ /las thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / ci yang rung ba thams cad la mgo bor gdab par bya'o/ /mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la skud

276a3(rgyud): gu dang snag tsha dang bcas par bum pa gsar pa'i nang du gzhug go / de yang bum pa mi nag cing rtsa ba med pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /mar gyi mar me yang
276a4(rgyud): sbyar la lha bshos su khu bcud dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byed cing thang chu'i bdug pa bsregs la/ gtsang mas
276a5(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos nas de nyid kyi drung du sa la nyal bar bya'o/ /mjug tu za ma bzhi smyung bar byas la zla ba nya la mchod pa shin tu rgyas par byas te grangs nges
276a6(rgyud): pa med pas bzlas brjod byas la tshes bcu drug la kha phye na/ thams cad zhu dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang na las thams cad la rdo rje lag tu blangs te sngar bsnyen

276b1(rgyud): 'das kyi gzugs 'brir gdu ga ste/ g.yon phyogs su ni/ lag na rdo rje bri'o/ /g.yas phyogs su pho nya mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das la thal mo
276b2(rgyud): sbyar ba bri'o/ /de nas sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi drung du ras kyi sku gzugs kha nub phyogs su bstan nas de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor ba

276b4(rgyud): de'i steng du tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje shar phyogs su bstan te gzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje la yang mchod de/ dus gsum du kA ra bI ra
276b5(rgyud): dmar po'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan re re bzlas brjod byas pas rdo rje bsnun par bya'o/ /de'i mjug tu za ma bzhi smyung ba byas la zla ba nya la mchod pa shin tu rgyas

276b7(rgyud): bzhin gyi tshul gyis 'ong ba'am/ bcom ldan 'das la phul ba'i mar me me lce chen por gyur pa'am/ rmi lam du ston par gyur gyi bar du rdo rje la bsnun na/ de nas
277a1(rgyud): las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i gtso bo'am mi chen po skyes bu'i khyad par 'di gnyis dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad
277a2(rgyud): la brtsams te gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas zas su dkar gsum bza' zhing sbyin sreg bya ste/ be kang ke ta'i bud shing ngam de ma rnyed na/ ba la
277a3(rgyud): sha'i bud shing gis me spar nas sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / lan tshwas sbyin sreg byas na mi'i gtso bo'am mi chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du yungs kar
277a4(rgyud): mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni/ lhag par yang gtsug nas byung ba'i cho ga'i khyad par gyi thabs yin no/ /rdo rje nag mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// //gzhan
277a5(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa'i cho ga la gdon thams cad la dbab pa dang / btsas pa za ba dang / grul bum gsal ba dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po
277a6(rgyud): dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / yi dwags la sogs pa gsal ba dang / gzhig par bya ba ni/ e raN+Da'i shing gis me sbar la/ e raN+Da'i yam sreg shing dang / yungs
277a7(rgyud): kar mar dang sbyar bas gcig car sbyin sreg bya'o/ /gdon gyis ma rungs pa byas pa la nim pa'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o/ /dbab pa la ni/ seng ldeng gi yam

277b6(rgyud): cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya'o/ /ras sngon po la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te ro smad du bcings na/ sus kyang mi thub pa'i rgyan du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du g.yul 'gyed
277b7(rgyud): pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad la bsrung ba'i phyir bcings na rgyal zhing lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod du las bya ba rnams dang /
278a1(rgyud): zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / gdon dgug pa dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug par bya ba la ni/ cho ga bzhin du bzlas brjod dang / rdo rje'i
278a2(rgyud): phyag rgyas bya'o/ /rmi lam du ston du gzhug pa la ni/ gtsug phud dang / ras kyi tshar tshar ram/ chos gos kyi gra la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bya'o/ /

278a4(rgyud): pa dang / srog chags kyi gnas med par bkra shis pa'i phyogs su mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad las yongs su sbyang ba brtsams nas dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug gra bzhi
278a5(rgyud): pa byas nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la tshon rtsi sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ /sgo bzhi gdod par bya'o/ /tshon rtsi 'byung khungs nas byung ba'i tshon gyis bri bar bya ste/
278a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lag na rdo rje gnas pa'i stegs bu byas la/ de'i phyogs gcig tu gur gum gyis rdo rje sor brgyad tsam bri'o/ /de'i steng du yungs kar
278a7(rgyud): gyis rdo rje bya'o/ /de'i steng du tsan+dan dmar po las rdo rje sor brgyad pa byas la gzhag go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar phyogs kyi sgor ni/ rdo rje dang / 'khor
278b1(rgyud): lo gzhag go / lho phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / dbyug pa gzhag go /nub phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / zhags pa gzhag go /byang phyogs su ni/ rdo rje dang / be con gzhag go /dkyil
278b2(rgyud): 'khor zlum po'i nang du phyogs bzhi nas rdo rje thams cad gzhag go / de dag gi phyi rol du khru gang tsam gyis dpag ste dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams kyis bskor nas tshes
278b3(rgyud): gcig la brtsams te bsgrub par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir ni/ bum pa mi nag cing rtsa ba med pa bzhi 'o mas bkang ste gzhag go /nyin gcig bzhin du mtshan mo mar gyi mar me
278b4(rgyud): yang dbul lo/ /lnga pa de lag na rdo rje dang / bcom ldan 'das la yang dbul lo/ /stegs bu der sku gdung dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs bzhag la de'i mdun du lha dang rdo
278b5(rgyud): rje dri thams cad kyis legs par bri bar bya ste/ khru gang tsam du bya'o/ /de'i phyogs gcig tu thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la der shing 'o ma can gyi yam sreg
278b6(rgyud): shing gis me spar te dgang blugs phul nas zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang / yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas la/ de nas bzlas brjod lan brgyad stong bya'o/ /zas
278b7(rgyud): su 'o ma dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du bdug pa dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas mchod de dus gsum du gos brje ba dang / mi smra bas bsgrub par bya'o//
279a1(rgyud): de'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ zla ba nya la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas sgrub cing lag pas rdo rje mnan te nam dro bar gyur ba dang / dud pa
279a2(rgyud): 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phags par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas blangs na/ lag na rdo rje dang mthu mnyam par 'gyur
279a3(rgyud): te tshe bskal par thub cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan la/ dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro/ /smyung bar 'dug pa'i nyin mo ni/ rtag tu mnan te
279a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la yang phyogs thams cad kyang lha bshos rgyas pa dbul lo/ /sgo re rer yang mar gyi mar me gnyis dbul
279a5(rgyud): lo| |nang du mar gyi mar me bzhi dbul lo/ /thog mar ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas ba lang gi lci bas skyang nul byugs la dri byugs nas gdod bri bar bya'o/ /'di ni/
279a6(rgyud): pho nya ma thams cad kyi rdo rje sgrub pa spyi'i cho ga yin te/ las thams cad kyang las kyi rdo rje lag na thogs par bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi chun po 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ /
279a7(rgyud): de ltar grub nas phyi de nyin par mchod pa shin tu rgyas par bya'o/ /blo gros rdo rje ma sgrub pa'i cho ga gsum pa ni/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi spyin med pas blo gros
279b1(rgyud): rdo rje ma pad+ma'i mdog can lag na pad+ma thogs shing pad+ma la 'dug pa bri'o/ /de nas zhag lnga'i bar du ba gcin dang / phye'i lde gu za zhing dus gsum du khrus bya zhing dus gsum
279b2(rgyud): du gos brje ba dang / rtswa dur ba'i stan la nyal bas dus gsum du pad+ma brgyad brgya la lan re bzlas brjod byas te dbul lo/ /zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du smyung bar byas te
279b3(rgyud): mchod pa rgyas par byas nas lha bshos kyang phul la nub gsum pad+ma brgyad stong phul na/ 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /blo gros rdo rje
279b4(rgyud): ma'i cho ga rdzogs so/ / //na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ni ri ni ri/ pa sh+ye pa sh+ye ne swAhA/ 'di ni/ pho nya ma lta ba ma zhes bya
279b5(rgyud): ste| 'di ni/ las thams cad rgyas par bshad par bya'o/ /gsal snang gi cho ga bya bar 'dod na ni/ ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs
279b6(rgyud): te bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri phul nas bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud pa phra mo nyis bltab tu byas pa sor bzhi pa gnyis byas la/ de nas lan bdun bzlas brjod
279b7(rgyud): byas te dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bzhag la de nas rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ 'di skad du ci ste don 'di 'grub pa lta na/ gcig la gcig 'khri bar gyur cig /
280a1(rgyud): mi 'grub pa lta na/ so sor gyes par gyur cig ces bya'o/ /de nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ltas ston par 'gyur te/ gtsang zhing tshangs
280a2(rgyud): par spyod pa dang / smyung bar byas pas bya'o/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de'i ming dang ldan par rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ ma da na'i shing
280a3(rgyud): l as gzugs byas nas tsha ba gsum gyis bkang la tshigs bdun du ma da na'i tsher ma bdun gyis btab nas zangs kyi thur ma rkub tu btsugs te spyi bor phyung la seng
280a4(rgyud): ldeng gi 'dab ma'i dugs kyis bdug cing / zhag bdun gyi bar du kha shar phyogs su bstan te dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas mjug tu lan
280a5(rgyud): stong byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhig par 'dod na yungs nag gi 'bru las gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsams te seng ldeng gi me'i nang du
280a6(rgyud): dus gsum du sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la gso sbyong dang ldan pas ro bsregs pa'i sol ba
280a7(rgyud): blangs te lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas dgra'i gzugs bris la rtag tu mgo bo dang / snying ga dang / lag pa gnyis dang / rkang pa gnyis su lcags kyi phur
280b1(rgyud): bu re btab na lce 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /de ming nas smos shing de'i rkang pa'i drung du ni ma pa'i bud shing khrag gi nang du smyugs pas me bus pa yungs nag dang / lan tshwa dang / til
280b2(rgyud): nag po bsregs te khrag dang sbyar bas dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid kyi mthu bskyed
280b3(rgyud): par 'dod na/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri phul la bum pa gsar ba chus bkang ste sman thams cad dang / sa bon thams cad
280b4(rgyud): dang / dbyig rnams blugs la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas ras ma nyams pas smad g.yogs byas te khrus byas na/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu bcom par 'gyur
280b5(rgyud): ro| / de nas mig sman sgrub par 'dod na/ ut+pa la dmar po dang / pad+ma skyon med pa dang / pad+mot+ta ra dang / sa ha tsa ra dang / gi'u wang dang / rdo pha bang long bu dang / mig
280b6(rgyud): sman gyi gtso bo 'di dag glang po'i rdul dang sbyar nas rgyun ma chad par lan stong sbyin sreg bya ste/ skar ma rgyal la mig bskus na/ de ma thag tu 'jig rten thams cad
280b7(rgyud): la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lus mi snang bar 'dod na/ mig sman gong ma de nyid lcags las mi'i gzugs byas pa'i spyi bo phug la de'i lto ba mig sman gyis
281a1(rgyud): b kang ste lcags kyi phur bus btab nas zhag gsum smyung bar byas la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi'i nub mo bzlas brjod byas te ro bsregs pa'i me 'bar
281a2(rgyud): ba'i nang du bor nas 'byung po'i gtor ma thams cad phul la grangs nges pa med par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rmi lam du mi nag po mthong bar 'gyur te/ grub zin
281a3(rgyud): no zhes zer ba dang / nang par langs te nges mig bskus na/ lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /rdul la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te gdong bskus na/ rgyab po'i pho
281a4(rgyud): brang dang / rtsod pa'i nang du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ don yang grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsal snang bya bar 'dod na/ smyung ba byas la bdug pa dang / me tog dang / dri dang / lha
281a5(rgyud): b shos phul te mthe bong rgya skyegs kyi khu bas mdog bsgyur nas dri zhim pos bgos pa'i til mar gyis bskus te byis pa byad bzang la mdog nag pa byed du bcug
281a6(rgyud): nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang na me long la yang bya ste/ mig la sngags kyis gdab bo/ /gos dang rgyan thams cad
281a7(rgyud): la yang sngags kyis gdab bo/ /lta ba ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas lha kun lu gu rgyud/ /lag na rdo rje'i g.yung drung las/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud grags
281b1(rgyud): pa| |bdag gis rab tu bshad par bya/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/
281b2(rgyud): thams cad du gzhan gyis mi thub cing don thams cad la 'grub pa lags kyi/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba stsal ba dang / dge slong dang / dge
281b3(rgyud): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la sman pa gang lags pa bdag gi 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ sa'i steng gang na bdud sdig can gyi dbang du gyur
281b4(rgyud): pa| dad pa ma mchis pa/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bgegs bgyid pa de dag gzhom pa'i slad du rig sngags rdo rje lu gu
281b5(rgyud): rgyud ces bgyi ba 'di bgegs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ las thams cad bgyid pa/ thams cad gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
281b6(rgyud): bgyid pa 'di'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams la bltas so/ /de nas
281b7(rgyud): r ig sngags kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te de'i tshe ched
282a1(rgyud): du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /nad med pa ni rnyed pa'i mchog /chog shes pa ni nor gyi mchog /yid brtan pa ni gnyen gyi mchog/ mya ngan 'das
282a2(rgyud): pa bde ba'i mchog / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po chen po 'khor dang bcas
282a3(rgyud): pa| g.yog dang bcas pa/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen
282a4(rgyud): mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud bshad par bya'o/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mdzes pa lag na 'khor lo
282a5(rgyud): dang rdo rje thogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje zhags pa dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
282a6(rgyud): rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje dga' bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu rdo rje 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
282a7(rgyud): byi ru dang / rdo rje mdzes pa sna tshogs can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri za thams cad kyis mchod
282b1(rgyud): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung pos
282b2(rgyud): brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten skyong gis brjod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags thams cad kyis phyag byas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po
282b3(rgyud): dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / phur bu dang / drang srong bdun gyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar mos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri len
282b4(rgyud): gyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag mos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma tang+gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal
282b5(rgyud): lo| |dbang pos phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyab 'jug gis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nus phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma dang zla bas
282b6(rgyud): phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram zes phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon gyi drang srong gis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlung lhas phyag byas pa la phyag
282b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje pho nya ma'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
283a1(rgyud): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / phur bu gsum pa la
283a2(rgyud): sogs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
283a3(rgyud): par bstod do/ / //'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so// //mkhan po bid+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lots+tsha ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o//
283a4(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub
283a5(rgyud): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
283a6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol ta/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ gsang chen
283a7(rgyud): dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad
283b1(rgyud): ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga
283b2(rgyud): rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ khyod gtum pa yin/ bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje/
283b3(rgyud): khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ gsang ba med par las mi byed do/ /lag na rdo rje/ de bas na/ rdo rje'i rigs
283b4(rgyud): 'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad pa/ gsang ba/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos
283b5(rgyud): na mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer
283b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad
283b7(rgyud): ba yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / smyung bar ma byas pa yang smyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge
284a1(rgyud): sbyong ma yin pa yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad
284a2(rgyud): pa dang las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
284a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi ming brgyad pa/ gsang ba/ gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/

284a5(rgyud): yin| khyod ni/ rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni/ bden pa nyid yin/ khyod ni/ gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ /

284a7(rgyud): brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshem du/
284b1(rgyud): na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
284b2(rgyud): chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo d+ha rma s+ya/ na mo d+ha rma s+ya/ na maHsaM g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ aT+Te/ maT+Te/ kha raT+Te/ so me so me su khi/ hi ri hi ri/

284b5(rgyud): so| |de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ rig pa mchog sgrub pa na bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad pa bklag par bgyi'o/ /bklags
284b6(rgyud): na bdag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' na dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol
284b7(rgyud): bar bgyid do/ /nyal ba'i tshe bklags na/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na/

285a5(rgyud): cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /

285b4(rgyud): can thams cad srung ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad rangs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag
285b5(rgyud): na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta
285b6(rgyud): ya| g+hUr+NA g+hUr+NA/ g+hUR+NA pa ya g+hUR+NA pa ya/ sarba satwa na/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ saM b+h+ra ma ya saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ saM kuT+Ta ya saM kuT+Ta
285b7(rgyud): ya| sarba sha trU/ g+haT+Ta g+haT+Ta/ saM g+haT+Ta ya/ saM g+haT+Ta ya/ sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/ ka Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aT+Ta ha
286a1(rgyud): sa nI la badzra/ su badzra ya swAhA/ he phu l+lu/ ni ru phu l+lu/ gr-ih+Na kul+lu mi li tsul+lu/ ku ru kul+lu/ badzra be dza yA ya swAhA/ kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta
286a2(rgyud): ma Ta| ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na/ pra mo Ta nA ya swAhA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ badzra bi dA rA ya swAhA/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ma hA kI li kI la ya
286a3(rgyud): swAhA| ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ tsu ru tsu ru tsan+da kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya badzra kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ ha ra ha ra/ badzra dA rA ya swAhA/ pra ha
286a4(rgyud): ra pra ha ra/ badzra pra b+hany+dza nA ya swAhA/ ma ti s+thi ra badzra su ti s+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shI g+h+raM badzra ya swAhA/
286a5(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra ku laM A ba rta ya swAhA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badzra NAM/ sarba ba laM A brta ye ma hA ba le ka Ta be ta Ta le/
286a6(rgyud): a tsa le| maN+Da la mA ye/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba le be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ piM ga le da ha da ha/ he dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ma hA pa le/
286a7(rgyud): badzrAM ku sha dz+wA lA ya swAhA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Sh+tsaN+Da badzra pa Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/
286b1(rgyud): da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badzra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badzra hUM phaT/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/
286b2(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun
286b3(rgyud): gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs
286b4(rgyud): pa dang / /mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal dang

286b6(rgyud): sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /
286b7(rgyud): zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi zad pa yi nad rnams kyang //
287a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad zhi bar lta/ /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang / /

287a3(rgyud): dgang / /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /rdo rje rnam

287a5(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ A R+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi kha ra kU Ta gA ra d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse

287b1(rgyud): ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin
287b2(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rdo rje chen po'i seng+ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par

287b4(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa
287b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa
287b6(rgyud): dang cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang gcig yungs tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan
287b7(rgyud): pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen
288a1(rgyud): po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang /

288b1(rgyud): khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob po/ /lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par
288b2(rgyud): bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / tsha dang ldan pa byams pa'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor

291a1(rgyud): pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an+da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas

292a1(rgyud): par gyur to/ /yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dwags kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyis ming yang mi grags par

292a3(rgyud): gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/ /de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis

292a5(rgyud): r dzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas
292a6(rgyud): de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so//
292a7(rgyud): snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ /rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo / /bdud kyi ris
292b1(rgyud): kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar du zhing skrag nas byer ro/ /bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi
292b2(rgyud): lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa
292b3(rgyud): dang / dge sbyong go'u ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo / /mtho brtsams so/ /phyogs gang na gnas su
292b4(rgyud): gtol med do/ /longs la dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i gan du dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud
292b5(rgyud): kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas rang rang gi gnas su dong ste lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go cha sna tshogs pa/
292b6(rgyud): cha byad dang / rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba
292b7(rgyud): dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud
293a1(rgyud): la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas ba de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung
293a2(rgyud): zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar brlag go /rnam par gzhom mo/ /de nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu
293a3(rgyud): ste shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud

323a1(rgyud): dbang nyid stong pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang stong pa'o/ /glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir
323a2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo / /de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid
323a3(rgyud): med pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan
323a4(rgyud): ma yin pa de gzhin nyid do/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o/ /rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong
323a5(rgyud): pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo / /lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so/ /zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa

323b3(rgyud): 'bras bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

324a1(rgyud): gyur pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ni/ dmigs pa med pa/ gnas pa med pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba

344b3(rgyud): kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das/ rig 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang / brdeg pa dang / 'ching ba dang / skrod pa dang / gnod ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das/
344b4(rgyud): klu mi bgrungs pa 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ma rungs par bgyid/ ser ba 'bab par bgyid/ sad dang rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid/
344b5(rgyud): ha cang char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags par char 'bab bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rig pa 'dzin pa sngags smra bas byams pa la

344b7(rgyud): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bdag dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di

345b1(rgyud): go / gzugs 'khyil ba bdun bya'o/ /'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil ba bdun bya ste/ gzugs re re zhing yang gzugs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o/ /'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang / zho dang / lo
345b2(rgyud): ma gzhag par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o/ /pad+ma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bshag ste ba las
345b3(rgyud): byung ba lnga dang / 'o ma dang / chus dgang ngo / /yungs kar dang / 'bras yos blug par bya'o/ /sngags lan drug cur yongs su bzla bar bya'o/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang / lcags kyi
345b4(rgyud): phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o/ /ba ser skya'i lci ba 'am/ bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gra bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /

351a1(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de la rdzing bu char gyi rgyun gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so/ /

351b2(rgyud): gang gis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun tu sgrol ba dang / ha cang char che ba dang / char ma mchis pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i

358b2(rgyud): cing nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ba thos so/ /de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

365a2(rgyud): bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / pog phor dang / gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go /gtor ma dkar pos bkang pa bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag /me tog sil mas gang

365a4(rgyud): bzhir mtshams gcad do/ /de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /der klu mi srun pa rnams 'phrog mi nus/ klu chen po rnams kyang rtag tu dus
365a5(rgyud): ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba 'bebs mi nus so/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad la 'tshe yang mi nus so/ /lan 'ga' yang rtswa'i lo ma la yang 'tshe mi nus/ bcing
365a6(rgyud): ba lngas bsdams te thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /'di zla ba brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / grul
365a7(rgyud): bum dang / gsang ba pa de rnams gnas 'di las mi 'da'o/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la lan bdun bzlas pas
365b1(rgyud): klu bzlog par bya'o/ /shin tu khros pas bzlog par bya ba ni/ ma yin no/ /klu'i skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdengs ka ltar byas la mthe'u
365b2(rgyud): chung gnyis brkyang ngo / /'di ni/ klu thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /brjod ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi snying dag la gnod par 'gyur ro/ /gal te klu dag phyogs de ma rungs par bya bar
365b3(rgyud): 'dod na/ de'i tshe bye mtshan mgo la 'bab bo/ /mgo dang / mjug ma dang / khog pa ji tsam pa de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu thams cad
365b4(rgyud): sdangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur te/ /de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /klu mi pa grungs pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /khang steng du dkyil 'khor gru
365b5(rgyud): bzhi pa byas te me tog sil mas gang bar gtor la bdug pas bdugs te bum pa chus gang ba thams cad la lan bdun du bzla bar bya'o/ /gtor ma gzhag go/ seng ldeng gi phur bu la
365b6(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te seng ldeng gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad kyi nyes ba thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/

366a1(rgyud): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gdu bur byas na/ thams cad du ser ba chod par 'gyur ro/ /shing kA ra bI ra dmar po'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
366a2(rgyud): bzlas te glog 'byung ba'i tshe nam mkha' la 'phangs na/ nam mkha' nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro/ /chu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na/ grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
366a3(rgyud): 'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na/ rtse gsum pa ma byung gi bar du 'brug zer te sprin bcings par

366a6(rgyud): ba de lta bur nam mkha' lding 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'bab par 'gyur te klu thams cad skrag cing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur te/ phyis rlung dang / ser ba 'bebs mi nus

366b1(rgyud): ba'i bar la sogs pa thub par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe char dgos par gyur pa de'i tshe char 'bebs so/ /spra tshil las klu'i gzugs tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te gser
366b2(rgyud): gyis g.yogs la steng gos dkar pos g.yogs te rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste lus gos kyis dkri'o/ /rgyas
366b3(rgyud): gdab bo/ /ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor la bdug pas bdugs te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /bal po se'u shing gi lcug

366b5(rgyud): tshil la byas pa la klu thams cad kyis ming bris na/ gang gi ming gis rigs brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te/ 'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing
366b6(rgyud): bsgo ba de thams cad byed do/ /klu'i rgyal po chos can ma yin pa yul yongs su mi skyong ba/ lo tog dang 'bras bu chud gzon pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste shin tu khrus byas la gos
366b7(rgyud): dkar po gtsang ma bgos te rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ klu'i khyim de nas bud med rgan mo dag 'byung zhing / rig pa 'dzin pa ci tshol zhes zer ba dang / lan ma gdab
367a1(rgyud): par rdo rje sa la brdal bar bya'o/ /phaT ces bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /klu rgan mo de dus nas shi'o shi'o zhes zer zhing khyim du 'jug go /de nas klu rnams 'dus
367a2(rgyud): te sngangs skrag ste khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol/ rig pa 'dzin pas sngar sngags brjod la khros pas bal
367a3(rgyud): po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sa la brdabs pa dang / khye'u gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cig /kye rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol zhes smra'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pas snying rje med par

367a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dam tshig srungs shig / srung ngo / /rig pa 'dzin pas yang 'di skad ces brjod do/ /dge ba bcu zungs shig /'dzin to/ /rig pa 'dzin pas yang gsum la
367a6(rgyud): skyabs su gsol btang ngo / /rjes su 'dzin to/ /rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol/ mi dbyung ngo / /'di skad ces brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bzlas

367b1(rgyud): kyi lam rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go /de nas gdod phur bu phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin dang / klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rang gi khyim du
367b2(rgyud): 'jug pa bzhin du zhugs shing las su bya ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang du btang ba der 'gro'o/ /bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur

367b5(rgyud): med pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bya ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
367b6(rgyud): de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis klu thams cad kyi snying 'bar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba

368a1(rgyud): gzungs brjod par bgyi na/ sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das/ de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/
368a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' lding gi dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha' lding gi bdag po rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs te

368a5(rgyud): na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na ma s+t+rai lo kya a d+hi pa ta ye/ na maHtsa tur na mo mahA rA dzA nAM/ oM badzra dun+te dun+te/ mahA dun+ta/ du ti du ti/ badzra shi kha ra dun+te/
368a6(rgyud): ma Ni ka na ka bi tsi ta/ A ba ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta sha rI re/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ nA ga rA dza bi drA ba Ni hri da ya/ s+pho Ta ya badzra dun+ta na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dz+wa li ta badzra dun+te
368a7(rgyud): na| ha na ha na/ ga ru Da bak+Sha ni pa te na b+hi smi ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru ku ru/ duSh+Tan nA gA nAM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho b+ho pan na gen+d+ra spu ta spu ta spu tan+tu du nA ga sma
368b1(rgyud): sha ni kro d+ha rA dza ma hA ba la pa rA kra ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho ga ru Da ra dza ba badzra dun+te/ su bar+Na pak+Sha mahA ba le/ ma hA ka na ka bi tsi tri ma
368b2(rgyud): hUM da ra/ bak+Sha ya duSh+Ta nA gaM bi ba du b+ho bA yu ba la ka ne hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sho Sha ya shA ta ba la ha ga ga ru Da uSh+me Na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ b+ho b+ho badzra dun+ta bi tsu huM na/ bi t+yad dz+wa la
368b3(rgyud): na| hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza ya/ sarba sha ri ni mA ti kra ma si ma na/ b+ho pan nA gen+d+ra mA te/ badzra dun+te na mur nAM/ po ta yA mi/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra hUM phaT/ ma ha ma ta/ sarba nA
368b4(rgyud): gA nAM hUM hUM phaT/ ta thA ga ta ba tsa na ma nu sma ra hUM hUM phaT/ badzra pA Ni sa ma ya ma nu pA la ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ trai lokya a d+hi ba te ra ba tsa na ma nu pA la ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ sma ra sma ra/
368b5(rgyud): sa ma ya ma nu pA la/ tri rat+na sa t+ye na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ hrIHbadzra dun+ta sarba nA ga bi dra ba na ka ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ tri rat+na ma nu pa lA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ pra ma dan+ta ha da sa hUM hUM hUM

369b1(rgyud): gam| grong ngam/ gtsug lag khang de rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i sprin thams cad snum pa dang /
