371a7(rgyud): ba| mgo dgu pa mgo rgyan du thogs pa/ klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g.yas na thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g.yon na thogs pa/ gser gyis g.yogs par
371b1(rgyud): byas ta cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris la/ stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la nyin zhag gcig la sngags stong brjod do/ /nam lus kyis mi thub pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza' bar

371b4(rgyud): gnas su bzhag la/ nam than pa byung ba'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas blangs te klu'i gnas su bkur bar bya/ klu'i gnas mtshor bzhag la me tog dang bdug pa byin la yungs kar la
371b5(rgyud): sngags lan gsum bzlas te gnas su gtor na/ 'phral du klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs so/ /gal te 'phral du char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs na/ de'i phyir klu'i gnas kun tu nam mkha'
371b6(rgyud): lding gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas me lce gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur/ bye tshan mgo la 'bab bar 'gyur/ chu bskams par 'gyur ro/ /than pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan na/
371b7(rgyud): char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / char sprin la bstan na/ skad cig tu med par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun tu ser ba mi
372a1(rgyud): 'bab cing / sad dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis mi tshugs par 'gyur te/ thams cad thub par 'gyur/ rlung 'khrugs pa'i tshe lam gyi bzhi mdor gzhag go/

372b3(rgyud): so| |na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te sa myak+saM bud+d+h+ya ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra d+ha rA ya/ mahA ba la ba rA kra mA ya/ na ma ste lokya
372b4(rgyud): murta ye/ na ma sh+tsa tur NaM/ na mo badzra sha ni dz+wa la ti rau trA T+Ta ha sA ya/ dza ya mahA ba la bIR+ya pa ra kro d+ha ra brah+ma dza brah+ma sa ra/ b+ho b+ho nA ga a d+hi pa ti bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ ma ro brah+ma dAn+te nA ma
372b5(rgyud): mUrtA nAM/ pra ta ya hUM hUM phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bik+Shu tsakra hasta na bo sh+ma nA gen du ma ti biSh+Ta tsa kre shi ts+tshe n+dI mi/ tu ti tu ti/ li li li li hUM hUM phaT/ mu hu mu hu mu h+yan+tu sarba duSh+Ta nA gA nAM/ s+pho Ta ya hr-i
372b6(rgyud): da yaM ma he shwa ra dz+wa la ti tri shU la d+ha ra/ ha na ha na hUM hUM phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ tu ti tu ti/ b+ha ba b+ha ba/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi ni k+Shi ni/ tsa tur+NAM ma ri tsi nAM/ dz+wa li ta sha k+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hUM phaT/ spu ra spu ra/ bi
372b7(rgyud): spur ji spu ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ nA sha ya/ duSh+Tan nA ga hri da yaM/ s+pho Ta ya hUM hUM phaT/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ duSh+Ta ne ya sha na/ ba ti nA gan shI ta ba d+yud dz+wa la b+hasmaM ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sa ma ya ma nu
373a1(rgyud): sma ra b+ho nA ga a d+hi pa te badzra ba ya b+ho b+ho tu ti tu ti hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ badzra A sha na ni nA sha ye hUM phaT swAhA/ sarba nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ bi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swAhA/
373a2(rgyud): bud+d+ha bi lo ka tI ya swAhA/ brah+mA ya swAhA/ biSh+Nu murti swAhA/ ma he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tri shU lA ya swAhA/ tsa tur ma hA rA dza sa ma ya d+ha rA ya swAhA/ b+hu dza gA ye swAhA/ nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/
373a3(rgyud): oM d+hi ri d+hi ri swAhA/ dz+wa li ta wA ka trA ya swAhA/ ro ma hA ra nA sha ya swAhA/ dzu ti dzu ti dzu ti swAhA/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya
373a4(rgyud): ba'i gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu klu mi srun pa thams cad lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to/ /lus shig shig por gyur cing sha bkras btab par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das

373b1(rgyud): na| 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas de'i chog brjod de/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'brul lo/ /lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro/ /yungs

374a4(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ tshangs pa chen po/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / klu mi srun pa dang / snying rje med

374a7(rgyud): mi srun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

375a1(rgyud): mna' 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la/ chu dang yungs kar bsres pas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ /gtor cing dran ma thag tu klu thams

375b7(rgyud): ra d+hA nAM/ s+pho Ta yAM/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bar+Na tsakra/ hA d+ha ni b+ho pa na nA gen+d+ra/ ma ti kra ma tha brna tsakra Na/ shi ri tsan+ta ma Ni hUM ti hUM ti li hUM hUM phaT phaT mu du mu du mu gyan+tu/ sarba

378a1(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la

378a3(rgyud): mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir klu'i rgyal po ma dros ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang /
378a4(rgyud): mtha' yas dang / dung skyong dang / gzi can dang / e la'i 'dab ma dang / mdong sa bu dang / klu'i rgyal po glog 'byin dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul dang /

378a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas bor shig / a na na ste/ bi na na ste/ bi shi ki shi/ a gu bi gu re re/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ staM b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya/ pa sa sha rI rA Ni/ mi tra mi tra/ ma tra ma na

384a7(rgyud): la b+hu Sha NI ya/ ga ga na a mr-i ta saM b+ha bA ya/ rak+ta mA l+ya/ a nu le ba ni pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badzra pa Ni hu l+ya/ ba ga yA/ de ba nA ga yak+Sha rak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa pra mAr+tha nA

384b2(rgyud): b+hu ta oM/ kha kha kha kha/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA nAM/ hr-i da ya phaT/
384b3(rgyud): gan+d+harba hr-i da yaM phaT/ rak+Sha hr-i da yaM phaT/ brah+ma rAk+Sha sa hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba dz+wa ra hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba tsa tur+tha ka hr-i da yaM phaT/ sarba nA ga naM hr-i da yaM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa ba tsa/
384b4(rgyud): A bi sha A bi sha/ i dany+tsa me kAR+yaM/ ku ru badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o/ /na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ daMSh+To t+ta kA Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/
384b5(rgyud): khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ /de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs
384b6(rgyud): na| bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang / bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de la 'di ni/ bdag gi snying po lags so/ /
384b7(rgyud): oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /log 'dren
385a1(rgyud): rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song ste bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du
385a2(rgyud): gsol/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo thur du gtugs so/ /kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon
385a3(rgyud): cig / rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo shags sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom
385a4(rgyud): pa dang / gtubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig /nga'i mthu dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par
385a5(rgyud): gyis shig / gang 'di gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / de srung ba byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig /til sgrus pa'am/ zas ngan pa za yang rung / grong gi chos
385a6(rgyud): spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig /zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ /nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun
385a7(rgyud): brjod na/ de'i phyir bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo / /log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo/ /til dang / sran chung dang / 'bras dang / spen tse yang rung / snum 'khur par pa ta dang /

385b7(rgyud): con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni/ zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'o/ /de'i 'og na ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas
386a1(rgyud): na ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so/ /g.yon na ni/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /de nas snying po rnams ni/ zla ba kham blta bur gzhag go /snying

389b6(rgyud): stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par

391a1(rgyud): oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che/ ha na da ha ba tsa ma tha bi ki ra/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya dza Ti laM bo da ra/ u tsuSh+ma ko d+ha hUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ staM b+ha ya/ staM
391a2(rgyud): b+ha ya| du rA rA/ duSh+Tan ni bA ra ya/ bdag la srung shig srungs shig swAhA/ oM a nan+ta/ bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da hUM phaT swAhA/ oM d+h+r-i ka hUM phaT/ oM shri re ye/ shi ro mA li ni/ si ni

397b7(rgyud): par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin

398a3(rgyud): par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' lag

398b1(rgyud): thams cad 'bab par gyis shig / lha dang / klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog /ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las

405a1(rgyud): byed pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / mthu bo ches phyag byas pa/ rig 'dzin thams cad kyi sgrub pa brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste/ bcom ldan
405a2(rgyud): 'das| bdag gis 'khor chen po lhags pa'i mdun du rab tu brjod par 'tshal na/ rig 'dzin thams cad grub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs
405a3(rgyud): pa'i phyir kun tu brjod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur zhing / lan gcig dran pa tsam gyis kyang rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rab tu 'byin par byed cing / dkyil 'khor
405a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs nas dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / ba lang gi rigs
405a5(rgyud): dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dngos grub ster ba/ dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgyas thams cad
405a6(rgyud): 'jug par byed pa/ gzungs chen po'i sngags kyi le'u rjes su ster ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ chung du na lan gcig rjes su dran pas kyang dngos grub thams cad rjes
405a7(rgyud): su ster bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs thams cad kyi spyi bor dbang bskur du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la brtse bar dgongs te phyag rgya chen
405b1(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor dang / le'u dang | sngags kyi dngos grub rjes su stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gar mkhan mchog gnod
405b2(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gzungs sngags grub par gnas byin gyis brlab kyi/ rig
405b3(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi bdag po sgrogs shig / de nas gar mkhan mchog gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das gang
405b4(rgyud): na ba der nye bar song nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras so/ /A R+ya narta ku be ra/ mu la man+t+ra man+t+ra/

405b6(rgyud): maM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ wa ra gam+b+hi ra d+hi ri/ a su rA ga Na/ ni yu na da man+d+ha ra da sha d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra gam+b+hI ra/ d+hi ra/ phi ra phi ra/ ma phi ra ma phi ra/ a su ra ga Na ni/ su d+ha na ma d+ha naM/ ta dz+dza
405b7(rgyud): ni| bi yu mi ga / a d+ha ra a ti ga ti ra Na/ pra b+hA a nu ra tsi ti/ maN+Dal na/ ka pA la mA la/ a b+ha ba d+h+wa dzA ti/ ha sa ku la na/ ni rma laM/ saM bu laM/ sA ga ra su me ru pa ra pa ta/
406a1(rgyud): ta ri ta rang+ga sa shi kha ra d+hA tu she la pa ta/ na ga raM/ a mo g+ha da sha A di t+ya/ maN+Dal na/ sha shi/ ki raM mo li d+ha raM/ sha shi ki raM mo li d+ha raM/ tsa

406a3(rgyud): taM| shi ra bi sid+d+ha ya sha / gan+d+ha rA ba su tsi taM/ mahA me ru maN+Da la na/ kuN+Da la d+harma/ wa ra yang myos bi dwa d+harma/ b+huny+dza ka ta k+Sha ka bA su ki /sA ga ra/ naM To pa naM ta/ ga la

411b7(rgyud): pa'i dag tu 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang gu gul gyi dud pas bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gar mkhan mchog gi brtag pa las/ mig sman dang / go ro tsa na dang / gnod

412a3(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ drang srong thams cad kyis bstod pa/ gnod sbyin dang 'bar ba thams cad kyis dam tshig pa/

412a7(rgyud): du dkyil 'khor yang rab tu bya'o/ /kun tu thig bri ba ni/ shin tu mnyan par bcal te gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba cha mnyam par gcal bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi khru brgyad
412b1(rgyud): pa'i tshad la tsan+dan dkar pos legs par bri bar bya'o/ /nang gi khru bzhi'i tshad la gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang / ga pur dang bsres bas bri bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su gar mkhan mchog
412b2(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa bcu drug pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang po chen po dang /

412b6(rgyud): snod brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /nub phyogs su pog phor nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / de bzhin du shar dang / lho phyogs su yang gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma gang ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang /
412b7(rgyud): gtor ma'i bum pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'bru dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog gi phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad dang / kham phor brgya rtsa brgyad dang / bar bar du mtshon cha sna tshogs pa
413a1(rgyud): yang gzhag par bya'o/ /kha zas drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bco ba sum cu dang / ba dan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / gser gyi snod bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
413a2(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o/ /tho ba bzhi dang / 'khor lo sum cu dang / mu sa la bzhi dang / mda' bzhi dang / bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /dri sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs rim

413b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'am/ dbang bo'am/ grub pa'i sbyor ba'i dbang po'am/ ngal bso 'am/ khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed na/

414a1(rgyud): tshar ma bcad pa/ skra med pa khru bzhi'i tshad la kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya'o/ /gtsang ma'i pho gar spyad cing ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsis ri mo mkhan gyis rjes su

415a1(rgyud): ga ba te/ na ra ku pa rA ya/ bai shra ba Na su tA ya/ oM ha Na ha na/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ he he na ra ku pa rA ya/ sbyin sreg gi sngags so/ /na mo na ta ku pa rA ya/ oM
415a2(rgyud): ke la ke la/ ki la dz+wa la ni/ khi li dz+wa li ni swAhA/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas la khrus bya'o/ /na mo na ta ku pa ra ya/ oM ha hi ka ri pa kun pa ti yak+Sha ku pa ra ya swAhA/

415b6(rgyud): tsi ti tsi ti bi ci ti mud gar hUM hUM/ de nas rdo rje lta bus sor mo kun bsnol te bkug nas mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad de zlum por bkug pa snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ gnod sbyin gyi
415b7(rgyud): bdag po chen po'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba dang / klu'i rigs dang / bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad gtan nas 'byin par byed pa'o/ /oM ru ti swAhA/ phyag rgya de nyid las
416a1(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug ste mthe bong gnyis rtse sprad de brkyang pa de ni/ thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad shin tu sgrub par

416a3(rgyud): snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ gza' thams cad rnam par gzhig pa dang / gang du bcings pa tsam gyis thams cad g.yo zhing gnod sbyin dang / 'bar ba ma rungs ba myur du ma
416a4(rgyud): 'ongs na mig nol cing mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /oM na mastu ste/ shud+d+he shwa rA ya/ na ra ku pa ra/ ma tu ma a ta/ ga Na pa te/ bai shra ma Na/ sA d+hu hUM/ b+hi bi d+hi swAhA/ sor

416a7(rgyud): bkug nas gung mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni/ bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gsang ba gsum gyi spyi'i las thams cad byed pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags de brjod
416b1(rgyud): de byas na/ de ma thag tu yid la dgongs pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /thogs pa med pa'i gar mkhan mchog gi snying po'i phyag rgya zhes bshad do/ /des lha dang / klu dang /

417b1(rgyud): da doM na ta ku pa ra s+ya/ hri da ya la pa ra ta sha ta me a pa ha nam/ sa ro pa nan/ ra ra ka pa nan/ ro na pa nan/ brta nan/ ma ma na ma na ma/ tra sa na ma/ te dza na ma/ staM d+ha na ma/ dza b+hi na

418a1(rgyud): ku pa ra ku pa ra/ bu pa ku sa ra/ hriM ku ba ra/ hu dra hu dra/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha ha na ta ku pa ra/ hi hi na ta ku pa ra/ pU ra ya bU

418a6(rgyud): bya'o| |'di dag sgrub pa'i tshig ste/ yungs kar la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te grong khyer gyi dbus su yongs su gtor ma gus par byin gyis brlabs te 'bab par 'gyur
418a7(rgyud): ro| |'jig rten pa phan tshun 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang gis kyang 'tsho bar mi nus so/ /chus gtor na/ zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ral gris yid la dran pa tsam gyis 'bar ba'o/ /
418b1(rgyud): de bzhin du rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / mu sa la dang / tho ba la reg cing yid la sngags dran cing gu gul gyis bdugs pa tsam gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
418b2(rgyud): bu don gyi gzugs la yungs kar gyis bdugs na/ gzugs de 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / mthu bo che dang / dbang po dang / ngal bso po

418b4(rgyud): bkang la dkyil 'khor du me tog gis gtor nas gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags rjes su dran par byas na/ babs na 'bar te/ me long dbab par 'dod na/ dkyil 'khor byas
418b5(rgyud): nas me tog gtor te gu gul gyis bdugs na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / thams cad me long gi dbus su mthong ngo / /ji srid lha'i gnas dang /

418b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba yang mthong ste/ 'jig rten mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tho ba la dbab par 'dod na/ tho ba la rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bskus nas dpung pa la tsan+dan dang / gu
419a1(rgyud): gul gyis bskus te me long la bsdigs na/ cho ga 'dis thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa'i thod ba blangs nas shin tu bkrus nas byi

419a5(rgyud): thod pa gsum dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas gu gul gyis bdug cing sngags rjes su dran par byas nas seng ldeng gi phur bus lan gsum brdegs na/ thod pa 'bar

419b1(rgyud): khye'u dang / bu mo la sogs pa mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la dbang za ba dang / byis pa mi shes pa rnams kyis mi mthong ngo / /sngags sgrub kyang de dag gis mi

419b7(rgyud): bai shra ma Na s+ya/ badzra mu sa la tri shU la gu sha hasta s+ya/ na maHsarba de ba ta la ye/ pU dzi ta/ na masti ta s+ya/ mahA gi li ki li s+ya/ sarba ga ga ga ra Na/ yadz+dza ya ta/ b+ha ga wAn
420a1(rgyud): na de shu b+ha ba rA ya/ yak+Shi ti ba ra tsi ti/ brah+ma Ni ka la ka la/ na ta ku pa ra ku la ku la/ ku ba ra ku pa ra/ du b+hi na b+han ku ba ra/ bi tsi rim ba b+ha na/ b+ha ga wAn/

421a1(rgyud): sbyin gyi dbang po/ khyod kyis sems can la phan pa'i phyir bstan pa legs par bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha dang / klu dang /
